drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sku yi che ba rab ston cing// gsung gi snying pos gnad skul te// thugs kyi dgongs pa gtsor mdzad nas// 'jig rten dregs

pa can dang mthu stobs can// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// hU~M 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen rnams// nga yi bka' bzhin nyan par bgyi// nga ni chos sku bde chen te// ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub// snang ba'i sku la dngos po med// ye shes sku ste sku yi mchog/ nga ni sngags gsung mthu chen te// ye nas tha snyad sgra dang bral// brjod pa'i gsung la 'dzin pa med// ma 'gags gsung ste gsung gi dpal// nga ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste// ye nas mtshan med yang dag bral// gnyis med thugs las rtsol ba med// skye med thugs te thugs kyi dpal// nga ni yon tan tshogs chen te// lhun gyis grub cing bsam mi khyab// smon med dgos pa ma lus 'byung// dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhi// nga ni phrin las mdzad pa'i ste// yongs rdzogs brtson pa'i bdag nyid can// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon du spyod// sna tshogs gzhan don lhun gyis rdzogs// 'jig rten sngags bdag dregs pa can// gtso chen dbang sgyur khyed rnams kyang// nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// thugs dang ye shes gnyis su med// gsung dang dbyer ba yod ma yin// sku la so sor mi blta ste// yon tan mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs// phrin las gcig ste thun mong bsgrub// thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// nyon mongs las kyi rgyu 'bras kyi// gnas ngan len gyi phung por smin// nga rgyal dregs pa'i lus ngag sems// stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogs// che btsan dbang phyug ldan gyur kyang// yang dag nges pa'i don ma rtogs// don dam bden pa khong ma chud// spros bral dge la blo ma phyogs// rang rig rgyal ba'i stobs ma rnyed// skye med dbyings kyi rtsal ma shar// bde chen gnas kyi gdeng ma thob// mtshon med bcud kyi ro ma myos// chos nyid sku yi gzugs ma mthong// ye shes glong gi sgo ma phyed// de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyis// rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogs// lus la bdag tu yod ma 'dzin// ngag la brjod par ma smra zhig/ sems la dngos por gang ma rtog/ gnas yul rigs khams sde dang dpung// brten rdzas longs spyod dbang skal rnams// nga dang nga yir gzung bya min// thun mong dang ni tha dad gcig/ de dag ma lus stong pa ste// stong pa nyid kyang de dag go/ de las gud na gzhan med de// gzhan las gud na'ang de med cing// ma skyes ma 'gags mtshan nyid med// ma phri ma bsnan ma bslad cing// ma bcos ma bsgyur ma byung la// ma skyes ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'i// don chen de ni rang nyid las// phyi nang snga phyi steng dang 'og/ phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus dang sems// kun nas rnyed pa ma yin te// 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin no// sha khrag pags dang rus pa dang// snying dang glo ba snod rnams dang// dbang po yan

lag bcas pa la// bde chen dam pa de mi gnas// de las gzhan na'ang gnas min te// gnas ma grub la gnas zhes brjod// gnas yod mnyam na der rtogs shig/ ci 'dra ci zhig ji lta bu// gang nas 'ongs shing gang du song// gang na 'dug cing ci zhig byed// dbyibs dang kha dog ming dang mtshan// rigs dang khams la rab tu rtogs// de la de yis der bltas pas// mthong ba med pa blta ba yi// gang la gang gis gar bsgoms pas// bsgom dang bral la sgom zhes bya// ci la su zhig spyir spyod pas// spyod dgu mi gnas spyod pa che// su las sus thob ci bsgrubs pas// ma grub rang gnas 'bras bu ste// ma lus med cing rnam pa yi// yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug go/ zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyod// dbang du bsdu ba phrin las yin// rang la rdzogs shing rang gis grub// thag chod pa dang bstan pa dang// tshad ldan mthar phyin la bzla dang// 'das dang ma 'das ston pa dang// bshad dang nyan dang sdud pa dang// gnas dus yon tan skyon rnams ni// rang gi de nyid rtogs pas 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las don dam pa'i gnas nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs te// ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i// chos nyid don gyi snying po ni// gzung 'dzin mtha' bral don rtogs te// nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis// dregs shing gzir ba'i ru tra de// ma bsgral ba ni nyes pa ste// thabs dang shes rab snying rje gsum// mthun zhing mtshungs ldan sras kyis bsgral// dam pa'i don de ma rtogs par// dngos por spyad pas 'khor bar ltung// mkhas rtogs ldan pas spyad pa yis// 'phags pa mnyes shing sems can sgrol// tshogs nyid rdzogs te sku gsum thob// rnam rigs mthong bas la thag bcad// brtul zhugs drag pos bsgrub pa brtsam// dbang du bsdu dang gdul ba'i phyir// 'jig rten las kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud// nga dang ston pa rnams kyis bshad// chos dbyings rang gnas dur khrod du// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du sdud// snyigs ma rab tu bdo ba'i dus// bsdod cing btsugs las ltos pa'i chos// skyon dang yon tan tshul du 'byung// bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan can// drag sngags stobs kyis bsgral byas nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rten yin no// lha dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// rdzas rnams rgyu dang rkyen du 'gyur// ling ga nya'o dmigs pa'i rten// ming rus byang bus rnam shes dang// bla tshe 'khor ba'i rten yin te// 'gugs 'dren gyis ni de dag 'gugs// pho nyas las kun sgrub par byed// sngags dang rdzas kyi

dpal skyed cing// thun rdzas rnams kyis myos pa dang// rengs lkugs mtshon 'bebs rdul du rlogs// gnad du 'bebs shing snying nas 'dren// lha dang 'byed cing rtsa ba gcod// byang chub sems kyi dngos po ni// don po khrag gi lan bu'i mgo// kun gzhi til 'bru tsam zhig gnas// rtsa ba rlung gnas 'dra bas te// phur pa me sbal lta bu yis// bsdus shing bsregs te gcad pa yis// dmigs pa rten dang bral bar byas// bkrag dang gzi mdangs rang la 'dus// phrin las rnam bzhis gzir ba la// dge sdig ngo bo nyid du mnyam// lta spyod ldan pas zhing bcus te// pha rol bla med gnas su bsgral// bar ma do yi rnam shes ni// hU~M dang phaT kyi 'phro 'du yis// sbyang dang spar ba'i las rnams bya// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// phung po lhag ma tsam nyid ni// rten gsum gyis ni rab tu sbyang// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan par bya// 'dis ni pha rol bla na med// sprul pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang// rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yi// spyod pa rlabs chen spyad pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// las kyi bye brag 'di gsungs te// thog mar 'di la shis pa'i gnas// dur khrod chu gling ri yi sul// khros shing gdug pa'i gnas de ru// rab tu mnag cing gdeng ldan pas// dam tshig ldan pa'i sgrub po ste// yongs su rdzogs pa'i slob ma yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas shing// lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldan// rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka/ nye dang ldan pa gnyis su med// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa ste// yang dag nges pa'i rtags mthong nas// rab tu 'bad par bya ba ni// smin 'byor gdug cing shis pa'i sa// las la mngag pa de dag la// dregs pa gtso 'khor dmigs pa'i rten// 'dom gang la sogs tshad dang ldan// lte ba las ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs// bzhi'am drug gam brgyad du 'god// bar khyams phyogs bzhir sgo bzhir bcas// rim pa gsum gyi thod phreng ldan// rang gi rigs la sngags pa yi// dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang rtags// thams cad ldan pa nyid du bya// dregs pa can rnams sku yi rten// bris sam brkos sam brtsigs pa dag/ rang gi gnas su mdzes par dgod// gsung gi snying po'ang de bzhin no// thugs rten rang rang phyag cha 'am// sngon nas bsags pa'i rdzas yin no// rang sngags bsags pa'i 'khor lo dang// mthun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnams// nang du mtshon pa'i rten du gzugs// de dag tsit+ta so so ru// dmigs pa'i snying po dril te gzhug/ gsang zhing sbas pa'i rten du 'gyur// de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams su// nga yis sngar bshad rgyud

nyid la// e dbyings bzhi dang brgyad bcu gnyis// khru gang mdzub gang thur du brko// gdug cing drag po'i rdzas kyis byug/ gdug cing bsreg pa'ang de yis so// de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// rgyud med gzugs ngan ka pA la// seng ldeng gser shing yan lag skyes// dpal ldan drag po'i phur pa dang// shes nag gnam ru gnag po dang// gi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dang// zla mi gcig dang srid shig dang// tsa ra ka dang mgrin snyan dang// sa spyod chu spyod rnams kyi lus// phyi nang bar dang gsang bas brgyan// bsreg chen spyi yi mnyes pa'i rdzas// rgyan ldan gzugs dang rnga gling sgras// bsung chen dri dang sha khrag ro// tsha rtsub reg dang 'dra bcud bshos// sha chen dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i tshogs// rab tu bstar zhing 'bad pas sbyar// dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu yis// nga yi sngon gyi phrin las bzhin// khro la khros pas zhi mdzad de// tha mas gnas pa'i 'byung chen lnga// drag po sngags kyi 'byung bar bsgom// keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bam// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khang// b+han d+ha gnas rigs gsum gyis brtsigs// sti ra gsar rnying tshogs kyis gtams// rak+ta dmar po brub cing 'bab// tshil chen dud pa 'khyil zhing 'phyur// dbang po don snying 'phyo zhing 'brul// bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldan// yan lag nying lag rkang zhing snyil// shun dang pags pa brgyangs shing 'phyar// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'og/ gcus dang 'phyang ba bskum dang brgyangs// rgyal mtshan dang ni za ra tshags// ba dan bla re lhab lhub dang// phur pa dang ni ltab ma dang// yol ko ka ma la gtams ni// rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// gzhal yas 'bar ba de 'dra ba// rab tu sngags pa'i 'di las bshad// dregs pa'i bdag po yum dang bcas// sbyor zhing dgos pa de nyid kyis// bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyed// 'phro dang chas kyi khyad par dang/ bsdu dang rang gi gnas su brtag/ skur gyur gang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo dang// byang chub sems kyi bya ba yis// yum dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs// de yi las kyang sngar bzhin du// rgyal mdzad rang gi phyag rten du// dmigs pa myur lhags de yi 'khor// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang// gnod sbyin drag po'i klu dang lha// rang rang chung mar bcas pa dag/ ngas bshad bzhin du 'jigs par bsam// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag ste// lha dang ma mo rgyal po ging// btsan 'gong rmu dang mu stegs dang// rang gi sde dang dpung du bcas// ma lus dregs pa can gyi tshogs// 'di las rab brjod gang yin pa// de nyid du ni gsal bar bya// nga yi sku dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes rigs kyi dbang bskur zhing// byin gyis brlabs nas rgyas

btab ste// de la rang bzhin gnas pa bstim// yongs rdzogs sku yis bstan pa bsgrub// phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod// rab tu mnyes pa rgya cher bya// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis// bsdu dang sbyor dang sgrol ba dang// gnas dang ring dang rim pa dang// bskyed dang dbab pa mnyes pa yi// gnas lugs lhun grub ma bcos pas// drag sngags rol pa ma 'gags spyod// rang gi las la sbyar ba ni// bdud kyi khram dang gshin rje'i lto// srin po'i dmar dang gnod sbyin byad// lha yi chad dang ma mo'i rims// gza' yi ki kang klu yi dug/ tshe tshad pa dang khri mon bcug/ gcan gzan 'dzums dang lcags sgrog tshud// nad dang mtshon nyid khong zhugs dang// dug 'thungs thog babs bzhin du drag/ thar zhes bya ba gdags su med// bdud ni ma brtags srog la rgol// gshin rje 'khor ba'i 'khor los gcod// srin po ral gri'i so yis 'gems// gnod sbyin gnam lcags thog gis 'joms// lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gi sor// ma mo dpag med mda' bzhin 'bigs// gza' bdud stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdeg/ klu ni sa 'og ral gri sogs// thams cad 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags// mun pa gling 'khrugs bdud kyi skad// ngu 'bod lta bu gshin rje ste// ro len dur ba srin pos 'gren// lce mdud drag po gnod sbyin no// bka' chad drag stsal lha yi dmod// ngu 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste// 'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud do// klu yis sbrul nag dug gis 'joms// 'jig rten lha srin rang sgra yis// phal pa rnams la dmod par byed// de ni drag sngags dmod pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dmod pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// so so'i drag sngags dmod pa bstan// phung bshig bdud kyi drag sngags ni// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// shel nag snying du nya'o stsal// dur khrod ras nag rgya yis gdab// tshon sna lnga'am nag pos bcings// gri lcags spug ma srog rtsar gzhug/ yungs kar yungs nag til nag dang// ske tshe shang tshe zi ra dang// zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma dang/ dug khrag ngar dang bcas pa rnams// mu su ra yi thod par bsdu// bdud kyi srog tig sngags kyis mngag/ bdud po nag po kha mun de ba mi la cho// ka la mu tri mA ra ya/ dgra bo snying ling tsit+ta rbud/ nr-i bzlum khyigs/ bram bram ro la 'dus/ zer sprugs/ ro sprugs/ bdud rjes chod/ bdud mos rol/ bdud bus gtor/ ba~M khyigs/ bra ma ni/ sha tru~M mA ra ya rbad/ mun pa gling khrugs zhes bya ba// ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad de// rtag tu brjod cing sbug mar brab// gang la dmigs pa de myur du// snang srid bdud kyis srog nas 'dren// mi nag go mtshon

bcas pa dang// sngags nag bud med mon dang rdo// khyi nag rta nag bya nag dang// rgod nag dre nag shel nag dang/ ri nag mtsho nag shel nag tshogs// dmag dang 'khrug dang 'thab pa dang// khrid dang gsod dang sha ba dag/ las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur// de nas nya'o bstabs shing bsgral// gro mtshon phur pa rnams kyis gtub// lhag ma bdud rtsi sha rag sbyar// ku ku nag po'i zas su sbyin// rol par mi byed bskyar la bsgrub// ru tras myos shing 'thib nas 'chi// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i drag sngags ni// rgyud med pho mo ka pA la// za ma tog tu kha sbyar la// nang du de nyid tsit+ta gzhug/ pho thod steng nas spyi bor phug/ bcing dang dgab pa drang ba dag/ sngar bshad rdzas kyis brab cing brdeg/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to me/ ru tsa na yo ni/ ro ma tsa ni/ sa ma rA dza/ mu ka snying khrag rtsal rbad/ ya ma dbugs la rngubs/ ro tsa ya ma rA dza/ rA dza ba~M ril rbad/ ya ma rA dzaHhri snying gong chod// ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ ya ma du ba~M ril rbad/ gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i sngags// rab tu bsngags te tsit+tar brab// sha khrag chen pos mnyes par bya// gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis// don snying rlon par ster ba dang// snying dang thod pa 'phar ba 'byung// de nas las la sbyar byas na// gang la dmigs pa myur du sgrol// gtum khro sr-in po'i dmod pa ni// myur shi'i thod par de snying nang// dmigs pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan de// ming sngags ldan pa btsal byas te// le brgan kha dog dar gyis dril// sngo dmar skud pa'i dra bar bzhug/ sti ra gsar pa kha phye la// dbang po don snying nang grol gyi// srin po skang zhing dmod pa bzlas// rag sha srin po sa mun dzaH rag sha ru tra hur hur b+h+yo// ru gnyan nag po dgra la b+h+yo// dgra bo mu la shin ni sod sod/ hab le hob le kha thun b+h+yo// rag sha dzaH tri ta dzaH du ra du ra shan dzaH rag sha rbad// nr-i mA ra ya sod// dmod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brdeg/ mi nag shan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// khrid dang gsod dang don snying ster// las la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyis// dgra bo'i don po myur du sgrol// drag sngags gnod sbyin drag sngags ni// rta dkar snying dang thod pa ni// nya'o gzhug pa'i snod du bsngags// rag chen la phug mu sa la// snying sna khrag sna sbyar bas mchod// gnod sbyin srog tig dmod la brjod// yak+Sha ba hu da ri dzaH/ ma ga la bag sha dzaH ru ru ma ru tra ma ti dzaH yak+Sha snying la shad shad du dzaH yak+Sha srog la breng thuM dzaH ming shar tshogs dang 'od dang sgra// rlung dmar dag dang bu yug 'ong// gsang ba'i rdzas kyis drag tu brdeg/ lhag ma bsregs shing rlung gis gtor// de nyid khrag tu skyugs te sgrol// drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags ni// lha g.yag dkar po'i snying nang

du// brnag pa'i gzugs dang ming rus bris// sngon dmar skud pas ske nas gdags// rje rigs thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dar dkar gyis ni kha bcad la// tshon skud sna lngas bcing bar bya// bya rgod dar ma'i sgro rtsa ni// srog rtsar bcug la dkyil du brtol// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus bu gru gsum thur du bru// lha rdo gsum gyi sgyed po la// gong gi thod pa gzhag par bya// mthun rdzas bshos gtsang rngon cha dang// ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying// bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dang// ba dan dkar po rten du gzugs// yungs kar sngags kyi mda' chog ni// thun gyi rdzas su gzhag par bya// drag sngags snying gi nang du brab// stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas// lha rnams 'dus pa'i sngags rnams sbreng// ma hA de ba ti dzaHti dzaH/ sa ma phra man rag sha ka~M ka la ya hU~M/ de ba rA dza ma hA ni dzaH/ dgra bo ma ra ya thun rbad thun rbad/ shag sen dzaHdzaHshag sen dzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M/ tsa tur mu kha rag sha ma na/ kang ka ma ya hU~M/ ma hA de ba a mu ka mA ra ya sod/ 'jig rten grags pa mthu rtsal can// lha yi bod rbad gsad gsum dril// drag tu bzlas shing snying nas brab// rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon dang// skyes pa stag chas dar ma dang/ zhub can pho tshogs 'ong ba ni// gsod gcod byed dang snying 'byin dang/ dngos su snying phyung 'phang ba 'ong// rtags byung snying nas ling ka dbyung// mtshon gyis gtub la me la bsreg/ thal ba nya'o byas nas ni// thod par bcug la lha rten nam// 'jig rten lha chen gnas sar mnan// lha yi dal yams dgra la phebs// nang bdag ma mo'i drag sngags ni// nr-i dri'i mo yi thod pa ru// de yi snying nang ling ga gzhug/ mthing nag dar gyis kha gcod la// thod pa tshon skud lnga yis bcings// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum dbus// thod pa bcug la bsgrub par bya// smug nag gsum gyi snying khrag gis// ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchod// yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe sogs// drag po'i thun rdzas tshogs tshad la// ma mo rnams kyi dmod pa'i sngags// ma ma snying kha rag/ ma ma snying kha rag/ ma ma rak+sha/ ma ma rag sha/ trag rag sha snying khrag la hubs dzaH snying khrag rtsa la dun dun/ trag rag sha ma ma dzaHdzaH dam dam dgra snying rbad bu nan ma ma nr-i snying tsit+ta la thun/ trag rag sha trag rag sha mo thun thun/ mugs mugs myogs myogs rbad rbad dzaHdzaHma ma thun/ snying khrag thun/ sha ti ta ma ma rag mo// sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma mo'i srog tig bsdus pa yis// gsad pa las kyi ngan sngags 'di// gri lcags las byas sbu gu'am// bya rgod sgro rtsa'i nang nas bsngags// ma sring mon mo phal mo dang// byi mo la sogs bud med tshogs// bya nag rgod nag tshogs chen lhags// dngos su sha dang mgo sug ster// tsit+ta dngos su

'phar ba dang/ bsad rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang// snying la phur pas gdab cing bsad// dug shing ma la sbyin sreg bya// thun khrag dmigs pa'i dgra la 'phang// thal ba bsdus la nya'o bya// dur khrod dbus su gnas par bya// rims nad dag gis dmigs pa sgrol// drag po'i gza' yi drag sngags ni// mon pa nag po'i ra rog po'i// thod par snying nang ling ga gzhug/ srog rtsar gri lcags spu gu gzhug/ yungs kar yungs nag zangs lcags phye// thun du sngags te thod par brab// mA ra pa sha mi ki/ du ru du ru/ ma ti dz+wa la ti dzaH tsa ba ma ni/ ru ru ra hu la/ a tra ta tra pad ma sha ra sha ra shasta/ a mu ka mu ra ru phaT/ tri ling ka shang+ka du dri/ dzaHdzaHyag sha thun/ bum dril shi ni ba~Mb+ha ba hi/ kha yag kha dun ti/ ru ti shu ti ti trig shu la pra ti/ mA ra ya dzaH/ dbang chen gza' yi drag sngags 'di// drag po'i rdzas la bsngags te brdeg/ sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjen// dkar gsum dmar gsum rdzas kyis mchod// nyi zla klad la 'khor ba dang// mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang// sbrul chen gshog can 'khrug pa dang// bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang// dgra bo dngos su khrid nas 'ong// rgod dang ri dwags gsod pa dang/ don snying nang khrol ster zhing rol// de lta'i gsod rtags rdzogs pa dang// snying dang long ka hoM mer bsreg/ thun rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor// thod pa klu yi brtan sar sba// chu 'khyags ser ba drag tu dbab// hur thum nad kyis glo bur 'chi// kha lkugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyur// gdug pa klu yi drag sngags ni// lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas su// stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum brus// dgra yi pha mes mgo bo'am// yang na mdze can thod pa ru// dgra yi ming rus bris te gzhug/ gtsang ma'i snod du dkar gsum dang// mngar gsum klu sman sna tshogs dang// rtag tu mchod cing mngag par bya// o~M nag po ti pa tsa ya// nA ga rA dzaH dgra bo ha khu la phe shan/ nA ga phos phos/ shig shig/ hu ya hu ya/ ti ya ti ya/ ti pa tsa ti pa tsa/ a sha nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rA dza dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ shag ti rbad/ srog ti rbad/ snying ti rbad/ snying la ril sham sham rbad/[Â¿]o~M shan nag po pho phe rag u da nA ga rA dza nAn/ thi le nan/ pho li nAn/ drag tu brjod cing bsgrub pa yis// me chen 'bar dang chu chen brug/ ba glang sbal sbrul sdom sdig tshogs// shing gcod sa snyil brag ral sogs// lus la shu ba skrang lo byung// stobs ldan gnyen pos drag du gcun// de nas byang bltas chu mig tu// ba ling gtang zhing bden pa brdar// thod pa ling gar bcas pa mnan// klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas la gtad// phung po lhag med btang bar bsam// gnas su phyin la bsrung bar bya// dgra

ni mdze dang rmugs pas 'chi// sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyis// 'jig rten las kyi mnar ba yi// bstan pa'i ru tra gdug pa can// ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa'i sde so so'i las la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyi// so so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs dang// sde dang las kyi byed pa bstan// sngon gyi 'jig rten khams 'di nyid// phung po nyon mongs la brten nas// nga rgyal dregs pa'i dbang gis myos// rang gzhan kun la 'tshe zhing rtsod// gnas ngan len gyis kha khrid byas// legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyod// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gis// gti mug mun thibs bdud dang klu// nga rgyal stobs kyi dregs pa bdag/ lha dang rgyal po gol sar 'gyur// phrag dog gza' dang gshin rje'i rigs// 'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin rigs// zhe sdang btsan dang srin por gol// srog lus 'brel pas bdud ces bya// yi dwags gshin rje rdog rnams rje// phra mor rgyu ba snang zhing dregs// de yi don gyis srin por byung// gang gis gnod pa sbyin byed pa'i// de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid do// gang las bskyed pa ma mo ste// skyod byed nus pa lha yin no// gdug cing gtum pas mi 'chor ba// gza' zhes bya bar brjod pa yin// blun zhing myos pas klu zhes bya// 'gro ba rigs drug so so la// bdud dang lha dang lha min te// gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyu skar bcas// rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha yi sde// ma mo srin mo mi yi sde// gshin rje yi dwags sde yin te// klu ni byol song sde yin no// bdud ris pho dang mo yi rigs// ye nas gnas dang blo bur byung// 'thab dang myos dang dregs par byed// sred dang chags par byed pa ste// gshin rje las dang zhi bas ste// gzugs can gzugs med dbang can dang// dbang med phyir dang nang khyad par// las kyis rab tu bsgrims pa yi// srin po sha za rgan mo can// sprul pa dang ni gzu lums can// rab tu rgyu dang gcig pu gnas// gnod byin gtso dang 'khor gyis brtags// grol ba dang ni rang rgyud de// tha dad rigs ni bcwa brgyad de// gnod cing 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can// lha ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang// gzugs med lha ma yin du gtogs// rab tu gdug rtsub che bas ni// lha min mi ma yin du grags// gang las byung dang gang las srid// gang gis bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa// ma mo zhes su grags pa ste// las dang ye shes bsdus shing phye// phra dang rags pa'i khyad par gyis// che chung gcal dang 'khor du snang// mkha' la rgyu ba'i drag shul can// las kyi

phung po kho na'o// rgyal po bla rje bram ze dang// dmangs dang gdol pa can rnams kyis// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i yan lag 'gyur// tha dad rigs ni sde yin no// 'di dag thog ma'i las kyi dngos// dngos dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid kyis// ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin byung// bdag blta bag la nyal du gnas// g.yo 'gul phra mo'i kun nas ldang// 'khrug cing 'tshe dang rtsod par shar// bsod nams las dang de ma yin// las kyi mtha' gnyis g.yang sar lhung// gnag cing mi dge zag par bcas// kha na ma tho lung ma bstan// log pa lus ngag yid gsum gyis// gnas ngan len pa'i rgyun chags 'thud// dus gsum phyogs dang bcas pa yi// rjes su 'gro dang bzlog pa yis// 'khor ba brten gzhi dam po btsugs// so sor ma rig srog la gcod// longs spyod 'phrog cing rnam par 'tshe// gzi mdangs 'byor pa sde dang bcas// gang yin 'joms shing rlag nus la// rgyud la sdug bsngal skyed byed pa// ma rungs nyes pa 'byin byed las// srog len tshe 'phrog gcod dang sha/ myos 'thibs byi nad rims dang yams// gcog 'gyel gdug pa'i nang 'bebs shing// rme dang 'khrugs pa rtsod pa dang// thor shod las dang dmod pa yis// rang gi sde las re re yang// kun la khyab pa brgyad brgyad de// drug cu rtsa drug yan lag bcas// las kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyab// dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi// rang bzhin dgos pa'i bye brag gis// dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa dag/ tshul bzhin srung ba'i dam tshig can// drag sngags las kyi dmod pa la// brgya dang bcu gnyis bcu drug gis// nus pa rdzu 'phrul mthu la sogs// rang gi rigs la gang bsngags pa// de dang de la rab sbyar bas// las kyi mtha' la gang dmigs pa// rdo rje can gyis yongs grub ste// nga yi stobs dang nus pa dang// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan tshogs// lus ngag yid kyis rab 'bad pa// gang yin de la mngon par 'byung// de yi thun mong yongs 'grub cing// mthar phyin pa yang len par byed// 'di las ma 'ongs rnyog pa can// the tshom bskyed par ma byed cig/ nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis// 'di ni rab tu bsngags pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa can gyi sde rigs dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// las la sbyar ba'i rim pa gsungs// dur khrod chu gling ri rtse dang// chu 'dus ngam grog 'jigs su rung// phung shul nags khrod ma rungs pa// dregs pa las kyi gnas yin no// mi rus mi gsad phung shul sa// rdur zad phe ta rul chad sa// sa smin dri chen ma rungs khrag/ las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i

rdzas// rta nag dre nag ma he dang// chu glang dang ni stag seng dang// rta dkar ne le rgod dkar dang// dom nag dmu rta ban glang dang// 'brug chen rma bya rus sbal dang/ bya khyi ku ku shel dang mi// rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khrag/ bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub sems// rang gzugs snying po 'khor lo bcas// rgyan ldan shos cha mthun pa'i rdzas// dam tshig mchod cing brten pa'o// so sor sngags pa'i las khung du// thod ngan 'bru nag dug khrag g.yos// rgyu gsum phu sa mtshon cha rnams// gsad pa thun gyi rdzas yin no// rme khrag gsum dang dri ngan gsum// srog chags gsum dang rme rdzas gsum// thabs rdzas gsum dang bsreg rdzas gsum// rten sa gsum dang dril sa gsum// bzhugs sa gsum dang dbab sa gsum// kun rdzogs rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis// chu drag dbab pa nges par 'grub// rigs sul snod dang mchod rdzas dang/ gnas sbyong byang chub srid 'dor blos// legs slangs yid kyis mthun spyad pas// gang la dmigs pa der gtad pas// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rten khang la// steng 'og gnas gsum bdag po gsum// rgya mtsho'i gting dang ri rab zur// bar snang khams dang nam mkha'i dbyings// bsrung dang bzlog dang gsad pa'i las// dmag dpung bsdu dang dpal skyed dang// rab tu khros dang sbyor ba zhig/ las kyis pha rol dmod pas bzlog/ ngan pa'i thod pa sna gsum dang// shis pa ma yin sa brgyad du// rten cing 'brel pa 'byung sbyor bas// dmigs pa'i nus stobs gnon par byed// khyad par las kyi bye brag gis// rgyal po ya rabs rje dpon dang// chung ma slob dpon mkhan po dang// rab byung khyim pa sngags spyod dang// phyi rol phyogs dang chos kyi grogs// che btsan dregs pas bsnyems pa dang// nga rgyal ldan zhing skal ba bzang// kun gyis bkur zhing brjod pa dang// sems rgyud bsrel dang yun gyis drin// nye bar bstan cing slob sbyong gnas// lhag pa'i lha yis rab skyangs te// thun mong nus pa'i stobs rnyed cing// yon tan gcig gis rab bsdus pas// tshar gcad dka' ba'i yul yin te// ma lus gang la bsngags pa yis// ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs pa'i grogs// rab sngags brtson 'grus can gyis bsgral// gzhan yang zhi dang rgyas pa dang// dbang dang mngon par spyod rnams dang// rdo rje 'dzin pa nga dang gzhan// mtshungs ldan rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin// thogs med nus pa'i stobs kyis spyad// de dag gsang ba'i dmod pa yang// dregs pa sde brgyad so so yi// gal gnad snying po 'di dag go/ ya ma du ha na ha na tiSh+ta tiSh+ta ru tra ma ma sod sod/ kha tri dza ma tri dzaHdzaHshog tri dzaH yag sha dzaHda tri dzaH sha tri ba tri dzaH/ tsit+ta

pra ma ya a mu ka srog la dzaHdzaHb+h+yo/ tri tsa pa la ag shug me/ a b+h+ri sha/ a b+hi shu/ tsag kra rag sha sa ma ya dun thum ril li li/ myags myags myogs/ srog la thun rbad/ rag sha srog la phrig phrig/ a pa ti li ki ni ya ma shri hri sti b+h+ri tri ta na kro ma ri pa tra srog la dun b+h+yo// ma hA yag sha thum ril rbad/ ma ru tsed+ha sha 'gri ba pra ma ling// gsod sgra gcod byed 'phrog byed kyis// ma lus las la bsngags pa 'gyur// nr-i hur thums dzaH sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ a mu ka mA ra ya nu ma ka ma ru sod sod// gsad pa thun gyi dmod pa'o// byi sha mi ki du ru mi tri ka ta dz+wa la a ta dza la swA hA/ tsa pa ti rA hu la ma hA kro d+ha ka pa shar shar ta sha ra ti hU~M phaT/ bi shu la du ma gi sha dz+wa la a na/ ma hA tsan+d+ha rag sha hr-i da nr-i ma ya ru tra sa tri byi nA ga rA tsa be ga a nan+ta rag+sha ti san+d+ha rak+Shi na tsit+ta b+ha mi ku ru/ mu hri tsan+d+ha dum bu dum bu/ kha la rag sha thum ri li li/ ma ma sa ma ya trag rag sha trag rag sha ma tri ga na/ ma sa kha ya ku ru ti rtse b+ha li mu ta da ra da ra/ tri ka ra mi tri/ dul dul/ snying khrag la ril ril/ rtsa la thun thun/ trag rag mo hril hril/ shag shag/ shar shar rbad/ ma ma tsag sha trag tu phrom/ a se la mi byi ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha hril hril shar b+h+yo/ mA ra ya raM hril shar b+h+yo/ shel tra hU~M drag tu rtsar shu te phroM ka ra phroM// phyir ma ti ba shad/ mi ki ri ra hu la shag shag hril phob/ khrag la tsa ra mu sha b+h+yo/ trag ram thun shag ril ram shar b+h+yo/ bdud phroM kar shu ti phro/ nag hril sen shag sa du ma ya hril b+h+yo/ pra ta pa sha ya ya ma snying ya ma khrag/ ra hu la hril hril shag shag/ ser ser/ tug tug/ ya ya/ phob phob/ mu ka ye/ ka pa ye/ a pa ye/ hri sti byi krin te/ dza ba ti ra hu la ma hA kro ta ka bab ta shar shal ta te hU~M phaT/ thig nig/ shu ti phroM/ bdud phroM/ mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi reng sod/ rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru/ ho ho/ phroM phro~M/ mu ra mu ra sha/ du ru phroM/ thog hU~M oM sod sod// rlung dang sprin dang rab rgyu dang// phyogs dang rtags kyi tshad ldan pas// dbab pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya// steng 'og bar gsum drag po'i las// gzhug dang gtor dang bsreg pa'i dang// bskol dang dgug dang sbreng ba dang// bod dang dmod dang gdung ba dang// gzir dang skor dang gzhig pa dang// gcad dang dril ba'i las rnams kyis// smin pa'i lo thog 'joms par byed// nag po ti pa tsa ya na rag sha/ rA dza d+he gu la phe sha rag sha nAn/ phos phos/ shig shig hu ya hu ya/ tir+ya tir+ya/ kA la nA ban+d+ha dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH nag po ti pa tsa ya phe sha rag sha dzaH nA ga ka ka la phe sha rag sha dzaHdzaH a sha na nA ga ti pa tsa ya dgra bo ma ra ya dzaH nA ga rA dza shag ti srog ti la rbad/ snying la rol/ sham sham rbad/ i sha na nAn/ phe sha rag

sha u nAn/ nA ga nAn thi li nAn/ phi le nAn/ rtsi ri nAn/ a par sod rmag/ dul dul kA la rngubs myogs thibs// mA ra ya 'dus 'dus/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ru ru/ ra ra/ ti ti/ tri mo ti ti/ ga ru ga ra gtor dza ma ra te gad/ man dzaHphe sha na rag sha u ta nAn/ b+ha shi ni/ sha ra le/ shu ru mu le/ d+ha ta ma re na/ hu ya hu ya/ ra ti ra ti/ thi ri shag tsag gi nr-i mA ra tri ya ma du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal pa ba~M ril/ nag po ti pa rag sha nAn/ khug ro la ba~M// dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH nag po ti pa tsa/ snying la dzaH shag shan nAn/ khug thum ril rbad/ tsan dri rag sha ro la khug thun kA la snying la thum ril rbad/ kA la sho ro snying la trag sha ha ra ka/ a mu ka mA ra ya thum ril rbad nAn/ khugs dang 'gro dang las byed pa'i/ rang gi rtags dang ldan pa na/ dmigs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya// zlog dang ma grub 'khyil pa dang// 'byams dang sdug dang zad mthar gtugs// gnyan po 'dab ma sna sel dang// bsdu dang spo dang mi zad gter// longs spyod thug pa med pa yis// dbyings kyi ngang du gtad par bya// sde brgyad so so'i ming gi sngags// rang skad dmod pa'i yan lag la/ d+he ba a byi sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ pra la dun rtse phob// badzra 'grig sho sa ma ya hri b+h+yo// bsan ti ma ru ru/ ya ma trig b+hu tak+Shi pa lo hU~M/ bzlog bsgyur gdug pa'i drag sngags kyis/ las kyi mtha' sgyur ma lus par// nga'am nga dang 'dra ba yi// rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis// gang la bsngags pa de dag sbyar// gzhan gyis the tshom mi bya ste// nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// de la rig par snang ba yin// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las dmigs pa'i khyad par las sbyar ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// yon tan bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hU~M dur khrod chen po'i rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gtum drag me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// gdug byed ru tra sti ra'i khri steng na// mdangs ldan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// dregs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni// sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar// sa dgu rdzogs pas dbu dgu bstan// stong pa bcwa brgyad ldan pa'i phyag/ zhabs kyis brjid pa'i bdud bzhi gnon// dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar bas// khro zhing bzhad dang gtsigs pa'i zhal// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// khams gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigs// shangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngub// snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gengs// tshems kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrol// ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyab// khro

gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud// phrin las rigs kyis dbu la brgyan// bcwa brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis// dbang sdud rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na// dregs pa'i lha brgyad b+han d+ha g.yas// tsit+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnams// 'bar ba'i chas kyis sku la brgyan// bsrung ba'i lha brgyad sku la rdzogs// g.yas g.yon zhabs kyis dregs pa gzir// ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshed// log lta ru tra 'dul ba'i dpal// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yum// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sbyor// gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi g.yas// b+han d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon// mthing nag 'od kyis kun tu khyab// ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa 'di// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag khros shing rngam// phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po yis// rdo rjes dung khrag dkrug cing gsol// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag bzhi yis// lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta rol// yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// sku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyor// g.yas kyis nam mkha' stong khams 'degs// g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// dpal chen yab yum byin rlabs las// sprul pa'i dregs pa pho mo gtso// bdud mo nag mo kha rlangs can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// khram shing tri shUl g.yas na bsnams// g.yon gyis kha T+wAM zhags pa 'phen// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// zhabs gnyis gdug pa'i snying gar gzir// bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma// khram ba~M thod rlon phyag na bsnams// sku la zhing lpags gsar pa bgos// bdud rta nag po chibs su bcibs// zhabs kyis bgegs bshugs kyis sgrol// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ phyag g.yas thos khrag gri gug g.yon// btsun mo yum chen za byed ma// gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams// yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// ma he khros dang chu glang bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gzir// srin po gsod byed sku mdog gnag/ phyag na ral gri thod khrag bsnams// yum chen gsod par byed ma yang// gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// stag seng rol pa chibs su bcibs// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yang// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// dar nag 'phyar zhing zhing lpags brdeg/ yum chen sha za ral gcig ma// yum gyi tshul 'dzin sprul pa mo// zhing lpags gyon te gyi ling bcibs// drag sngags bdag po chen po ni// dbang phyug chen po lha yi gtso// mdog dkar shel gri ba dan 'phyar// na bza' dar

dkar ber chen gsol// chibs su gnam ru dkar po bcibs// thar pa nag po ru tra'i gtso// mchod gtor dug thun phyag na bsnams// zhing lpags gyon te dom nag bcibs// dmu bdud rje dpon nag po ni// dar nag 'phyar zhing sti ra 'drad// ber nag gsol zhing dmu rta bcibs// mu stegs kA la yag sha ni// mthing nag kha T+wAM tri shUl 'dzin// zhing lpags bgos te ma he bcibs// khyab 'jug rog ti nag po yang// khram shing dgra s+t+wa phyag gis 'dzin// sprin nag bgos te 'brug sngon bcibs// klu rgyal ba ru Na yi rje// ser nag sbrul gyi na bza' gsol// bum pa rus sbal phyag gis 'dzin// chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs// rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya ba// mdog dkar shel gri dar dkar 'dzin// sras mchog 'bar ba dmar po ste// mdung rings g.yas la shan gri g.yon// rdo rje mdzes pa mdog dmar po// ru mtshon dgra s+t+wa phyag gis 'dzin// khi le lag dgu 'bar ba yang// mdog gser sprul ba'i lag dgu 'gyed// zhing lpags bgos shing sti ra gnon// drag sngags bdag po gtso 'khor yang// rang gi rigs kyi 'khor 'dul ba// so so'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// gcod par byed pa bdud kyi sde// 'chi bar byed pa gshin rje'i sde// gsod byed shan pa srin po'i sde// gdug rtsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sde// drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sde// nag gdon 'bebs pa ma mo'i sde// nam mkha' dbang sgyur gza' yi sde// glen lkugs gdug pa klu yi sde// sde brgyad dmod pa'i drag sngags can// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// 'khor dang sde rigs brjod mi lang// phrin las longs spyod mi zad gter// yon tan nus pa dpag tu med// zhe sdang can la khros par ston// nga rgyal can la lhag par ston// 'dod chags can la mi sdug ston// gti mug can la myos par ston// ser sna can gyis 'phrog par byed// phrag dog can la 'jigs par ston// khyod kyi mi 'dul gcig med kyis// mchod cing bskang ba'i thun rdzas bzhes// bcol cing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig/ bstod cing bsgrub pas las mdzod dgyes par mdzod// de nas rang gi snying po dang// 'jig rten dregs pa'i bdag po rnams// so so'i sngags kyi las la sbyar// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// byang chub sems kyis bsam pa yis// ltos dang re ba kun spangs te// sangs rgyas bstan pa rab dmigs nas// drag sngags bdag po nyer bsgrubs na// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob cing// sems can rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// thun mong ba dang nye ba dang// mchog 'gyur ring ba'i dngos grub kun// dpa' bo de las mngon du 'byung// yon tan

mchog gi stobs rnyed cing// 'jig rten chos las rab bsngags pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang// sa chen po la rtogs pa yi// rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spyod// mthu stobs nus pa bsnyems pa yis// gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing// rang gi dbang du khugs pa dang// bsgo ba rtsod pa med par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ nyid kyi sku 'jigs byed chen po'i lugs su sku sprul te/ thugs chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i gnas thams cad las 'od kyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/ ma rungs shing gdug pa dang gtum pa'i sems dang bsam pa thams cad kyang ma lus par zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ gnod pa med pa dang/ brtse ba dang/ yid dga' ba dang bcas pas phyogs der snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang// khyod kyi bstan pa gsang chen 'di// ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu/ rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhig na// bdag cag 'jig rten dregs pa can// zhi ba'i sems su gnas byas pas// rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa// de la rgyas pa phan par bstan// phrin las dang ni lta spyod kyis// khyab pa de las yongs rdzogs shing// grogs dang bran dang dmangs bzhin du// gang gis bsgo ba de bzhin bgyi// dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan dang// rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan pa la// bka' las 'da' ba mi spyod cing// gsung bzhin bsgrub pa rab tu spro// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis// ji ltar mngags pa'i las rnams ni// bdag cag nus pas myur du bsgrub// byin gyis brlab pa gtsor mdzod cig/ ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing phyin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi bkod pa rnams rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad kyang nyid kyi sku'i dbyings su bsdus shing sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bdag bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing bzhus te gtan la phab

pa//// rgyal po khri srong lde btsan gyi bla'i phyag dpe la zhal bshus pa las brgyud pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la nA tha g+hu ya tsit+ta tsakra sid+d+hi ma hA hi ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo dngos grub chen po 'byung ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po gzi byin can la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po rngams pa'i rgyal po nyid/ lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i pho brang chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang bcas pa khro bo rngam pa'i rol pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can pho mo dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dang/ lha dang mkha' 'gro ma mang po 'dus pa'i dbus na/ chos nyid las sku bzhengs te/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba/ gsang ba'i yum dang bcas pa/ sprul pa'i srog gshed dang pho nya'i las mkhan dang/ sgrol ging shan pa pho mo dang bcas pa de nyid du lhags te rang rtags srog gi snying po/ gdug pa'i dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje gtum po la mdongs gsol du phul lo// smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM shrI ma hA kA la tri yaM dzaHdzaH/ dgra bo mA ra ya nan/ mA ra ya sod/ nag po dgra bo'i sha rgyud snying 'di thon thon/ bdud po dgra bo'i srog la dzaHdzaH/ nag po dgra bo'i bla rtsa la dzaHdzaH/ nag po dgra bo'i snying rtsa la dzaHdzaH/ nag po dgra bo'i klad pa'i rtsa la dzaHdzaH/ nag po dgra bo'i snying rgyud dbugs la dzaHdzaH/ nag po dgra bo'i rtsa rgyud srog la dzaHdzaH/ tsa dIp+ta tsakra ni hUM/ ma dIp+ta tsakra ni hUM/ bam ni ra hUM b+h+yo/ ma ma cho las la gro// ha la ha la hUM phaT/ ces rgyan gyi dmod par phul lo// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang sngags ston pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// de nas dpal mgon po chen po rnam thos sras kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ma hA kA la khros pa zhes// kA la 'od 'bar drag shul can// 'jigs byed khros pa'i gzigs mdangs can// sgrol byed shan pa rlung gi shugs// rnam par kun gyi mgon gyur pa'i// bsnyen cing bsgrub na ji ltar sgrub// bsad cing lus srog dbye ba dang// ltas ngan cho 'phrul dbab pa dang// drag po shugs kyis bsgral ba dang// lo rtog 'joms pa la sogs pa// las rim rdzogs pa ji lta bu// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje gtum pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// ma hA kA la mthu rtsal can// legs ldan nag po 'jigs pa'i sku// bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang

phyug ste// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla yin// rig 'dzin kun gyi srog shing yin// gsang ba'i yum dang sprul par bcas// ri gsum rtse 'dus dben pa'i sar// nags tshal rtsub mo gcan gzan 'grims// yid 'ong gnas su maN+Dal bsham// gru gsum mthing nag zla gam bstan// zlum po thod pa bdun gyis bskor// gru chad sgo bzhi rdo rjes ni// dbus su gru gsum bsnol ma la// 'brub gnas bzhi dang ldan par bya// ga'u steng 'og 'khor lo'i bar// tsit+ta srog rtsa dmigs pa gzhug/ kha sprad skra shad thag pas bcings// steng du dgra bshos nag po bzhag/ lug nag pags pa tsa ka li// mda' nag dar gyis brgyan pa dgod// pho rdzas dug dang mo rdzas khrag/ tshogs bo'i dgra ba'i thun yang bca'// mon mo chen po'i thod pa ru// gnag pa'i dgra bgegs bcas la bzhag/ zlum po'i thod pa re re la// dug shing phur bu re re dgod// gru chad la sogs maN+Dal te// mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'di dag dgram// sha sna lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// dkar gsum mngar gsum me tog spos// chang dang la phug tsan+dan rnams// zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dgram// mtshan ldan thod par rak+ta dang// gtor ma bshams la dbul bar bya// de nas bdag nyid skad cig gis// phyag na rdo rjer gsal byas nas// thugs ka'i sa bon 'od 'phros pas// khro bo mang pos gzir bskrad nas// gzhal med khang dag bsam dbus su// bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor tshogs// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs stong nyid las// hUM las bdag nyid khro bo'i mdun// ma hA kA la 'jigs byed che// sku mdog nag po mun pa'i mdangs/ zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ sku la mtha' ber brtsegs pa gsol// chibs su dpa' bo stag la bcibs// phyag na tsan+dan bing chen bsnams// dom dang dred kyis sna 'dren cing// lcags kyi bya khra phyi nas 'brangs// ce spyang nag po khrag rjes gcod// srog gcod khro bo 'jigs pa'i sku// spu gri mi snying thogs pa dang/ tri shUl rgyal mtshan dung 'bud dang// gsod byed mos pa bdun dang bcas// spyan drang mchod dang bzlas brjod cing// de tshe mtshan rtags byung ba dang// sgra dang 'od dang mon nag dang/ ban+de nag po slob dpon dang/ mi nag la sogs byung ba dang// dngos su sku yang ston par 'gyur// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ste rtog pa gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// bsad pa'i sbyor ba bshad par bya// bam chen mo yi thod pa ru// tshwa ba gsum dang lci ba dang// skra dang dri ma rkang rjes dang// grog mkhar sa dang dar khrag gis// dbang po tshang ba'i 'dra 'bag bya// gu gul rgya tshil dud pas bdug/ thod pa

sngags kyi 'khor lor gtum// gdug pa'i re bas kha bcad la// bsad pa'i sngags la 'jug par bya// srod dang tho rangs gung gnyis la// mda' re thun re sngags re sprugs// las rdzogs phur gdab gris gtub la// dar nag gtum la dkar nag gis// mtshan ngan thod par bcug nas ni// ka rten lha yi khang pa'am// gdug pa gnas pa'i sa ru mnan// oM shrI ma hA kA la tri yaMdzaHdzaH/ dgra bo che ge mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM shrI che ge mo kI la ya/ ki ti kI la ya/ mu+u ka kI la ya/ hri hri dam kI la ya/ pa ta kI la ya/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Nade wa/ tad+ya thA/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ phur pa gdab dang mnan pa'i sngags// brjod dang dmod pa drag tu gdab// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ bsad pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste rtog pa gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// sprul pa'i nges pa bshad par bya// gri rgod thod pa bam ril du// phung sa gsum dang mnyan sa gnyis// nang du ming rus sngags bris la// kha mig dug dang khrag gis bya// gnas khang sbas na sgra 'byin 'thabs// gzhan yang wa sprel byi la sogs// sha khrag gzugs byas rang rang rdzogs// gcan gzan gdug pa sgra 'byin cing// gnas khang 'jig dang grong khyer bskor// khra dang 'ug pa srin bya dang// kang ka ti pa mdzad la sogs// sha khrag spu la gzugs byas sba// 'dab chags bya gcan khu 'debs dang// 'thab dang sder 'dzings gnas khang 'bab// nya sbrul gdug pa klu gnas sa// sha khrag bsres te gzugs byas sba// sa bdag klu yi cho 'phrul 'bebs// ngan sngags khri phrag gsum rdzogs nas// sbyor ba smin pa'i dus chen la// grong khyer phyogs bcur cho 'phrul 'babs// oM shrI ma hA kA la tri yaM dzaHdzaH/ che ge mo ka pA li rgyas// hal hal du ling hal phob/ pi sha rtse rlung sing/ khram khram du ling has phob/ ling ling pu ta dun sham dun ling has phob/ nA ga b+ha nu ga du ling has phob/ rtsa ba dmigs pa mi dang po// sngags kyi sbyor ba bsdebs pas 'grub// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying tig gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ ltas ngan kyi le'u ste rtog pa bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// lo tog 'joms pa'i las bshad pa// drag po'i mi shes thod pa ru// yul lha yul mi ser bsrung lo// zhing khang sa la ling+ga bya// thod par brub la thun gyis gtems// rtol khrag rta yi khrag dang ni// ba mar yugs sa'i 'o ma dang/ ra dug spyang dug drag po'i thun// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe brdeg/ drag sngags sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// phyed sba phyed bsregs lhag ma gtor// lo tog 'bras bu brlag pa'i phyir// skyi 'dang 'khyags

pa ro ltar spungs// oM shrI ma hA kA la tri yaM dzaHdzaH/ rA hu la ya ma snying/ rak+Sha de si be// de wa a tsa yaM tri ya na ga/ trig nan nyag spur ya dza la raM thibs 'dus/ 'ur 'ur khroM khroM hril hril yaM yaM shar shar nal nal ser ba drag tu phob/ gza' bdud srin po lta klu btsan// rang rang sngags kyis 'dabs bskul nas// 'bras bu lo tog 'joms par byed// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las// sar ba dbab pa'i le'u ste rtog pa lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// khyad par drag po bsgral ba'i las// 'khor lo thun brab las kyi gtso// shi sa ar la gtad pa dang// ma grub spogs pa'i las mthab ni// rnal ma zlog pa lto dkrug pa// rgya shog rgyu la 'khor lo bri// mu khyud gsum pa bcu bdun rtsibs// sdig pa'am sbrul gyi khongs su bri// gcan gzan khrag dang sri can khrag/ mi dang rta yi khrag tu sbyar// rgyu rkyen drug la ling+ka bya// gri rgod thos pa'i nang du'o// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe khrag/ thun gyi rdzas su rab tu bsngags// drag sngags mda' dang bcas shing bsreg/ khri gsum sngags kyi bar du spangs// 'khor lo rtsang khar bar snang lding// brgya brgya rdzogs nas sngags thun brab// dgongs dang tho rangs srod dang gung// mon pa dang bcas drag sngags sbrel// rdzogs nas 'khor lo ling+ga kun// sha za ging ni rtsa 'am ni// yang ni lha khang rnying par mnan// de yis brlag par yang dag bshad// gal te las la mthu med na// bzlog cing dkrug pa rnal ma bya// thod pa mun pa'i 'od khung ngam// gdug pa gnas pa'i sa ru mnan// de yis las kun 'grub par 'gyur// ya bag sha ya yin pas na// kun la bya bar ma gsungs so// oM shrI ma hA kA la tri yaM dzaHdzaH/ dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ dgra bo'i srog la myogs// tsit+ta khas// rak+ta thibs hUM li mA ra ya rbad// dgra bo mA ra ya hUM li ya li// rak+ta thibs tsit+ta khas/ srog la myog la rbad/ dgra bo mA ra ya srog la myog/ hUM ling yaM ling rak+ta thibs rbad/ ngan sngags skye ba rgyun gcod de// khyad par mchog gi las su bshad/ mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ khyad par gsang ba'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste rtog pa drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa che// mgon po nag por mtshan gsol ba// las la phrin las 'di yis bskul// hUM// che btsan dpe med mgon po nag po ni// sku la dar nag 'jol ber gsol// dbu la sbrul gyi ral pa can// mi yi thod pas dbu la brgyan// gdong mig dmar la mche ba gtsigs// stag gi sma ra me ltar 'bar// snyan cha mgur chu mi thod dmar// gser ka rin chen sku yi rgyan// zhabs la l+h+wam ti l+h+wam po

che// chibs su dpa' bo stag la bcibs// phyag na tsan+dan bing chen bsnams// gsor zhing klad pa'i rgyas su 'debs// song zhig khong gi snying phyung zhig/ lha chen mgon po nag po khyod// nga la sdang ba'i dgra bo 'di// myur du sod la rnam par rgyob// smyo ru chug la 'bog tu chug/ lha chen mgon po nag po dang// lha mo nag mo gnyis su med// lha mo nag mo gshegs su gsol// lha mo nag mo chen po ste/ sku mdog dmag nag ral pa can// g.yas na bdud kyi khram shing bsnams// g.yon na nad kyi rkyal pa thogs// chibs su dre'u rta rkang gsum chibs// dra ba dgu yi he le bkal// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// sku yi sprul pa'i las mkhan ni// mun pa nag po gtum bag can// sku mdog nag po mun pa'i mdangs// tri shU la yi rtse mo la// mi ro dmar po'i rgyal mtshan phyar// dar nag ru mtshon chen po yis// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpung sdud// mgon po nag po las la b+h+yo// gsung gi sprul pa'i las mkhan ni// mon pa nag po 'jigs pa'i sku// sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs pa la// ma he'i rwa dung chen po yis// snang srid lha 'dre sgra yis 'bod/ gtum chen nag po las la b+h+yo// thugs kyi sprul pa'i las mkhan ni// lcags kyi mun pa gsod byed de// sku mdog sngo nag rngam pa'i zhal// lag na spu gri tsit+ta bsnams// spu gri'i dgra bo'i khong gshags nas// tsit+ta phyung nas gtso la stob// bdud kyi mos pa nag po bdud// bdud nag 'bum gyi sna drangs nas// nyams pa'i dgra yul dmag gis 'gengs// lho phyogs gshin rje chen po brgyad// khyod kyi 'khor dang g.yog yin pas// gcan gzan mang po pho nyar 'gyed// byang phyogs gnod sbyin chen po brgyad// lcags kyi bya khra 'jigs par sprul// nyams pa'i sha dang rus pa 'dral// dur khrod gnas kyi ma mo brgyad// b+h+yo dang dza yi sgra sgrogs shing// nyams pa'i dgra la zor thun 'bebs// lhan chen mgon po nag po ste// ma hA kA la mthu rtsal can// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgra yin// rnal 'byor yongs kyi spyi dgra yin// sngags 'chang bdag la brnyas btsugs so// srung ma khyod la phod btsugs so// zhes drag tu bskul bar bya'o// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// gsang ba mchog gi sgrub pa ste/ chos skyong mgon po dpal mgon mchog/ oM ni ye shes lnga yi dngos// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid// shrI ni bdag gzhan yongs kyi dpal// mgon gyur dpal 'bar chen po nyid// ma hA che btsan dpe med de// kA la 'od 'bar drag shul can// tri zhes sgrol ging shan pa bskul// yaM ni drag po rlung gi shugs// dzaHnyid dgugs pa'i lcags kyu yin// dmigs pa gang yin dgug pa

ste// gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la// khams gsum mthu chen bdag po ste// ma hA kA la khyod la 'dud// gang dag gsang ba'i snying po la// mos sam yid la byed pa yis// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa dang// srid gsum zil gyis gnan pa dang// me dang rgyal po chu dang dug/ ma rungs gcan gzan la sogs pa// 'jigs pa che las yongs su thar// tshe dang dbang thang la sogs pa// longs spyod 'phel zhing dbul ba sel// dpag bsam ljon bzhin rgyas pa dang// nad dang sdug bsngal rab zhi nas// 'jig rten mi nub rgyal mtshan du// grags pa chen po bla med 'gyur// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ mgon po la phrin las bcol ba dang/ bstod pa dang yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste rtog pa bdun pa'o//// mgon po nag po mo rgyud gsang ba dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ bod kyi ban+de khri btsan rdo rje la gtad pa'o// sa ma yA/ rgya rgya rgya/ kA thag kya/ rgya rgya rdzogs so//// de nas gnod sbyin chen po rnam thos sras kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ma hA kA la khros pa che// rnal 'byor kun gyi mgon gyur pa// nyid kyi sgrub pa de ltar na// sprul pa srog gshed las mkhan de// sgrol byed shan pa'i las mkhan gang// rdo rje gtum pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la 'od 'bar ba// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla yin// de yi las mkhan mon pa dang// las kyi ma bdun pho nya mngag/ las kyi mtha' ru bzhag pa yin// lcags kyi mun pa khrag 'thung ni// nag po spyi ring sol dum 'dra// ri nag brag nag logs la bsngags// bya rog rta rog mon nag khrag/ g.yag rgod brag nag sa la sbyar// gru gsum mthing nag khyi nag mgo/ yang na mon nag rabs chad thod// a mu ka yi gzugs dang bcas// dar nag gur dbu thun gyis bsad// gdug pa'i drag sngags 'di dag bzlas// dun du trag du thum b+ha ti srog breng breng dun tri dzaH/ bdud po dgra bo'i srog la dzaHdzaH/ oM sai ra phrum phrum la ga re khas ha he/ slad ni slad ne dgra bo'i srog tsa le tsa le mA ra tsa hUM dzaHhUM dzaH/ mA ra ya rbad/ bror btegs phur gdab gris gtub la// mun pa'i gling du gnan par bya// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ lcags kyi mos pa spyi ring mngag pa las/ phyi ma'i rtog pa brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// srog gcod mos pa snying 'byin te// dkar po phyA sangs mngag par bya// dar dkar nas sam rgya shog la// lha khang rnying pa'i ka rten sa// cong zi ha shig rgya tshwa dang// ra dkar rta dang bya dkar khrag/ bsres te lte bar 'khor lo bca'// 'brub gnas e gting ga'u bca'// dar dkar gur phub drag sngags

bzlas// rdzogs dang 'khor lo ga'ur bcas// lha yi khang par sbas par bya// smyo 'bog nad kyis nges par na// myur du brlag par ngas bshad do// rA tsa tsa pa la a shug me rA tsa srog la hriM hriM/ ud mad bya sangs la sham sham tsi tra ha la yang ti par rbad// khri gsum mngags la bar chad spangs// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las// dung gi mos pa srog gcod spu gri mngag pa'i le'u las/ phyi ma'i rtog pa ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// mon mo lcags kyu mngag pa ste// rdo rje sder can gtum mo khros// mngag pa'i pho nya las mkhan mo// dur khrod gnas su bsgrub par bya// sme sha 'bru nag dug gtor rten// las kyi thod pa mtshan ngan du// a mu ka yi gzugs dang bcas// dme khrag dug sna gnyan mtsho'i chu// sngags te thun gyis yongs bar bsnun// las rdzogs ling+ga skud pas dril// ma mo'i gzugs kyi zhabs 'og gzhug/ klu mo nag mo gnas sar mnan// ma trag rak+sha nag mo ting lam b+h+yo/ nag mo dun snying las la b+h+yo// mun rag+sha tsa mur kha la b+h+yo/ khrag 'thung khol ba mtshan rtags yin// rlangs dang mdog 'gyur rtags yin pas// dgra la zor 'phong brnag par bya// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las// khrag 'thung mon mo las la mngag pa'i le'u ste/ las kyi phyi ma'i rtog pa bcu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// gdug pa mos pa gzer 'debs kyi// drag sngags dam pa bshad par bya// klu gnyan gdug pa'i dben gnas su// de yi sa la maN+Dal bya// dri spos sman gyis chag chag gdab// gnyan ra dgu yi shing sna la// 'ongs ra bong yang byas te rten du gzugs// sbal pa'i lto bar 'khor lo bri// sbal nag khrag dang sbrul dang ni// ba dmar rak+ta mdze khrag la// thun dang 'khor lo bri bar bya// dkar gtor klu sman sna tshogs bsag/ gdug pa klu yi gzugs byas la// gdug pa gnas sar de yis mnan// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag go/ nA ga hu ti nA ga du ru ha nA ga du le he 'dus sa ma ya// dgra bo'i rtsa la ha la ro ga nan// dz+wa la ni dz+wa la ni shu khram myags thib la// la btsas pha long rda ba drug/ dar mda' za'u bshos bu rten// srog snying rdzogs dang dgra bo'i gnas// de nyid mthong ngam phyogs kyi rir// kha bstan sprul pa dpag med dbab// las ni srog la shan pa 'gyed// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag go/ badzra tra pa du kha thum tri dza dzaH/ rU pa sarba gu yaM ka sa li ti rgyal hal hal du ling has phob ya// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ mon pa gtum bag can las la mngag pa'i le'u ste/ las kyi phyi ma'i rtog pa bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo

rje gtum po yis// las kyi ma bdun mngag pa thun gyis sbyor ba bshad// rabs chad thod pa dri ma spangs// nang du khrag dang dug chus dgang/ gru gsum spags ma'i nang ral du// steng na a mu ka ye gzugs// khrag la dug gi thun brdeg pa// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshes brdeg/ ling+ga thun brab gnan pa bya// khrag thor dgra yi gnas la 'phangs// de yi drag sngags 'di dag go/ trag rak+sha ha la dgra bo mA ra dzaH// tsa thun mA ra ya thun sod// sha thun sod/ mA ra thun sod/ ru ru nag mo mA ra ya thun sod/ ma ma muk+ti 'gri na thun sod/ ma ma ka thun te ka sod/ ma ma rbad thun mA ra ya thun sod/ shag shag rag mo thun mugs mA ra ya thun sod/ mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ gcan gyi ma bdun gyi gsad pa ste/ las phyi ma'i rtog pa bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas gnod sbyin chen po rnam thos sras kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// mgon po nag po zhes bya ba// mtshan don ngo bo gang la bya// bsgrub pa'i tshul ni ji lta bu// las kyi bye brag bstan pa gang// rdzogs par 'khor la bshad par mdzod// rdo rje gtum pos gang gsungs pa// mgon po nag po zhes bya ba// rnal 'byor kun gyi mgon gyur yin// ngo bo ye shes sprul pa las// ye shes sku ste rdo rje che// de las sprul pa dpal 'bar ba// dam chos bsrung ba'i srung ma ste// rdo rje snying pos lung bstan nas// bstan pa de la mngon sangs rgyas// las kyi pho nya mngag pas te// bdud rgyal la sogs 'jigs pa'i 'khor// las kyi mgon po zhes su bshad// bsgrub pa rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// bstan pa'i bla srid nyer bzhag ste// dkon mchog bla ma'i don du bsgrub// rtsa ba'i sngags la nan tan bya// de rdzogs ga'u las la sbyor// de rtags sngon du 'ong ba yin// gal te las 'gor dam tshig bshags// las mtha' 'khor lo drag pos bya// bzlog dag dkrug pa drod med spangs// dpa' bo gcig pa bsgrub pa ni// spu gri snying gi 'khor lo yin// ga'u 'khor lor sgrub pa ni// nag po snying chos can zhes bya// ga'u gsang ba e rung bsad// las kyi mon gsum lto sdebs pas// gsang ba snying gcig bsgrub pa yin// las ka gang byed dregs pa'i sngags// mgon po'i rtsa sngags de la gdags// mtha' ru las sbyor gang yin bya// yi ge rmad byung gsang ba'i rgyud// dam tshig ldan zhing lta ba rtogs// dbang thob rgyun du bla ma 'khur// de la nus pa dpag med de// rdo rje snying po ngas gsungs so// zhes rdo rje snying pos gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs te/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams thams cad rjes su yi rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo las/ 'khor la

gdams pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// dngos grub chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// sa ma yA/ na ra kan/ lo ts+tsha ba gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la ag ni dzi hwo nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po me lce phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ nag po chen po dang thabs cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po ni/ dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal ri'i tshogs dbus na/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang/ mkha' 'gro dang/ sha za dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po'i tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dpal nag po chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan khro rgyal gtso// bdag gi lo rgyus ji ltar lags// bstan pa bsrung tshul ji ltar lags// phyi rabs rnal 'byor bdun gyis su// rjes su zhugs nas bsgrub na ji ltar lags zhes pas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so legs ldan nag po khyod// khyod kyi don ni ngas bshad kyis// legs shing gus pa'i yid kyis nyon// zhes pas/ gleng gzhi gleng bslangs dang bcas pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod sngon dur khrod gtums par grags pa zhes bya ba na/ a su ra'i shing gi bdag po dang/ dur khrod kyi bdag po dang/ ro langs dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ 'byung po dang/ yi dwags dang/ sha za dang/ 'dre la sogs la gnas pa'i phyogs de na/ srin po'i rgyal po yag sha ha ri zhes pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan cing bzhugs so// srin po'i rgyal po des/ rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i rgyal po'i bu mo gcig brkus nas/ dur khrod der khrid nas rang dbang med par chung ma byas so// dus de nas zla ba bdun lon nas srin po'i rgyal po de tshe'i dus byas nas 'das so// der lha'i bu mo de la sron po'i bu zhugs te/ der lha'i bu mo de srin po'i chung mar gyur pas sus kyang ma 'dod do// der mo gcig pur lus pa las srin po'i phru gu skyes par gyur to// der mo'i bu de snying rje bar tshor nas/ rang gi lus de'i lha'i rgyan phog ste/ nor bu rin po che gcig dang/ gling bar gyi nya pa la nya tshong byas

nas gsos so// gling bar gyi rgun 'bru'i sa nas rgun chang byas so// gling bar gyi sgog btsong bsnyabs nas de rnams kyis bu gsos so// de ltar gsos pas bu de yang skye drag la gzugs bzang ba gcig byung ste/ ring por ma thogs par tshar bar gyur ro// bu des ma de la smras pa/ ma gcig bdag la pha med dam zhes dris pa dang/ mas smras pa/ pha srin po yin te 'das so// bus smras pa/ de ltar yin na nga cag ma smad sdug pas rten med pa'i gnas 'dir mi sdod// ro langs kyis bsad par 'ongs pas/ dur khrod 'di'i lho phyogs na ri ma la ya mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba la/ dge slong bde ldan dpa' bo zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa yin te/ shin tu nyin mo zhi zhing nyan thos kyi cha lugs su zhugs nas/ chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i mi rtog pa'i don sgom mtshan mo ni lus gcer bur byas nas/ rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas// dur khrod khrag gi mchod pa bshams nas/ 'khor mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs bsdus nas glu dang gar du bcas nas/ dpal bde ba chen po'i mdun gyi nam mkhar mchod pa mngon sum du mdzad nas/ de'i dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs la dbang thob/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu rnam pa sna tshogs la mnga' brnyes pa zhig bzhugs so// nga cag ma smad de'i drung du 'dong/ de la skyabs su gsol la dngos grub kyis bka' don cig kyang nod/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ mas kyang bu la mnyan te/ de'i drung du byon no// der slob dpon chen po de'i spyan sngar 'khod do// lha'i bu mo des rang gi nor bu se mo do phog nas slob dpon de la phul te phyag 'tshal zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag lha'i bu mo lags pas/ las kyi dbang gis srin po chung mar gyur te/ srin po 'das par gyur nas/ bdag la srin po'i bu sbrum par gyur te/ sdug bsngal ma zad par spyad nas/ da ltar gyi bu 'di lags so// da bdag cag ma smad la mgon ma mchis pas/ slob dpon chen po khyed la mgon dang skyabs zhu na// dngos grub kyi thugs rje gcig kyang gnang bar zhu/ slob dpon gyi thugs kyis gzung bar zhu zhes gsol ba dang/ slob dpon gyi thugs rjes dgongs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu sna tshogs kyi phyag ces pa ma smad gnyis kyi spyi bor bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i dbang bskur nas/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don bshad/ de'i tshe mas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don rtogs/ bus ni sprul pa'i sku'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs la dbang bsgyur bas/ gdug pa can 'dul ba'i las kyi mnga' brnyes/ phyag mang po dang zhabs dpag tu med par sprul nas/ phyag 'gyur zhing zhabs brdabs pas sa gzhi dang ri rab ldeg par nus so// de nas slob 'bangs

'khor dang bcas pa la dur khrod kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis nyin dang mtshan du bskor ba dang mchod pa rgyun ma 'chad par mdzad pa las/ srin po'i phru gu de la slob dpon gyis gsang ba'i dbang las kyi gnyer gtad do// slob dpon bde ldan dpa' bo'i rgyal tshab tu bzhag go/ slob dpon bde ldan dpa' bo dang/ lha'i bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gnyis rdo rje dang dril bur 'gyur te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang/ me long lta bu'i ye shes su sangs rgyas nas bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gshegs su gsol/ bde ldan dpa' bos phrin las kyi mdzad spyod mthar phyir nas dbyings kyi ye shes gnyis su med par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang slob dpon chen po skal ldan dpa' bo'i dur khrod chen po'i gnas na/ sngon gyi slob dpon gyis mdzad pa'i phrin las sna tshogs thams cad ni mdzad/ 'dul ba'i phrin las sna tshogs ni 'dul/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams la sngon gyi gdams ngag rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas chos ston cing/ phrin las sna tshogs kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa las/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis nyin dang mtshan du bskor ba byed cing/ mchod pa byed de bzhugs so// de'i tshe mkha' 'gro rnams dur khrod du zas tshol du gshegs so// slob dpon skal ldan dpa' bo gcig pu nyid dur khrod na bzhugs pa las/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mngon par byung ba zhes bya ba sprul pa'i sku'i brtul zhugs mdzad ste/ phyag mang po dang zhabs mang por sprul te// rdzu 'phrul gyis gar mdzad nas ri rab gling bzhi thams cad ldeg par mdzad do// de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang po brgya byin gyis ri rab kyi rtse nas gzigs so// lha'i dbang po nyid skyes bu de'i rdzu 'phrul de la ya mtshan du gyur te 'di snyam du sems so// ma gi ni ngas ri rab kyi kha la spyan drang lha rnams kyi dmag dpon byas la/ lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i g.yul bzlog na snyam ste/ skyes bu chen po de mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni mi sdug pa'i gzugs can yin/ lha'i bu mo ni mdzes la yid du 'ong ba yin/ lha'i bu mo gcig gis brid la dgug go snyam nas/ lha dpal 'chang gar kIrti ka ti ga'i bu mo u+u ma yang/ dbu ma de ba zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing lta na sdug pa gcig yod de/ de la lha mo ni rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de la 'di skad ces bka' bsgo'o// khyod song la ma gi na skye bu dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul can cig yod de khug la shog cig/ lha'i dmag dpon byas la lha ma yin gyi g.yul pham par bya'o// ma khugs bar du khyod rang ma 'ong bar sdod la gsol ba thob cig ces bka' bsgo nas

btang ngo// de skad byas nas lha'i bu mo de dur khrod kyi gnas su dong ngo// lha'i bu mo des skyes bu de la phyag byas nas zhus pa dang/ mkha' 'gro ma bdag lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mngags nas/ skyes bu khyed lha'i mchod gnas su spyan 'dren lags kyis/ ri rab kyi rtse la lha rnams kyi dpon por gshegs su gsol zhes zhus pa dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ma gnang ste/ dpon slob bde ldan dpa' bo'i rgyal tshab tu bzhugs pa yin/ nga yang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi dpon du gyur pa yin/ dur khrod kyi tshogs bdag yin pas ri rab kyi rtse la gshegs pa min zhes zer nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ma gnang ngo// der lha'i bu mo de lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ma khugs kyi bar du ma 'ong zhig byas pas mo skyes bu chen po de yi rtsar chags so// der mkha' 'gro ma rnams dur khrod du song nas zas tshol ba'i bar du/ rtag tu brid cing mchod par byas so// slob dpon de'i thugs la gcags par gyur te/ lha'i bu mo de chung ma byas so// de yang bu bu mo 'di gnyis skyes so// bu la ni rus pa'i rgyan thod pa'i phreng ba byas te brgyan no// mtshan ni legs ldan thod phreng can du gdags so// bu mo de la dur khrod kyi dung gi khog ma gcig btags te/ ming ni dpal ldan dung skyong mar btags so// bu tsha ming sring gnyis la gling bar gyi nya sha dang/ sgog btsong dang/ rgun chang dang/ sha khrag rus pas rkan phab ste gsos so// mos kyang lha'i dka' thub nyams te dur khrod kyi zas ci za ba zos so// der mos yun ring por lon pa dang/ de'i dus na lha ma yin gyis lha'i yul phrogs nas/ rin chen sna lnga'i grong khyer sum brtsegs su yod pa dpangs cis kyang gshog thabs med par sgo la sogs pa dam pa des lha'i khang bzang bas dpag tshad gcig gis mtho ba brtsigs te/ lha'i yul gtan shor la khad pa las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri rab kyi kha nas pi wang gi brdas bskul te/ lha dang lha ma yin 'thabs pa'i dmag dpon 'gugs su btang na ji srid 'khor ram yul ni gtan shor la khad na/ bya bas bskul ba'i brda' byung bas/ mos thos te skal ldan dpa' bo la bskul ba/ shang+kar bde byed stobs po che/ skyes bu dpa' bo khyod la ngas/ ji srid du zhabs tog byas nas da nga'i tshig nyan dgos byas nas/ shaM kar bde byed na re/ ji ltar bya zer te/ nga lha'i dbang pos khyod 'gugs su btang ba yin pa la ji srid du ma khugs na/ da ni lha'i gnas su gshegs pa 'tshal zhes zhus pa la/ der gnang ste mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gsang ste/ khyo shug gnyis gros byas te zhag bdun na 'bros par bya ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la pi wang gi brda mar btang nas/ zhag bdun na shing rta'i

'khor los spyan drangs par byas so// de nas lha'i dbang pos 'khor lha tshogs mang po dang bcas nas shing rta'i 'khor lo mang po khyer te dur khrod du phyin nas// mkha' 'gro ma rnams dur khrod du zas 'tshol du song ba'i shul du/ skal ldan dpa' bo zhes bya ba de ri rab kyi rtse la spyan drangs so// der lha thams cad kyis chos bzang lha'i mdun sar phyag byas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang du mchod pa byas so// de nas lha'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis tshal chen po bzhir mchod pa byas so// de nas byang shar du shing yongs 'du+u sa brtol gyi rtsar lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig gis mchod pa byas so// de nas lho nub tu rdo a mo li'i steng du lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig gis mchod pa byas so// de yang dang po dur khrod kyi gnas nas yab yum sras dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa ni/ dur khrod gnas na legs ldan thod pa'i phreng ba can/ pad ma'i steng du hUM las sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ dar mthing nag gi 'jol ber sku la gsol ba/ gser sked rin chen sku la bcings pa/ dbu skra kham nag ral pa'i thor gtsug gcig tu 'khyil ba/ khro gnyer smin mtshams su brjid pa/ spyan gsum sdang mig tu gzigs pa/ zhal bgrad pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ sma ra mun ltar gtibs pa/ phyag na par bu nag po bsnams pa/ zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs pa/ 'jigs 'jigs rngam rngam 'dra ba la/ rang gi gtso bo rgyan du 'dzin/ pheng pheng gi sgra sgrogs pa/ oM ma hA kA la rak+sha du beM ni dzaH de skad hUM phaT sgra sgrogs shing// 'jigs byed lcam drang dung skyong ma// sku mdog nag mo char sprin la// re ldeg gos gon stag sham glang lpags gon// shan ti mtshon cha 'dzin pa 'jigs tshul can// skal ldan dpa' bo ru mtshon dpa' rtags lnga dang chas// u ma de ba 'jigs su gzi mdangs byams// de 'dra dur khrod gnas na bzhugs pa las// lha dbang brgya byin la sogs lha rnams mdun gyis gsol ba ni/ hUM/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs ma hA kA la che// tshur gshegs tshul byon dpal ldan mgon po che// 'dir gshegs lha min g.yul rnams bzlog phyir byon// dbyings nas bzhengs pa mi mkhas yang// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung slad du// 'bar ba'i skur ston 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// 'dir gshegs bdag gi longs spyod mchod par bzhes// nag po mi bzad 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// pha rol phyin spyod 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// 'bar ba'i skur ston 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// lha min g.yul bzlog 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// lha dmag dbugs 'byin 'dir

gshegs mchod pa bzhes// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs ma hA kA la che// gnas ri rab rtser gshegs bzhugs su gsol// bdag cag gsol 'debs 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// oM shrI ma hA kA la dzaHhUM baM hoHhUM phaT/ ces pas lha rnams kyis gdung ba'i dbyangs blangs pas/ rang dbang med par 'khor bcas bskyod de byon no// de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gdan rin po che nyi zla pad+ma dang ldan pa phul nas/ dar mthing nag gi gur phub nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// hUM/ ye shes mkha' 'gro sngon po'i mdog tu gyur// sku mdog sngo nag dbyar gyi sprin lta bu// dug gsum ma lus mun khams 'joms mdzad pa'i// ma hA kA la khyed nyid dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs// 'dir gshegs gdan la bzhugs nas kyang// 'jig rten pa dang mthun 'jug phyir// phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil bar mdzod// oM shrI ma hA kA la rU pa hUM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ A pe sha ya a/ zhes bzhugs su gsol nas/ lha rnams kyis phyag byas pa/ hUM/ mnyam nyid mthu mnga' gtum chen me ltar 'bar// ma rungs 'jom mdzad lha min dbang du sdud// mthar byed gzhon nu 'jigs pa'i gad rgyangs can// skal ldan dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha min dmag tshogs g.yul bzlog gtso// lha dmag dkar po dbugs 'byin pa// rdo rje dur khrod 'khor bcas la// dang ba'i sems kyi phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams gzi byin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// drag shul mthu chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes tshogs rdzogs khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrib gnyis spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lung bstan thob rdzogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'di na gang zhig gis// khyod kyis mtshan nas brjod bsgrubs na// dngos grub myur du ster mdzad pa// mi bsnyems byams pa khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// ma hA kA la khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// oM shrI ma hA kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ a ti pu ho/ na mo ya/ zhes lha rnams kyis phyag byas pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po dang lha'i ded dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis dga' ba'i tshul du phyi'i mchod pa phul ba/ me tog phreng ba la sogs rin chen dbyig/ mar me mun sel dri zhim spos kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi yon chab 'o ma kun gyi gsos// sgrib sel bshos gtsang dam pa bdud rtsi sbyar// drang srong shaM kar sku la mchod pa 'bul// lha mo u ma'i sku+u la mchod pa 'bum// legs ldan nag po'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// ma hA kA la'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// lha mo dung skyong sku la mchod pa 'bul// oM ma hA kA la rak+sha du beM beM ni dza pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na/ a d+hU

pe/ puSh+pe/ A lo ke/ g+han+d+he/ nai bid+ya/ shap+ta rat+na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye A hUM/ zhes brjod pas mchod do// nya sha la sogs pa'i tshul du dam rdzas kyi mchod pa phul ba ni/ lcags bar gyi nang du dkar gsum dang/ mngar gsum dang/ la du dang/ la phug dang/ sgog btsong dang/ rgun 'brum dang/ 'bru thug dang/ 'bras chan dang/ khur ba dang/ shing thog sna tshogs dang/ de rnams lcags bar gyi nang du bsags nas/ dar mthing nag gis kha bcad de/ 'di skad ces lha rnams kyis bskul/ me tog phreng ba la sogs rin chen dbyig/ la du la phug la sogs yod pa ni// rang sbyin 'bras bu'i zas la sogs// phyogs bcu'i chu skyes thang skyes me tog longs spyod rgyan// ris su ma bcad longs spyod rgyas par 'bul// dkyil 'khor dam pa mdzes pa dang// bshos gtsang mar me spos sna tshogs// rgun chang la sogs btung ba'i mchog/ sbrang rtsi la sogs mngar ba'i dbyig/ sna tshogs mchod pa 'di dag bzhes// dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul// gzugs dang sgra dang dri ro reg/ chos la sogs pa'i mchod pa kun// mgon po 'khor bcas sku la 'bul// zhes pas phul lo// rtsub 'gyur tshal du chang gi mchod pa dang// nang gi mchod pa phul ba ni// g.yu dri myos byed chang/ skye 'gro'i 'bru bcud/ bdud rtsi bcud kyi zas/ skyems 'phangs phud kyi mchog/ skal ldan dpa' bo gsol/ drang srong shaM kar gsol/ legs ldan nag po gsol/ lha'i gnod sbyin gsol/ skal ldan rin chen gsol/ dar nag ral ga can gsol/ rig 'dzin srog shing gsol/ dus gsum sman pa gsol/ skyes bu chen po gsol/ lha mo nag mo gsol/ 'dod khams dbang sdud gsol/ zhes mchod pas mnyes par gyur to// 'di'i tshal du mtshon pas dge ba'i mchod pa phul lo// yongs 'dus kyi rtsar lha'i bu mo rnams kyis mchod pa/ hUM gshegs shig gshegs shig gnas 'dir gshegs// bu yi gnas mchog dam pa na// khyod kyi mthun pa'i dam rdzas ni// 'byor par tshogs so thugs dam can// rgyu shug la sogs spos lnga thu lu lu// ga pur la sogs sman lnga si li li// 'bru bcud chang gi phud ni brengs se breng// rak+ta dmar gyi ar+g+ha kyi li li// b+han+d+ha rus pa'i tshogs ni khra la la// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i tshogs ni chi li li// sha chen mAM sa'i tshogs ni tshangs se tshang// mthun pa'i dam rdzas tshogs so gnas 'dir byon// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long la// lha min dmag sna bzlog tu gsol// bdag cag rnams la skyabs chen mdzod// oM ma hA kA la rak+sha du bo ni dza/ ma hA kA la rU pa ma hA mAr sa khA hi ho// mA hA rak+ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ mA hA du tri khA hi/ zhes mchod do// de nas a mo li ka'i rdo steng

du lha'i bu rnams kyis mchod pa dam rdzas bdud rtsi gtor ma dam rdzas tshang ba la/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rab brgyan cing// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// dbang po drug gi spyod yul 'gyed// dri chen dri chu'i tshogs ni rba rlabs 'khrugs// rak+ta dmar gyi rang bzhin rgya mtshor 'khyil// ma hA sha yi rang bzhin sprin ltar spungs// ke rus rus pa'i rang bzhin ri ltar spungs// dpal ldan legs ldan yab sras yum dang bcas// gtso dang 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs dam bskang// zhes lha'i bu rnams kyis mchod do// de nas chos bzang lha'i mdun sar lha rnams kyis dmag dpon du mnga' gsol te/ legs ldan nag po lha'i bu rnams kyis dmag dpon du mnga' gsol ba'i phyir/ dar nag gi 'jol ber chen po bkon/ a ka ru nag po'i dud pas bdug/ phyag mang por sbrul gyis gdub bur byas/ tsan+dan gyi bing chen phyag tu bskur/ mtshon cha dang ru mtshon mang po thogs te/ lha rnams kyi dmag dpon byas so// bu mos ni lha'i bu mo rnams kyi dmag dpon byas so// ma mos ni lha mo rnams kyi dmag dpon byas so// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par rtsub 'gyur tshal du 'dus nas/ lha rnams kyi dmag dpon skal ldan dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul grub pa'i sras/ mgon po legs ldan nag po thod phreng can la dmag dpon du mnga' gsol ba// hUM/ dus gsum bder gshegs thams cad kyis// ma hA kA lar mnga' gsol bas// dpral ba'i khro gnyer gsum dang ldan// dkon mchog gsum gyi mnga' gsol bas// khrims kyi cha lugs gsum dang ldan// rigs gsum mgon pos mnga' gsol bas// zhal gyi cha lugs gsum dang ldan// rigs gsum khro bos mnga' gsol bas// zhal gyi khro gnyer gsum dang ldan// lha srin rnams kyis mnga' gsol bas// dbu skra kham nag ral pa can// rgyu skar rnams kyis mnga' gsol bas// sku smad me lce'i lcags kyus rgyan// srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur bas// sku yi lte ba zur gsum zab// klu chen brgyad kyis mnga' gsol bas// yan lag sbrul gyi chun pos brgyan// sa bdag rnams kyis mnga' gsol bas// na bza' zab ber mthing nag gsol// 'chi bdag bdud kyis mnga' gsol bas// phyag na tsan dan bing chen bsnams// lha rnams kun gyi mnga' gsol bas// bso sgra chen po gsum dang ldan// lha min g.yul las rgyal mdzad phyir// cha sgra chen po gsum dang ldan// byol song kun gyi mnga' gsol bas// mun pa'i g.yu rung sku la gsol// yi dwags rnams kyis mnga' gsol bas// rin chen 'bar ba'i do shal can// dmyal ba rnams kyis mnga' gsol bas// spyan nas bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// shangs nas bskal ba'i rlung

nag 'tshubs// zhal nas bskal pa'i chu chen 'khrugs// lha yi dmag dpon mnga' gsol lo// chos skyong chen por mnga' gsol lo// mgon po chen por mnga' gsol lo// dkar po'i dbugs 'byin mnga' gsol lo// zhes mnga' gsol lo// der rgyal ba'i bka' bden par brjod do// dkon mchog gsum la mnyes pa'i dpang gzug ste// 'di skad brjod do// hUM/ ma nyes ma mo gzu dang dpang// dkon mchog gsum po gzu dang dpang// dus gsum sangs rgyas gzu dang dpang// dam chos bdud rtsi gzu dang dpang// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gzu dang dpang// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs gzu dang dpang// chos skyong lcam dral gzu dang dpang// phyogs skyong bcu po gzu dang dpang// lha srin sde brgyad gzu dang dpang// klu chen brgyad po gzu dang dpang// rigs gzhi'i klu rgyal gzu dpang// klu bran 'bum sde gzu dang dpang// gnyan chen 'khor bcas gzu dang dpang// rigs bzhi'i sa bdag gzu dang dpang// snang srid lha 'dre gzu dang dpang// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu gzu dang dpang// rgyal po btsan dang bdud du bcas// gzu dang dpang por khyod rnams bzhugs// nged kyis ma lan khong gis lan// nged kyis ma nyes khong gis nyes// legs nyes gnyis kyis stangs chod la// yo gal gnyis kyi thig thob cig/ lha min 'di la las mdzod cig/ ces lha rnams kyis bro brdungs/ mchi ma bton 'o dod bos so// zhes pa me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ lha min 'dus pa'i mdun du lha rnams kyis legs ldan nag po spyan drangs mnyes par byas nas/ dmag dpon du mnga' gsol ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas oM ma hA kA la rak+sha du biM ni dza/ oM shrI ma hA kA rU pa hUM phaT/ ces lha rnams kyis gnad nas bskul bas/ legs ldan nag po thod phreng can ni byang phyogs kyi gnod sbyin chen po brgyad ni lcags kyi bya khra brgyad du sprul nas sngon du 'gro zhing// dam tshig nyams pa'i klad pa rtol cing lha min rnams kyi gnyen po mdzad pa/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i gshed po brgyad ni/ stag gzig dom dred spyang ki brgyad du sprul nas phyir 'brang zhing lha min brlag par mdzad do// de lta bu'i dpa' bo de lha rnams kyis bskul ba/ dang po lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bskul
