bzlas la rab gnas bya// hUM las byung ba'i gri gug la// yu ba'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros// slar 'dus nag po'i chen por bskyed// rang bzhin mgon po spyan drang gzhug/ de nas sngags bzlas rab gnas bya// thang ka rab tu gnas pa la// dang po tshad ldan dkyil 'khor brtsigs// dam rdzas sna tshogs 'byor ba bsags// nag po bskyed la sngon bsnyen bya// 'bum drug bzlas nas spyan dbye ba// oM ma hA kA la tsak+Shu pa lam hri/ zhes brjod do// de nas rang nyid der bskyed do// rang bzhin mgon po bzhugs par bya// de nas zira'am nyung dkar la// 'bum bzlas nas ni rab gnas bya// phur bu rab tu gnas pa la// yi ge hUM las nag por bskyed// rang bzhin mgon po spyan drang gzhug/ de nas sngags kyis rab gnas bya// oM ma hA kA la kI la ya phaT// stong rtsa brgyad kyis btags pa brjod// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las/ gleng gzhi dang rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// lha bskyed pa ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po b+h+rUM las gzhan yas khang// zur gsum zur du sgo yod pa// zhing gi ka gdung grab dral la// thod pa skam rlon rtsig par ldan// gri gug yu can me ris mtshan// de yi 'og tu rdo rje brag/ mthing nag shin tu gtams pa'i steng// de steng gru gsum zla gam gsum// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mthing ga

la// gri gug mthing ga'i ra bas bskor// de steng ro gnyis bsnol steng du// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// bdag nyid thugs kar hUM byung nas// nyi ma'i steng du gnas par bsam// de las gri gug hUM gis mtshan// 'od du zhu+u nas mgon por gyur// mdog nag gzugs thung gzi brjid che// kha nas khrag chen khros tsam na// rang gis yan lag sha gcod byed// khrag gi rgyun yang 'jib par byed// slob dpon la smod bstan la sdang// dam tshig la 'chol mtshams med byed// de rnams mgor gnas rnam shes bza'// g.yas na gri gug g.yon thod khrag/ stag lpags rlon pas smad dkris shing// gtum pa spyan gsum gsus pa 'phyang// yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan// mche ba gtsigs shing spyan mig bzlog/ sku la nag po grangs med 'phro// de yi thugs kar dkyil 'khor bsam// de steng nyi steng gri gug las// rdo rje'i rtsa bar hUM gnas la// 'od 'phros rang bzhin mgon po dgug/ rdo rje 'chang gi spyan snga ru// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas 'di ru// drag po'i las la spyan 'dren bzhugs// zhes brjod pas gnyis su med par gyur// gzhan gyi khyad par ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nag po chen po khyod nyon cig/ sngar bshad pa yi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su nag po chen po ni// drag byed tshul du bskyed byas nas// rtsibs brgyad la ni go rim bzhin/ gshin rje pho nya ma dang/ gshin rje mche ba mo dang/ gshin rje be con ma dang/ gshin rje dus mtshan mo dang/ gshin rje lcags kyu mo dang/ gshin rje zhags pa mo dang/ gshin rje lu gu rgyud ma dang/ gshin rje 'bebs pa ma dang/ dur khrod ma mo 'di dag kyang// g.yas na gri gug mtshan ma dang// phyag g.yon na ni thod khrag 'dzin// gzhan ma cha lugs gtso dang mtshungs// de yi phyi rim brgyad po la// gdan gyi steng du bsam bya ba// las kyi gshin rje brgyad po ni// shar phyogs su ni ya ba te// lho phyogs su ni rgyal po'o// nub phyogs su ni til pa ste// byang gi phyogs su glang mgo can// byang shar ral pa tshar dgu ste// nub byang gshin rje smig pa bsam// lho nub gshin rje phya sangs bskyed// shar lho mtshams su mig dmar dgod// de dag kha dog sngo skya la// gri dang thod pa thogs pa'o// spyan drang cho ga gong dang mtshungs// nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las lha bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// dbang bskur cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngar bshad pa yi dkyil 'khor du// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshams byas la// nag po chen po spyan drangs la// de yi mdun du bsnyen pa ni/ 'bum du byas nas spyan phye

la// sngar bshad pa yi bris sku rten// de la gri gug thod pa dang// thang kas dbang bskur tshogs la bshad/ nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// nag po'i lha rgyud ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ni// lha rgyud bstan gyis mnyan par gyis// hUM srin po'i gzugs kyi gdug pa can// tshar gcod byang chub sems dpa' ste// grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jigs byed bdag/ gtum po khyod la bdag bstod do// hUM mdog nag gzugs thung gzi brjid che// gdug pa tshar gcod gri gug g.yas// g.yon na thod pa khrag bkang snod// thod phreng can la bdag bstod do// hUM khros pa'i zhabs brdabs sa gzhi g.yos// 'jigs pa'i gad mos ri rab bsgyil// dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'bying pa// dam tshig can la bdag bstod do// nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las/ lha rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gtor ma'i cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha ni mnyes par byed pa dang// bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// gtor ma bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// a las byung ba'i thod pa yi// nang du sngar bshad rdzas rnams bsam// 'og tu yaM las rlung bsam la// de steng raM las me 'bar bas// gtor ma'i steng du nyi ma bsam// de steng hUM las gri gug bsam// de las 'od zer gnyis su 'phros// 'og mas gtor ma bdud rtsir bsgyur// rlung gis me spar thod pa bsros// sngo dang dmar dang dkar por bsgyur// de nas steng gi 'od zer gyis// rang bzhin grub pa'i bdud rtsir gyur// gri gug nyi bcas 'od du zhu// de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya// oM ma hA kA la yA dz+nyA na a mr-i ta oM AHhUM hUM ma/ de nas sngags kyis dbul bar bya// nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las// gtor ma cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// sngags rnams thams cad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed pa/ drag byed thams cad gnon par byed pa/ bgegs thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad sgrol bar byed pa/ ser ba thams cad gcod par byed pa dang/ char pa dbab pa dang/ bcad pa dang/ yi dwags skrod pa dang/ ma mo dang 'byung po thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang/ rig sngags rbod gtong gcod pa dang/ nag po chen po'i snying po dang 'bod rbad bsad gsum gyi snying po dang/ 'khor lo'i sngags brjod par bya yis nyon cig/ oM shrI ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la shA' sa na u pa kA ri ni/ e ShA pash+tsi ma ma kA lo \u0f85 ya mi daM rat+na tra yA ya u ba ha ri Ni ya

ti pradz+nyA/ smA ra si ta dA/ i daM duSh+taM kha kha khA hi khA hi// mA ra mA ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza sa dwa me ya/ ya me do ru/ Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra yak+She ya yak+Sha yats+tsha ni ra ma ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+rU+-iHwa kr-i tA nan hUM phaT/ oM ya mAn+ta ka ha na hUM phaT/ nag po chen po rgyud dur khrod nag po las/ sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// thugs dam bskul ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nag po chen po las la bskul ba ni// nga yis bshad kyi khyod kyis nyon// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// bstan pa srung bar skyed byed pa// nag po chen po khyod ni yin pa ste// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ral pa nag po gyen du g.yeng// steng gi lta tshangs 'jigs par byed// spyan bgrad ljags 'dril bar gyi lhag don bsdig/ g.yas pa gri gug gnod sems can la sdang// g.yon pa thod khrag gnod sems khrag gang gsol// zhabs brdab gnod sems can gyi las la nyed// gang gi dkon mchog gsum khro dang// bla ma brnyas byed sems can 'tshe// bdag gis da sgos kun khug la// ling+ga 'di la myur du chug/ 'di yi sha zo khrag 'thung la// rus pa klad pa nang rol zo// rigs rgyud rtsad nas chod la shog/ mdza' bo kun dang phrol la thong// bdag gis bsgo ba ma nyan na// nag po khyod ni nyams par 'gyur// zhes bskul lo// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las/ bskul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// ling+ga bca' ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'bru nag sna tshogs phye ma la// tsha ba gsum gyis gzugs brnyan bya// dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa dang// rgya tshwa kha tshwa rtsabs ru tshwa// sngags dang dgra ming spel la bri// shi kA'i khrag dang myos byed kyis// khyad par du yang dgra ming bri// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas ni// rtsibs dang rtsi bar rnams la ni// snying po dgra ming spel la bri// mu khyud 'khor bar sngags ring dang// bsad bcas sngags dang dgra ming spel// dril nas snying gar gzhug par bya// de nas 'bod rbad bsad gsum ni// stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du brjod// de nas nag po grangs med 'phros// gri gug gis ni lus bkug nas// sngags kyi ling+ga dag la gzhug/ snying po'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// sems bkug nas ni snying gar gzhug/ de nas sngar bstan bskul bar bya// nag po las ni nag po'am// yang na dngos po song bas ni// phung po lhag ma de bkug nas// snga ma 'khrul 'khor de la gzhug/ sngags dang dgra ming spel la bri// sngar bshad pa yi dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod shing dang phub ma la// pad+ma 'dzag pa'i rak+ta dang// tshil chen gu gul nag po dang// d+ha du ra

yi 'bras bu bsregs/ gdung la tsher mas tshigs rnams dgang// nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las/ ling+ga bca' ba dang kha sbyor gyi cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// sbyin bsreg cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngar bshad pa yi thab khung du// gnag cing rtsub pa'i shing brdzangs nas// ling+ga g.yas su bca' bar bya// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang// dug gi rim pa ci 'byor dang// lcags sam thod par blugs nas ni// mchod pa'i rdzas dang g.yon du dgram// mgo las byas pa'i dgang blugs dang// tshil chen zhun mar mdun du dgram// de nas sngags pas mnyam gzhag pas// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis// dgra bgegs bkug la gzugs la bcug/ de nas phyag gi gri gug gis// sngags brjod nas ni gtub par bya// de nas thab khung de nyid du// yaM las rlung dang nyi ma dang// de steng raM gyis bzhu nas ni// gri gug hUM gis mtshan par gyur// de la me lha bsgom pa ni// mdog nag gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi// g.yas kyi dang po gri gug la// g.yon pa na ni thod pa bsnams// 'og gnyis be con ril pa'o// snying gar hUM dang lce la raM// snying gar hUM las 'od zer 'phros// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drang bzhugs// de nas me spar rim bzhin mchod// oM ag+na ye che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de yi thugs kar nag po bsam// mchod pa phul te sreg pa'i sngags// sngags dang ling+ga re re ldan// oM ma hA kA la che ge mo sarba sha trUM tu/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na/ yang na sngar bstan sngags kyis dbul/ nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// nag po chen pos gsol pa/ mnan pa'i cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mnan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// thig bzhi pa la re mig dgu// thig skor gnyis kyis bskor ba bri// de nas yi ge bris nas ni// rtsa ba'i sngags ni dbus su bri// bar ma'i cha la snying po bri// tha mar nye ba'i snying po bri// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas ni// 'bod rbad gnyis ni rtsibs par dgod// yi ge gzhi dang snying po ni// ming dang spel nas nang tsha la// bsad pa brgyad ni thad ka ste// thig les de dag 'khor bar bya// rabs chad thod pa g.yas g.yon la// bris nas de nang ling+ga gzhug/ de nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar// sbyor ba bzhi yi cho ga brtsam// de nas nyi ma dang po la// oM ya ma rA dzas do me ya/ ya me do ru che ge mo pra mo yaM ku ru hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa la/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya che ge mo rak+ta tsa ra ya sa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa la/ yak+Sha yats+tsha ni ra ma che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ya ba ti dang phywa sangs dang// gshin rje 'bebs pa ma rnams

ni// bsgrub bya'i 'khor du bcug pa'o// glang mgo can dang/ smig pa gshin rje pho nya mo// gshin rje mche ba mo rnams ni// bsgrub bya bsnyo ru bcug pa'o// gshin rje ral pa dang chos kyi rgyal po dang// gshin rje lcags kyu ma dang// gshin rje zhags pa mo rnams ni// bsgrub bya khrag tu skyug pa'o// ral pa tshar dgu dang/ mig dmar dang/ gshin rje mtshan mo nag mo dang/ dus mtshan nag mo rnams ni gsod pa'i las byed/ nyi ma lnga pa yi ge bcu pa'o// nyi ma drug pa la yi ge bdun pa'o// de dag ni bsad pa'i las la sbyar ba'o// nyi ma bdun pa la nag po chen po'i sngags brjod nas dur du sba ba'am/ yang na nyi ma bzhir byas nas dur du sbas nas rgyud mi lus par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad byas nas ni// klu brgyad bris nas bar du bcug/ klu yod gnas su sbas gyur na// de ni lo las mi 'da' bar// gang la bya ba 'chi bar 'gyur// khri 'phang brgyad pa'i mchod rten du// ling+ga log nas bcug byas te// rtsa ba'i sngags kyang gzhug byas na// de yang gong dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang 'dod yul gyi lha rten gnas// nag po bskyed la gtor ma sbyin// sngon bshad bsnyen pa tshang bar bya// yul 'dir ser ba myur du phob// bsgos na ser ba 'bebs par byed// der ni gtor ma gter du sbas// yul lha'i snying gar phur bus gdab// des ni the tshom som nyi med// sngon bsnyen gong du song ba yis// mang po spu can dkyil 'khor sngags// stong ngam khri phrag bsnyen pa bya// de nas ra ru g.yas pa ru// 'bum phrag bzlas nas nyung dkar bsags// kha gcod nas ni gnas su sba// oM kri li shag ser dril b+h+yo/ oM dza ti She shar po dril b+h+yo// oM phra ma ya kar kri phib b+h+yo// de nas mi rkang sgyed pu'i steng du mnol thod btsug de yi nang du 'o ma dang/ sngo khu dang/ dug khrag sna tshogs bskol/ rabs chad thod pas kha bcad/ 'og tu dug me 'bud/ oM bor ma'i sngags bya/ ra gsob gdab/ skyer phur lnga la 'og dang logs la oM lnga bris la bsrungs su btsug rbad bskul bya/ khyi yi thod pa la snga ma'i sbyor ba byas la khang smad du sbas na gang bsgo ba 'grub bo// thal ba'i nyul dkar la bzlas te gter na ser ba chad par 'gyur ro// de nas dur khrod shing ras la// dug dang snga ma'i rdzas rnams kyis// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gnyis bris la// rtsibs la ma gshin bcu drug bri// dbus su dgra yi ming rus sbrul nag po mgo bdun yod pas dkris/ de'i khang ni yi ge kha/ de rgyab sngar bshad sngags kyis bskor// de nas ling+ga'i bar bcug la// kha sbyar byas la thod par gzhug/ dug gis byug la sngags kyis gdab// sbrul dang sbal pa lcong mo'i sha/ dug la bsreg cing bdug par bya// phur bus btab nas klu'am ni// sa bdag mgul bskyed

gsum pa yi// bar du sbas nas rims kyis 'dzin// mdzes 'dzin pa la the tshom med// spog pa'i cho ga ni// snga ma'i rdzas rnams la ling+ga byas te/ snying gar ming rus bcug nas/ dur khrod kyi me la bdug cing/ sngags zlog nas bzlas na nges par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las/ las sbyor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// sngags rnams btu+u ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags rnams btu+u ba ma byas na// don rnams log par 'gro bar 'gyur// sngags rnams spro bar ma byas na// dngos grub 'grub par yongs mi 'gyur// sngags rnams bsre bar ma byas na// rang dgar 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur// des na sngags rnams ngas btu yis// nag po chen po nyan par gyis// drug pa'i dang po dang/ lnga pa'i lnga pa dang/ drug pa'i gnyis pa dang// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba dang/ gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar ba dang/ bdun pa'i gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa'i gsum pa la/ dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa sbyar ba dang/ lnga pa'i lnga pa la/ dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa sbyar ba'o// drug pa'i dang po gnyis su bgrang ba dang/ lnga pa'i lnga pa la/ dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa gnan pa'o// bzhi pa'i gsum pa la/ dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang ldan pa dang/ drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs yig lnga dang ldan pa dang/ gsum pa'i lnga pa dang/ de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa sbyor ba dang/ bzhi pa'i gsum pa la/ de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin/ drug pa'i dang po dang/ bzhi pa'i gsum pa dang/ de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin// dbyangs yig bcu gsum sbyin pa dang/ bzhi pa'i lnga pa la/ dbyangs yig gsum pa sbyar ba dang// de nas me yi sa bon sbyin// rlung gi sa bon de bzhin no// de nas yig ge tha ma sbyin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang sbyar// de nas rlung gi sa bon mchog/ drug pa'i dang po mchog/ de nas yi ge tha ma sbyin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang sbyin// de nas rlung gi sa bon la/ gnyis pa'i dang po gnyis gcig tu bgrang ba dang/ bzhi pa'i lnga pa la/ dbyangs yig gsum las dbye ba'o// de nas me yis sa bon la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba'o// lnga pa la yang lnga pa la/ de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin// dang po rnam par snang mdzad bzhag lnga pa'i gnyis pa la/ gsum pa'i dang po lan gnyis brjod par bya'o/ sems kyi sa bon bar du rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'o// bdun pa'i bzhi pa la/ dbyangs yig bzhi pa sbyar ba dang// me yi sa bon 'og tu sbyin// de nas bcu drug tha ma'o// bdun pa'i gnyis pa la// bzhi pa'i dbyangs yig gis sbyar te// gsum pa'i dang po la/ me yi sa bon 'og tu gdags par bya'o// de nas

drug pa'i mthar gdags par bya'o// drug pa'i bzhi la/ dbyangs yig bzhi pa sbyar/ dang po'i dang po la/ dbyangs yig bdun pa sbyar/ bzhi pa'i dang po dang/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar/ bzhi pa'i lnga pa la ni/ blo dang ldan pas lan gnyis brjod// ye shes lnga ldan dang por bzhag/ ya ma brgyad kyi sa bon la// dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan pa// spyi bo ru ni thig les brgyan// lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa'i dang po'o// snying po'i sngags btu ba'o// drug pa'i dang po dang// lnga pa'i lnga pa la/ dbyangs yig gnyis pas dbye ba'o// bzhi pa'i dang po de nyid las lnga pa'i dang po dgod do// dang po'i dang po dang/ thog mar rnam snang sa bon sbyin// dran pa de bzhin mthar sbyin na// drag po'i mthar gdags// ye shes lnga ldan dang por dgod/ bdun pa'i dang po 'og du me yi sa bon sbyin// dbyangs yig gsum pas gnan par bya/ lnga pa'i lnga pa dang/ mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang/ dang po'i dang po dang/ an+tas+tha'i gsum pa dang/ dran pa'i mthar ni gsod byed gdags/ snying po'i sngags btu ba'o// rnam snang sa bon dang por sbyin/ lnga pa'i lnga pa dang/ mthar gnas pa'i bzhi pa dang/ dang po'i dang po dang/ An+tas+tha'i gsum pa dang/ an+tas+tha'i dang po dang/ mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang/ mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang/ gsum pa'i bzhi pa'i mtha' ma gnyis/ lnga pa'i dang po dang/ mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang// ma ning bzhi yi dang po dang// bzhi pa'i mtha' ma la dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa sbyar ba dang/ dbyangs yig bcu gcig mtha' ma la// mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la// gsum pa'i dang po 'og tu gdags// dbyangs yig gsum pas mnan pa dang// yang na yi ge bzhi pa'i sgra// drug pa dang po dang/ lnga pa'i tha ma dang/ dbyangs yig gsum pas mnan pa dang/ bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la/ bzhi pa'i dang po gdags pa dang/ bzhi pa'i dang po la/ 'og tu me'i sa bon sbyin/ de nas bzhi pa'i dang po la// bzhi pa'i mtha' ma gzhag par bya// yang na bzhi pa'i dang po la// 'og tu me yis sa bon gdags// an+tas+tha'i dang po dang/ lnga pa'o dang po dang/ mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang/ ma ning bzhi pa'i gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa'i mtha' ma la/ lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ an+tas+tha'i dang po dang// bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig gsum pa bzhag pa'o// lnga pa'i dang po la 'og tu me'i sa bon gdags/ bzhi pa'i dang po la/ dbyangs yig gsum pa bzhag pa dang// de nas gnyis pa'i gsum pa brjod// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// lnga pa'i tha ma 'og tu gdags pa dang// an+tas+tha'-i gnyis pa dang// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pa sbyar ba dang/ gsum pa'i dang po la/ de yi mtha' mar ldan pa dang/

de nas dbyangs yig gsum pa dang/ gsum pa'i gsum pa la/ lnga pa'i lnga pas mtshan pa dang/ bzhi pa'i gsum pa la/ dbyangs yig lnga pa sbyar ba dang/ mthar gnas pa'i dang po la/ dang po'i gnyis pa lan gnyis brjod pa dang/ de nas dang po'i gnyis pa lan gnyis brjod pa dang/ mtha' gnas pa'i bzhi pa la/ dbyangs yig gsum pas mtshan pa gnyis dang spel bar bya'o// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa dang/ drug pa'i gnyis pa dang/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa'i tha ma dang/ sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la/ me yi sa bon 'og tu sbyin// dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan par bya// gsum pa'i tha ma ring por bya/ de nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa dang/ gsum pa'i gsum pa ring por bya/ bzhi pa'i gsum pa dang/ mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa'i dang po dang/ gnyis pa'i dang po dang/ de dag gnyis gnyis spel te brjod/ bzhi pa'i gsum pa la/ dbyangs yig gsum pa sbyar ba dang/ gsum pa'i tha ma dang/ lnga pa'i tha ma dang/ dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa sbyar ba dang/ dang po'i dang po la/ dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa sbyar ba dang/ de bzhin bzhi pa'i tha ma bzhag/ sems kyi sa bon skrod ba mthar// 'bod rbad bsad gsum sngags btu pa'o// rang byung sngags la btu ba med/ nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po la/ sngags btu ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas nag po chen pos gsol pa/ nag po chen po'i dam tshig ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// dam tshig bshad kyis nyan par gyis// nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang ma bskur bas mi sgrub cing// gri gug dang ni thod pa dang// phur bu dang ni thang ka dang// su+u la bstan par mi bya ste// rdo rje slob dpon mi smad cing// gsang ba las ni brnyas mi bya// nag po'i rgyud dang dam rdzas ni// snod min pa la bstan mi bya// nag po'i grub rtags byung gyur na// las la sbyar ba ma byas na// nag po'i dam tshig nyams gyur te// sngags pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur// bsgral ba'i zhing du ma gyur pa'i// skye bo rnams la byas gyur na// nag po'i dam tshig nyams gyur te// sgrub pa po rang gnod par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las// dam tshig bsrung pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces stsal pa dang/ nag po chen po 'khor dang rje dang bcas pa rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//// nag po chen po'i rgyud rtogs pa bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// bla ma nag po ro 'dzin dang/ gyi ljang bu dkar gyis bsgyur

cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ man+t+ra asna ka ha dza tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ man ngag brtsegs pa gri gug gi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gdon tshogs chen po dang/ thabs cig tu lcang lo can gyi pho brang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na lcang lo can gyi pho brang du gdon tshogs pa chen po dang bcas te/ dpal mgon po nag po des skye ba mang du brgyud de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnam bzhi bskyong bar thugs dam du bzhes so// de'i tshe phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje sems dpa' la phyi rabs kyi don du rgyud 'di bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas// des bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ le'u dang pos gleng gzhi bshad par bya/ le'u gnyis pas rgyud ji ltar 'byung ba bshad par bya/ le'u gsum pas mdos bsag pa'i thabs bshad par bya/ le'u bzhi pas lha bsgom pa'i thabs bstan/ le'u lnga pas spyan drang ba bstan/ le'u drug pas mchod pa dbul ba bstan/ le'u bdun pas mdos btang ba/ le'u brgyad pas sbyin bsreg bya ba/ le'u dgu pas zor 'phang ba/ le'u bcu pas sngags bzlas pa bstan/ le'u+u bcu gcig pas 'khor lo bri ba bstan/ le'u bcu gnyis pas gnan pa bya ba bstan/ le'u bcu gsum pas ser ba dbab pa bstan pa/ le'u bco lnga pas klu la gtad pa bstan pa/ le'u bcu drug pas sre'u gso ba bstan pa/ le'u bcu bdun pas klus zin pa gso ba bstan/ le'u bco brgyad pas gzungs bton cing smon lam gdab pa bstan pa/ le'u bcu dgu pas 'khor gyis gtso bo la bstod pa/ le'u nyi shu pas mgon po la bstod pa/ le'u nyer gcig pas brgyud pa'i rim pa bstan pa'o// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// rgyud ji ltar byung ba bstan pa ni/ rin po che dpung rgyan gyi rgyud dang/ dpung rnam par bkod pa'i rgyud dang/ khro bo me 'bar gyi rgyud dang/ rdo rje rtso mo'i rgyud dang/ thod pa nag po'i rgyud/ char sprin nag po'i rgyud/ rin po che dpung bkod pa'i rgyud/ 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud/ gsang ba nag po'i rgyud kyang bshad do// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ rgyud ji ltar byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'di dag sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mdun du lha rnams spyan drangs la// bdun po rnam dag byas nas ni// rang gis sdom pa dag kyang bzung// gzhung dang ldan pa'i gnas dag tu// rgyud las byung ba'i gsang sngags 'di// sum 'bum drug 'bum

dgu 'bum bzlas// bzlas pa'i tshad du phyin pa dang// las 'di thams cad brtsam pas 'grub// rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa dang// gzhan gyi rig sngags byung ba dang// rig sngags phar la gtang 'dod na// gang dmigs gso bar 'dod pa des// 'bru sna bdun gyi ngar phye la// gzugs ni khru gang tshad du phyin// bcu gsum dag gi gzugs byas la// rbab kyang rnab zer skra la lung thang mig/ mgron bu'i so la zho sha'i snying// gang dmigs gso bar 'dod pa de'i// 'phang ba'i nor phogs mgul du gdab// gces pa'i gos phud lus la bskon// dar mtshon sna lnga'i rgya mtshan dang// bal tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang// mi bo de la gzug par bya// lug nag khyi nag g.yag nag dang// bya nag shang shang rma bya dang// stag dang gzig dang glang po che// bcu gsum gzugs su byas pa rnams// rin chen sna lnga sder du dgram// btsod dang zhu mkhan rgya skyegs dang// 'brang rgyas phyed dkar phyed nag dang// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro'i rdzas su bsags// dkar gsum mngar gsum sman sna tshogs// 'khor gyis chos skyong rdzas su bsags// gang dmigs bsad pa'i 'dod pa na// sbrul nag gi ni chun bskor dang// ral pa dmar nag dag tu bya// tsha ba gsum la gang dmigs bri// dpral bar rus la kha ru ming// spyi bo snying ga lte ba ru// spyi bo srog gi snying po dang// ha na badzra lte ba ru// gsal ba'i mar me btang nas ni// sngags kyi phreng bas bskor nas kyang// dur khrod dag du bsreg pa na// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang// myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ mdos btang ba'i le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas lha bsgom bshad par bya// tshad med stong pa'i rang bzhin la// yaM baM raM laM hUM la sogs// A li kA li'i 'phro 'du las// thig le hUM gyur rdo rje ste// rdo rje dang po'i mgon por bsgom// ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar zhing// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug po// nag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni/ g.yas kyi phyag tu bsam bya zhing// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni// g.yon gyi phyag tu bsam bya bar// sku gsung thugs dang ldan par bsgom// dbu rgyan cod pan de bzhin te// mtshan dang dpe byad dang yang ldan// de yi mdun du bsam bya ba// sku gsung thugs las byung ba yi// hUM yig sngon po bsam par bya// hUM las mgon po nag po bskyed// mdog nag shin tu 'jigs mdzad pa// gsus khyim che la rkang lag thung// mgrin pa sbom la zhal mdog nag/ mche ba gtsig pa smin mtshams gnyer// dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes// gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams// sku la thod pa dag gis brgyan// de yi sprul pas 'jig rten gang// mkha' 'gro shugs

'gro'i tshogs dang bcas// 'byung po phyogs skyong tshogs bcas kyis// thams cad bskor nas 'dud par bskyed// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ lha bsgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas spyan drang ba bshad par bya ste// hUM mgon po'i thugs dam bskang ba dang// gzhan gyi gnod pa bsal ba dang// bdag gi las bcol grub pa'i phyir// mgon po nag po spyan 'dren gyi// hUM bde chen 'du 'bral med pa'i klong dkyil nas// yang dag sku gcig gshegs su gsol// lha chen dpal 'bar spyan 'dren gyi// nag po chen po gshegs su gsol// oM dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur spyon chos skyong mgon po'i tshogs// dri za me lha gshin rje dang// bden bral chu lha rlung lha dang// gnod sbyin dbang ldan la sogs pa// lha dang gshin rje chen po dang// srin po ro langs gsod byed dang// klu yi bu mo tshogs bcas dang// gnod sbyin 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas// nyi zla sa bdag la sogs pas// so so rang rang gnas nas 'dir gshegs shig/ ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ spyan drang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang gtor ma bshad par bya'o// 'bras chen sha dang chang dang ni// me tog bdug pa byug pa dang// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang// khur ba shing thog sna tshogs kyis// gtor ma sbyin pas mnyes par bya// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ gtor ma'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas mdos kyi cho ga bshad par bya// hUM 'bru sna bdun las byas pa'i ngar gyi mi bo che// rbab zer skra la lung thang mig/ mgron bu'i so la zho sha'i snying// gces pa'i nor phogs mgul du btags// phongs pa'i gos phud lus la bskon// dar tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan btsugs// mchod rdzas mang po gral du bshams// mdos kyis bdag pos mdos bzhes shig/ hUM bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// shin tu mi bzad ma hA kA la'i sku// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sku mdog mthing nag la// 'jigs pa'i na bza' ber smug sku la gsol// thugs rje rtags kyi thod pas sku la brgyan// g.yas kyi phyag na gcod pa'i gri gug bsnams// g.yon pa thod pa khrag gis bkang ba 'dzin// dbu skra ral pa'i thor tshugs gcig tu 'khyil// gdug pa sbrul gyi chun pos dbu skra bcing// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs par bstan pa ni// don dam dbyings las 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags// sku la dar nag 'jol ber gsol ba ni// thugs rje'i sprul pas 'gro don byed pa'i rtags// thod pa'i phreng bas sku la brgyan pa ni// thugs rje'i sprul pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rtags// dbu skra ral pa gcig tu 'khyil ba ni// thams cad chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa'i rtags// gdug pa

sbrul kyi chun pos brgyan pa ni// nyon mongs dug lnga ma lus spangs pa'i rtags// g.yas na gcod byed gri gug bsnams pa ni// rnam rtog bag chags ma lus gcod pa'i rtags// g.yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba ni// rnam rtog nyon mongs thams cad zad pa'i rtags// hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ste// khyod kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab// seng+ga la yi dur khrod du// srin po gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// thugs rje'i shugs kyi sprul pa'i sku// gsod byed ma hA kA la ste// dar nag 'jol ber sku la gsol// gser ka rin chen sku la bcings// g.yas na tsan+dan bing chen bsnams// gsor zhing klad pa'i dkyil du brdeg/ g.yon pa'i thod pa khrag gis bkang// 'byung po'i snying khrag dron mo 'thung// phyogs mtshams steng 'og la sogs pa// ma hA kA la'i tshogs su gtams// srin po dang ni srin mo rnams// 'byung po yi dwags ma lus kun// gsod dang gzir ba'i las rnams kun// ma mo thams cad 'dul byed pa'i// shin tu brjid pa'i sku byung ba'i// phyi yi dur khrod chen po ste// bsil ba'i tshal gyi gnas mchog na// mkha' 'gro ma la shugs 'gro ma// gsod byed ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// zhal gsum phyag drug brjid pa'i sku// mthing nag 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// dur khrod thod pa'i phreng ba dang// zhing lpags 'jol ber sku la gsol// sbrul nag ske rags sku la bcings// dbu skra gyen du 'khyil pas ni// steng gi lha rnams 'dar zhing dngangs// sbrul nag rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// 'og gi klu rnams 'dar zhing dngangs// 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas ni// lha dmag kun gyi dbugs 'byin cing// lha ma yin gyi g.yul rnams bzlog/ zhal gsum phyag drug bstan pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma mo 'dar zhing dngangs// zhing chen gdan la bzhugs pa ni// yi dwags tshogs rnams dbang du sdud// spyan rtsa gyen du bzlog pas ni// bar snang lha rnams dbang du sdud// shangs kyi sbug nas tshub ma 'phro// stong gsum 'jig rten 'dar zhing dngangs// ljags ni drag po'i glog bzhin 'gyu// stong gsum 'od kyis 'gengs par mdzad// mche ba zang yag brdar ba ni// log rtog kun gyi mtshan ma 'joms// spu gri so yis dgra snying 'gems// gri gug 'bar bas dgra srog gcod// thod rlon 'bar bas dgra khrag 'thung// tsan+dan bing chen phyar ba yis// dgra bo'i klad pa'i rgyas su brdeg/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod byed dang// theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dbyen byed dang// slob dpon smad par byed pa rnams// ma lus pa ni bsgral du gsol// hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// shar gyi phyogs kyi

dur khrod na// dri za stong gi tshogs dang bcas// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung/ sha dang khrag ni za byed pa'i// gdug pa'i dgra bo srog gcod pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// shar lho mtshams kyi dur khrod du// dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// me lha stong gi tshogs dang bcas// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung// sha dang khrag ni za byed pa'i// gdug pa'i dgra bo'i srog gcod pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// lho yi phyogs kyi dur khrod du// gshin rje stong gi tshogs dang bcas// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung// sha dang khrag ni za byed cing// gdug pa'i dgra bo'i srog gcod pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// lho nub mtshams kyi dur khrod du// srin po stong gi tshogs dang bcas// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung// sha dang khrag ni za byed cing// gdug pa'i dgra bo'i srog gcod pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// nub kyi phyogs kyi dur khrod du// klu yi rgyal po'i tshogs dang bcas// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung// sha dang khrag ni za byed cing// gdug pa dgra bo'i srog gcod pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// nub byang mtshams kyi dur khrod du// rlung lha stong gi tshogs dang bcas// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung// sha dang khrag ni za byed cing// gdug pa dgra bo'i srog gcod pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// byang gi phyogs kyi dur khrod du// gnod sbyin stong gi tshogs dang bcas// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung// sha dang khrag ni za byed cing// gdug pa dgra bo'i srog gcod pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la 'bab// byang shar mtshams kyi dur khrod du// 'byung po stong gi tshogs dang bcas// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung// sha dang khrag ni za byed cing// gdug pa dgra bo'i srog gcod pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dgon pa'i nags 'dabs dur khrod du// 'jigs byed ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas// dur khrod ma ma'i gtso bo mdzad// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// sku ni mthing nag 'jigs pa la// ral pa bsigs pas 'jig rten khyab// ba sbu'i bu ga thams cad las// sdom dang sdig pa'i sprul pa 'gyed// phrag pa g.yas nas dbu byung ba// dbu ni lha chen 'joms pa'i dbu// dbu skra ral pa bsigs pa las// seng ldeng phur bu'i ser chen 'bebs// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// phrag pa g.yon du dbu byung ba// dbu ni srin po 'joms pa'i dbu// dbu skra ral pa bsigs pa las// tsan+dan phur bu ser chen 'bebs// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// thugs kyi dkyil nas dbu byung ba// dbu ni klu chen 'joms pa'i dbu// dbu skra ral pa bsigs

pa las// chu srin bye ba'i sprul pa 'gyed// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// lte ba'i dkyil nas dbu byung ba// dbu ni gnod sbyin 'joms pa'i dbu// dbu skra ral pa bsigs pa las// lcags kyi phur bu ser chen 'bebs// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// dri za gshin rje me lha dang// bden bral chu lha rlung gi lha// gnod sbyin dbang ldan sa bdag bcas// lha yi tshogs dang klu yi tshogs// srin po la sogs gnod sbyin ma// klu yi bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas// gnod sbyin bu mo 'byung po'i tshogs// sha dang sha khrag la dga' ba dang// thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig/ mdos kyi bdag pos mdos bzhes shig/ glud kyi bdag pos glud 'di long// mA hA kA la'i rgyud las/ mdos btang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas sbyin sreg bshad par bya// gang dmigs ling+ga bcas pa de// lcags kyus snying drangs rlung gis btegs// rnam par shes pa de la bstim// rdo rje phur pa de la brdeg/ bsad nas de la sbyin bsreg bya// las dang 'tshams pa'i thab khung du// de dang mthun pa'i me lha bsam// de ltar mgon po bsam pa dang// tsha ba'i mar dang tsher ma can gyi shing// til nag dug chus sprus pa yis// sngags dang sbyar te bsregs byas na// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang// tsha ba'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las// sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// da ni zor 'phang ba bshad par bya ste// thod pa bya rog rjes can du// gang dmigs ling+ga gzhug par bya// khrag sna stong dang dug sna stong// thod pa'i nad du blug par bya// gzungs thag dag gis gdags byas nas// maN+Dal dbus su gzhug par bya// sngags pa bdud chas dag tu zhugs// ngan sngags drag po bzlas byas la// dgra bo'i grong la btab byas na// tshangs pa'-i tshe dang ldan pa yang// smyo 'bog nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// ma hA ka la'i rgyud las/ zor 'phang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// da ni sngags bshad par bya'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA la ru ni/ kA dza dza hUM/ oM ma hA kA la ha na ha na badzra swA hA/ oM ma hA kA la mA da rA dza hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+sha de ba ma hA kA la kro d+ha hUM dz+ha dz+ha dz+ha/ ha na ha na/ ma hA kA la ya hUM phaT/ da ha da ha/ ma hA kA la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ka la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ ma hA kA la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ ma hA kA la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA kA la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la che ge mo mA ra ya sha thun mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ mA ra mA ra gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ de na me ke na hUM phaT/ ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ drag po sngags kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'khor lo

bshad par bya// dur khrod ras sam shog shog la// yang na rdo sngon dag la bri// gzar skar 'joms pa'i nyi ma la// dug dang ske tshes ming rus bri// 'khor lo khrag chen dag gis bri// gang dmigs dgra bo'i khang sa la// rtsibs ldan mu khyud gsum ldan bri// rtsibs brgyad dag la dgod pa ni// gnyis po lnga dang re tha gsum// gang ras dag la mi rus bri// mA ra sha thun tha ma bskor// mgrin par hUM la snying gar ming// 'doms su phaT rnams bri bar bya// sngags pa las su rung ba dang// lha khang dur khrod klu yi gnas// gnod sbyin gnas pa'i sar mnan na// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang// glo bur nad kyis myur du 'chi/ ma hA kA ka'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bri ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas gnan pa bshad par bya// thod pa ma gas ma chag pa// ma hA kA la'i snying po bri// bzlas byas nyung dkar de ru blug/ yang na klu sbrul dkar nag gnyis kyi gzugs// kha ru ming la rgyab tu rus// tshon skud sna lngas gril byas la// stag gi kha'am chu srin sna// dgra bo'i sgo khar mnan pas ni// sngags 'di bzlas pas 'chor mi srid/ oM ma hA kA la blad hri sna ram shig sod/ le'ur shig sod/ sur le shig sod/ thuM ril shig sod/ phud la tsho shig sod/ zhung tri shig sod/ ma bu ru shig sod/ sbur la shig sod/ nA ga rA dza tsit+ta dz+wa la ya nan nan/ ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ mnan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas ser ba dbab pa bshad par bya'o// khyi'am rabs chad thod pa ru// 'khor lo dpe'u chung ltar byas te// btsan dug nyung dkar gu gul yang// thod pa'i nang du blug par bya'o// zangs dang 'khor ba bud med mngal khrag gsum// sha zan spu rus sgro chu ser/ zhabs mar grol te thod par gzhug/ yul dang phu chu dgra ming rnams// 'khor lo dag la bri bar bya// klu'am yul lha gnas sar mnan// sngags 'di bzlas pas myur du 'bab// oM ma hA kA la gyi ling ni sad ne sa ra b+h+yo/ di rak+sha b+h+yo/ rak+sha dza la mi dza la/ sra krid sra krid de ser de ser// badzra tsa khrid phob phob/ ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas ser ba bsrung bar bshad par bya ste// seng ldeng phur bu bcu dag la// ha na ha na'i sngags bzlas la// 'ong ba'i mtha' ma bskor bar bya'o// rang nyid mgon po nag po yis// nyung dkar khrag skam nag po la// sngags 'di bzlas shing stong thun dag tu bzlog/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA kA la badzra daM gre ni hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ nA dza ya nA sha ya/ s+t+waM b+ha ya s+t+waM b+ha ya oM phaT/ ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ ser ba bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas klu la gtad pa bshad par bya'o// thod pa ma mkhal

ma bral ba// tsha ba gsum la gzugs byas la// ming la rus su bcas pa yang// thod pa de yi nang du gzhug/ dmangs rigs klu la sngags 'di bzlas// oM ma hA kA la nag gi la yag yaM/ nA ga pa ru sna tsa li/ sarba ni sarba ni rbad/ nA ga ku ru nA ling tsit+ta badzra mA ra ya dza dza/ ma hA kA la'i rgyud las// klu la gtad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas sri'u gso ba bshad par bya ste// rin chen lnga yi spu gu la// gsang ba'i sngags kyi 'khor lo gzhug/ gang bsrung ming gang spel te bri// gu gul gla rtsi shu dag kyang// 'khor lo de yi nang du gzhug/ tshon rtsi lnga yi tshon dang ni// rdzas sna lnga yi thang chus byug/ mgon po nag pos byin brlabs te// gang bsrung mgul du btags na ni// des ni gcod pa thams cad bsrung// tshe thag phur bus bsrung ba ni// bal tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'am// yang na nag po rang la bya// seng ldeng phur bu bdun dag la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis btab nas ni// gang bsrung lus la btags pa na// des ni klu yi gnod pa srung// gang bsrung ma brtas bar du ni// sba lcags dkar po tshigs gsum mo// bya rgod sgro bsgron mda' dag la// bal tshon sna lnga gdags par bya'o// mtshal dang spos kyi dud pa btang// sngags pas mgon por byin brlabs nas// gang bsrung sngas su btsugs nas ni// de ni gtan gyi bsrung ba yin// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ sri'u gso ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas klu yis zin pa gso ba bstan te// phya tshang ku ba'i nang du ni// klu yi nor brgyad blugs nas ni// sngags pas byin brlabs cher byas te// gang 'dod gnas su bcug pas ni// de ni gnod par mi 'gyur ro// drag pos 'dul ba'i cho ga ni// seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad la// gu gul tsha ba'i mar gyis byugs// gang gnod gnas su btab pas ni// klu yi gnas khang 'joms par byed// 'di ni nag po klu yi gzir sngags yin// oM ma hA kA la nA ga zhung thun/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ nA ga sa ra ya nA ga dung dung dza dza/ ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ klus zin pa gso ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang gzungs 'don cing smon lam gdab par bshad par bya'o// tshe rabs sngon nas rgyal bas dbang bskur nas// tshe rabs brgyud nas bstan pa srung bar mdzad// mgon po thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo yo gi nI/ na mo ta gi ni/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ ki ti tsi ti/ ni ti ye swA hA/ tshe rabs sngon nas da lta yan chad du// rgyal ba'i bstan pa srung bar zhal bzhes pa'i// de ring dus 'dir bstan pa rgyas par mdzod// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ gzungs 'don cing smon lam gdab pa'i le'u ste bco

brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'khor lha ma srin rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang// rdo rje sems dpa' la bstod pa/ hUM rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje ye shes chen po'i mchog/ phyag na rdo rje mthu stobs bdag/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can// ya mtshan rmad byung khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gri gug gi rgyud las/ 'khor gyis gtso bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang 'khor gyis gtso bo la bstod pa/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi// dur khrod chen po'i klong dkyil nas// gdug par gyur pa thams cad kun// 'dul byed mgon po nag po ste// sku ni mthing nag chen po la// dpa' bo stag gi slag pa can// bdud kyi ber nag sku la gsol// thal ba'i mtshan mas lus byugs pa// g.yas nag gcod pa'i gri gug bsnams// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha'i khrag chen gsol// zhal nas khrag dang zhag kyang 'dzag/ mche ba zla ba chos pa'i tshul// spyan gsum sdang mig glog ltar 'gyu// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// khro gnyer bsdus pa'i gzi brjid can// b+han+d+ha'i phreng bas do shal byas// gsus khyims che zhing gsus pa 'phyang// mi thud khro gnyer drag po yis// mchu dang so la khrag kyang 'dzag/ mi ro skra yi skud pas dkris// bam chen steng na btsan dkyil gnas// phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid can// dam pa'i gtsug lag srung ma ste// keng rus brtsegs pa'i steng na bzhugs// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung// zas su sha dang khrag la za// dur khrod gnod sbyin kun gyi gtso bo mdzad// nag po 'jigs byed sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo 'khor lo'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dmag dbugs 'byin khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang klu la sogs pa yis// dpal ldan mgon po nag po la// dam pa'i bstod pas bstod nas ni// so sor rang rang gnas su dengs// mgon po nag pos 'khor gyi lha srin sde brgyad la bka' stsal pa/ oM dri za me lha gshin rje dang// bden bral chu lha rlung gi lha// gnod sbyin dbang ldan sa bdag sogs// lha yi tshogs dang klu yi tshogs// srin po ro langs gsod byed ma// klu yi bu mo'i tshogs bcas dang// gnod sbyin bdud mo 'byung po'i tshogs// sha dang khrag la dga' ba rnams// thams cad kun nas 'dir gshegs shig/ 'byung po'i sha ni bza' bar zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni btung bar zhim// 'byung po'i bus pa zhim pa ste// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir// zo zhig 'thungs shig myur du sgrol// mgon po man ngag gri gug brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor gyis gtso bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag po'i rgyud 'di 'jig rten gyi khams

su grags par ston cig/ rgyud 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi srog yin no/ rgyud 'di ni yul d+ha na ko sha'i gling mkha' 'gro ma mang po tshogs pa'i gnas su bab par gyur cing/ phyag na rdo rje ri rab ri'i rtse mo na 'khor lha srin sde brgyad la bshad pa'o// de nas gyad kyi sku mchog chen pos ma hA bo d+hI'i mchod rten gyi rtsar ma bdun la bshad/ de nas lha'i gtso bo rnams kyis rdo rje gdan du bdud brgyad la bshad do// de nas rgya gar gyi yul gser mig bya mchu can du sbas so// de nas rgya gar gyi slon dpon grub pa can rnams kyis rnyed de/ rim gyis brgyud pa lags so// mgon po nag po man ngag brtsegs pa'i rgyud las// brgyud pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// sngon gyi las dang smon lam da lta'i skal bar ldan// skyes mchog de lta bu dang rgyud 'di 'phrad par shog/ man ngag gri gug brtsegs pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// bla ma dam pa mi bskyod rdo rje la gnang ba'o// rje btsun shAn+ti b+ha dras zhus pa las/ dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la ma hA kA ya bAka tsit+ta kro d+ha tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon po nag po chen po sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i gtso bo bud+d+ha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ chos nyid rnam par ma phye ba'i zhing khams rgyan yongs su bkod pa/ dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ga'i e gru gsum 'bar ba drag po'i gzhal yas khang na/ gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'phro ba/ khrag 'thung rig pa'i he ru ka lnga krod+hI shwa rI rig pa'i yum lnga dang 'khril cing/ mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas te ye nas lhun grub tu bzhugs skad do// bzhugs so bzhugs par gyur// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ khrag 'thung rig pa'i rtsal phyir 'khyams pas ma rig bdag 'dzin gyi rU tra lngar gyur te/ gshin sa dang/ gshin chu dang/ gshin mo dang/ gshin rlung dang/ gshin e nag po lnga dang// de rnams kyi chung ma srid pa sha za/ srid pa khrag 'thung/ srid pa drod 'phrog dang/ srid pa dbugs len/ srid pa'i rgyal mo mu kha le dang lngas khams gsum kun gyi srog gcod cing sprul pa dang yang sprul sna tshogs par bkye ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang/ nga rgyal phrag dog dpung bskyed nas sa chu me rlung nam mkha' la gnas bcas te sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs nas 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de'i tshe de'i dus na khrag 'thung rig pa'i he ru ka lnga las/ thugs rje rang byung gi 'od zer steng 'og phyogs mtshams med par 'phros so// ma rig pa

bdag 'dzin 'joms pa'i mtshon chas ni khengs// drag po sngags kyi rang sgra ni drag la ldir che/ 'jigs byed khro gtum gyi sku ni che la mang bas ma rig bdag 'dzin gyi rU tra lnga dang srid pa srog gcod kyi chung ma lnga/ sprul pa yang dang sprul pa sna tshogs pa rnams stong gsal 'dzin med du brgyal te ji ye bzhin par brgyal ba sangs nas khrag 'thung yab yum lnga rang du shes so// oM sku'i dbang bskur bas gshin rje chung ma dang bcas pa khrag 'thung lha lnga yab yum du bsgyur te/ 'jigs byed phyag bzhi pa yab yum gyis sangs rgyas bstan pa'i mgon byed par khas blangs so// AHgsung gi dbang bskur bas zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhi ru bsgyur te/ 'jigs byed chen po'i phrin las kyis sgrub pa po'i mgon byed par khas blangs so// hUM thugs kyi dbang bskur bas skye med 'o gsal 'dzin med du sangs rgyas te sems can kun gyi snying la gnas bcas pas sems can kun gyi mgon byed par khas blangs so// sku brjod las 'das pas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o// gsung brjod las 'das pas phrin las bzhi las 'dus pa'o// thugs brjod las 'das pas bsgral tshad byang chub pas so// mtshan yang ye shes mgon po phyag bzhi pa zhes grags skad do// grags so// grags par 'gyur bas/ nag po'i phyogs kyi ma mo dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ bdud dang/ gza' dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gshin rje dang/ btsan dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ mi srun pa du ma lhags te/ da ni sangs rgyas 'byung ngo// 'dis bstan pa srung bar 'gyur ro// da ni chos dar ro// ha la ha la zhes mi dga' ba'i tshig tu ma smra zhing nad rigs du ma'i rlung 'tshubs so// der khas blangs rjes su dregs pa zil gnon gyi ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ oM AHhUM kro d+ha mA ra na mA ra na zhes pa'i sgra bsgrags pas/ shar du sa g.yos/ lho ru glog 'khyug/ nub tu 'brug ldir/ byang du thog babs/ sku khros pas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor gzugs med kyi khams nas khro zhing gtsigs/ sku lus gzugs khams na 'khyil ba phyag bzhin snying dang/ ral gri dang/ thod khrag dang/ rtse gsum bsnams pa/ zhabs gnyis phyed skyil du bzhugs te pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la 'dod khams rigs drug mnan nas khro bo khyung gis 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ngo// gsung khros pas oM AHhUM ma hA kA la e ka dzA ti ma ma hUM hUM dgra bgegs mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces stong gsum du bsgrags so// thugs khros pas gzi brjid bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar te log pa'i dgra bgegs zhe la bcangs na skye med chos sku'i zhing du sgrol bar dam bcas pas mi srun pa thams cad brgyal rengs khrag tu skyugs so// dkar po'i phyogs kyi lha dang mi

dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te mchod pa'i sprin gtibs shing bstod pas hUM raM raM/ dmar nag me yi dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma nyi zla ro steng du// dpal ldan ye shes mgon po ni// sku mdog mthing nag gsus po che// zhal gcig phyag bzhi phyed skyil bzhugs// g.yas gnyis tsit+ta ral gri bsnams// g.yon gnyis thod khrag kha T+wAM bsnams// zhal gdangs ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs// khro gnyer spyan gsum dmar la 'khyug/ ag tsam smin ma dbu skra ser// thod skam rin chen sbrul gyis brgyan// mi mgo'i do shal stag lpags dkris// 'jigs byed chen por phyag 'tshal bstod// ces dpal nag po chen po'i sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ 'byung 'khrul rang shes gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'og min b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang skam rlon gyi mi mgo'i rtsig pa brtsigs pa/ khrag dang zhag tu 'khyil ba/ zhing lpags kyi bla re la zhing chung gi 'phan 'phyar ba/ rak+ta'i mtsho la tsit+ta me tog bkram pa na/ e ka dzA dkar mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ ser mo dang/ ljang gu nag mo 'bum gyi gtso mo thod mkhar brgya'i bdag mo/ srid pa las kyi 'byung khungs ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo tsan ti dbang phyug ma zhes bya bas rus pa'i byin gsol/ rak+ta dmar gyi skyems drangs nas phyag dang bskor ba byas shing ye shes mgon po nyid las 'khril te/ dgyes chen su la ma hA a mr-i ta/ e ma ngo mtshar rab 'jigs so// ma rungs dregs pa'i tshogs rnams la// zhing bcu sgrol ba'i las bcol gyis// thugs rjes dgongs nas brgyal rengs slong// khrag skyugs phrin las dag la bkod// ces ni zhu ba rab bzhugs pas// 'jigs byed ye shes mgon po yis// gtum khros dgyes pa'i 'dzum bton nas// d+harmA kA la shan ting ku/ zhes pa'i sgra yis brgyal bslangs nas// rang rang phyogs kyi sa la 'khod// de nas seng gdong gis gus pa'i tshul gyis 'di skad gsol// hUM gtso mchog 'bar ba'i phyag bzhi pa// mthing nag rab 'jigs ye shes mgon// dregs pa'i tshogs bdag skyabs su mchi// brgyal rengs khrag skyugs grol mdzad cing// kun la drin chen lha mo'i sku// yum mchog tsa ti dbang phyug gtso// sku mdog nag mo khro tshul can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis thod skam brgyan// phyag g.yas gri gug dgra snying 'byin// phyag g.yon thod khrag gtso la stob// mche gtsigs khro gnyer spyan gsum dmar// gcer bu skra grol rus pas brgyan// zhabs gnyis yab la 'khril cing sbyor// gnyis med bde chen he ru ka/ khrag 'thung yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod// che mchog nyid kyi spyan snga ru// khas blangs khrag 'thung yab yum gyi//

bka' nyan las byed srog 'bul lo// si na ra hUM phaT tri hring dza/ bsad pa'i gtor ma bdag la zhu// gar rbad rlag byed bsgrub mchog skyong// sa ma ya/ srin po ha la pha ri dang// DA ki sha za nag mo'i bu// sha za khrag 'thung bya rog gdong// gus pa'i tshul gyis 'di skad gsol// che mchog sprul pa khrag 'thung rgyal// dregs pa'i tshogs bdag skyabs su mchi// zhi rgyas dbang drag phrin las sku// dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ba yis// las grub yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod// bstan srung gtso bo yab yum gyi// bka' nyan las byed srog 'bul lo// kA ka mu ka hUM sa ma ya srog dung dza dza/ sha chang dmar gyi gtor ma zhu// bstan pa bsrung zhing bsgrub mchog skyong// srin mo blag 'bar mi thod can// bdud po sgos bye'i bu mo ni// 'bar ma nag mos 'di skad gsol// che mchog sprul pa phyag bzhi pa// bka' nyan las byed srog 'bul lo// ma ma nag po dza li ru hring dza dza// rag ta sha khrag gtor ma zhu// bla tshe 'phrog nas bsgrub mchog skyong// klu mo glog lcam 'bar ma dang// srin po rag sha ha li'i bu// rA hu la yis 'di skad gsol// chos sku 'gyur med nag po che// phrin las lhun grub phyag bzhi pa// gnyis med bde chen yab yum gyi// bka' nyan las bgyid srog 'bul lo// rak+sha rA hu la pa hring dza/ sha khrag 'di la gtor ma zhu// bla srog 'byed cing bsgrub mchog skyong// klu chen brgyad kyis 'di skad gsol// khrag 'thung khyung gi tshogs rnams la// gus btud bka' nyan rang srog 'bul// nA ga nA ga rA dza phu hring dza// dug rlangs 'byed cing bsgrub mchog skyong// shar phyogs rgyal pos 'di skad gsol// bdag ni khrag 'thung bka' la nyan// rang srog 'bul zhing dam nyams sgrol// king kar ra ra ra hring dza/ bshos bu gser skyems gtor ma zhu// smyo 'bog gtong zhing bsgrub mchog skyong// sa ma ya na ra kan/ lho phyogs gshin rjes 'di skad gsol// bdag ni khrag 'thung bka' la nyan// rang srog 'bul zhing dam nyams sgrol// ya ma rA dza hring dza// snying sna dag gi gtor ma zhu// srog rtsa gcod cing bsgrub mchog skyong// nub phyogs btsan gyis 'di skad gsol// bdag gi khrag 'thung bka' la nyan// rang srog 'bul zhing dam nyams sgrol// badzra sa du tsa hring dza/ bshos bu sha khrag gtor ma zhu// gzer thabs gtong zhing bsgrub mchog skyong// byang phyogs gnod sbyin 'di skad gsol// bdag ni khrag 'thung bka' la nyan// rang srog 'bul zhing dam nyams sgrol// yak+sha nag po dun hring dza// bya dmar sha khrag gtor ma zhu// tshe srog sdud cing bsgrub mchog skyong// sa ma ya na ra kan/ dpal nag po chen po sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ srog 'bul khas blangs

kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// tsa ti nyid kyis yang gsol pa// tshe srog sprul pa dregs pa'i gtso// ma sring smin byed dbang ni gang// dam tshig bsrung tshul ji ltar bgyi// khyed ni 'dul byed lha ni ci// spyi bsgrub bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi// sku gsung thugs kyi las mkhan dpung// mnyes shing 'du ba'i bsgrub rdzas rnams// 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// nag po chen pos bka' stsal pa// kye kye 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// rin chen bdud rtsi'i sa dag la// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi bya// chos 'byung nyis brtsegs pad 'dab bzhi// de yi phyi rim 'khor lo bzhi// yang na pad+ma 'dab brgyad bya// thod phreng rdo rje ra bar bcas// me ri dmar nag bskor ba la// pad+ma 'khor lo phyogs kyi tshon// gtor tshogs su mthong sin+d+hu ra// mchod lnga gsur che ltag sprod gling// legs par sta gon tshogs bcas te// spyan drang bzhugs gsol mchod gtor dbul// zhi khro gzhung bsrang dbang bskur ro// zhes snang srid drag po dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te tsa ti dbang phyug gis yang gsol pa/ dpal ldan 'jigs byed chen po kye// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// dregs pa pho mo slar gzhug pa// dpa' bo bla mas gsung du gsol// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// ho dpal ldan khrag 'thung yab yum gyi// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs legs// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung pa'i phyir// drag po'i phrin las grub par mdzod// oM ma hA kA la e ka dzA ti/ A be sha ya ma ma hUM hUM// ye shes babs nas ldeg pa dang// ri rab 'gul zhing rgya mtsho 'khyams// sa rnams g.yos shing byin phebs pas// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas na// sgrub byed kun gyi rtags thon na// de nas bum pa rab thogs te// nga yis bka' nyan dregs pa'i tshogs// 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor 'di la ltos// bdag ni yab yum he ru ka/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro me 'od 'bar// dpal dang ldan pa'i dbang bskur ro// oM badzra rat+na pad+ma karma bud+d+ha// ma hA kA la e ka tsa ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa aM/ dbang thob sangs rgyas kun zhal mthong// bka' nyan bstan bsrung khas blangs so// phyag g.yon thod pa rab gtad do// byang sems dkar dmar her ka'i bcud// bdud rtsi lnga ni khrag 'thung rdzas// dngos grub myur thob dbang bskur ro// AHma hA kA la e ka tsa ti ma hA su kha a mr-i ti/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa A/ dbang thob sngags dang dam tshig spyod// sngags kyi sgor zhugs bu ltar dgongs// me long sin d+hu ra bstan te// dri med shel sgong rang rig sems// snang grag me long gzugs brnyan las// yab yum gnyis med sbyor cing rol// gsal la ngo stong dbang bskur

ro// oM hUM ma hA kA la e ka tsa ti/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dbang thob mchog gi sa la gnas// chos byed thugs dam tsam gyis 'gro// e ma ltos shig ltos shig sems la ltos// lus ni gsal stong nga yi sku// ngag ni grag stong nga yi gsung// sems ni rig stong nga yi thugs// ngo bo mthong na 'khor ba med// rang bzhin mthong na sangs rgyas yin// thugs rje drag po'i las byas na// zhing bcu thar pa'i sa la bkod// khrag 'thung rig pa'i he ru kas// nga yang de ltar smin par byas// sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// tsa ti dbang phyug yang gsol pa// dbang gi rim pa de ltar na// dam tshig bsrung tshul gsung du gsol// khrag 'thung chen pos bka' stsal pa// spyi ru dam tshig 'bum sde de// yan lag grangs ni dam tshig dang// bsgrub pa'i dam tshigs nyi shu bsrung// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs yin no// bla ma yi dam rang re dang// mched lcam sems can ma khrel bsrung// zla dang zhar dang sku gsung thugs/ yan lag grangs kyis ma nyams na// dam can 'go bas mthu rtsal 'byung// mang pos bkur bas grags pa ste// yid du 'ong zhing sangs rgya'o// dam tshig nyams par gyur pa na// rdo rje dmyal ba chen por skye// mi bzad sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i snga ltas su// rims dang yams nad 'tshe ba 'byung// dbang po 'gag cing mdze shu dang// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pas// dam tshig nyams pa rlag par byed// des na phyag dang bskor ba dang// sngags bshags ting 'dzin dag la 'bad// dam ldan bsnyen bsgrub rem la ni// sprin ltar 'du zhing bu ltar brtse// ci bcol phrin las kun sgrub pa'o// sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las dam tshig gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// tsa ti dbang phyug yang gsol pa// dam tshig rim pa de ltar na// 'dul byed lha ni gsung du gsol// khrag 'thung chen pos bka' stsal pa// nga yi 'dul byed lha nyid ni// khrag 'thung rig pa'i he ru ka/ ma bskyed dbyings na gsal bar bzhug/ 'bral ba med cing gnas pa med// rang gi sems nyid rtogs par gyis// nga la skye ba'i yul med pas// 'chi ba zhes bya mi 'ong ngo// nga la 'gro dang 'ong med la// 'du 'bral zhes bya ming nas med// nga la gsal dang 'grib pa med// nga la dgyes dang mi dgyes med// nga la bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyang med// bzlas par bya ba'i sngags kyang med// thams cad rang gi byed pa yin// me long gzugs brnyan ltar shes na// snang grag 'dul byed lha yin no// brag cha lta bu shes pa yin// tshig rnams 'dul byed lha yin no// rig pa'i don nyid rtogs pa na// thams cad 'dul byed lha

yin no// zhi khro bskyed rim gsal ba na// nga nyid 'dul byed lha yin no// nga nyid yab yum gsal ba na// dregs pa 'dul byed lha yin no// khrag 'thung rigs lnga'o snying pos ni// nga nyid 'dul zhing thams cad bsgrag/ mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'byung// sku gsum thugs khros pa'i rgyud las 'dul byed lha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// tsa ti nyid kyis yang gsol pa// 'dul byed lha ni de ltar na// spyi bsgrub rim pa gsung du gsol// phyag bzhi pa yis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor dbang dang mthun pa la// phyogs mtshon sgo dang bcas pa bri// dbus su thod pa kha sbyar nang// gri snying bya rog nal snying dang// 'khor lor bcas pa dar nag gril// nas kyi tshom bu gtor mar bcas// yab yum gtso 'khor nyid yin no// he ru ka yi nga rgyal gyis// snying gar srog phul sngags bsams te// 'od zer dmar pos dbang bsdus la// gsal ba'i sems kyis 'bum du bskyal// oM ma hA kA la e ka tsa ti g+hu na hri da hUM phaT ma hA kA la kha kha mu kha hUM/ sa ma ya srog dung dza dza/ ma ma rag mo dz+wa li ro tring dza/ san ra hu hring hring dza/ rak+sha rA hu la hring dza/ ging ka ra hring dza/ ya ma rA dza hring dza/ badzra sa du hring dza/ yak+sha nag po hring/ mi tshor bzlas na snang srid g.yo// 'gro ba kun gyi srog 'bral lo// ci bsam 'grub cing bstan pa bsrung// sku gsum thugs khros pa'i rgyud las spyi bsgrub kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// tsa ti nyid kyis yang gsol pa// spyi bsgrub rim pa de ltar na// sku gsung thugs kyis las mkhan gsung// nag po chen pos bka' stsal pa// che mchog khros pa'i nus mthu yis// rU tra lnga btul nga yang lnga ru 'gyur// chung ma lnga ni btul ba yis// gtum pa'i dbang phyug tsan ti ka/ glog 'bar ral gcig sha za ma// ye nas lhun grub dgongs pa shes// bstan bsgrub sems can mgon du bsgyur// dregs pa 'dul phyir sku che'o// phrin las bsgrub phyir gsung che'o// sangs rgyas zhing sbyor thugs che'o// ye shes mgon po yab yum grags// nga nyid stong pa nyid yang che// nga nyid gsal 'tsher lhun nyid sdug/ nga nyid kun khyab bde chen 'khril// sku yi las mkhan bya rog gdong// bka' dang bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// gsung gi las mkhan 'bar ma nag/ bka' dang bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// thugs kyi las mkhan rA hu la// bka' dang bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// chos byed bsgrub mchog dam pa yis// bos pa'i dus na snyan ma sra// g.yab pa'i tshe na spyan ma brtul// lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs// brten pa'i tshe na phrag ma dog/ rbad pa'i tshe na mthu ma chung// gsod ba'i tshe na ngang ma ring// tsit+ta gtor ma ltag sprod lnga// dar nag gling du+u gser chen du// sha lnga

bdud rtsi lnga tshogs na// sha la sbrang bzhin khyed rnams 'dus// chos byed dam tshig can la ni// ci yang med las dam la 'dus// sngags pa dam tshig mi bsrung na// bsrungs kyang skal nyams las ma byed// bya rog 'bar ma seng ge gdong// gza' bdud rgyal po gshin rje btsan// gnod sbyin klu dang mi srun tshogs// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bka' 'di srungs// rnal 'byor yongs kyi dgra bla mdzod// rig 'dzin kun gi srog shing gis// dam nyams kun gyi srog rtsa chod// bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug che// gtsug lag khang gi srung ma rnams// legs nyes kun gyi ltang 'dzin che// nag po stong gi tshogs kyis bskor// sha za 'bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor// gnod sbyin du ma'i tshogs kyis bskor// bdud pho nyi khri'i tshogs kyis bskor// mi srun drag po mthu chen rnams// bstan 'jig dgra bo zas su gtad// dam nyams sha zo khrag ni 'thung// snying phyung srog chod dus mtha' sdus// nor phrogs grang sgyel nye dang phyes// lo zlar ma bzhag za mar sgrol// ces yab yum chos nyid mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te khrag 'thung rig pa'i he ru ka la thim/ dpal nag po chen po'i sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ las mkhan gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang snang srid kyi lha srin sde brgyad rnams kyis/ bsad pa'i sha dang btsos pa'i chang// btsong sgog la phug spod rigs dang// kham bu ku shu bcol ti dang// rgun 'brum ka ra bu ram dang// rak+ta la sogs khrag sna stong// ma hA tsit+ta la sogs snying sna stong// mAM sa la sogs sha sna stong// su ra la sogs chang sna stong// b+han d+ha nang khrol rus pa'i tshogs// dar nag rgyal mtshan gsur chen spos// rol mo'i tshogs kyis rab mchod nas// 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung gis// gnyer gtad bka' bsgo spun gsum la// mgrin gcig bsdebs nas 'di skad gsol// chos dbyings skye med ngang shed nas// thabs dang shes rab gdug pa 'dul// drag po 'jigs byed skur bstan pa'i// mgon po yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod// sngon tshe khrag 'thung spyan snga ru// bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa'i// srin po'i gzugs 'chang gdug pa 'dul// bya rog gdong la phyag 'tshal bstod// nag po'i las mdzad mkha' 'gro'i gtso// srin po'i gzugs kyi dug char 'bebs// sha za khrag 'thung rab 'bar ma// nag mo bya zhon ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten las grub dregs pa can// rang sngags dmod pa'i mtshon cha yis// srog dbugs 'bral ba'i mthu bo che// rA hu la la phyag 'tshal bstod// de skad bstod cing 'di skad gsol// dus ni bskal pa phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe// chos la dgra dang 'tshe ba byed pa yis// gtsug

lag chos dkor gnyan po rlag par byed// phyir rabs sngags pa nang dme byas pa yis// zhing bcu gdug pa rU tra dar bar 'gyur// de tshe sgrol ba'i las bsgos ji ltar 'tshal// sgrub gnas zla ba gang la bya// dkyil 'khor bsgrub rdzas ci dang ci// 'bod rbad gsad pa'i las mtha' gang// rtags dang mtshan ma ji ltar 'ong// ma grub spogs chog ji ltar bgyi// phrin las bzhi dang las tshogs dang// dngas ma srog gi yi ge rnams// 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las sgrol ba las zhus kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas las kyi mgon po yis// bya rog dag la rab zhon nas// phyag gnyis gri gug thod khrag bsnams// stag lpags mi mgo g.yang gzhi gsol// kA kha mu kha kro ta mA ra ya/ bya rog khros pa'i gsung sgrog cing// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// zhing bcu rU tra dar dus su// snying stobs brtson 'grus ngar ldan gyis// sems bskyed bstan srung dam bcas la// dur khrod lha khang brag nag phug/ zla ba tha chung bzhi po la// dur khrod la dkyil 'khor bya// spyi bsgrub dag dang mthun pa yis// phung sa gsum la 'brub khung ste// khru gang rgya la dug khrag rtsang// rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa la// spu gri sngags kyi 'khor lo bri// pho thod steng la mo thod 'og/ bkang rdzas dang ni dri ma dang// dug sna khrag sna thad phrom pa// grog mkhar spungs sa phye dang bsre// dgra bo'i 'dra 'bag ling+ga bya// ras sam gro ga dag la ni// ling+ga bris la snying gar gzhug/ thod nang bsgyel la 'brub khung nang// gzungs thag btags la lha dang dbye// oM ma hA kA la a mr-i shag phye shag phye ma ma trag rU tra mA ra ya phaT/ sme rdzas dug gis bdug byas nas// skam rlon thun rdzas thod pa bcad// lug nag g.yag nag bya rog gsob// rgod dang bya rog rgod dang mda'// 'khor lo stag gzig dgra snying bcas// nal gsob snying dang sbal mig can// gtor ma sha khrag chang gis bran/ sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bsgrub rdzas bca' gzhi'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// yang ni bshad kyis legs nyon dang// pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan steng na// rje dpon gsal bar sngags 'di bod// oM ma hA kA la ka kha mu kha hU sa ma ya srog dung dung dza dza// ma ma rag mo dz+wa li ru hring dz+wa/ rag sha rA hu la sa hring dza// gdan drang bzhugs bstod mchod gtor dbul// sangs rgyas bstan srung mthu bo che// yab yum 'khor bcas dgongs shing gshegs// bdud kyi bar chod bsal ba dang// gdug pa dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po'i gzhal yas dkyil 'khor 'dir// gnyis med gdan zhugs 'phrin las mdzod/ sa ma ya/ A ka ra sha ya hwi dza A be sha ya tiSh+Tha lhan// khams gsum dregs pa'i mthu bo

che// 'jigs byed me 'bar yab yum sku// las mgon ging tshogs phyag 'tshal lo// bza' dang bca' dang btung ba dang// bshos dang kha zas sna tshogs dang// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg/ bdud rtsi sha khrag gtor ma 'bul// dgyes par dgongs la bzhes su gsol// ma hA kA la DAki nI sa ma ya/ d+hU pe puSh+pe gan+d+he hUM/ nai bit+ya A lo ke shap+da hUM/ ma hA kA la sa ma ya sarba pU dza ho/ b+ha ling ta khA hi ma hA maM sa khA hi/ ma hA tsit+ta khA hi/ ma hA su ra khwa hi/ pra be karma/ sarba ar+tha sid+d+ha ye swA hA/ de ltar dus bzhir mchod cing bod// sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ bod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon/ oM ma hA kA la e ka tsa ti g+hu na hri ta dgra bo aM ku sha ya dza dza badzra ma hA kA la a nu kaM/ dgra bo'o srog b+h+yo rbad/ kha la rag sha rbad/ snying kha la rag sha rbad/ srog la rag sha rbad/ snying khrag bal mo kha la rag sha rbad/ dza yA dza yA/ yeM yeM/ ldeng ldeng/ hram hram/ lhang lhang/ dgra bo'i srog la thum ril rbad/ ru ru shi ti kri ma ru sod// thums ma rag du sba sod/ kha dug sha Sha ma sod/ dgra bo'i srog la thums rbad sod rniya ya rniya ya tsa dun sod// a mu kaM sa ka rbud mA ra ya srog la thunab+h+yo/ dgra bo che ge mo mA ra ya rbad sod// ram ta de'i bde ba byi nu tsan tra ru ba ni rA hu la dgra bo'i snying la khrag rbad// he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha tsan d+ha mA ra ya rbad// 'bar ma seng gdong gza' bdud kyis// dgra bo gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// kha bltas nga ro drag pos rbad// bskul 'di gtang zhing mi lpags rdeb/ hUM// mi mngon dbyings nas bzhugs pa yi// bstan srung dpal ldan nag po che// rigs lnga khrag 'thung sprul pa ste// chos skyong mgon po mthu bo che// bka' srung chen po dam tshig can// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes// sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng ba bcings// zhal nas 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer gyis// bdud dpung ma lus skrag par mdzad// spyan gsum dmar la 'khrug pa yis// sdang mig phyogs bcu kun tu blta// shangs nas drag po'i 'thor rlung 'bud// sma ra ag tshom smin ma ser// zhal gdangs ha ha hUM phaT sgrogs// mche gtsigs ljags 'dril rkan sgra rdeb// phyag g.yas dang po dgra snying 'dzin// 'og ma ral gri dgra srog gcod// phyag g.yon thod pa snying khrag 'thung// 'og ma kha T+wAM dug gsum 'joms// thung la sbom zhing gel ba'i gzugs// sku la mi mgo'i phreng bas brgyan// yan lag sbrul gyi chun pos bcings// sku smad stag gi pags pas dkris// zhabs gnyis brdabs pas dgra bgegs 'dul// pad+ma nyi zla ro gdan la// dpa' bo'i stangs stabs tshul gyis bzhugs// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil

nas// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// zhal nas me 'bar 'u ru ru// dbu skra ral mun ltar gtibs// spyan nas glog dmar khyugs se khyug/ snyan nas 'brug sgra di ri ri// drag sngags thog ser chems se chem// dpal ldan mgon po drag shul can// mthun rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bdud dpung thal bar rlag par mdzod// bgegs dpung ma lus bsgral ba dang// dgra bo'i srog rtsa chod la shog/ hUM/ yum mchog tsa ti dbang phyug ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ gcer bu skra grol rus pas brgyan// phyag g.yas gri gug dgra snying 'byin// phyag g.yon thod khrag gtso la stob// zhal gdangs spyan gsum mche gtsigs khro// zhabs gnyis yab la 'khril cing sbyor// bde chen stong gsum gar bsgyur la// gdug pa'i bu mo drag rtsal can// mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'di bzhes la// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying khrag gzhibs// dus la bab po tsa ti ma// he ru ka yi spyan snga ru// khas blangs yab yum da rgyugs shig/ oM ma hA kA la tsa ti ma ma hUM hUM/ dgra bo'i bla rtsa thuM ril b+h+yo/ hUM ye shes mgon po yab yum gyi// sku yi las mkhan drag rtsal can// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// las kyi mgon po mthu bo che// mthing nag rab 'jigs bya rog gdong// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bya rog gdong// spyan gsum dmar po sdang mig log/ dbu skra dmar nag gyen du brdzes// zhal gdangs mchu ni khrag gis byugs// dgra bo'i snying khrag dron mo 'thung// rno gdug mche ba zla tshes gtsigs// dgra bo'i srog rtsa dmar po za// mi mgo'i phreng ba sku la gsol// zhing chen pags pa stod du gon// stag gi sham thabs smad du dkris// gdug pa sbrul gyi ske rags can// sku lus sbom thung gsus po che// ma rungs kun 'dul mthu rtsal can// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// sngon gyi khas blangs dam bcas ltar// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung 'tshal gyis// sha khrag dmar gyis brgyan pa yi// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'di gsol la// mgyogs byed bya rog chibs bskyod cig/ dgra la rbad kyis sod la shog/ phyag g.yas gri gug dmar po yis// dgra srog dmar po chod la shog/ phyag g.yon thod par khrag thogs la// dgra bo'i snying khrag dron mo gsol// sder mo lcags kyu 'bar ba yis// glo snying nang khrol phyung la shog/ sprul pa'i bya rog mang po'i tshogs// da rung dgra bo'i sha la chums// pho nya dgra bo'i bla la b+h+yo// sha za srin po mthu stobs can// dgra bo'i rtsa khrag khong nas 'thung// nag po 'khor bcas dgra po nag po yi// las byed mi srun seng ge'i gdong// khas blangs bzhin du dam ma 'da'// bsad khrag 'khyil pa'i rba klong nas// nag po khrag ral sku bskyod cig/ rlung rta nag po chibs su chibs// sku mdog

nag mo 'jigs su rung// dar nag ber chen sku la gsol// phyag g.yas dar nag ba dan phyir// nag po'i ru dang lhabs se lhab// phyag g.yon thod par dma' gtor khyer// dam can pho mo sprin ltar sdud// g.yu ral gseb nas seng chung 'phyo// 'jigs byed sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// gung gnyis rgyu zhing rlung 'tshub// bam ro pho mo spyi gtsug 'gro// rkang pas gtor khyer dgra la 'phen// las kyi mgon po'i bka' 'khor ni// mi srun drag po dgra bgegs 'dul// seng ge'i gdong can dgra la ya// dgra bo'i sha khrag gtor ma longs// nam phyed srog gi dngas ma chod// nyin phyed dbugs kyi rta pho phrogs// rlung dmar nad kyis dgra rtsad chod// snying khrag dron mo zhal du gsol// bcol ba'i las 'di grub par mdzod// oM ma hA kA la si na ra hUM phaT ya ma rA dza dun tri phu tri dgra bgegs mA ra ya sod swA hA/ lam bsdubs ya ma chod/ kham 'thung ra ma gtor/ mA ra ya rbad sod// dpal ldan mgon po nag po yi// thugs kyi las mkhan mthu bo che// mgo dgu bya rog gdong pa can// 'jigs byed chen po ma rungs pa// sku mdog dud ka 'bar ba la// ro stod srin po ro smad sbrul// mgo lus med par mig gis gang// sde brgyad kun gyi dmag dpon mdzad// phyag g.yas chu srin zhags pa thogs// phyag g.yon rA yi mda' gzhu 'dzin// las su gdug pa'i dgra bgegs 'joms// sa chu me rlung dkrugs pa yis// dam nyams dgra bo myal thag chod// sha khrag til dang 'o ma dang// klu sman mchod pa 'di zhes la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// lus srog dum bur gtubs la shog/ dus la bab po rA hu+u la/ rag sha ra hu+u la/ dgra bo'i dbugs chod/ thum ril rbad sod// b+h+yo/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po yi// shar phyogs sgrol ging mthu bo che// tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can// shar phyogs gnam sa phyed kyi bdag/ dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa dar mdung dgra la 'debs// g.yon pa mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor// chibs su rta dkar ze dmar chibs// sku la dar dkar 'jol ber gsol// stag shubs g.yas la gzigs shubs g.yon// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bshos bu gser skyems 'di gsol la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// smyo 'bog nad kyis sod la shog/ ging kar dgra bo'i srog la breng shag rbad b+h+yo/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po yi// lho phyogs sgrol ging mthu bo che// gshin rje dmar po 'gong po'i rje// lho phyogs gnam sa phyed kyi bdag/ dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa spu gris dgra srog chod// g.yon pa btsan zhags dgra la 'debs// chibs su btsan ra dmar po chibs// rgyab na bse yi phub phub dmar khur// steng na bse yi bya khra lding// khyod

kyi thugs dam dus la bab// snying sna'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// shan pa'i spu gris gtubs la shog/ ya ma tri ling rbad/ dgra bo'i snying la dgu rmugs rbad// b+h+yo/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po yi// nub phyogs sgrol ging mthu bo che// btsan gyi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul can// nub phyogs gnam sa phyed kyi bdag/ sngo nag zhal cig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje dgra la gsor// g.yon pa dgra snying dmar po 'dzin// sku la za 'og ber chen gsol// chibs su seng ge sngo nag chibs// sprul pa lcags spyang sngon po 'gyed// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bshos bu sha khrag 'di gsol ba// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// gzer thabs nad kyis sod la shog/ hri badzra sa du/ dgra bo'i bla la rgyug rgyug rbad// b+h+yo/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po yi// byang phyogs sgrol ging mthu bo che// gnod sbyin lcags kyi ber ka can// byang phyogs gnam sa phyed kyi bdag/ nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa lcags kyi ber ga bsnams// g.yon pa dgra snying dron mo za// sku la re nag slog pa gon// chibs su bdud rta nag po chibs// bdud kyis khram thogs dgra la 'gyed// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bya dmar sha khrag 'di gsol la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// tshe srog dus mtha' sdus la shog/ yag sha nag po rgyug phreng/ dgra bo thums ril rbad sod// b+h+yo// gzhan yang mgon po'i bka' 'khor na// nag po'i dmag tshogs nyo re re// nag mo zor 'phen sha ra ra// sha za khrag 'thung phungs se phung// gnod sbyin srog gcod ra la la// bdud pho khram thogs ye re re// drag po'i pho nya sha ra ra// rgya mo mon mo lhems se lhem// bya rog mang po thibs se thib// ce spyang du 'bod di ri ri// mthun pa'i dam rdzas kun bzhes la// bstan dgra phung gsum g.yab kyis thob// bdun rgyud rtsad nas chod la shog/ ma hA kA la yi sha tsa yak+Sha mA ra ya sarba duSh+tAM sarba sha trUM/ aM ku sha ya dza/ mA ra ya/ na sha ya/ thum ril thad/ sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las rbad bskul gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon// ma hA kA la ka kha mu kha/ dgra bo'i srog thums ril rtsa la breng shig/ tsit+ta rmugs/ khrag thibs rbad/ ling shag rbad/ nri hur thums dza khram rbad/ ri tra kham tsi ta shag dgra ba'i tsit+ta gzer thim rbad/ badzra yak+sha spre ta na b+ha ra ru sa gri na ru pa hUM phaT/ thibs khams shag dun/ dgra bo'i rtsa srog snying la gzer thums mA ra ya la rbad sod/ rag mo nr-i shang ku ru ru lu thums rbad/ rag mo kha la rtsa dun b+h+yo/ rag ta thun rbad/ rtsa la rtsa thun b+h+yo/ rtsa rtsi ta rbad/ snying la dun/ rag mo kha la tsa tsa dun b+h+yo/ tiSh+Tha bam rim/ sa ma

ya dun b+h+yo/ sod sod/ skam thun mtshon la rlon thun nad// bsams la a mU ka la brdeg/ me rlung mtshon gyis gtubs par bsgom// sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las gsad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon// oM ma hA kA la kha mu kha kro d+ha a mu kaM nr-i shang ku ru rbad/ snying la thums ril tsit+ta rbad/ srog la myags chod rbad/ sod sod snying phyung srog rtsa rbad// thums nr-ir dgra bo sod rbad/ ma hA kA la dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ hab hab hub hub ma ma rag mo hab hab hub hub sa mA ra hUM phaT/ hab hab hub hub/ rag sha rA hu la hab hab hub hub/ ging kar hab hab hub hub/ ya ma ra dzI hab hab hub hub/ badzra sa du hab hab hub hub/ yag sha nag po hab hab hub hub/ phur pa brdab cing gri gug gtubs/ oM ma hA kA la ka kha mu kha/ dgra bo'i snying la ram/ srog la ram/ rtsa la ram/ ma hA kA la sa ma ya rbad/ ru pa da ha da ha dz+wa la raM/ pa tsa pa tsa dz+wa la raM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mA ra ya dz+wa la raM/ ma hA sha ya ni srog la ni/ dgra bo'i snying la ya ya/ dgra bo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ las kyi dkyil 'khor 'brub khung can// drag po'i me spar ling ro dbul// oM ma hA kA la gu na hri da/ dgra bo da ha da ha stam b+ha ya nan/ pa tsa pa tsa stam b+ha ya nan/ ya ma ya ma ha ya stam b+ha ya nan/ ma hA kA la ka kha mu kha mi rus ma a nan ya g+ha ti ra/ dza ha ta/ sa gu mA ra ya// stam b+ha ya hUM phaT// ling ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la// dgra bo'i gzugs ni byas nas kyang// mchod rten gzhi mdo them 'og mnan// dgra bo gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu// khrag zor gtor zor thun zor 'phen/ sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las gtub bsreg mnan gzer las mtha'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon// bag dro byin che chos nyid gnas// lus bde nyams 'bar rig pa dngas// gtso bo ye shes yab yum rtags// dngos sam rmi lam nyams snang la// zhal ston byin rlob ming yang ston// phyi ma khrag 'thung rig pa yi// lha la bstim nas mngon sangs rgyas// spyi bsgrubs rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung// mi nag bud med bya rog zhon// nga dang 'bar ma yin pa'o// rta nag zhon na seng ge gdong// smigs mangs sbrul zhugs me 'od gza'// rta dkar mdung can rgyal po ste// ra dmar zhub can gshin rje'o// zab slag seng ge chibs pa dang// gnod sbyin rta nag lcags mkhar thogs// sbrul mgo sbal pa thogs pa klu// me 'bar rlung 'tshub ce spyang bya// spre'u khyi dang bya khra dang// spyang ki g.yag nag la sogs stag/ ban sngags rta nag mi nag dang// a tsa ra dang bya rog dang// bud med rgyal mo mon mo dang// thog 'tsheg thug choms 'di yis khengs// bad po dus kyi rtags yin

no// dmag 'dren grong bsgyel btson bzung dang// rta phyug ra lug dgra khrid dang// bya rog khra yis sems can gsang// rbad pa dus kyi rtags lnga yin// rta phyugs ra lug ri dwags gsad/ dmar gsod nang khrol ster dang za// mgo bcad snying phyung ro dang ni// bse dris khengs nas khrag dri bsnams// rang yang 'grangs shing shes pa hur// gsad pa dus kyi rtags yin no// ling+ga gas shing sums pa dang// khrag rul mnam zhing gzugs mi gsal// gtum rngams dus kyi rtags yin no// me ni dmar gsal 'bar skyen na// bsreg pa dus kyi rtags yin no// blo bde rmi lam nyal song na// mnan pa dus kyi rtags yin no// 'ur rdo skad che me stag 'phro// zor 'phen dus kyi rtags yin no// snying dang lag med yang yang rmi// las 'grub mi 'gyang rtags yin no// bya rog 'thab dang dmag rogs 'dzings// mi nag khro dang bud med 'du// 'tshub nag thag nag rmi ba dang// tshig pa za zhing mi dga' dang// khro tshig byed na 'khu ldog rtags// mda' mdung rdo dang ser ba babs// skyes pa bud med la sogs pas// gos dang lag cha med pa dang// yang na rwa chegs rdung byed dang// khral 'dod rgyan 'gyed shags 'gyed dang// rang yang ltogs shing skom pa dang// bya rog spu med g.yag ru chag/ dar nag mdung bsnyil rmis pa dang// zlog pa byung ba'i rtags yin no// dang po 'phrul che bar du lhangs/ mtha' ma sha yi longs spyod rmi// nus pas bstan pa srung bar byed// grags pas kun gyis 'khur bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor dam tshig ma nyams nas// las kun 'grub par the tshom med// sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon// oM ma hA kA e ka tsa ti lhun hri ta hUM phaT/ ma hA kA la ka kha mu kha ru tra ti nan rtsa khrag tsit+ta rgyas/ sreg khri khrag hur thums dza/ ma hA kA la dgra bo'i rtsa khrag tsit+ta hur srog la thum ril rbad/ nr-i thums thums tsit+ta rkud rbad/ srog la rmugs/ tsit+ta rbud rbad myogs/ tsit+ta ku la rbad/ rbad yam/ rbad thums/ rbad raM/ rbud myogs/ rbad la ma thud myogs/ rbad lam rbud myags/ rbad ma hA kA la dgra bo'i srog la myogs thums ril rbad// rtags dang ldan pa las 'gor na// rang nyid he ru ka ru bsgom// zhi khro skul zhing skam thun brab// lce dril drag sngags mgo gzhug bzlog/ nyin par sngags des rU tra gsad// the tshom med pa'i drag sngags 'di// blo la mi gzur rang la gzan// sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las spogs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon// nad gdon zhi ba'i las byed na// rje 'bangs 'khor bcas dkar por bsgom// rgyas pa'i dus su ser po ste// dbang gi

dus su dmar po la// drag po ljang nag 'od zer 'phro// 'jam zhing rgyas shing dbang gi shing// drag po'i shing rnams bsag bya ste// zlum po gru bzhi zla gam dang// gru gsum dkyil 'khor steng du cig/ sku bskyed bsreg rdzas dbul zhing bstod// zhi ba shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ ba su rat+na puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ a mri nr-i ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ rU tra mA ra ya phaT// lan grangs brgya rtsas las kun 'grub// he ru ka yis 'khu ldog 'chings// rang 'og gnan pas ban dgra 'chings// rten gtor bcas pas sri'u gsos// gtor thor 'phangs na rbad 'dre bzlog/ phur pa'i rtse yis ser ba thub// rde'u dkar nag zho
