pa'i ba dan bsnams pa/ zangs ma mo ske ring la zhon pa byang shar la gnas pas so so nas 'dul lo/ lha ma yin ni ba dan dkar po lce dmar ba'o// bdud dang gnod sbyin ni dar sna lnga'i ba dan no// lcog gi rtse la rgyal mtshan bzhi re gnas te/ stag dang gzig dang bya rgod dang/ rma bya'i rgyal mtshan gnas so/ de na dga' ba'i tshal la sogs pa bzhi ni 'dres pa'i tshal du 'thab ba'o/ de na ni shing yongs 'du sa brtol gnas te/ yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o// de na ma srid pa'i rgyal mo la/ badzra he ru kas brgyan la gzhal yas khang gser gyi 'khor lo 'od 'bar ba lte ba kha dog sna tshogs pa mdzes pa'i brgyan la mu khyud dkar po dang gru chad ljang gu/ bar khyams ni shar dkar po/ lho baiDU ra ya sngon po/ nub rA ga dmar po/ byang in+d+ra nI la ljang gu de'i phyi rim na sgo snam dang/ sgo khyud drag po lcags kyis byas pa/ gru gsum sum brtsegs ni nag po dmar po ser po'o// yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa gser gyi 'khor los byas so// de rgya ma chad pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ thod pa skam rlon gyi rtsigs pas brtan par byas pa/ de thams cad khrag gi zham chu 'bab pa/ dur khrod kyi ce spyang mang po khrag la stod cing 'thung ba/ keng rus dang sha khrag mang po ri rab tsam spungs pa/ zhing chen gyi rgyal mtshan dang 'phan gdug dang bla res bres pa/ kang ka la sogs te/ dur bya'i tshogs mang po yang lding ba/ gnod sbyin pho mo mang po 'du ba/ nyi zla'i mthongs khung dang/ gza' chen pos brgyad kyi ka zhu dang/ zhing smug po'i ka ba dang/ dar nag gi lda ldi dang/ phel ka che chung dang/ mchog phran gyi gral phyam dang/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i gnas na bcom ldan 'das badzra he ru ka dang yum gyi srid pa'i rgyal mo la/ gnod sbyin pho mo mang pos

bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ dbyings kyi yum drug la/ bde ba cha snyoms ma yid kyi rtsa las bskyed pa dang/ yid 'ong rgyal mo b+ha ga sems kyi rtsa las bskyed pa dang/ 'khor lo tshims byed ma nyon mongs pa'i rtsa las bskyed pa dang/ 'gro ba sgrol byed ma mkha' lding gi rtsa las bskyed pa dang/ thos byed kyi rtsa las yid 'phrog ma bskyed pa dang/ snom byed kyi rtsa las chags byed rgyal mo bskyed pa dang/ drug ni dbyings kyi yum drug ces bya'o/ yum drug ces pa ni/ ma mo thams cad de drug las bskyed pas yum drug ces bya'o/ srid pa bde 'gro ma bde ba cha snyoms ma'i yid las bskyed pas rtags su 'khor lo dang b+han+d+ha bsnams pa'o/ yid 'ong rgyal mo'i sems las rnam snang gsal bskyed pas/ 'byung ba nam mkha' la dbang byed pa'o/ 'khor lo tshims byed ma'i nyon mongs pa'i rtsa las bkrag gsal 'bar bskyed pas/ 'byung ba sa la dbang bsgyur ba dang/ 'gro ba sgrol byed ma'i mig gi rnam shes las 'od gsal 'bar bskyed pas/ 'byung ba me la dbang bsgyur ba'o/ yid 'phrog ma'i rna ba'i rnam shes las gnyen gsal 'bar bskyed pa las/ 'byung ba chu la dbang bsgyur ba dang/ chags byed rgyal mo'i sna'i rnam shes las yang gsal g.yos bskyed pas/ 'byung ba rlung la dbang bsgyur ba'o/ de yang dbyings kyi yum drug la dpal chen pos ming gi dbang bskur ba ni/ dga' ba'i me tog mdangs ldan ma zhes bde ba cha snyoms ma la dbang ba'o/ yid 'ong ma la rin chen lcug ma zhes bya'o// 'khor lo tshims byed ma la 'bar ma 'od chags ma zhes dbang bskur ro/ 'gro ba sgrol byed ma la ri rab brjid ldan ma zhes dbang bskur ro/ yid 'phrog ma la 'khor ba chags pas tshim mdzad ma zhes btags/ chags byed ma la rgyal mo kun bskyed ma zhes ming gi dbang bskur ro// dbyings kyi yum drug po de ni dbu gsum gsum ste/ dga' ba'i me tog ma zhal dbus ser g.yas dkar yon ljang nag go/ rin chen lcug ma'i dbus sngo g.yas ser g.yon dmar/ 'bar ba'i 'od chags ma'i zhal dbus rA ga g.yas mthing ga g.yon dmar/ ri rab brjid ldan ma ni dbus dkar g.yas ser g.yon dmar/ 'khor ba chags pas tshim mdzad ma ni/ zhal dbus ljang g.yas dmar g.yon dkar/ chags byed rgyal mo ni zhal dbus ser g.yas nag g.yon mthing ba'i zhal/ de drug ka'i g.yas dang po drug na b+han+d+ha khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa'o// g.yon gyi dang po kun na dar nag gi ru mtshon phyar ba'o// bar ma tha ma na sna tshogs kyi mtshon cha phyar ba'o/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug kyang dbu gsum gsum mo/ phyag mtshan sku mdog kun gzhung dang mthun/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug ni rnam snang gsal ni 'gro ba'i

sems la dbang bsgyur/ bkrag gsal 'bar ni sha la dbang sgyur/ gnyen gsal 'bar ni 'gro ba'i khrag la dbang bsgyur/ 'od gsal 'bar ni 'gro ba'i drod la dbang bsgyur/ 'phags pa g.yos ni 'gro ba'i dbugs la dbang bsgyur/ srid pa bde 'gro ni 'gro ba'i mdangs la dbang bsgyur/ bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum mo// cir mi 'ong ba'i spun drug yin/ zhes gtso mo dang bcu gsum po la bya'o// de rnams ni gtso mo'i 'khor ro// de nas bang rim dang po la ni rnal 'byor ma bzhi khros pa'i ma bzhi phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi dang// nyi zla thod phreng dang/ phra men rgya mtsho rnams ni dbu gsum mo// gzhan zhal gcig phyag gnyis so// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng ni zhal dbus dkar g.yon sngo g.yas ser/ phyag drug gi dang po na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa/ bar ma na gser gyi 'khor lo/ tha ma na ga yu'i ga'u/ phyag g.yon dang po na nyi zla/ bar ma na ga yu khra/ tha ma na rgyu ma'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o// phra men rgya mtsho dbus sna tshogs kyi zhal g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ g.yas dang po na puSh+pe dkar po khrag gis bkang ba/ bar ma zhing gi ru mtshon/ tha ma ne'u le'i rkyal pa/ g.yon dang po na ti ra'i dbyug pa/ bar ma na sbrul nag gi ru mtshon/ tha ma na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// de ni rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi'i 'khor ro// srid pa'i sman mo'i 'khor ni/ ma mo bdun dang/ sring mo bzhi dang/ rgyas 'debs bzhi dang/ dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi dang e ka dza Ti spun drug dang/ gru 'degs bzhi dang/ bya ba mo dang byed pa mo gnyis dang/ dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ de ltar shar gyi dkar mo shel gyi bum thogs ma shel gyi khang pa na gnas pa/ de ni khri 'phang yar 'phags mar nub kyi rtsa la gnas pa'o// lho na sngon mo baiDUr+ya'i bum thogs ma bzhi baiDUr+ya'i khang pa na gnas pa'o// nub na dmar mo bye ru'i bum pa thogs pa bzhi gnas so// byang na ser mo gser gyi bum pa thogs pa bzhi gnas te/ phyogs bzhi'i sring mo bzhi bzhi yin/ tshe'i lha mo bcu drug ces bya'o/ lcags ri mu khyud 'das pa'i pha rol na/ mun pa'i g.yung drung gling bar gyi mun pa'i nang na zor bdag chen mo bzhi ni// dga' mo gnyan gyi zor 'phen ma// ar+g+ha gnyan gyi sman gcig ma// rak+ta gnyan gyi tsa mun tri// dre'u gdong can mgo gcod ma/ zhes thams cad kyi las la shis pa'i ma mo bzhi'o// nam mkha' stong la dbang bsgyur ba'i ma mo ni// bdud kyi bu mo nag mo dung mgrin ma dang/ sa bdag dang klu la dbang bsgyur bdag g.yu bye'u can gyi 'khor gyis bskor ba ni ma mo brgya rtsa brgyad kyi khungs nas brgyud pa'o// de las spros na stong rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ro// de yang ma mo rigs bzhir

bsdus pa las/ dbyings kyi ma mo gtso mo srid pa'i rgyal mo dang/ phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi dang/ bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum la sogs pa ni dbyings kyi ma mo'o// bdud mo kun gyi gtso mo ni e ka tsa ti dang/ rnal 'byor nyid dbyings bcu bzhi dang/ nag mo dung 'grin la sogs pa ni bdud mo'i rigs so// yang gab ma bzhi dang/ g.yu'i bye'u can dang/ tsha ba mgo ti'i bdag mo mgo dgu ral gcig dang/ ro bshal ma dang/ dra mi dra dang/ rma rin chen mo la sogs pa ni sprul pa'i ma mo'i rigs so/ gtso mo gdug byed nag mo dang/ bseb ti'i bdag mo dang/ gdong mo bzhi dang/ dur khrod kyi bdag mo shrI tsa mun tri dang/ rgya ri skye ser kha 'bar rkan sgra can la sogs pa ni las byed ma'i rigs so// 'dren cing 'gugs pa'i las byed pa// nyul le nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis// mngag cing gzhung pa'i las byed pa// pho nya nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis// gsod cing gcod pa'i las byed pa// bdud mo nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis// 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i las byed pa// sman phran nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis// ma mo stong dang brgyad du grags// bsdus na dbyings kyi ma mor 'dus// kun kyang gtso mo yum du 'dus// gtso mo yum yang dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus// dang po bskyed pa'i hUM du 'dus// hUM yang thig le chos skur 'dus// ma ni chos kyi dbyings yin te// mo ni rig pa'i ye shes yin// chos kyi sku ru thams cad rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ gleng gzhi'i skabs te dang po'o//// de nas yang lha g.yung drung gis 'di skad gsol to// yab cig 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha// skos bdag brgyad po ji ltar lags// srid pa cham la ji ltar dbab// yab cig bdag la bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pas bka' stsal pa/ skos rje drang dkar la sogs brgyad// srid pa b+h+yo bzlog mdos kyi skos// shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi nas// 'dod pa'i rdzas rnams skos kyis 'grems// bka' blon sgo ma thams cad byed// ma mo rnams kyi mngag gzhug yin// srid pa cham la dbab pa yis// lha min g.yul ngo bzlog pa ste// srid pa'i ri rab bcas nas ni// steng du srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhal// gzhung dang mthun par byung bar bya// dbyings kyi yum drug gzhung bzhin bri// yang na gsang phye dag la bya// smug nag sngo nag ljang nag drug/ gzhung dang mthun par bri bar bya// de nas bskang rdzas bsag par ni// gzugs mdzes bri'am 'bur du gtong// mkha' lding rgyal po shang shang drug/ rigs dang kha dog mtshungs par bya// khyung chen drug dang mdangs ldan rma bya drug/ de bzhin mdzes pa'i btsun mo drug/ gwa dor drug dang skyes pa drug/ rigs dang mthun par bris pa

drug/ sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan nas kyang// gtso mo drug ni khyung la bskyon// skyes pa drug ni gwa dor la// stag gzig chas su bcug la bskyon// rgyal po drug ni 'khor dang bcas// 'gying bag bcas te glang chen drug la bskyon// dbyings kyi yum la dbul bar bya// shing ris drug ni sna tshogs mdzes par tshon gyis byug/ rigs dang bstun te mdzes par tshon gyis byug/ gnyis pa ri dwags rgyal po sha ba drug/ bud med drug kyang bri bar bya// bya dang sna tshogs che ba'i nyi zla bris// mkhar thabs sgo drung blon po drug kyang bri// khu byug gsung snyan drug dang dpag bsam shing lor ldan// mdzes pa'i rta pho ya tha yin// sna tshogs dar las tshom bu drug pa'i ljang bu drug/ ring thung lus kyi tshad du bya// rma bya'i sgro yi mdongs kyis brgyan// me 'phang rigs dang mthun pa drug/ sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan par bya// gtso mo'i nam mkha' kun tu zhal// drug la khong pa nag po ste// ser po sngon po dkar po dmar// sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan nas kyang// rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan par bya// mdzes pa'i yum la dbul bar bya// 'di la mda' rnams ma gsungs te// 'khor la gnas pa'i ma mo gsum gsum po la nam mkha' nag po gser gyi kha cag can bco brgyad la ras ma sngon dmar dang/ rgod kyi phod kyis brgyan par btang ngo// ma mo kha blon re gung blon re nang blon re'o// nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma dang/ 'byung ba'i bcud 'byin ma dang/ mkha' la gar ting shags dang/ dus gsum du rgyu ba'i glog phreng can dang/ har ting nag mo dang/ dun ting sngon mo dang/ me za brag gyon ma dang/ me tog mdongs kyi rgyal mo dang/ srid pa'i g.yul ngo bzlog ma dang/ 'od ldan rgyal mo dang/ nyi ma'i zer can dang/ 'od chags g.yu'i ral gcig ma dang/ dung thod thig le can dang/ rdo rje bya mgo ma dang/ kha na me 'bar ma dang/ ri rab rdor rgyu ma dang/ 'khor lo 'dre zhon ma dang/ e ma 'ur sgra can dang/ bco brgyad po de ni kha blon dang/ gung blon dang/ nang blon dang/ de rnams la ngar glud mdzub gang pa re chas su bcug la dbul bar bya'o// 'phang sna tshogs pa re nam mkha' bzhin brgyan pa dbul bar bya'o// de ni dbyings kyi yum drug gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i chas su 'debs pa'o// de ni rtags pa'i rgyal mo drug la bsngo ba ni/ seng ge g.yu'i ral pa can drug/ ban glang dkar mo gser gyi sna chu can drug la/ skyes pa chas su bcug pa drug bskyon pa dang/ khyung drug la dar snas brgyan pa dang/ rta drug la btsun mo go zu can chas su bcug pa drug dang/ mi mo mdzes ma drug la gser g.yus brgyan pa drug po ni kha phyir bltas par bang rim dang po la dgod/ 'bru sna lnga la rin po che sna lnga btang/

spos dang sha ba la btang/ bse mgron bu long btang dung/ zangs ma lcags de rnams la/ ngar glud khru gang ba gcig byas la/ bza' mi du yod pa'i ming 'o ma dang mtshal sbyar la bris la/ rus kyang gzhug mgo la g.yu gdags la lag tu nor phyugs dang/ zangs lcags dang 'bru'i bang dang shog bu+u la bris la ci yod pa'i rdzas bskur/ gos dang rgyan sna tshogs gdags so// de nas shing ris 'phan bzang drug la/ rdo rje dang pad+ma rin po che 'khor lo rgya gram ral gri bri/ khyung re re/ rma bya re re/ ne tso gsung snyan re re/ shing lo'i kha nas skad snyan bsgrogs pa re bri/ ba dan lce lnga pa re re bri/ ri dwags rgyal po drug bri/ nyi zla 'og nas 'char ba bri/ mda' rigs dang bstun pa drug bri/ nam mkha' kha dog rigs dang bstun la/ mdzes tshon du byas pa drug bri/ 'phang drug gi kha dog mthun/ rma byas kun brgyan dar sna tshogs dang bzang sgros brgyan/ khams gsum yum mchog la rgod kyi ldem ru gzug ljang bu drug lus tshad du bya/ dar gyi tshom bu gsum gsum gdags so/ 'bru bya tshang ba ni g.yog mo rnams la bsngo/ ting lo mar gyi bkang ba bco brgyad sdong bu dang bcas pa bya'o/ ngar glud chag gang pa drug bya/ gos zu bskon no/ ma chos kyi rgyan gcig ma dang/ thor tshugs gcig ma dang/ keng rus thod phreng can dang/ dbugs bdag ral gcig ma dang/ nag mo mchu 'phyang ma dang/ smug nag mig gsum ma dang/ dkar mo zhi ba'i 'od 'phro ma dang/ nag mo chen mo mgyogs ma glu zhon ma dang/ smug nag chen mo ro rkun ma dang/ dmar mo 'od chags ral gcig ma dang/ ser mo sbrul gyi gshog pa can dang/ sa bdag chen mo bse'i ral pa can dang/ bdud rtsi dmar mo dang/ smug nag chen mo mgo dgu dang/ gtum pa chen po mgo dgu ma dang/ khrag 'thung spyan gcig ma dang/ re mkhan nag mo dang/ rgya nad gtong ba'i ma mo dred gdong ma dang/ bco brgyad po de ni 'khor 'dul gyi ma mo zhes bya'o/ da ni rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi'i bskang rdzas bstan te/ gtso mo gnyis la sgos kyi bskang ba'i rdzas rnams ni/ khrung khrung dkar mo la dar za 'og gi zu can btsun mo'i chas su bcug pa dang/ phra men rgya mtsho la gzig la skyes pa stag chas bskyon par bya/ gzhan ni spyi'i bskang rdzas te/ stag bcu bzhi/ gzig bcu bzhi/ khyi dkar po gser gyi yang chung can bzhi/ khyung bcu bzhi/ rma bya bcu bzhi/ shang shang bcu bzhi/ gzhan yang sa'i 'bras bu ku lan ta/ sha sna tshang ba'i gtor ma bzhi/ stag chas gzig chas dar zab khang bzang gser g.yu go mtshon dang/ mi la yod pa'i rdzas kun tshogs tshad du bsog/ de nas mda' gzhung dang mthun pa bcu bzhi/ shing ris lnga/ de yang gtso mo gnyis la re re/ khros pa'i dbang chen

bzhi la gcig/ thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi la gcig/ phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi la gcig/ mda' yang rgyas par byed na bcu bzhi/ bsdu na lnga/ gzhung dang mthun par bcu bzhi bri/ 'phang ni lnga ru bsdu bar bya/ nam mkha' ldang bu bcu bzhi'o// nyi zla thod phreng la nam mkha' khong pa dkar po la mdzes pa'i tshon du bris pa'o// phra men gyi rma zangs ma la dar gyi dpyang lag rtse mo gnyis la dgod/ rma bya'i mdongs kyis brgyan par bya/ khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi la khong pa nag mo la gser gyi kha chag can bzhi/ dgyes sde bzhi la g.yu'i khong pa la phyi rim gser la kha chag dung/ ma mo bzhi la gcig khong pa gser la phyi rim g.yu/ gcig khong pa gnag la phyi rim ser/ gcig khong pa g.yu la phyi rim dung/ gcig khong pa g.yu la phyi rim gnag/ kha chag byi rus byas pa yis// 'phang lnga rgyan dang chas pa yin// de yis 'khor na gnas pa la// bal mtshon ljang khu gsum pa sbyin// kun kyang ring thung lus kyi tshad// nam mkha' ljang bu sna tshogs re re sbyin// sna tshogs ras la sgro yis brgyan// 'khor na gnas pa'i ma mo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'di lta ste/ sngon mo khro gnyer sbrul zhags can// ma btsun mthing gi lha mo dang// sgrol byed lcags kyu can dang/ dre'u gdong 'khor lo can dang/ btsan gyi bu mo mdun ting shags dang/ gza'i bu mo thogs 'phen ma dang/ bdud ky-i bu mo mig gcig ma dang/ kha la me 'bar ri rab 'phen dang/ tshangs pa gzi chen gyi bu mo gzi brjid 'od ldan ma dang/ mun pa'i bu mo rkang gcig ma dang/ gnod sbyin bu mo rab 'bar sgra mo chen dang/ klu'i bu mo 'od de ring mo dang/ rab 'bar sgra bo che dang/ nag mo bya rog gi gdong pa can dang/ thal mdog khro gnyer can dang re ma ti dang/ gser gyi 'bru gcig ma dang/ Ar+ya gnyer gyi ri ma ti dang/ keng mu chen mo g.yag mgo can dang/ nag mo sbrul mgo can dang/ nag mo bse gdong mig gcig ma dang/ klu'i bu mo g.yu'i lan tshar can dang/ yid 'ong gi dge ba dang/ mtsho sman gyi rgyal mo sbrul nag gi go zu can dang/ ral gcig rgya mtsho dang dpag bsam nam gru ma dang/ bdud 'dul dbang gi lha mo dang/ dpal lha mo nag mo dang/ bya thul can dang/ thugs kyi gzer can dang/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dpal mo btsan dang/ sa'i ma mo khrag gnad gtong ba dang/ bar snang khams la smyo 'bogs rgyal nad gtong ma dang/ nam mkha'i mthongs nas mkhris pa sha ya dang/ bal nad 'dar bu gtong ba'o// mtsho sman chen mo dkar mo dbu dgu ma dang/ smug mo dbu lnga ma dang/ rak+ta tsa mun ti dang/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dkar mo g.yu'i thod gdeng can dang/ gnam sman dkar po nyi 'od 'bar ba'i sman gcig ma dang srid pa

gsum gyi thod gdengs can dang/ rma ri rab 'byams rdo rje grag mo rgyal lo// de ltar ma mo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi'i 'khor na gnas pas/ de rnams la mchod par bya'o// de man chad na srid pa'i sman mo lnga bcu rtsa dgu gnas te/ ma mo bdun la ni/ nam mkha' nag mo dung gi kha cag can bdun/ bya spu dang ras ma sna tshogs kyi brgyan te/ 'phang nag mo bdun la gser gyi me long bstsal ba dang/ ljang khu bdun no// mda' nag po bdun la gzig rig gnyis/ stag so ris gnyis chu mig ris gnyis/ mkhar thabs zo ba ris ni gtso mo lnga la lnga'o// sring mo bzhi la phyogs dang bstun pa'i nam mkha' bzhi'i kha dog mdzes par dbab par bya'o// mda' ni dkar dmar gser dang sngo/ thig le stag so ldan par bri/ nyi zla sman mo kun gyi gong nas 'char/ ma mo'i grangs ji bzhin ljang bu bya/ shing rigs ma mo bdun la gcig sring mo zhal gcig/ 'phang yang de bzhin grub tshad bya/ gru 'degs bzhi la shing ris gcig/ dmag gis rgyal mo bzhi la shing ris gcig/ gsang ba yum chen bzhi la shing ris gcig ljang bu re res gcad pa min/ gsang ba'i yum bzhi la/ nam mkha' khong pa dkar po 'ja' ris gzhi ka las mdzes pa'i tshon gyis bri bar bya/ mda' yang phyogs kyis bsgyur ba las/ shar du dkar po stag so ris/ lho ru sngon mo gzi bri/ nub tu dmar po zo ba kha spraud bri/ byang du ser mo nya mig bri/ dmag gis rgyal mo bzhi la yang/ kha dog nag po bsgyur ba la// dkar po ri bo gsum gsum dang// ser po dmar po gsum pa bri// e ka dza ti spun drug la/ nam mkha' smug po drug la g.yu'i kha chag btang// mda' ni gzhung dang mthun par bri// shing rig gcig la sna tshogs ldan par bya// stag so nyi zla gong du bya// ljang bu shing ris lus kyi tshad/ gru 'degs chen po bzhi po la/ ri'u dang 'bri'u'i nam mkha' dang/ zangs ma dmar mo ser mo bya// stag gzig bris pa'i shing ris bya// bya ba mo dang byed pa gnyis/ thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid yin pas/ shing ris lus tshad gnyis bya ste/ gcig la dpag bsam shing bu bri/ yal ga re la bkra shis pa'i bya mdzes skad snyan sna tshogs bri/ nyi zla gnyis ni 'og nas 'char/ gang na kha yal yel dang gsang phya phyo bya ba dang/ logs la ni ri dwags rmig bzhin rgyu ba/ tshon sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bris la dar sna mang po'i spyang lag gdags/ gcig la kha yal yol dang gsang bya phyo'i 'og tu khyung kha sprod gnyis/ de'i 'og tu btsun mo chas bzang gnyis bri// de'i 'og tu ri dwags grub tshad bri/ de nyid ri rab kyi steng du srid pa'i rgyal mo'i mdun rgyab tu gzug go/ sman mo thams cad la srog chags ni

gnam la lding dgu dang/ sa la 'dzul bcu'i gzugs grub tshad du bya'o// spyan gzigs kyi gtor ma bzhi phyogs bzhir gzhag go/ srid pa'i bem las le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang lha g.yung drung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho// yab cig 'jig rten 'joms mdzad lha/ srid pa'i b+h+yo rdzogs mdos 'di la// ri rab gling bzhi ji ltar bca'// skos bdag brgyad kyi glud ni gang// yab kyis bdag la bka' stsol cig/ ces de nyid na 'khod do// bka' stsal pa/ rgyu ni gtsang phye srang phyed pa// cha gcig ri rab gling bzhi bca'// rin chen sna lnga gtang bar bya// 'o ma spos dang chu gtsang gis// legs par brdzis te khri 'phangs bzhi ru brtsigs// steng du zur bzhi la lcog bzhi'i steng du/ ded dpon bzhi gzhung dang mthun par gzugs su dgod// steng du srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhal// mngon du gzhung dang mthun par dbyung// gling phran rnams ni legs par bca'// 'dzam bu'i gling ni sngon po la// mi rnams 'dra ba'i gzugs gsum bya// gos dang kha dog 'di 'dra'i chas su bya// shar ni dkar po yin pa ste// mi yi dbyibs kyang zla gam tshul// bongs che kha dog dkar por bya// byang dang lho yang de bzhin te// mi ni gsum gsum kun nas chas kyis mdzes par rgyan// shar gyi gsum po shar gyi skos bdag la// dmar gtor re dang chas te 'bul lo// lho dang nub dang byang yang de bzhin no// dang po dbyings kyi yum drug dgod// de yang gsang phye 'phul bzhi la// yum drug sku ni che bar bya// yang na shog shog la tshon gyis legs par bri// thams cad bang rim dang po la// 'khor dang bcas pa dgod par bya// de nas rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug/ de nas gsang phye bre phyed la// sku gzugs yang ni shog bu las// mdzes pa'i gzugs ldan dbul bar bya// btsun mos mdzes pa drug dang mdzes pa'i rdzas rnams dgod/ gtso mo yum la dar sna lnga yi gur yang dbub// rgyal mo drug la mthing nag gur// yum chen drug la 'ja' tshon khang pa dbub/ de nas phra men rgya mtsho dang// nyi zla thod phreng gnyis la che bar bya// rnal 'byor bcu bzhi chung bar bya// gsang phye bre gang dag la bya// yang na shog bu dag la bri// mthun pa'i rdzas kun bsog par bya// bang rim gsum pa dag la dgod// bzhi pa srid pa'i sman mo'i tshogs// sna tshogs mthun rdzas bsog par bya// gzhan yang spyi yi bskang rdzas ni// sha chen gtor ma cha bzhi bsham// phyogs bzhir khrag gis bkang la bzhag/ ri rab steng gi rgyal mo bdun la// sna tshogs sha sna'i gtor ma la// phud dang bdud rtsi sman gyis dgang// snang ba'i mar me bltam par bya// rgyal mo nyid kyi thun rdzas yin// rtag pa'i rgyal mo

drug la yang// spyan gzigs gtor ma cha gcig dang// phud dang sman gyis mchod par bya// yum chen drug la bskang ba ni// sha chen gtor ma cha gcig dang// sna tshogs snying sna'i phreng ba gdags// 'ja' tshon khang par phud dang mar mer bcas// mthun pa'i rdzas su 'bul bar bya// rnal 'byor chen mo bcu bzhi la// rak+ta gtor ma sman dang phud// sha chen gtor ma tshil chen dang// sbar ma ti'i mchod pa 'bul// sman mo rnams la 'bul ba ni// tshogs dang mar me zhal zas dang// nag smug rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// spyi yi rdzas rnams bstan pa ni// rdza rdza cang te'u gling bu dang// rnga dang sil snyan sna tshogs dang// 'phan dang gdugs dang dbul bar bya// skam chas thams cad gdags la g.yogs// mda' dang 'phang dang nam mkha' yang// dbyar dgun cha yis rab tu brgyan// shing ris kun kyang dar gyi chas// tshe yi lha mo bcu drug la// tshe yi bum pa bug rdol med pa ru// bdud brtsi 'dza' gad blug nas ni// be rgyal dkar phrom gzhag par bya// snying po lnga yang nang du blugs// de nas phyogs bzhir gdan gyi steng du bzhag/ bu mo gtsang ma chas su bcug pa bzhis// mda' dar me long bzhi thogs la// tshe yi snying po 'bod du gzhug/ phyogs bzhir nam mkha' bzhi bzhi dbul// phud gtsang gtor zhing spos me btang// zor bdag chen mo bzhi yi rdzas// nam mkha' nag mo gser gyi kha chag can lho// nam mkha' ser mo mdung gi kha chag can shar// dmar mo g.yu'i kha chag can nub// sngon mo bye ru'i kha chag can byang/ ser lding phur bu shar/ mchog phur byang/ skye 'phur lho/ zangs phur nub/ kho rang gi gzugs ci 'dra ba dgod do// lcags ri 'das pa'i pha rol du/ gru gsum bzhi la dgod do// de nas skyes pa chas su bcug pa bzhi 'phar ba'am spyang ki la bskyon la glud du 'bul lo// shog bu la bris na rab// ded dpon bzhi la khong rang ji bzhin dbul// bya bral kha dog so so dang mthun pa bzhi dang/ dmag mi bdun bdun mdzes par bris la dbul bar bya/ de nas slob dpon chas gos dang ldan par bya ba ni/ dar nag gi ber gyon/ re ba nag po'i lham gyon thod nag po bcings/ dpral bar rgya long mtheb gang ba gdags/ mdun dang rgyab tu dar dkar gyi snying non dang/ me long snying gar gdags so// rta mgrin nam dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la gyer gzug go// rtag pa'i gyen mo man chad gyer kun mthun no// skos bdag brgyad dang/ dbyings kyi yum drug dang/ srid pa'i g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i ded dpon bzhi/ skos bdag mo brgyad/ zor bdag mo bzhi skad lugs mi gcig pas/ nan tan rgyal mo nyid la bya'o// gtso mo gtsos na kun kyang bde

zhes gsungs so// de bas na gtso bo'i rdzas dang bskyed pa'i ma mo bcu gnyis po'i rdzas ma tshogs na mi rung ngo// ma mo srid pa'i bem po las/ srid pa b+h+yo bzlog gi mdos chen po gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang lha g.yung drung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha// rnal 'byor nad kyis thebs gyur na/ ma mo gang dang gang gi bka' chad lags// 'jig rten 'joms mdzad bka' stsol cig/ ces de nyid na 'khod do// 'jig rten 'joms pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung lha yi gtso// nga yis 'di ltar bstan pa yin// lci zhing 'thibs nas yi ga 'gags// gtso mo yum gyi bka' chad lags// brgyal zhing so tshig lce ril byed// dbyings kyis yum drug bka' chad lags// ro stod brang du gzer bas snying mi dga'// smug mo lcam dral bka' chad yin// mig ser za 'phrug bzhin ni sngo// yang gab ma gzhi'i bka' chad yin// smad mi bde zhing rkang pa bri sbrid// za lto che zhing skom dad che// rgyal mo lnga yi bka' chad yin// gzhogs phyaid na zhing bzhin ldog pa// kha zas yi gar mi 'ong na// pud byed ma gzhi'i bka' chad yin// mgo zer drag la rmal zhing na// nyi zla thod phreng bcos par bya// 'dar zhing rngam pa drag po 'ong// ma mo bdun la mchod par bya// brang rgyab sbyar na dreg pa chags// yi ga mi bde stong sgregs byed// e ka spun drug gcos par bya// tshig cing smra zhing ngu zhing 'bros// smug mo lcam dral bcos par bya// pho stod lci yang bcos la sha ma skye// sgyings ba ngan la nyal snying 'dod// zas kyang mi zhu mdog kyang gnag/ 'di rnams bcos pa'i ma mo ni// shrI tsa mun ched du bcos// spyir ni bdud mo'i rigs ka bcos// lus po lji la rkang lag 'dar// khong pa sbo 'khrog byed pa na// lha mo nag mo bcos par bya// spyi yang bdud mo'i rigs ka bcos// yar la skyug cing mar la sbyong// so dreg chags zhing dong ka bde// rgya re skye ser bcos par bya// khong pa na zhing gsus pa rdzings// mtsho sman mched lnga bcos par byed// smad tshigs na zhing sked pa 'phyes// bla rkun nag mo bcos par bya// 'bras bu skrangs shing rkang pa na// shin tu sked pa na gyur na// ral gcig rgya mtsho bcos par bya// gtsor btsor na smugs na rgyal po la/ byung ni smug nag rgya srol po la// dar smug pa'i thod bcings pa la grib sel ma gzugs/ gsang ba'i mdos dang bcas la dbul// rkang lag skrangs shing lus mi bde// g.yal zhing sbred la kha zas lto ru zos pa skyug/ dbyings kyi ma mo'i bka' chad yin// skom dad che la snying mi dga'// 'gro snying 'dod la gzhan la khro// dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa yin// rang gi dam

tshig gzhung bzhin bskang// 'bras bu skrangs shing rgyun chu 'gags// ma mo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bgegs// rnal 'byor ma ni bcu bzhi bcos// klad pa rdol thabs gser khung 'gags// gnyid mi 'ong zhing gzhan gyis smras pa gnod// sprul pa'i ma mo bcos par bya// rkang pa drag pos 'phral du thebs// lus dang gdong pa skrangs nas ni// skra dang kha spu na ba na// lha mo g.yu yi byi'u can bcos// lkog nad 'bras dang phol byung na// lha mo nag mo ched du bcos// gag pa drag po byung gyur na// gtso mo e ka tsa ti bcos// khrag nad rgyu zer byung gyur na// nag mo spun gsum bcos par bya// 'brum nag drag po byung gyur na// rgyal mo 'khor bcas nyi shu rtsa bzhi bcos// bal nad 'dar bu byung gyur na// sring mo bzhi ni bcos par bya// srid pa'i sman mo rnams la mchod// skrangs nad bem bu byung gyur na// rig ma 'od ldan bka' kyon yin// rgyas 'debs bzhi bde yang la mnyes par mchod// bas ldag shu ba'i nad byung nas// shin tu tsha 'brab che gyur na// rma ri rab 'byams bka' kyon yin// ma mo 'dus pa'i gur mdos bya// rus nad zer bu byung gyur na// rgyal mo bcu gsum bka' bkyon yin// smre sngags drag pos bskang gso bya// gzer ba drag pos thebs gyur nas// brgyal zhing 'bog pa'i tshul ston na// skos rje drang dkar gsang mdos bya// skya rengs dang po shar tsam na// 'bog cing 'phrig 'byil ba yang pa byung gyur na// srog bdag mched lnga'i bka' bkyon yin// dkar po bcu gsum mdos kyis bskang// de nas rgyal po'i gsang bsgrub bsham// gzhung dang mthun par bsgrub par bya// de nas lcam mo e ka tsa ti dang// lha mo nag mo'i lcags ka mdos// mjug la btags na byas gyur na// nad rnams zhi bar gdon mi za// des kyang zhi bar ma gyur na// nag smug gnyis kyi bsgrub pa bya// nga yis nges par bshad pa yin// shin tu kha smra smyo gyur na// gnam sman bcos par shin tu bshad// gnam sman dkar po yang dag dpal// bu mo dam tshig g.yu sgron ma// gcung mo 'od chags g.yu yi ral gcig ma// de yi gcung mo par+Na sha ba ri// de yi gcung mo g.yu yi thod gdengs can// de yi gcung mo nam mkha'i khams ky-i bo d+hi ma// de yi gcung mo nam mkha'i dpal mo btsan// gnam sman mched bdun gzhung bzhin bskang// dkar mo nyi khri bdun 'bum gyi// mched bdun kun gyi gtso mo yin// bya thul can zhes bya ba ni// ci byas ci ru ma btub pas// log tu thugs dam gzhung bzhin bskang// mched bdun 'khor na ye nas gnas// srog bdag bu mo yin pas bcos// nad pa'i sri'u gso ba la// shin tu gdug pas bcos par bya// lha mo smug nag gnyis kyi smyo 'bog ni// shan

pa phyo bsod srog pa bzhin// phra zhing kha chu 'ong bar 'gyur// de yi bcos thabs bstan pa ni// nag smug gnyis kyi mdos dang ni// pho mdos mo mdos spel la rgyas par bya// sgrub pa ma mo'i gzhung bzhin bya// de nas nag smug sbyin bsreg bya// de yis nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur/ de yang gdug pa'i klu yi nad rnams ni/ glang thabs spos gri byung gyur na/ rigs ngan gdol pa'i nad rnams yin/ dri dang sna tshogs nad rnams 'byung/ sa bdag klu yi nad rnams kyang/ zha grum 'phye'o bzhin ldog na// spyi ru bcos pa yo bcos yin/ de ltar nga yis bcos par bya/ zhes gsungs so/ ma mo srid pa'i bem chen po las/ gdon gyi nad rigs ngos gzung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang lha g.yung drung gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ kye ma ho 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha/ ma mo gur mdos chen po la// bskang ba'i rdzas rnams ji ltar lags/ zhes gsol te de nyid na 'khod do/ nyon cig nga yis bstan par bya// bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum kun kyang gcig/ rdzas kyang gtso mo mi dgos kun kyang gcig/ b+h+yo bzlog bzhin du bsag par bya// rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi la// nam mkha' snga ma bzhin du bya// mda' ris lnga yang bya ba ste// dkar mo gzi ris mkhar thabs bri// nyi zla gong nas 'char ba bya// nyi zla'i thod phreng can la dbul// stag so chu mig bsgril ma ris// mkhar thabs nyi zla stong la gur// shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya// phra men rgya mtsho'i phyag tu dbul// dbang chen bzhi la za 'og ris// mkhar thabs nyi zla gong nas 'char// de bzhin dbang chen bzhi la dbul// dgyes sde bzhi yi mda' ris ni/ sngon mo bzhi la nya mig ris// shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya// mkhar thabs nyi zla rtse nas 'char// dgyes sde bzhi la dbul bar bya// phur byed bzhi la chu mig ris// gdan ni phyogs dang bstan pa dang// mkhar thab nyi zla 'char bar bya/ 'khor na gnas pa'i ma mo stong rtsa brgyad/ grangs kyi gnas pa ma bsdus te/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la gong ma bzhin du mchod par bya// gtor ma bzhi yang phyogs bzhir bzhag/ shing ris bsdus pa snga ma bzhin/ ljang bu dar gyis mtshan pa gsum// gtso mo nyid la dbul bar bya// lnga bcu rtsa bzhi bal tshon la/ tshom bu gsum pa bya bar bshad// ring thung kun kyang lus kyi tshad// de yang ma mo 'khor bcas glud// stag gzig la sogs bcu bzhi dang// srog chags tshan pa bcu bzhi tshang// 'bru bya 'bru lug grub tshad rnams// lnga bcu rtsa drug glud du dbul// de yang sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan// de yang srid pa'i sman mo la// 'bru las byas pa'i sems can sna tshogs dang// ljang bu lnga bcu rtsa dgu dang// nam mkha' lnga bcu rtsa

dgu dang// ma mo bdun gyi nam mkha' ni// khong pa gnag la kha chag ser// rma bya sgro yi zer gyis brgyan// sring mo bzhi yi nam mkha' ni// phyogs dang bstun pa'i khong pa la// kha chag mdzes tshon gtang bar bya// mda' ni zang yag lcam mkhris btang// phyogs dang mthun pa so so'i mda'/ sring mo bzhi la dbul bar bya// e ka tsa ti spun drug la// gzhung dang mthun par dbul bar bya// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i nam mkha' dang// sna tshogs rdzas rnams bsag pa kun kyang mthun// de nas ri rab bca' ba ni// sna tshogs 'bru sna'i gsang phye la// ri rab bang rim bzhi pa bya// ljang bu khru re 'phang kyang de bzhin no// ri rab thog tu nas dang 'bru yi bang ba bya// de nas lha rdzas sna tshogs bang ba bya// sha mar gsur dang sha sna sna tshogs bsham// ri rab steng du gzhag par bya/ gser dngul zang lcags rin chen dbyig/ ri rab steng du gzhag par bya// de nas mngar sna tshang bar bzhag/ de yi steng du za 'og gur chen dbub par bya// grwa bzhi dbus su rma bya lnga/ gzhung dang mthun par gzug par bya// de nas bang rim dang po la// mthing nag gur chen dbub par bya// de nas bang rim gnyis pa la// ljang sngon gur chen dbub par bya// de nas bang rim gsum pa la// le brgan gur chen dbub par bya// de nas bang rim bzhi pa la// sna tshogs dar gyi 'ja' ris bya// dar dang ras ma lpags bu rnams// khri rkang bzhi la rim par bskor// de nas gzhung bzhin bskang bar bya/ ma mo srid pa'i bem chen po las/ gur mdos chen po bskang pa'i rdzas bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang lha g.yung drung gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ kye ma'o/ yab cig 'jig rten 'joms mdzad lha// sarba rU pa zhes bya ba/ thams cad bskang bzlog chen mo'i mdos// 'di yi bskang rdzas ji ltar lags/ zhes gsol te de nyid na 'khod do// de nas yang nyon cig 'jig rten skos kyi g.yung drung lha// dbyings kyi yum drug rdzas rnams mthun// rgyal mo drug kyang de bzhin no// ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi mthun/ 'khor rnams 'di ru+u ma gsungs pa/ srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhal mang phyung/ ljang bu shing ris kun dang mthun/ srid pa'i sman mo rnams la ni/ shing bu+u ma gsungs ljang bu bya// bskyed pa'i khro mo rnams la ni// ljang bu nam mkha' shing ris rnams// dar gyis sna tshogs brgyan par bya// nam mkha' rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan// rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi yi// gco mo gnyis la dar gyis brgyan par bya// khyung ni sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan par bya// srid pa'i sman mo'i tshogs la ni// nam mkha' bsags pa kun kyang mthun// snang zhing srid pa'i sems can gzugs// sna tshogs ngar sgros brgyan par

bya// gtso bor mi gzugs pho mo spel ma yi// phyogs bzhir bdun bdun gzhag par bya// pho chas mo chas mdzes par brgyan// khrag sna mang pos brgyan pa'i phor bu brgyad// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir gzhag par bya// rin chen snod mchog dum pa bzhi// bdud rtsi 'dza' gad sman gyis dgang// tshe yi 'brang rgyas bzhi yis kha bcad de/ gtsang ma'i stan bting phyogs bzhir bzhag/ gtsang ma'i mda' bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag/ btsun mo chas bzang bzhi yang phyag gis 'degs pa'i tshul// de nas dang por sna tshogs dar gyi phreng bas bskor// de nas ras ma dkar po'i phreng bas bskor// dmar po ser po sngon po dang// pags pa'i phreng bas brgyun zhing bskor// spyir yang dbyar chas dgun chas dbye// skad snyan bya dang nor bzang lug/ gser g.yu khrab dang zangs dang lcags// dar dang za 'og gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs tshang bar bsags nas ni// gtsang ma'i gnas su dkar nag sbra phub ste// zhag gsum bsnyen pa phul nas ni// slob dpon gsum gyis so so'i las// ting 'dzin gsal te gzhung bzhin bya// slob dpon chos gos rab ldan pas/ mdos la dang por spyan drangs shing// bar du byung khungs gdon par bya// tha mar skos kyang gdab par bya/ de nas bskang gso drag tu bya// de nas chad lhag nor ba bshags// de nas gtso mo yum la gyer// de nas yum drug rtag pa'i rgyal mo la// rim gyi tha le gcad par bya// dbyings kyi yum dang rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug/ rje mo bcu bzhi sman mo'i tshogs// kun kyang mdos chen gsum la gcig/ dbyings kyi ma mo'i 'khor bcas dang// rgyal mo drug gi 'khor bcas dang// smad mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// b+h+yo bzlog mdos las gzhan na med// skos bdag brgyad dang tshe'i lha mo bcu drug ni// bar snang sa dang bco brgyad pa'o// gzhung ni gzhan las grags pa med/ zor bdag bzhi ni kun la gces/ tshe yi lha mo bzhi yang dgos/ ded dpon bzhi po gzhan na med/ ces gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem chen po las/ skos kyi g.yung drung lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang lha g.yung drung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho 'jig rten 'joms mdzad lha// srid pa'i gto ni kun la shis// de nas rgyal mo bcu gsum mdos/ de yi rdzas rnams ji ltar bsag/ ces gsol te de nyid na 'khod do// de nas bka' stsal pa/ rgyal mo bcu gsum bskang rdzas ni/ mda' chen bya rgod ma bcu gsum la/ me long bcu gsum gyis brgyan pa dang/ nam mkha' bcu gsum la/ rma bya'i mdongs bcu gsum gyis brgyan pa'o// nam mkha' sngon po gser gyi kha chag can gsum/ nag mo dung gi kha chag can gsum/ ser mo

g.yu'i kha chag can gsum/ dmar mo la nag mo'i kha chag can gsum/ khong nag mo la tshon sogs kyi nam mkha' gcig/ 'phang bcu gsum la me long so sor mdzes tshon btang/ de'i tshe rgyan ni sna tshogs dar snas brgyan pa'o// ngar glud bcu gsum ni ngar chas su bcug la kha dog ni nam mkha' dang mthun pa la gser g.yus brgyan pa'o// gcig ni che ba la dang mthing nag gi go zu+u gser gyi rdo rjes kha chag byas pa la nyi zla'i phur sgrogs byas pa bskon pa la/ mthing gi go lcog la gser g.yu'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa mgo la bskon pa ni rgyal mo la dbul lo/ snying gar me long mtheb gang ba yang gdags so// de yang rgyal mo zhes bya ba ni/ dper na sa bdag rgyal pos 'bangs mnga' 'og bsdus nas bka' bsgo ba nyan pa bzhin/ srid pa cham la 'bebs pa'i gtso mo srid pa'i rgyal mos dbyings kyi yum drug cham la phab nas 'khol te/ de yi nang nas chags byed rgyal mo dang/ rin chen 'bar ma 'od kyi rgyal mo dang/ dga' ba ting 'dzin nyul byed kyi rgyal mo dang gsum gyis rtags pa'i rgyal mo 'khol/ srid pa'i bde 'gro rtag pa'i rgyal mo dang/ mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma dang/ mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal 'od 'bar rgyal mo dang/ de tshos rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi 'khol/ 'dod pa'i rgyal mo phra men thugs kyi gzer chen ma dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal mo bdud kyi gtso mo kham thogs ma dang 'dod pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje khros mas ni srid pa'i sman mo rnams 'khol te/ de yi nang nas 'dod pa'i rgyal mo nag mo kha rlan mche ba can dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal mo bdud 'dul ral gcig ma dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal mo dkar mo g.yag thod ma ste/ de ltar rgyal mo bcu gsum po des ni ma mo'i rigs stong rtsa brgyad 'khol lo/ srid pa'i rgyal mos mi 'khol ba ni med do/ de nas sngags pa dam tshig nyams na/ snying mun rum du sros nas nyams lci ba la lus ber ba langs nas dran pa ma gsal na bya/ khrag gi phor bu bcu gsum ni/ thams cad 'dus pa'i zor kha bzlog pa'o/ tha ma mdos byang shar mtshams su chu la bskyal lo/ gtang ba ni srid pa'i rgyal nyid la gtong ngo/ khrag gi phor bu ru khrag sna yod tshad las shes rab ma'i mtshal med du mi rung bas bskang la bal tshon sna lngas kha bcad la sha chen gyi gtor ma cha gcig dang/ dpal gyi gtor ma dang/ phu dang bzhal zas kyi tshogs dang rnga gling dang sba sma ra ma ti dang/ mar me dang/ mchod rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o/ de nas rnga chen brdung zhing 'di skad gyer ro/ zhes gsungs so/ kye 'dod khams rgyal mo tshur gson cig/ khyod kyi ming dang mtshan gsol ba// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// pad+ma gar gyi legs ldan

gnyis// dpyid zla ra ba'i nya shed la// gnyis med sbyor ba byas pa las// zla dgu dang ni ngo bcu la// bu tsha ming srid dgu zhig btsas// srid mo chen mo mthu chen rtsal drag nas// sa rim pa dgu'i 'og tu sbas// ming po skos kyi bdag po brgyad// gling bzhi yi ni bdag mor bskos// ming sring de ni dgu ru srid// sa dgu'i steng du sbas pa de// ro langs sku gcig 'gul 'gul byung// 'dzam bu'i gling yang 'gul 'gul 'gul// da ni sku gcig kyang 'gul ni ma mdzad cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling yang ni 'gul zhing ldeg/ sa g.yos 'ong bar nus pa'o/ zhabs gcig 'gul 'gul ni ma mdzad cig/ zhabs gcig 'gul 'gul ni mdzad pa na// sa bdag klu yang brgyal bar nus// zhabs gnyis thur du brgyad tsam na// gcig ni klu yi yul du brgyad// gcig ni sa bdag mgo dgu 'dul// klu yi yul du brkyang ba yi// bde byed klu rgyal gyi thugs kyang dkrugs// 'byung ba klu yi tsha ba snyoms// dbu gcig bteg bteg ma mdzad cig/ dbu ni bar snang khams su 'phyo// lha bran kun kyang 'dar zhing brgyal// spyan gnyis dmar ba'i rtsa bzlog pas// bar snang lha bran kun kyang 'khol// srid gsum la ni mnga' mdzad ma// lo gsar gnyan po'i tshes gcig la// rgyal mo ni sku bzhengs la// mdos kyi ni phud la spyon// spa ra ma ti'i mchod pa bzhes// sha chen gtor ma ni 'di bzhes shig/ mdzes pa'i sgra snyan 'di la spyon/ 'od ldan gsal ba'i me long dang// mda' bzang dang ni bya rgod ma// dpal dar ni ru mtshon dang/ za 'og ni lding khang na/ gsal ba'i mar me bltam// ma dud spos bdug spos kyang mchog ni na bun du 'thul/ sems lus nam mkha' bkrag gsal 'bar/ khrag sna'i rba rlab ni chi li li/ mo 'phang mod lang yang si li li/ chas su gsal nas rgyal mo spyan 'dren no/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ra tsa ma snying kha rag rak+ta ti badzra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes spyan drangs la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ dpal chen po'i mdun du bzhugs te mdos la byin gyis rlobs par bsam mo// de nas rim gyis spyan drang ba ni/ 'di skad ces brjod do// kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ chags byed rgyal mo rin chen 'od 'bar rgyal mo dang// ting 'dzin nyul mdzad rgyal mo'i tshogs// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// sangs rgyas ma byung sngon rol du// mnga' mdzad rgyal mo bcu gsum byung// chags byed ma dang rin chen 'od 'bar ma/ dga' ma ting 'dzin nyul byed ma// srid pa'i bde 'gro nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma// bkrag gsal 'od 'bar gsum// phra men thugs kyi gzer can dang// bdud kyi gtso mo khram thogs rgyal mo dang// 'dod pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje khros ma dang// gtso mo la sogs

bcu gsum mo// 'dzam bu gling la dbang sgyur ma// 'jig rten mthu dang dpal mdzad ma// do nub mdos la spyan 'dren no// mnga' bdag rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// ri rab khri 'phang dang po las// chags byed rgyal po rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mo dang// dga' bas ting 'dzin drong nyul rgyal mo gsum// 'od chen 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// kun kyang mi bzad 'bar ba'i sku// gsang ba mdos kyi dkyil 'khor du// sna tshogs rdzas rnams bsog nas ni/ dbyings kyi rgyal mo spyan 'dren no// mdos la byin gyis rlob cing spyon// bskang ba'i rdzas chen mchod pa 'di// gtsang zhing dag par sbyar ba la// bdud rtsi mchog dang nor gyi dbyig/ gos dang rgyan dang mdzes pa'i nor// snyan pa'i sgra mchog 'di 'bul gyi// rnal 'byor mthu dang dpal skyed la// mi mthun skyen chen slar la bzlog/ srid pa'i bde 'gro rtags pa'i rgyal mo dang// nam mkha'i rgyal mo mkha' 'gro'i dbyings phyug ma// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal rgyal mo gsum// bar rim gnyis la sku bzhugs te// 'od chags mthing ga'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsang ba mdos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// mthun pa'i rdzas chen bsog pa las// spyan 'dren mchod kyi gshegs su gsol// kun kyang mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku// mdos la byin gyis rlob cing spyon/ bskang ba'i rdzas chen mchod pa 'di/ gtsang zhing dag par bshams pa la/ bdud rtsi mchog dang nor gyi dbyig/ gos dang rgyan dang mdzes pa'i nor/ snyan pa'i sgra mchog 'di 'bul gyi// rnal 'byor mthu dang dpal skyed cig/ mi mthun rkyen chen slar la bzlog/ mnga' thang rkyen du bzhes su gsol/ kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ thugs kyi gzer chen 'dod pa'i rgyal mo dang// bdud mo kun gyi gtso mo khram thogs rgyal mo dang// rdo rje khros ma 'dod ma'i rgyal mo rnams// ma mo kun gyi rgyal mos bya// ri rab bang rim gsum pa la zhugs pa// kun kyang khro mo ljang nag sku// gsang ba mdos kyi dkyil 'khor du// sna tshogs mthun pa'i rdzas bsog nas// rnal 'byor rgyal mo spyan 'dren no// mdos la byin gyis rlob cing spyon// gtsang zhing dag par bshams pa la// bdud rtsi mchog dang nor gyi dbyig/ gos dang rgyan dang mdzes pa'i nor// snyan pa'i sgra mchog 'di 'bul gyi// rnal 'byor mthu dang dpal skyed cig/ mi mthun rkyen chen slar la bzlog/ kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ nag mo kha rlon mche ba can// 'dod pa'i ma mo bdud 'dul ral gcig ma// 'dod pa'i ma mo dkar mo g.yag thod can// ri rab bang rim tha ma las// khrag mtsho dmar po'i dkyil 'khor nas// kun kyang dmar nag 'bar ba'i sku// gsang ba

mdos kyi dkyil 'khor du// sna tshogs mthun pa'i rdzas bsog ste// sman mo'i rgyal mo sbyan 'dren na// mdos la byin gyis rlob cing spyon// bskang ba'i rdzas chen mchod pa 'di// gtsang zhing dag par sbyar ba la// bdud rtsi mchog dang nor gyi dbyig/ gos dang rgyan dang mdzes pa'i nor// snyan pa'i sgra mchog 'di 'bul gyi// rnal 'byor tshe dang dpal skyed la// mi mthun gdug pa'i rkyen chen bzlog/ mnga' bdag rgyal mo bcu gsum yang// gsang ba'i dam rdzas 'di na mthun par bsogs// bzang dgu bsdeb nas sku glud 'bul// rgyal mo bcu gsum thugs dam bskang// ma mo bye ba 'bum phrag 'khor du skyong// 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes// zhes spyan drangs la/ de nas khungs byung tshul nas 'di skad ces brjod do// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// mdos byung de ni ji ltar byung// glud byung de ni gang nas byung// rgya gar gyi yul shed du/ mi nad ni chu ltar 'khrugs/ phyugs nad ni rlung ltar 'tshubs/ ci bgyis la ci ma phan/ paN+Di ta mched gsum gyis/ thugs kyis ni smon lam btab/ se na'i phra skor nas/ gsang ba 'bum sde'i nang shed nas/ srid pa'i mdos le'u chen po btus/ pho dang ni mo'i mdos la/ nyin gsum ni tshogs su bsags/ mtshan gsum ni gyer du bgyer/ cha gcig ni ri rab rtse ru bskyal/ cha gcig ni lung gsum mdo ru bskyal/ cha gcig ni chab kyi gzhung la bskyal// de nas mdos byung ni gang nas byung// glud byung ni gang nas byung/ bal po'i yul du byung/ bal po ni hUM mdzad kyis/ bal po rgyal po'i don du mdzad/ rgyal po bcu gsum gyi glud du phul/ rgyal po'i snyun nad kyang der sangs so// de nas mdos byung gang nas byung/ zhang zhung yul shed du/ zhang zhung gi rgyal po la/ mkhris pa ni sha yas zin/ ci bgyid ni cis ma sman/ mun dun shags kyis pra phab pas/ hor ta lcam mo bcu gsum la/ glud dang ni thabs cig phul/ rgyal po'i snyun nad der sangs so// zhang zhung bon po khri mun stong gis ni/ dka' dgu ni bsogs bsogs nas/ mthun dgu ni sdebs nas su/ rgyal po bcu gsum la glud du phul/ snyun nad kyang der sangs so// de nas mdos byung ni gang nas byung// glud byung ni gang nas byung/ bod yul gyi dbus su byung// spu rgyal btsan po ni snyun gyis zin/ ci bgyis ni cis ma sman/ rgya gar gyi yul nas su/ grong khyer ni gsal ldan nas/ dza ya se na spyan drangs nas/ pra phab ni phya bskor bas// ma bdud rgyal mos bkyon no skad/ rgya bod mkhas pa ni mang pos bskor/ nyin gsum ni bsogs su bsag/ mtshan gsum ni gyer du bgyer/ chag cig ri gsum rtse la bskyal/ cha gcig lung gsum gyi mdor ru bskyal// cha gcig

gtsang chabs kyi gzhung la bskyal/ rgyal po snyun las der thar ro/ do nub tsam su yi glud/ yon bdag rgyu+u sbyor glud/ rdo rje slob dpon glud/ mched dang ni lcam dral glud/ rgyal mo bcu gsum la glud du 'bul/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig de nas byung sa gdab pa ni/ ma mchis ni dgu zhig mchis/ dga' dgu ni bsogs nas mchis/ gthun dgu ni sdebs nas mchis/ tsho ma ni tsho dgu mchis/ mda' la bya rgod ma bcu gnyis ni// phod sgro ldem ru dang bcu gsum mchis/ dar sna bcu gnyis ni/ dpal dar yug chen dang bcu gsum mchis/ nam mkha' bcu gnyis ni/ 'ja' ris 'od sngon dang bcu gsum mchis/ ljang bu ni bcu gnyis na/ khugs rang byung dang bcu gsum mchis/ rma bya ni bcu gnyis na/ 'dab ldan ser po dang bcu gsum mchis/ mo 'phang ldeng mo ni bcu gnyis na/ gser ris 'khor lo dang bcu gsum mchis/ mdzes pa'i me long ni bcu gnyis na/ gzi ldan 'od chags dang bcu gsum mchis/ khrag sna'i phor bu ni bcu gnyis na/ mtshal khrag zag dgu dang bcu gsum mchis/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyen po ni/ rgyal po bcu gsum spyan snga na/ 'dza' gad bdud rtsi'i bcud bltam nas/ rak+ta rgya mtsho rba rlab ci li li/ gsal ba'i mar me 'od bltam nas/ ma bdud spos chen du thu lu lu/ mthing nag gur chen ni ldi ri ri/ sha chen gtor ma ni ci li li/ chu lug rgyal mo ni 'ba' dang di ri ri/ 'bras bu me tog sna tshogs ni bcal du bkram/ zhal zas sna tshogs mchod pa ni ri ltar spungs/ ma mo mkha' 'gro dang re spro/ rdza rnga sil snyan skad re snyan/ ma tshogs mkha' 'gro dam la 'du/ do nub ni mdos gyer ro/ lha yang ni skyeng ma snol/ mi yang ni ma gzims shig/ nam mkha' ni ya gi la/ rgod po ni khyung lding yang/ 'greng mi yin ni glud ma lags/ dud phyugs kyi ni skyin ma lags/ ma bdud ni rgyal mo'i bya/ ri logs ni ya gi na/ sha rgod ni rmigs rgyu yang/ 'greng mi yi glud ma lags/ dud phyugs kyi ni skyin ma lags/ ma bdud gyi rgyal mo'i dkor/ mtsho mo ni ma gi la/ 'gyur sram ma bu ni skye gzhungs yang/ 'greng mi yi ni glud ma lags/ dud phyugs kyi yang skyin ma lags/ ma bdud rgyal mo'i dkor/ do nub 'greng mi yi ni glud du 'bul/ dud phyugs kyi yang skyin gcig gsob/ kye 'dod pa'i rgyal mo tshur gson cig/ chags byed rgyal mo tshur gson cig/ sku ni mthing nag 'bar ba la// mthing gi go lcog dbu la gsol// mthing nag ral pa 'od du 'bar// sku la dar nag go zu gsol/ mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ dar nag ru mtshon g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na 'phrul gyi me long bsnams// sngo bsangs ma ni

bka' blon mdzad// khro gnyer can ni gung blon mdzad// nang blon mon mo spyi r-ings ma// rgyal mo khyod kyi 'khor bcas la// gsang ba mdos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di 'bul gyis// rgyal mo'i bka' chad da bzlog la// gsang ba mdos 'di phar la song// ljang bu 'phan ring sku yi glud// rgyal mo sku lus 'od ldan pas// dam tshig nyams pa'i bka' chad zhi// rma bya'i mdongs chen 'di phul bas// bkrag dang gzi byin ldan par dbul// sems kyi glud du nam mkha' dbul// tshe yi glud du mo 'phang ljang mo dbul// srog gi lud du mda' bzang bya rgod dbul// gos kyi glud du dar nag sle chen dbul// rnam shes glud du khro lcags mde'u rtse dbul// rgyal mo rnams ni ma rig 'khrul pas bcings// ma rig bag chags sel mdzad pas// snang srid gsal ba'i me long dbul// rgyal mo rnams kyi bka' chad bzlog pa'i phyir// sna tshogs khrag sna mtshal chen zag dgu dbul// rgyal mo'i thugs nad sangs gyur la// bdag cag g.yar dam gso ru gsol// ma dud spos chen 'brang rgyas dang// 'dza' gad bdud rtsi 'di 'bul lo// rgyal mo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bdag cag g.yar dam gso ru gsol// pre ta gling gi rgyal mo khyod// mdos bdag lags kyi mdos long la// glud bdag lags kyi glud bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag rkyen du bzhes nas kyang// tshe srings dpal skyed dngos grub stsol// mdos bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ces mchod do// de nas 'dza' gad gtong la 'di skad do// kye 'dod pa'i rgyal mo tshur gson cig/ rin chen 'od 'bar rgyal mo ni// sku ni ljang nag 'bar ba la// thugs ni ma g.yos dkyil mo che// g.yas pa thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// g.yon na sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyar// srid pa gsum la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dod khams rgyal mo chen mo khyod// khams gsum zhal du rab gdangs nas// stong gsum zhal du rab tu gsol// bzod par dka' ba'i dur khrod chen po na// mi khrag rta khrag mtsho ru bskyil// 'gro ba'i mdangs la mnga' mdzad ma// khyod kyi sngon dmar kha rlangs nas// sna tshogs mi nad phyugs nad gtong// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtong// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal mo la 'di skad do// kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ dga' ma ting 'dzin drod nyul rgyal mo ni// sku mdog sngo bsangs khro mo'i sku// dbu+u la mu tig ljon tshar gsol// sku la ljang nag go zu la// mu tig phreng bas kha chag gsal// phyag g.yas zhing chen rgyal mtshan bsnams// g.yon na mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bsnams// 'dul ba kha chen drug po 'dul// 'khor ba ma mo brgyad cus bskor// gsol ni

sha khrag dmar chen gsol// zas su cang kha bu+u ri gsol// nor bu 'bar ba'i kha bad thags bzang bsrel// grogs su gnod sbyin stobs ldan nag po brten// 'bar ba me yi 'od dang bcas// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtong ngo// kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ srid pa'i bde 'gro rtag pa'i rgyal mo ni// sku ni ci yang ma nges te// sku la mthing gi go lcog gsol// rma lo mdzes pa'i lan tshar can// phyag na ba dan b+han d+ha 'khor lo bsnams// 'khor ni rnal 'byor ma mo 'khol// mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ mkha' 'gro rgyal mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'chang zhing// 'khor lo ral gri phyag na bsnams// mthing nag mdzes pa'i go zu la// ut+pal sngon po'i kha chag can// dbu skra mthing nag thor tshugs can// kha blon gung blon nang blon tshogs dang bcas// 'byung ba nam mkha'i mnga' bdag mo// 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor ma mo 'dul// mdos len ma mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'od// sku ni ser nag 'bar ba la// ser nag ral pa thor tshugs can// lag na rin chen b+han+d+ha bsnams// zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs pa na// nyid kyi 'khor rnams ma lus 'dul// khro gnyer bzhad pas rnal 'byor ma mo 'dul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtong ngo// kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ phra men thugs kyi gzer can rgyal mo ni// sku ni smug mthing chen mo la// dbu skra rma lo mdzes pas brgyan// me dpung dmar po'i dkyil na bzhugs// sku la phra men go zu gsol// gza' chen brgyad kyi kha chag can// nyi zla shar ba'i go mtshon can// phyag g.yas rin chen ga'u mdzes pa'i chun 'phyang bsnams// ma mo bdun la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dul ni srid pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ khram thogs bdud mo gtso mo'i rgyal mo ni// khram kha stong la dbang sgyur ba// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dul ni srid pa'i ma tshogs 'dul// sku ni mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// g.yas pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams// g.yon na spyang mo mgo dgu bsnams// zhal du mi snying 'bum 'bum gsol// bdud kyi dmag dpung 'joms mdzad ma// mdos bdag lags kyi mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes

shig/ kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ rgyal mo chen mo kha rlan mche ba can// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa drug la// mnga' bdag rgyal mo mnga' mdzad drug/ srid pa'i byol kha bzlog mdzad ma// sku mdog nag mo tse re re// thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// g.yon na mi snying thu lu lu// sdang ba'i las ngan dgra bo la// las kyi thun gcig dbab tu gsol// 'khor 'dul rgyal mo go ting shags// ma mo bdun gyi rgyal mo khyod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ bdud 'dul rgyal mo ral gcig ma// sku mdog bye ru dmar po la// mu men zangs kyi go zu can// phyag g.yas 'od ma'i rgyud bskul zhing// g.yon pas zhags pa dmar po sdog/ nyams pa rnams kyi snying khrag 'thung// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo dkar mo g.yag thod ma// sku mdog shel dkar ldem pa la// rma lo g.yu yi thig le can// dbu la dung gi go lcog gsol// sku la dar dkar go zu la// mi mgo thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ sri mo bzhi la dbang bsgyur zhing// gsang ba'i ma mo bzhi la mnga' mdzad ma// gru 'degs bzhi ni khyod kyis 'khol// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ gsang ba mdos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di 'bul gyi// rgyal mo rnams kyi bka' chad 'dis bzlog la// gsang ba'i mdos 'di phar la long// ljang bu 'phan rings sku yi glud// rgyal mo'i sku lus 'od ldan pas// dam tshig nyams pa'i bka' chad zhi// rma bya mdongs chen 'di 'bul bas// bkrag dang gzi mdangs ldan par dbul// sems kyi glud du nam mkha' dbul// tshe yi glud du mo 'phang ldong mo dbul// srog gi glud du mda' bzang bya rgod dbul// gos kyi glud du dar nag sle'u chen dbul// rnam shes glud du khro lcags mde'u rtse dbul// rgyal mo rnams ni ma rigs 'khrul pas bcings// ma rig bag chags sel mdzad pa// snang srid gsal ba'i me long dbul// rgyal mo rnams kyi bka' chad bzlog pa'i phyir// sna tshogs khrag sna mtshal chen zag dgu dbul// rgyal mo'i thugs nad sangs gyur nas// bdag cag g.yar dam gso ru gsol// ma bdud spos chen 'brang rgyas dang// 'dza' gad bdud rtsi 'di dbul lo// rgyal mo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bdag cag g.yar dam gso ru gsol// be ta gling gi rgyal mo khyod// mdos bdag lags kyi mdos long la// glud bdag lags kyi glud bzhes shig/ mnga' thang rkyen du bzhes nas kyang// tshe srings dpal bskyed dngos grub stsol// mdos bdag chen mo glud 'di

bzhes// glud bdag lags kyi glud longs shig/ glud thams cad ni pho glud mo glud de/ kun kyang mthun no// de nas rma bya'i mdongs kyis byad sgrib tu bcug la/ pho glud mo glud la 'di skad brjod do// kye rin chen spos kyi mi bo che/ yon bdag ni pho mo'i glud/ rin chen ni sna lnga'i gzugs/ lung thang mig la mgron bu'i so// rus pa dkar po ni mi la mchis/ rus pa'i glud du ni/ dung khang ni bya rus dbul/ mi la ni sha mchis te/ sha yi glud dbul lo// sha bal ni spang skye mchis/ mi la ni khrag mchis so// rgya mtshal ni lcogs la ma/ khrag gi glud dbul lo/ mi la ni snying mchis so// snying gi glud dbul lo// zho sha rtsa bzhi dbul/ mi la ni mkhal mchis so// mkha' ma'i glud dbul lo// ma mkhal ni smug po dbul/ mi la ni so mchis te/ so yi ni glud dbul lo// mgron bu ni sul mdas dbul/ mi la mig mchis te/ mig gi glud dbul lo// lung thang ni nag po dbul/ mi la ni sgra mchis te/ skra yi ni glud dbul lo// gzi mo ni byi thur dbul/ mi la ni klad mchis te/ sram gyi klad dbul lo// mi la ni bkrag mchis te/ bkrag gi glud du bse yi lo grom dbul/ mi la ni tshe mchis te/ tshe yi glud dbul lo// zangs ma ni gnyan gyi tshe/ srog gi ni glud dbul lo// gnam lcags ni ngur mo dbul/ mi la ni mdangs mchis te/ rma bya'i mdongs chen dbul/ rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyi glud du dbul/ rin chen sna lnga dang/ rgya long dang me long dbul// lus la dar zab ni bskon te dbul// mgo la sal sil brgyan te dbul/ g.yas na dar thogs ni pu ru ru/ g.yon na me khyer ni lams se lam/ ma bdud rgyal mo'i spyan sngar mchis/ bal mkhal thags 'thag tsam rdo re thog/ phyer thag 'gram skya tsam rdo re thog/ chu 'chu 'gab gsher tsam rdo re thog/ bang chen ring rgyug tsam rdo re thog/ rin chen ni ngar gyis 'di skad zhus/ ma bdud rgyal mo ni tshur gson dang/ rje dang 'bangs su ni brje bar zhu/ tshe dang glud du ni brje bar zhu/ ltas ngan sna dgu ni bzlog par zhu/ yas kyi bdud g.yos kyang slar la bzlog/ mas kyi sri langs ni slar la bzlog/ de skad ces zhus pa las/ ma bdud rgyal mo'i zhal na re/ smra ba ngag snyan ni tongs se tong/ 'gro na stabs sdug ni lag ma legs/ khyod rje yi glud du mchis pa na/ smra ba tshig gsum ni nyan mi nyan/ 'gro ba gom gsum ni mgyogs mi mgyogs// gser dang do gcig bdo mi bdo/ btsan dang kha lta ni phod mi phod/ mi dang glud du rje mi rje/ mi dang glud du ni do bdo na/ kha gser kha g.yu yod dam med/ de tsug ni yod pa na/ rje dang ni 'bangs su brje/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ rin chen ngar gyis mching na re/ ma bdun rgyal mo ni tshur gson cig/ gser

dang ni do bdo bas/ mi lus ni gser bas brin/ btsan dang ni kha yang lta/ btsan yang mi yis 'khol/ mi dang glud du mi brje ru/ mi bas glud du bzang/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ mi dang glud du do gcig bdo/ kha gser dang kha g.yu bdog/ rje dang 'bangs su mi brje ru/ rje yi glud du 'bangs re bzang/ kye ma bdud rgyal mo ni tshur gson cig/ kye mdos 'di ma bdud rgyal mo'i phyag tu dbul/ dang po ni ma bdud rgyal mo la/ bca' bca' ni bsngo bsngo nas/ da g.yang ya bdud rgyal mo la dbul/ smra tshig gsum mkhas te bsgo ba nyan/ 'gro gom gsum mgyogs te bang chen pher/ ma bdud rgyal mo'i bka' stsal nyan/ ces ngar gyis smras pas/ rgyal mo thugs dgyes nas glud bzhes pa'o// de nas rgyal mo la mdos gtong ba 'di skad do// kye rgyal mo brgyad cu rtsa lnga glud du 'bul/ rgyal po bcu gsum gyi gtso mo ni/ ma sring pa'i rgyal mos bya/ rgyal mo khyod kyi cho dang ni 'brangs smos pa/ sa gzhi ni sku yis brdal/ dog mo ni chu las chags/ mtsho ma pang gi steng shed na/ sku ma nyag gcig ldem pa'i tshe/ dbu ni bar snang khams su 'phyo/ zhabs ni rgya mtsho'i gting du 'khrugs/ phyag ni srin po'i yul du brkyangs/ zhal ni mi yi yul du gdengs/ sku ni ri rab kyi zom la bzhugs/ mche ba rol mtsho'i gting du gtsigs/ spyan ni stong gsum kun tu gzigs/ dbu skra sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su slebs/ rgyal mo khyod kyi lto ba nas/ lha dang lha min gyis g.yul ngo 'gyed/ rgyal mo khyod kyi lto ba nas/ rten 'brel ni bcu gnyis 'char/ rgyal mo khyod kyi lto ba nas/ nyon mongs ni dug gsum 'char/ yi dwags dmyal ba ni 'gro drug kyang/ rgyal mo khyod kyi ni sku las 'chad/ dga' ba'i tshal dang ni 'dres pa'i tshal/ ri rab rtse yi tshal bzhi yang/ rgyal mo khyod nyid las kyang byung ba ste/ 'byung ba kun gyi ni bcud bdag mo/ srid pa cham la ni 'bebs mdzad ma/ ma mo kha rlangs ni 'od du 'khyug/ 'jig rten rims nad gtong mdzad ma/ rgya mtsho'i steng du zhabs brkyang pas/ klu bran 'bum sde ni dbang du sdud/ bar snang khams su ni 'phyos pas ni/ lha bran mang po dbang du sdud/ srin po'i yul du ni phyag brkyang bas/ srin po rnams ni grogs su byas/ mi yi yul du zhal gzigs pas/ sngon dmar mi yi yul du khrag nad gtong/ ri rab ngos la sku bzhugs pas/ thams cad 'byung ba ma mos byas/ mche ba rol mtsho'i nad gtsigs pas/ srid pa'i ma bdun las la 'khol/ stong gsum kun tu spyan gzigs pas/ 'gro ba'i srog la mnga' mdzad ma/ dbu skra sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su slebs// lha rnams kun yang cham la 'bebs// ma mo ma mo mi bgyi ru// thams cad 'byung ba ma mos byas// chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med

cing// sku ni mthing nag chen mo la// thugs ni ma g.yos dkyil mo che// sna tshogs 'ja' gur ldi ri ri// bzhengs shig chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// 'jig rten rngam pa'i sgra byung bas// snang srid thams cad zil gyis gnon// lo gsar gnyen po'i tshes gcig la// rgyal mo sku bzhengs shig/ phyag na mi bre mi srang chen po bsnams// mi brgya khram la thob la rta brgya srang la 'jal// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ dbyings kyi rgyal mor gshegs su gsol// dbyar gyi rgyal mo mdzad pa'i tshe// me tog kun gyi mdangs 'phrog ma// ston gyi rgyal mo mdzad pa'i tshe// lo tog snar mo'i bcud 'byin ma// dgun gyi rgyal mo mdzad pa'i tshe// sgrub pa po yi grogs mdzad ma// rgyal mo lnga bcu rtsa lnga'i gtso mo khyod// mdos bdag lags kyi mdos long la// glud bdag lags kyi glud bzhes shig/ rgyal mo bcu gsum khyed rnams kyis// mdos 'di phar song slar ma bzlog/ 'di la phya dang g.yang ma 'bros// zhes sring mo bzhi ni sgo ba ste// shar gyi dkar mo spyan gsum mche ba can// sring mo rdo rje mdos long la// ming po rnal 'byor mdos gtong ngo// lho yi nag mo spyan gsum mche ba can// ming po rnal 'byor mdos gtong gis// sring mo rdo rje mdos longs shig/ nub kyi dmar mo spyan gsum mche ba can// ming po rdo rje'i mdos gtong gis/ sring mo rdo rje'i mdos longs shig/ byang gi sngon mo spyan gsum rnal 'byor ming pos mdos gtong ngo// sring mo rdo rje mdos longs shig/ sgo ba'i las su sgo phye la// 'phrad pa'i las su 'phrang sol cig/ mdos cha gcig ri gsum rtse la bskyal// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// ri bo bas kyang lhun sdug pa// bkra shis dam pa'i mchog gyur cig/ mdos cha gcig gtsang chab gzhung la bskyal// mi mtha' chu yi rgyun bzhin 'gyur// cha gcig lung gsum gyi mdo ru bskyal// longs spyod tshogs rnams 'du gyur cig/ ces mdos bdag bskyal tshe 'gugs khrag gi phor bu zor bdag bzhi la bskul la zor du 'phang ngo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ rgyal mo bcu gsum gyi mdaus kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// sna tshogs sdigs pa'i ltas ngan ji ltar bzlog/ sdigs pa'i ltas ngan gang la bgyi// zhes gsol pas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig khyod kyis dri ba legs// 'khor ba 'dus kyi cha 'di la// dus kyi ltas ngan mi la bab// 'ug pa mkhar la tshad bcas dang// srod la bya skad sgrogs pa ni// ma bdud bya sman las ngan yin// srin bya ro byung zer ba dang// lha bya gong mo khyim du zhugs pa ni// sman dang

'gong po'i ltas ngan yin// bya rgod mkha' la sder badzings pa// ya bdud rgyal po'i ltas ngan yin// yugs sa pho mo'i sder 'dzings pa// 'brog srin spun bdun ltas ngan yin// tag yag mtshe ma byung ba ni// byi ba 'gong po'i ltas ngan yin// mgo rkub log pa'i sems can yang// de yang byi ba 'gong po'i ltas ngan yin// ming sring bsnol dang ba gshor ba// dam sri nag mo'i ltas ngan yin// glang po che yi mche 'dzings pa// brag btsan rgyal po'i ltas ngan yin// sha pho rwa 'dzings bdud kyi ltas ngan yin// mi dang byol song bslad pa ni// gnam sman mched bdun ltas ngan yin// sbal pa khyim du tshang bcas skrog sgra 'don pa ni// sa bdag bzhi yi ltas ngan yin// sbrul gyi gshog sgra 'phur ba mthong// byol song klu yi ltas ngan yin// sre mong byi ro sngon du bskyur// ma bdud rgyal mo'i ltas ngan yin// bya rog 'ug pa deng nas khyim du bab// li byin har gyi ltas ngan yin// bud med lus mi bde gyur la// lus las bu ni mi btsa' bar// sbubs dang chu ru byung ba ni// li byin har gyi ltas ngan yin// de la zlog pa ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten stobs ldan bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// mi dang byol song bslad pa ni// 'bru bya dkar mo mche dmar bdun// lug dkar mo bdun/ khyi dkar mo bdun/ dngos su med kyang she mig gcig la dar sna tshogs brgyan nas/ dar ser pos mgul nas btags la/ de man chad du lug mig dmar gyis sna drangs la bshig/ dar dkar gyi nyag steng na mar brkyang la bzhag go/ ngos gcig na mar bya bshibs la de yang dar dkar gyi nyag brkyang la gzhag go/ gling bzhi bca' nas de ru sman bshos bdun bzhi yang byas la ri rab kyi steng du bzhag/ de'i steng du btsun mo go zu can bdun byas la bzhag go/ ngar phye la sha ba yu mo bdun byas la dar dmar pos brgyan/ nam mkha' dkar mo g.yu'i gong chung can bdun la ras ma dkar mo dang/ gong mo'i sgro dang sna tshogs kyis brgyan no// 'bang bdun la gser g.yu'i mong lo can sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa gzug go/ de nas yas stags ru la ston la/ spos dang me dang 'brang rgyas bdun dang/ phud gtsang mas rin po che'i snod bltams la bzhag/ mda' bya rgod ma la dar dkar gyi sle'u btags la bu mo gtsang mas g.yob tu gzhug go/ lag pa g.yon du me long bskur/ spos chus bu mo'i lus bkru/ ras gtsang ma'am phy-ing pa gtsang ma la gser yus phrag pa g.yas g.yon brgyan la bkon no// de na gyer gzugs zin tsam na phud gtor/ bya lug dang yas stags g.ya' ri dang gangs ri la bskyal lo// hUM nam mkha' khams kyi dkyil 'khor nas// gnam sman dkar mo rdo rje yang dag

gsal// gnam sman mched bdun spyan 'dren no// dar dkar sle'u g.yab 'dor ro// dri zhim spos kyi na bun gtibs// gsal ba'i me long mda' bzang bya rgod rten// rin chen mdos mchog 'di la spyan 'dren na// gnam sman mche bdun gshegs su gsol// gnam sman dkar mo rdo rje yang dag dpal// sku ni 'od chags sdem pa la// na bza' sprin dkar go zu gsol// mtha' ma gser gyis kha chag can// nyi zla mdzes pa'i go mtshon can// dbu+u la g.yu yi go lcog gsol// chibs su sman sha yu chung chibs// gser gyi sga srab si li li// g.yu mthur sngon mo brengs se breng// rol du khrung khrung dkar mo khrid// mdos bdag lags kyi mdos long la// thugs nad sangs la bka' chad bri// bya skad snyan te tongs se tong// lug dkar mig dmar 'ba' dang di ri ri// khyi dkar shel mig 'dur dang zhungs se zhung// sman sha yu chung yang dkyus dang brengs se breng// dar dkar nyag thag kyang sku la ring gis 'char/ rnal 'byor bdag gis brten cing khyod mchod do// gring mo dam las ni ma 'da' zhig/ de'i ni gcung mo ba/ dam tshig ni g.yu sgron ma/ phra men ni mdzes pa'i sku/ dbu la dar dkar gyi lding zhu gsol/ mu tig mdzes pa'i ljang tshar can// sku la phra men gyi go zu gsol// sku stod g.yu'i na bun ni thu lu lu/ phra men mdzes pa'i gong yag can// chibs su khrung khyung dkar mo bcibs// rol du sman sha yu chung khrid/ g.yas na phra men 'phrul gyi ga'u bsnams// g.yon na dngul dkar gyi me long bsnams// mu tig khu 'phang yang sha ra ra/ nor bu gong sreg ni mang po bsrel// sman mkhar rtse la na bun 'thul/ gzed mo grong bdun ni 'khor du 'khol/ mi mthun ltas ngan yang slar la zlog/ mdos bdag ni mdos khongs la// smyo 'bog nang kha yang slar la zlog/ bya skad gsung snyan yar di ri ri/ sha dgod kyus dang ni brengs se breng/ sman lug dkar mo yang 'ba' dang di ri ri/ nam mkha' mtho lding yang/ bkrag mdangs sigs se sig/ dung 'phang me long yang/ mdzes pa'i chas su bstsal// rma bzang phod sgro yang zer dang phyu ru ru// mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtsang gtong ngo// de'i gcung mo la/ 'od chags g.yu'i ral cig ma// sku ni rin chen ldem pa la// rma lo mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// mu men mdzes pa'i kha chag can// sman sha yu chung ni chibs su bcibs/ rol du dgo ba ru sngon khrid/ g.yas na sha zhag khra bo bsnams/ g.yon na g.yu yi khu byug bsnams// gsung snyan ni tongs se tong/ mdos bdag ni mdos longs la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ mi la ni than ma tho/ bya la ni snyi ma 'dogs/ sna tshogs ni

sdig la zlog/ de'i ni gcung mo ba/ par+Na sha ba ri/ sku+u la ni ci gsol na/ btso ma gser gyi ni go zu la/ phra men mdzes pa'i kha chag can// chibs su sman sha ni yu chung bcibs/ rol du snyan po ni ru sgor khrid/ phyag na phra men ni bum pa bsnams/ g.yon na gser gyi ni zor ba zo ba yang bsnams/ nad du smyo nad ni gzer ba gtong/ gsung snyan bya skad kyang tongs se tong/ dmu lug 'ba' skad ni di ri ri/ logs la sha dgo dag kyang brengs se breng/ dri zhim spos kyi na bun kyang thu lu thu/ nam mkha' mtho lding yang bkra dang sigs se sig/ mo 'phang dung dkar yang ni si li li/ mda' bzang bya rgod kyang mkha' la ldems se ldem/ sman mkhar stod na g.yu yi na bun 'thul/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtong ngo// de yi gcung mo ba/ g.yu'i thod gdengs can/ sku ni rin chen 'bar ba la// sku+u la men dkar gyi go zu gsol/ rma tsho g.yu'i ni gong lag can/ dbu+u la g.yu yi go lcog gsol/ chibs su khyung chen dar ma bcibs/ sku la rang la lcags kyis bskyod/ rgya long mdzes pa'i mu men can/ g.yas na shel gyi bya khra bsnams/ g.yon na g.yu'i seng ge bsnams/ 'od dang ni 'ja' mtshon ris/ lha bya ni gong mo yang/ skad gdangs ni tongs se tong/ bya bzang ni gar byung yang// mkhar gyi ni rtse la lding/ rmu sman ni mched kyis bskor/ thags bzang lug dkar la/ mang khyu dang me ri ri/ dri bsung spos kyi na bun thu lu lu/ dar dkar nyag brkyang yang/ 'od dang brengs se breng/ sman phran gshegs kyi shul/ dar dkar gyi sle'u chen yang/ sman phran bzhugs kyi gur/ mdo bdag ni mdos bzhes shig glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtong ngo// de'i gcung mo ba/ nam mkha'i khams kyi bo de ma/ sku+u la ni ci gsol na/ bya rgod po'i thul ba gsol/ chibs su ni ci bcibs na/ seng ge ni dkar mo bcibs/ rol du ni g.yu yi bya khra khrid/ phyag na bya rgod ldem bu bsnams/ sman bran ni 'bum dang bcas/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ de'i ni gcung mo ba/ nam mkha' khams kyi dpal mo btsan// sku+u la dar dkar slag pa gsol// ba ti smug po'i sham bu gdags// phyag na gser gyi zangs gri bsnams// g.yon na ba dan dkar po bsnams// chibs su dgu tshigs skya mo bcibs// skar ma mda' ru 'phen pa'i rtsal mo che// 'khor du sman phran 'bum gyis bskor// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ces ri gsum rtse la bskyal lo// byol bzlog pa dang/ nyams lci ba dang/ smyo 'bog dang/ brgyal bu dang/ dmu rdos phog pa dang/ glu bro rtse zhing smyo ba dang/ snying mi

dga' zhing mi gseb tu 'gro snying mi 'dod pa dag la 'di'i phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// sbal ba tshang 'chas na sa bdag gi yo bcos bya/ klu la klu'i mdos kyis bcos bya/ rgyal po 'gong po spun dgu bzlog/ dkar po bcu gsum rab/ shin tu smyo 'bog la phan no// ma bdud kyi ltas ngan rgyal mo bcu gsum mdos kyis bzlog/ sman dang 'gong po'i mtshan ngan la pho mdos mo mdos rgyas par bya/ ya bdud kyi bdud zhal bsgyur bya/ yugs sa pho mo'i mtshan ngan la gling bzhi kha lnga'i mdos kyis bzlog/ phyugs nad thams cad de yis bzlog/ bying ba 'gong bo'i mtshan ngan la// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i sgos mdos bya// dam sri nag mo'i mtshan ngan la// lha mo lcags khang mdos kyis bzlog/ brag btsan dmar po'i mtshan ngan la// rgyal po 'gong po spun dgu'i mdos kyis bzlog/ shin tu yam shud dmar po bcos// sha po bdud kyi mtshan ngan la// lcags mda' bcu gsum mdos kyis bzlog/ sro mo ma bdud rgyal mo'i mtshan ngan la// mda' bzhi sgyogs bzhi'i mdos kyis bzlog/ bya rog li byin har gyi mtshan ngan la// de yang yul mkhar mdos kyis bzlog/ de yang b+h+yo bzlog mdos kyis kun kyang bzlog/ ces gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ltas ngan bzlog pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// mda' bzhi sgyogs bzhi ji ltar bca'// zor kha chen po ji ltar bzlog/ ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig gnod 'dul g.yung drung lha/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud la// sgo bzhi sgo rnams ldan par bri// de nas mda' bzhi me long bzhi// dar sna ldan par 'khor lo bzhi la gzug/ 'ug pa pho rog khra dang srin bya bzhi// mkhas pas sgro ni bskyon par bya// mde'u skyer pa'i zur gsum gzhug/ de yang pho rog byang la 'ug pa shar// khra ni lho la srin bya nub// khrag sna'i phor bu phyogs bzhir bzhag/ khyi rgya bo'i snying khrag/ glang rog po'i snying khrag/ sa bdag rgyal po'i snying khrag/ bud med kyi dus khrag de rnams med du mi rung ngo// gzhan yang khrag sna yod tshad blugs so// glang gi khrag byang// shar du+u sa bdag rgyal po'i khrag/ lho ru khyi khrag/ nub tu dus khrag/ de bzhin lcang lo mtshan ldan du// phud gtsang sman dang sbyar la bzhag/ ngar glud 'dzub gang tshad du bya// btsun mo bzhi yi chas su gzhug/ nam mkha' khong khra 'ja' ris ni// khong gis bsgyur la rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan// de bzhin phud byed bzhi la dbul// lha yi cho ga gzhung yang bsrang// nam stod lha 'dzab dbul bar bya// nam smad ma mo'i bsnyen pa dbul// zhag gsum bar du bsnyen pa dbul// sngags 'di ni bzhi snying gcig du

dril ba'o// trag rak+sha mu tra ma ma snying kha rag ma ma trag rak+sha ma ma rak+sha/ rag mo snying khrag la ma dun dun/ trag rak+sha snying ma snying he keM ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ de nas ma bzhi bu mo bzhi la bstod nas tshe 'gugs/ de nas phyogs bzhi mtshan ngan dang zor kha zlog/ khrag gi phor bu re re dang mda' re re bsgrags la/ mde'u dmar kham me byas la bror bdag bzhi la bskur btang ngo/ ma bzhi bu mo bzhi gzhan dang mthun/ mda' dang me long dang dar sna dang chas pa na tshe g.yang dgug pa'o// dang po 'khor lo la 'jug tsam na ma bzhir bskyed pas/ sngags bzlas shing mchod la dbang bskur ro// tshe blan/ maN+Dal bsdu/ zor bdag mo'i bskul thun/ da ni mda' 'phen su la 'phen// da ni sgyogs 'phen su la 'phen// nyi ma shar phyogs pha ki nas// mtshan ngan 'ug pa gad mo dgod// dur bya srin byas ro byung zer// tho rangs sgo khyi ngu zhing zug/ sre mos byi ro 'phang du sgyur// da ni mda' 'phen dai ru 'phen// da ni sgyogs brdeg de ru brdeg/ steng gi lha la mi brdeg go/ 'og gi klu la mi brdeg go/ bar snang lha la mi brdeg go/ bar snang lha yis shul mtshon cig/ bla yi bu la mi 'phen no// 'og gi nu la mi 'phen no// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig la mi 'phen no// 'ug pa gad mo dgod cing srin byas ro byung zer// sgo nas khyi ngu sre mong byi ro bskyur// nyi ma shar phyogs pha kir 'phen// shar phyogs rgyal chen bka' bsgyur la// rmi ltas mtshan ngan slar la zlog/ zor kha zlog la sgyogs kha sgyur// shar nas gza' yi bu mo dan ting shags// sgyogs kha sgyur la zor kha zlog/ bstan pa 'jig pa de la zlog/ zor kha mda' yi rtse la longs// khrag zor dmar po dgra la sgyur// khrag nad rgyu gzer dgra la thong// da ni mda' 'phen gang du 'phen// nyi ma lho phyogs pha ki nas// 'ug pa gad mo dgod cing srin byas ro byung zer// sre mong byi ro 'phang du bskyur// tho rangs khyi ngu de na ngu+u// shes rab thabs kyi gzhu bdungs nas// ye shes thabs kyi mda' 'phen gyis// zor kha zlog la sgyogs kha sgyur// khrag zor dmar po dgra la rgyob// lho phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur la// mda' ni zor kha dgra la zlog/ sgyogs kyi kha la dal kha b+h+yo// nyi ma lho phyogs pha ki nas// btsan gyi bu mo kha la me 'bar lce dgu ma// sgyogs kha bsgyur la zor ka zlog/ bstan pa 'jig pa de la zlog/ dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la rgyob// khrag zor dmar po dgra la rgyob// las kyi thun gcig dbab tu gsol// da ni mda' 'phen gang du 'phen// da ni sgyogs 'phen gang du 'phen// nyi ma nub phyogs pha ki nas// 'ug pa gad mo dgod cing srin byas ro byung zer// tho rangs sgo khyi ngu zhing sre mong byi ro 'phang du bskyur// da ni mda' 'phen de ru

'phen// da ni sgyogs kha de ru sgyur// mda' yi rtse la zor kha sgyur// sgyogs kyi kha la dal kha zlog/ nyi ma nub phyogs pha ki nas// klu yi bu mo yid 'ong dge/ zor kha bzlog la sgyogs kha sgyur// bstan pa 'jig pa de la zlog/ khrag zor dmar po dgra la rgyob// da ni mda' 'phen gang du 'phen// da ni sgyogs 'phen de ru 'phen// nyi ma byang phyogs pha ki nas// 'ug pa gad mo dgod cing srin byas ro byung zer// thor rangs sgo khyi ngu zhing sre mong byi ro 'phang du bskyur// da ni mda' 'phen de ru 'phen// da ni sgyogs 'phen de ru 'phen// byang phyogs rgyal chen bka' bsgyur ma// zor kha zlog la sgyogs kha sgyur// nyi ma byang phyogs pha ki nas// bdud kyi bu mo mig gcig rkang 'degs ma// zor kha zlog la sgyogs kha sgyur// bstan pa 'jig pa de la zlog/ khrag zor dmar po dgra la sgyur// mde'u'i kha la zor kha long// zhes tshe blan no// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ mda' bzhi sgyogs bzhi'i mdos kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// mtsho sman mched kyi bskang mdos la// de yi mthun rdzas ji ltar bsog/ dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ mtsho sman mched kyis bskang rdzas ni// mda' ris shing ris ma gsungs te// dang por nam mkha' bsog par bya// gser gyi khong chung btang ba la// rag mo g.yu yi kha chag can// sna tshogs dar dang rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan// smug mo dbu lnga'i phyag tu dbul// nam mkha' sngon po gser gyi kha chag can// mthing nag dar dang rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan// ma btsun mthing gi lha mo'i phyag tu dbul// nam mkha' dung gi khong chung la// gser la g.yu yi kha chag can// dkar mo dbu dgu'i phyag tu dbul// khong pa smug la phyi rim ser// g.yu yi kha chag mdzes par btang// tsa mun tri yi phyag tu dbul// khong pa g.yu la phyi rim dmar// g.yu yi bye'u can phyag tu dbul// nam mkha' sngon po zang yag la// dung gi kha chag gtams pa ni// rgya mtsho gling gi dbang mo che la dbul// khong pa dung la phyi rim dmar// kha chag g.yu la byas pa de// rma ri rab 'byams phyag tu dbul// khong pa gnag la phyi rim dkar// kha chag g.yu yis byas pa ni// 'o de ring mo'i phyag tu dbul// nam mkha' 'ja' ris 'od po che// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i phyag tu dbul// kun kyang dar dang rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan// mtsho sman mched dgu'i bskang rdzas ni// 'phang sngon dgu la mdzes pa'i me long stsal// dar gyi gos sngon chas su gzhug/ bu+u ram mtsho dang sbrang gi mtsho// mar nag mtsho dang rtsi mar mtsho// 'o ma'i mtsho dang khrag gi mtsho// rtsi sman mtsho dang chu mig

mtsho// lding ka mtsho dang 'bab chu mtsho// bya dgu'i kha dog 'phang dang bstun// bud med mdzes ma dgu yi gzugs// mgo la gser g.yu mdzes pas brgyan// mthing nag dar gyi go zu bskon// gsal ba'i mar me dgu yang bltams// gtor ma dgu yang bshams nas ni// slob dpon chas su zhug nas kyang// rta mgrin rgyal por bskyed nas kyang// mtsho sman rgyal mo dgu la gyer// de nas tshe dgug g.yang blan la// bya chu kha'am lug chu kha mgo dar gyis gtums la/ chu dbyings su tha ma mthing gi lha mo la gtad do// de yang 'di skad ces dbul lo// kye do nub mdos gyer ro// do nub ni glud 'bul lo// gnam yang ni ma mnal la// sa yang ni ma gzims shig/ lha yang ma mnal la/ mi yang ma gzims gshig/ phyogs phyogs de ni pha ki na// mtsho ma pang de ni me re re/ gser gyi nya sbrul yang shigs so shig/ klu bya pho yang di ri ri/ gnyan bya mchu sngon skad snyan tongs se tong// ngar ngur lcam dral yang dar ma dir/ gnam sngo sa sngo yang sangs se sang/ rma bya gar byed kyang sga ra ra/ de'i ni gnyan mo ba/ ma btsun mthing gi lha mos byas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang shed na/ g.yu yi sbrang ma bkra la la/ de'i nang shed na/ g.yu mkhar sngon po yang sdems se sdem/ mkhar stod g.yu yi na bun 'thul/ mkhar smad g.yu'i bu yug 'tshub/ de'i nang shed na gser gyi khri la g.yu'i gdan steng na/ ma btsun mthing gi lha mo bzhugs/ sku la mthing gi ber chen gsol// dbu+u la dar zhu nag po gsol// chibs su chu glang sngon po bcibs// phyag na rma bya'i rgyal mtshan bsnams// mkhris pa sha ya'i mnga' bdag mo// 'khor du klu sman 'bum gyis bskor// pho nyar bcu btsan chu tshan yang sngon mo 'gyed// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag ni glud longs shig/ g.yu mtsho sngon mo ni me ri ri/ de'i nang shed na/ g.yu mkhar sngon po ni ldems se ldem/ de'i nang shed na/ mkhar gyi bdag mo la/ klu yi pho mo 'od de ring mos byas/ sku la sbrul sngon gyi slag pa gsol/ dbu la mthing gi go lcog gsol/ phyag na rus sbal nag po'i par bu bsnams/ g.yon na sbrul zhags ni khra bo bsnams/ chibs su rus sbal nag po bcibs// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag ni glud longs shig/ sa bdag klu dang ni ma sdong par/ ming po rnal 'byor gyi mnga' bdag ring 'khor du/ sring mo rnal 'byor dam ma 'da'/ phyogs phyogs de ni pha ki na/ yul bas kyi ma mtha' na/ chab bas kyi ma gzhug na/ mtsho ding ding gi nang shed na/ mthing gur sngon mo ni ldi ri ri/ gser gyi re thag ni rgyangs se rgyang/ g.yu yi chon phur ni si li li/ de'i ni nang shed na/ kha bdag chen mos bya/ klu yi bu mo yid 'ong dag/ sku+u la

nya lcibs sngon mo gsol/ sbal lcong 'bum gyi ni kha chag can// chibs su chu srin dar ma bcibs/ rol du sbal pa nag po khrid/ mdze nad shu ba'i mnga' bdag mo/ phyag na sbrul gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams/ pho nya chu btsan sngon po bgyed/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag deng 'khor du/ mtsho sman ni mched dgu+u la/ glud 'bul khab 'jal lo/ mi bas glud re dga'/ rdzas bas khab re dro/ rgya gar yul gyi tshu rol na/ kha che yul gyi ni pha rol na/ gzeb be ta'i gling shed na/ mdze nad bco brgyad gtong ba'i mnga' bdag mo// lha mo g.yu yi bye'u chung can/ sbrul mgo dgu yi go zu can/ sbal cong 'bum gyi kha chag can/ rma bya'i la tshom pu ru ru/ klu rgyal 'bum gyi lcam gcig ma/ phyag na sbrul gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams/ mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ dung mtsho dkar mo'i nang shed na/ klu 'od zangs kyi lcam gcig ma/ sku+u la dar dkar gyi go zu gsol/ dbu dgu'i thor tshugs ni gcig tu bcings/ chibs su gser sbrul ni g.yug shog bcibs/ phyag na dung gi
