rgod ni legs pa bsnams// kha rlangs sngon dmar 'ja' tshon 'khyug/ ljang sngon drag po'i srin mo ste/ yak+sha nag po'i btsun mo yin/ pho nya ma bdud rgyal mo 'gyed/ mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag ni ding 'khor du/ mtsho sman mched dgu la glud 'bul lo/ dog nems nems kyi ni 'og/ mtsho mer gyi nang shed na/ gser mkhar ser po la/ g.yu yi bad btags pas/ gnyan bya ni ding po lding/ rin chen ni sgo bzhi bstsal/ g.yu'i rgyal mtshan ni bkra la la/ de'i nang shed na/ a phyi la kha bdag mo// mtsho sman rgyal mo nyul le ma// sku la mthing nag ber chen gsol// dbu+u la rma bya'i mthing zhu gsol// rgya long me long ta la la// chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs// rol tu chib rta sngon po khrid// khyi sngon mo shel mig gi mnga' bdag mo// nad du zha grum la za 'phrug gtong/ mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig mnga' bdag ni ding 'khor du/ mtsho sman mched la glud 'bul lo/ khrag mtsho dmar po 'khol ba'i nang shed na// dmar mo g.yu yi ral pa can// khyod kyi sku lus mthing bas sngo// g.yu yi ral pa 'od du 'bar// ral pa'i zar bu nyag ma re re la// gser gyi nya sbrul shigs se shig/ khyi dmar po shel mig gi mnga' bdag mo// 'khor du dung 'phen re mkhar nag mo 'khol// za 'phrug gtong ba'i mnga' bdag mo// 'khor du dmar mo 'bum gyis bskor// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag ni ding 'khor du/ mtsho sman mched

la glud 'bul lo// mchongs khar smug po'i nang shed na// dung gi rgyan ni khra la la// g.yu yi khri la gser gyi gdan steng na// smug nag chen mo dbu lnga mo// sku la le brgan ber chen gsol// rol mtsho g.yu yi kha chag can// dung gi sdom sdig nyi li li// bud med dmar nag 'bum gyis bskor// chibs su chu klang sngon po bcibs// g.yas na dpal dar smug po bsnams// g.yon na mchong gi ga'u bsnams// sku la nyag gcig bskyod tsam na// sku ma ring la thams cad 'du// khyi smug mo shel mig gi mnga' bdag mo// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag ni ding 'khor du// mtsho sman mched la glud 'bul lo// ri rab chen po'i rmang shed na// rgya mtsho chen po'i nang shed na// rma ri rab 'byams lha mo grags mo rgyal// srid pa gsum gyi thod gdengs can// gser dang shel gyi rnga mo la// g.yu yi sga bstad zangs se zang// mu men gur chen khyi li li// mu tig khu 'phang sha ra ra// sku la rma bzangs ber chen gsol// phyag na klu 'brug da ra 'dzin// sus kyang mi bskyod mi shigs yang// rnal 'byor dam tshig can la dgongs// bran glu spyugs pa tse re re// zhabs gcig rgya mtsho'igating du brkyang// klu bran mang po bran du 'khol// zhabs gcig srin po'i yul du brkyang// srin po pho mo bran du 'khol// phyag gcig ri rab brtse la bton// lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngo zlog/ phyag gcig lha yi yul du brkyang// lha bran mang po bran du 'khol// mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag ni ding 'khor du// mtsho sman ni mched dgu la// rgyal du glud 'bul lo// mi ma ni rin chen bdun dgu yang/ mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ rnam shes ni dbang po ldan/ mi yi ni glud lags te/ mtsho sman ni mched dgu la 'bul/ nam mkha' ni sems kyi glud/ mi yi glud du dbul lo// mo 'phang thang bzangs ni gzug/ gzugs gyi ni glud lags te/ gsal ba'i mar me dgu/ rang rig ni gsal ba'i glud/ sems nyid snang ba'i glud du 'bul/ rma bya ni mdongs chen dgu// mdangs dang bkrag gi glud/ bkrag dang mdangs kyi glud du 'bul/ mtsho chen dngas ma dgu/ yul dang ni mkhar gyi glud du 'bul/ dngul dkar me long 'od po che/ dbang po sgo lnga'i glud du 'bul/ dar sna mang po yang/ na bza' mdzes pa'i glud/ gos kyi glud du 'bul/ zangs lcags gser g.yu dang/ bya khyi mdzes par kha dog bsgyur/ nor gyi ni glud du 'bul/ spyan gzigs ni zhal zas yang/ zas kyi glud du 'bul// rin chen spos kyi mi bo che// mched lcam sku yi glud du 'bul// sha chen gtor ma rak+ta rnams// gsang ba'i dam rdzas mchod par

'bul// mtsho sman mched dgu mdos long la// tshe dang glud du brje bar zhu// rdzas dang zhabs su brje bar zhu// ma mo'i bka' chad slar la zlog/ mi bas glud bzang 'bul/ zhes mdos 'di skad ces btang ngo// ma tshogs ni gnyan mchod do// mtsho sman ni mched dgu mchod/ mdos ni gang du gtong/ phyogs phyogs ni pha gi na/ mtsho ma pang ni me re re/ bskyod pa'i rba rlabs kyang ci li li/ de'i nang shed na/ mdos kyi bdag mo ba/ ma btsun gyi rgyal mo lags/ ma btsun ma btsun mi bgyi ru/ rma bzangs tha mo'i lcam mo lags/ klu 'od ldan gyi btsun mo lags/ rgyal mo rgyal mo mi bgyi ru/ klu rgyal 'bum gyi lcam mo ste/ mtsho sman mched dgu'i rgyal mo lags// do nub ni glud 'bul lo// do nub ni mdos btang ngo// chu rgya drol sol yang po dar gyis brgyan/ mdos kyi sna drongs la/ ma btsun gyi spyan snga ru/ mu tig gi rtsar bas mdzes/ ma btsun gyi spyan snga ru/ srin mi babs kyi bu bas mdzes/ de'i mdos la ni chog cig 'don/ mdos kyi ri rab kyang// rin po che'i rtsigs pa la/ mu tig phreng ba ni rtsar du brgyus/ sku 'phang ni ri rab tsam/ dma' yul gyi ni glud lags so/ mtho khar gyi glud lags so// mtsho sman mched dgu dang mi ru brje ba'i mdos/ de'i sku rgyal du sna tshogs bsags/ mthun dgu ni mtshar du sdebs/ ma btsun rgyal mo'i spyan sngar dbul/ kye ma btsun rgyal me ni tshur gson cig/ yul ni klu yul ding ba na/ mkhar klu mkhar ni nya yi mkhar/ stod sdig pa la chu srin gyi gtams/ de'i la nang shed na/ klu yi bu mo ma de lcam gcig ma/ sku la sbal pa'i tshem tshem gsol/ zhal lag g.yu bag sngon po gyon/ phyag na sbal lcong gi dong bu thogs/ nad du mdze dang ni phol 'bras kyang gtong/ ma btsun mtsho ni ma 'khrugs par/ mdos ni phar longs ni 'gab ma ngan/ tshe ni tshur log ni mna' ma za/ tshe dang ni g.yang ma 'bros/ mdos kyis khyed bskang pas/ mtsho sman mched dgu'i thugs nad sangs/ pho glud g.yas na sga ra ra/ mo glud g.yon na si li li/ mdos 'di phar 'bul gyi/ tshe dang g.yang 'di tshul stsol cig/ phywa dang ni dmu yang mdos// lha dang lha min mdos/ btsan dang bdud kyang mdos/ do nub su dang su yi mdos/ mtsho sman mched dgu dang/ yon bdag ni rgyu sbyor mdos/ bzlog pa ni mdos kyis bsdu/ dka' dgu ni bsog nas dbul/ mthun dgu sdebs nas dbul/ sku glud ni ring tshad 'jal/ sgo ba la sgo phyes shig/ 'phrang ba la 'phrang sol cig/ sgo ba la btsas su 'bul/ 'phrang ba la btsas 'bul lo// zhes phud bar ma btang/ lug sna la khrid du bcug/ yas dang ni 'grogs la/ da ni gshegs so sha ra ra/ nyi ma byang phyogs pha gi na// byang gi sngon mo khrog gnyer las

mkhan ma// ming po rdo rje mdos btang gis// sring mo rdo rje mdos long la/ tshe dang g.yang gcig tshur la gsol// da ni mdos gtong gang du gtong// nyi ma shar phyogs pha ki na// shar gyi spyan gsum mche ba can// ming po rdo rje mdos gtang gis// sring mo rdo rje mdos long la// tshe dang g.yang gcig tshur la gsol/ da ni mdos gtong gang du gtong// nyi ma lho phyogs pha ki na// lho yi ser mo spyan gcig mche ba can// ming po rdo rje mdos gtong gis// rdo rje sring mo mdos longs shig/ tshe dang g.yang gcig tshur la gsol// da ni mdos gtong gang du gtong/ nyi ma nub phyogs pha ki na// nub kyi dmar mo bye ru'i lan tshar can// ming po rdo rje mdos gtong gis// sring mo rdo rje mdos longs shig/ tshe dang g.yang gcig tshur la gsol// mdos 'di phar song 'gab ma ngan// tshe 'di tshur shog mna' ma za// mdos la phya dang g.yang la 'bros// zhes phyogs bzhir phud gtang/ mdos byang phyogs su bskyal lo// de nas tshe blan bshags pa bya'o// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ mtsho sman mdos kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// dbang phyug ma yi zor mdos la// rdzas rnams mthun pa ji ltar bsog ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ rdzas rnams mthun par bsog pa ni// mda' mtho gang ba nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ 'phang bu nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ nam mkha' nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ phyogs dang bstun la gzug/ ting lo nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ zan chang nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ ngar glud nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ khrag gi phor bu nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ kha dog phyogs dang mthun/ phyogs bzhi gtor ma bzhi/ ljang bu nyi shu rtsa brgyad// stag pa dang glang ma'i pho dang mo dang nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ gtsang gshos gru gsum nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ bya nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ rtsang nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ phyi rim du gzug go/ de nas maN+Dal gru bzhi lham pa la/ zur bzhi cha yis bgos nas ni/ b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ rtse mo bzhi la hUM bzhi/ de ltar bshams la de nas gtor ma bshams la/ las kyi cho ga gzhung bsrang/ rak+ta sbrengs shing srin mo smug nag ces drag tu bskul/ de nas tshogs kyis mchod/ lhag ma ye shes kyi dbang phyug ma la byin/ de nas gling bzhi'i rdzas dang yas bgos la/ b+h+yo shar gyi ma bdun shar du b+h+yo// lho yi ma bdun lho ru b+h+yo// nub kyi ma bdun nub tu b+h+yo// byang gi ma bdun byang du b+h+yo// zhes byang phyogs su yas stags bskyal lo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ dbang phyug ma'i sgos mdos kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i sgos mdos dang// mthun pa'i

rdzas rnams ji ltar bsog/ 'jig rten stobs kyis bka' stsol cig/ ces de nyid na 'khod do// yang bka' stsal pa/ rdzas rnams mthun par bsog pa ni// ma trang nag po gru gang la// kha mig dbang po tshang bar dgod// lus po nag po gdong pa dmar// de yi snying gar mo nyid bskyon// ngar gyi phye la khru gang ba// kha mig legs par dod par bya// lus la dar nag go zu bskon// mgo bor mthing gi go lcog bskon// mthing nag ral pa phrag sor sleb par bya// mdun du rma bya'i sgro lnga sbam la gzug/ nam mkha' khong nag po la 'ja' ris byas la/ dar nag dang rma bya'i sgros brgyan la mo'i rgyab tu gzug/ de bzhin khong ser mo la kha chag nag gus byas pa gcig g.yon du gzug khong sngon mo la dmar mos phyi rim byas pa gcig g.yas su 'dzug/ nam mkha' khong dkar po la phyi rim sngon po gcig logs g.yon par gzug/ khong dmar po la phyi rim dkar pos byas pa gcig logs g.yas par gzug/ khong sngon mo la dar gyis tshom bu lngar brgyan pa'i ljang bu lnga nam mkha'i 'gram du gzug/ dar nag gi gur dbub/ 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i bla re bre/ sha chen gyi gtor ma cha gcig bsham/ bya kha dog lngar byas la gzug go/ de nas rim gyis thugs dam bskang ba dbyings kyi yum drug nas/ sman mo yan chad bskang/ lhur ma mo rigs bzhi bskang/ sgos dbyings kyi ma mo la bskang/ bskang ba'i rdzas ni mdos dang/ lug nag mo thig le can dang/ phug ron nam kyung kas bskang/ rnga gling dang gtor ma 'dza' gad dang/ zhal zas tshogs dang/ mda' bya rgod ma sgro dang mde'u ma nyams pa dang/ me long dang dar yod tshad kyis bskang ngo// de nas mdos bskyal ba dgra phyogs su bskyal/ ma mo'i zhal kha dgra la bsgyur/ thugs kyi gnag pa dgra la mdzod// zhabs kyi rten ma dgra la mdzod// phyag gi sor gdub dgra la 'phangs// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// dam tshig nyams na gso ru gsol// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ zhes dang po sa dgu'i gting na bzhugs zhes bstod do// ma mo srid pa'i bem chen po las/ srid pa'i rgyal mo'i mdos sgos bskang chen po'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang g.yung drung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha/ lha mo nag mo thugs dam bskang ba la// lcags khang nag mo'i mdos la/ mthun rdzas ni ji ltar bsog/ ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ lha mo nag mo'i thugs dam bskang ba la/ mthun rdzas ni lcags las khang pa gzhung bzhin rtsig/ zur bzhi smug la logs bzhin dmar// 'gram bzhi rang khar gzhag par bya// bang bzhi gser la kha bad g.yu/

tshon sna lnga las khong mig dgu ru dbub/ de nas gsang phye phul gang la/ bong nag gzugs byas gzhung bzhin sga yang bstad/ srab dang mthur yang gzhung bzhin gzhug/ lha mo'i sku gzugs bstod pa dang mthun par bya// bong bu+u la bskyon ming pos khrid// nang du lha mo bzhugs pa la/ bong bu sgo drung gdags par bya/ nam mkha' khong nag po la gser gyi phyi rim bya/ kha chag ni g.yu/ sna tshogs dar dang rma byas brgyan pa dang/ 'phang nag la gser gyi me long byas la mkhar gyi gdong du gling phran gcig la gzug go/ seng ldeng gi phur pa gcig la/ dar sna lnga btags la de yang gzug/ de nas phud ltir bu gang gi kha ru 'brang rgyas gcig gzhag/ bya nag mo gser gyi mgrin pa can nam/ lug nag mo mig gser ma la rten bca'/ dar nag po lce lnga pa'i 'phan gzug/ me dud spos chen gtang rkang gi gling bu 'bud/ rnga chen brdung zhing spyan drangs/ khong pa'i nang nas byon nas/ gling phran steng na bzhugs pa la/ ma mo sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ zhes brjod pas/ phur pa dang gnyis su med par bstim pas tshul dang cha byad ji bzhin gyur pa la/ bdag badzra he ru ka ru bsgom pa'i thugs ka nas trag nag po gcig ma mo'i thugs kar 'phangs pas/ shin tu gzi byin dang ldan par gyur te/ de la srog gi snying po brgya 'am stong rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o// oM ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me ba hUM ma b+h+yo dza dza/ zhes pa'i yi ge bcu bdun pa/ des srog bsdus nas gzhung dang mthun par mchod pa rim gyis dbul/ me tog mang po bcal du yang dgram mo// de nas bstod pa kun yang gtang/ dam bdar phud gtang bskang ba drag tu bya/ bshags pa 'bul ba dang/ de kun thun re re ltar bya zhing/ hUM bdag ni ye nas ma chags byang chub sems// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dang ye nas mnyam// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyen po 'dir zhugs nas// mi pham lha mo khyod dang mthun sdebs na// dus 'dir mi 'dod dgra langs pas// lha mo khyod kyi mthu dang byin rlab da ma chung// gangs kyi seng ge bzhin du tshang mar dag gis bsgrubs// nags kyi stag gu bzhin du gcig bur bdag gis bsgrubs// brag bar rus sbal bzhin du byang chub sems dang ldan par bsgrubs// bya rgyal khu byug bzhin du dam tshig bdag bsrung na// don med g.yel bar ma gtong ma mo khyod// byams mgon thugs rje bdag la dgongs su gsol// 'di 'dra dus ngan bskal pa'i tha ma la// bde gshegs bka' yi bstan pa bsrung dgongs kyis// khyed rnams ma g.yel thugs dam srungs// grogs so cog kyang grogs min gyi// rnal 'byor grogs mchog bdag ma spangs/ sgrub po cog kyang dam mi bsrung// ri kha ma rgyud dam tshig srungs//

khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas 'di ru// ma mo mkha' la ma 'phyo bar// nam mkha' stong pa ya gi ni// ma mo rten du ma 'cha' dang// de ni ma mo'i chags sa min// de bas gzhal yas 'di ma spangs// chu bo 'khyil ba'i rba klong la// don ma mchis par ma mchod cig/ ma mo rten dang mtsho mi 'gyur// rak+ta'i rba klong 'di ma spangs// dur khrod gnas su ma gshegs shig/ ma bsngos 'tsho ba'i zas ma yin/ de bas dur khrod rdzas chen 'di ma spangs// nags tshal ya gir ma gshegs shig/ gshegs kyang ma mo'i bzhugs sa min// de bas b+han+d+ha lcang lo 'di ma spangs// ri bo ya gi lhun sdug kyang// ma mo'i chags kyi rten ma mchis// de bas bdag gi srid pa'i ri bo 'di ma spangs// ma mo khyod kyi dam 'khor yang// dge ba'i don la mi dgongs kyi// sdang ba'i dgra bo srog dang phrol// 'chi med don gyi lam bstan gyi// skye med byang chub ma spangs shig/ srid pa gsum po lam min no// don dam sems nyid ma spangs shig/ de bas rang dam rang gis srungs// ma mo khyod la smreng gsol ba// skye ba 'di dang sngon tshe gong ma nas// ma mo khyod dang mthun sdebs nas/ bdag gis bla med byang chub sgrub dgongs pas// las ngan dgra bos ma ster ro// bdag dung dung ni mchi ma bro// kaM kaM brang lag 'thab snying 'tshal// 'di ltar bos shing gdung tsam na// ga'u shod kyi srin mo yang// pha bas byams shing khu bas dungs// lang ka yul gyi srin mo yang// ma bas byams shing sring bas dungs// pu ri yul gyi srin mo yang// phu bas byams la nu bas dungs// sha sha'i srin po pho mo de 'dra na// ma sring rgya mtsho thugs re sra// bdag gi gzugs kyi phung po ni// sdong po rul pa'i rtsa ba 'dra// bdag gi srog gi sbu'u gu ni// ston kha'i sog spugs shar gshir yang ba 'dra// bdag gi rnam par shes pa ni// me stag rlan sar bab pa 'dra// 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal thugs kyis bzod lags sam/ bdag seng ge brjid dang ma bral cig/ stag gu ris dang ma bral cig/ rus sbal khog pa stongs sa re// bdud rtsi rgyun lam chad da re// rdo rje'i gzong kha snyil la re// khyung chen gshog pa chag ga re// pa ta ri le'i sha ma za// lang pa dbye dang khur ma khur// dbye ba rbab kyis phog ga re// ya ga chen po da ra re// zhes smreng gsol la bskang gso bya tshogs rol/ de nas lid+ga skud pa sngon dmar gyis la yang mi'i snying gar bcings la/ kha byang phyogs su bstan te/ lcags khang gi nang du gzhug lam rgya gram du mnan no// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ lha mo nag mo'i gsang mdos dam sri dang dgra ma rungs pa mnan cing bzlog pa dang bskang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces

gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// lha mo'i ma trang mdos 'di la// mthun pa'i rdzas rnams ji ltar bsog/ ces gsol to// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ ma traM nag mo brkyang khru gang// kha mig legs par btod pa la// lha mo'i cha byad zhal bskyon te// mdangs ldan lnga yis brgyan par bya// dre'u nag mthur dang sga bstad la// phyag tu g.yas nas mthur mda' gtad// nam mkha' 'ja' ris mdangs kyis brgyan// sna tshogs dar gyi dpyang lag btags// nam mkha' dkar mo g.yu yi kha chag can// ras ma sgro yi 'phan lag gtang/ nag mo dung gi kha chag can// rma bya zer dang dpyang spyang yang lag gdags// re ma dza yi phyag tu dbul/ smug mo gser gyi kha chag can// re ma dzu yi phyag tu dbul// 'phang yang de bzhin kha dog mthun// gtso mo dar gyi ljang gu la// gsum la bal tshon ldang bu bya/ shing ris ma mo bdun dang mthun// 'bru bya bzhi yang kha dog snga ma bzhin// lug nag kha rgya smug dgu spyi thig can// de rnams dngos su mdangs kyis bskang// gtso mo'i lag pa g.yas ral gri// g.yon du 'phrul gyi me long bsnams// dar nag go zu+u mthing nag ral pa bya// spyi gtsug g.yu khrab g.yas na khyung// g.yon na seng ge de bzhin bskur// ngar glud bzhi yang gtang bar bya// me mar kha lnga btang nas kyang// de bzhin spos chen dud pa dang// me tog sna tshogs sha chen gtor ma mi dbang 'bras bu dang// go ro tsa na snying sna'i phye ma rnams// dbang po lnga la mchod par dbul// bstod pa tshul bzhin kun kyang mthun// bskang ba'i mdos rnams 'di yis ni// tha mar dgra bo'i phyogs su bskyal// sngags pa'i dam tshig nyams pa'i tshe// mdos rnams kyis ni skang bar bya// smyo dang 'bog dang rims dang shi ba yang// dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa yin// mdos rnams 'di yis bskang bar bya// kyung ka gson ma shin tu gces// de yis thugs dam bskang bar gyur// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ lha mo nag mo'i ma trang gi gzugs mdos thugs dam bskang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to/ kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// ma mo'i khrag mdos chen po la// bskang ba'i ma mo gang gang lags// de yi rdzas rnams ji ltar bsog/ ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ bskang ba'i ma mo bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi dang// ma mo bdun dang sring mo bzhi// e ka dza Ti spun drug dang// gsang ba'i yul bzhi srid pa'i gru 'degs bzhi// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi dang ni// ma mo las la grub pa nyi shu brgyad// bya ba mo dang byed pa mo// bskang ba'i ma mo yin par bshad// bskang ba'i rdzas rnams bstan pa ni// med du mi

rung khrag sna gsum yod// gzhan yang sna tshogs khrag sna bsog/ ma mo bdun cu don gsum la// rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi la// shing ris gzhung bzhin kun kyang bya// ljang bu bcu bzhi dar las bya// gzhan ni bal tshon sna lnga po// nam mkha' kun kyang gcig pa yin// pho glud mo glud dar zab mdzes par bya// stag dang seng ge dkar po'i khrag/ phyi ba ma'i zil pa skyes pa dar ma'i khrag/ rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi'i rdzas// ba glang khyi dang rta khrag mi khrag rnams// ma mo bdun gyi dam rdzas yin// ri bo nya khrag srin mo bzhi yi dam rdzas yin// dmag gi rgyal mo gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang// gru 'degs bzhi la khrag sna tshang bar bsog/ ma mo bcu gnyis dam rdzas yin// e ka dzaTi sbun drug dang// dbang gi lha mo nyi shu brgyad// bya byed ma mo'i dam rdzas rnams// khra dang 'ug pa pho rog rnams// gcig tu dril bas khrag sna bcu gsum yin// ma mo bdun cu rtsa gsum la// mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya// gzhan yang ma mo bcu gsum tshan pa la// rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi la// gtso mo gnyis la re re tshan pa gsum re re la lnga/ ma mo bdun dang srig mo bzhi la re re gnyis// bzhi tshan ngar glud bcu gsum bya// de yang gtso mo gnyis la dar gyi go zu bskon// bcu gcig gang mdzes chas su gzhug/ khrag sna'i phor bu bcu gsum bya// so so'i tshan dang ris su dbye// cho ga mdos tshan gsum dang mthun// de nas mdos gtong tsam na ngar glud gsum khrag gi phor bu bcu gsum du bcug la gtang ngo// de nas gling bzhi bca' ba ni// gling bcu gsum bya ba'am/ yang na dgu ru bya bar gsungs/ rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi la gcig/ de ltar bya bar mdos bsdus chen po'i nang nas gsungs/ mdos gtang ba'i cho ga kun mthun/ gtang ba ni bya ba mo dang byed pa po gnyis la gtang/ tshe blon thugs dam bskang/ sngags pa dam tshig nyams nas khrag nad kyis thebs na bya// bstan pa bsrung ba la byed la rang gang bsgrub la/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i yas lug gi thugs dam bskang// spyir skong la mkha' la lding dgu dang// sa la 'dzul dgu'i mdangs kyis bskang// med na 'bru las grub tshad bya// rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi la// gzhung dang mthun par bsag par bya// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo khrag mdos thugs dam bskang ba dang las dang zor du 'phang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// phyugs nad dal yams babs pa la// de la zlog thabs ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten stobs kyis bka' stsol cig ces gsol to// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ dal yams phyugs la babs pa'i

tshe// de yi cho ga 'di ltar bya// gling bzhi rdzas dang ldan pa la// mdongs ldan rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan// sna tshogs lha rdzas tshang bar dbul// ras ma sna tshogs dkor chas brgyan// de nas yang phud gtsang ma dbul/ srid pa'i rgyal mo dang/ smug mo ral gcig ma dang/ rak+ta tsa mun ti dang ma mo bdun la drag tu cho ga byas la/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la stsal/ de bzhin du phud gtsang mas mchod nas zhag gcig gi nang par gzhan du 'phos la// sa tshon sna lnga la sbreng/ sngags 'di bgrang nas dal mi chod mi srid do// e 'bur 'bur ma hA sa ma tsi 'bur bya ma nas o to shi mo kro ta hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod na phyugs nad dag don mi za ste/ mdos de ni dbyings phyug lha mo lnga'i mdos zhes bya'o// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ dbyings phyug ma lnga'i mdos kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// lo tog bsrung ba'i cho ga ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten 'joms pas bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ zhing la ri bong za ba dang 'bu srin za ba dang/ gdon rnams bsrung dang so srin bsrung ba dang// mdzer pa bsrung ba rab tu gces// sri'u gso dang lhog pa dang// gag pa bsrung ba ji ltar lags// ser ba bsrung ba dang/ shwa kha zlog pa dang/ ling tog rims nad ji ltar bsrung bar bgyi/ zhes gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ zhing la ri bong bsrung ba ni/ dkar rtsis zhing gi mtha' ma skor// zhing dkyil du ri bong gi ril ma'i me btang la/ cog trang bud du yen swA hA/ com bu gol bu yen swA hA/ thuM thuM ye le swA hA/ thaM thaM swA hA/ des ni ri bong kha chings par 'gyur ro// zhing la 'bu srin za na/ ra rog po'i rwa g.yas par ram bu dang zhing gi ljang rtsa'i nas khu bun dang/ 'bu mgo dmar po'i rigs dang/ mgo nag po'i rigs dang/ me'i brun skams so// ra ru ru btsal te/ zhing dkyil du sbas la sngags 'dis kha bcing ngo// oM bra bra duM buM kha yel yel be ra be ra/ man 'dar kha thuM ru thuM rbad/ ces kha la chas bcad nas sbas na gdon mi sdug go/ gdon yo byad la gdon na/ snod gang yin pa la/ nyung dkar la sngags 'dis brab la nang du blugs na myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// so na ba la rigs gsum ste/ khrag srin dang rlung srin dang/ srin bu rang dang gsum las rlung srin ni mi thub ste rtags med na rlung srin yin pas mi thub ste/ khrag srin dang srin bu+u la sngags 'dis gdab bo// oM g+hu g+hu lhang lhang srin bu ma ru ba ti ma tsa/ bra bo bra bo shig tsit+ta ku la nan log log kas kas swA hA/ des ni myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang na ba'i thad dkar gdab bo// de yang khyi'i rtsib mas dang po

mdzer pa gang byung ba la byug cing sngags 'dis gdab par bya'o// oM b+ha ga la b+ha ga la tsi 'dar nan swA hA/ zla ba mar ngo la btab na// phyi ma'i yar ngo la sangs tser 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sri'u gso na rus bu gog mo rdza gsar par bcug la/ 'bru ngan dang sbang ma de ru blugs/ de nas thal bas kha bcad do// phur bu gcig dpral ba'i dbyes su gdab/ gcig snying la gdab/ gcig gsang sgor gdab/ kha ru spang mdang sol ba thal ba blugs// de nas sngags 'dis brdeg go/ tri kha sha mar yang/ bur dza ni sra sra gang shi ber// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ ces them pa'i 'og gam/ mal 'phangs su mnan/ rab tu thab kyi dbus su gting bsring la mnan no// lhog pa dang gag pa la gong du bsrung ba dang 'phral du gdab pa gnyis te/ gong du bsrung na// skud pa sna lnga bsgril la/ sngags 'dis gdab/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab/ de nas dpung pa la bcings/ 'phral du 'debs na gang byung sar gdab bo// oM grang ti trig tig gra dang/ gra shig ta ra ya ta tsa le hUM ka hUM phaT/ de nas 'dis kyang gdab pa/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA tsa ma ma e ka dzA Ti ni dza dza/ zhes kyang gdab/ bya khyung gi snying pos kyang gdab bo// de ngos 'dzin na/ byol song la nang khrol smad lnga lan 'ong/ de gang byung sar ba spu ldog/ mkhal ma la byung na rkub 'phrig rkang pa 'tshab/ mtsher pa la byung na gung ru zhag bzhi yang gsum gyi steng g.yon du 'ong/ glo ba la byung na gzhu mchog gi sna ru spu ldog/ mchin pa la byung na ni gung ru tha ma la'o// glo ba la byung na sna sgo g.yas g.yon gyi steng du'o// snying la byung na mig rtsa rgod/ brang gi ze ma g.yas g.yon dang bzhag sha 'dar spu ldog pas sngags drag tu gdab/ mi la ngos ma zin na/ dri ma gang du log brtag/ gang du bzlog par gdab/ lhog pa dkar po rkang lag dang/ rtse'u chung g.yas g.yon la 'ong/ dang po lus grang shum khyer nas 'ong/ snying mi dga' bar 'ong/ de gang du byung yang sna la spyi gtsug snying ga/ lte ba rkang mthil lag mthil rtse'u chung g.yas g.yon de rnams la gdab/ de nas gang byung sar mtha' ma bskor// de bzhi nas zas mi zhim pa dang btung du+u ma 'dod na/ bros pa yin pas gang du song ba lta'o// ngang la dri ma bsnams des ma tshor na/ me long rdul che ba gsal po phyis la blta'o// nad byung ba'i skor gyis zan dron mo 'o ma dang brdzis pas phyi/ der me long gi nang du dmar breng ba yang 'ong/ der gdul dka' bas brtson 'grus bskyed mdos bya/ sngags drag tu gdab bo// dkar po byung na chu gtor 'don/ rdo rje rnam 'joms 'don no// sngags gdab dmar po byung du mi rung ngo// ngo gang du bros pa'i ba spu ldog/ de brtag pa na ma byung ba

gcig gis phyis la mthun mi mthun pa lta'o// ser ba srung bar 'dod na/ seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pa la snying po sho chung la bris pa lnga la gang du khri tsho gcig bzlas la/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzug/ tho brtsig yung dkar la sngags mang po bzlas la/ phying khug chung du lnga ru blugs thog gseb tu gzhug go/ de'i snying po ni/ oM 'bur 'bur ma hA pad+ma rde'u 'bur rtsi 'bur phyi ge bi ma na se/ oM ho shi mon kro rta hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ des ni ser ba zlog par 'gyur ro// shwa bzlog na rabs chad kyi thod par sngags bris la seng ldeng gi phur pa la btags la thod pa'i nang du bcug la sngags bzlas la/ shwa sgor sbas na shwa bzlog par 'gyur ro/ ling thog la ni bya phug ron gyi ding rung g.yas pa la sngags 'di bzlas nas btags na gdon mi za'o// bra bra thuM pa yer yer tog mar bun kha song dmar byung phur na yer yer swA hA/ rims nad bsrung na gang du bsrung bar 'dod na mdo gdon tsha tsha dang chu gtor btang/ gling bzhi kha lnga'i mdos btang/ gnod sbyin gyi sngags bzlas/ de yis rims nad thub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ 'jig rten phan gdags pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas ma mo rnams ni las la grub pas/ de 'dul ba'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi/ zhes dgongs nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha// 'di la nan tan ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten 'joms mdzad bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ ma mo nag mo bya ba la// rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya// ye shes cha las skyes pa dang// 'jigarten las la grub pa'o// ye shes cha las skyes pa ni// dbyings kyi yum drug sbas nas byung// rtag na rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug/ rigs lnga kun bzang phyag mtshan dang// dbu gsum phyag drug rngam par byung// dbyings kyi ye shes ma mo dang// las kyi ma mo'i cha 'dzin pa// dkar mo dbu gsum dbyings kyi cha// phra men rgya mtsho las kyi cha// phra men zhes su bya ba de// bdud po thod pa'i phreng ba dang// srid pa'i bde 'gro 'chos pa las// phra men rgya mtsho mkha' la thon// des na dbyings kyi ma mo dang// bdud chos pas ye shes las su byung// phra men zhes su she la bya// dkar mo zhes su bya ba na// gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje yis// srid pa'i rgyal mo nyid la thugs ye shes kyi mda' gcig 'phangs pas/ mo las sras gcig bltams pa las/ skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su dbu gsum sku ni dkar mo ldem bag tu byung ngo// phyag na rdo rjes nyi zla gnyis thod du bcings nas/ khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi khyod kyis thul cig ces bsgos so// de bzhis phung byed ma bzhi btul

lo// des ni dgyes sde mo bzhi btul lo// des na ma bdun man chad ni las la grub pa ste/ 'jig rten pho mo'i mdza' na las byung ba'i ma mo mang po'o// ma mo bdun cu rtsa brgyad sprul pa'i ma mo'o// bya ba mo dang byed pa mo n-i dbyings kyi ma mo'o// gnam sa gnyis kyi ma mo dang/ tshe'i lha mo bcu drug zor bdag mo bzhi ni nyi shu gnyis te bdud mo'i rigs so// las la grub pa rnams ni/ gong ma rnams ni rje bo lta bur blta'o// chos 'di la ni gzhan med de gong ma rnams yod par blta'o// de yis bsgo ba rnams kyang nyon/ de bzhin du rje bo ltar blta ba'i rnal 'byor pas kyang shes par bya'o// sprul pa'i ma mo dang dbyings kyi ma mo dang/ las byed ma mo dang bdud mo'i rigs so// ma mo bzhi po de ni ye shes kyi cha dang las kyi cha las bskyed pa ste/ ma ni thabs mchog 'dod med mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med klong// ma ni nam mkha' dbyings kyi mkha'// mo ni sems kyi sems nyid klong// ma ni chos nyid zab mo'i klong// mo ni rnam shes hUM du 'bar// sems nyid thig le hUM du 'dus// de las ma mo thams cad 'dus// de las dbyings kyi ma mo ni// sems nyid mkha' la dbyings nyid klong// thams cad sems su dag par blta// bdud mo'i rigs kyis 'di ltar blta// gang zag rnams kyi bdag med cing// chos la phyogs gcig yod par blta// sprul pa'i ma mo rnams kyis ni// bdag dang bdag gi byed pa po ru blta/ thams cad de rgyu ngo bor blta'o// gzhan ni yod par mi rtag go/ las byed ma mo rnams ni 'di ltar blta// dang por bag chags brtas pa'i mthus// dpal chen sku ru gang bsgoms pas// de nyid rje bo lta bur blta// chos yod bya ba lta bur blta// de ni ma mo khog non mdor bstan yin// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo'i las kyi rim pa so sor bstan pa dang lta ba mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// ma mo rim gyis ji ltar gang zhig gang gis btul// ji ltar 'dul bar bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa dang/ ye shes thig le chen po dang// gsang chen bde ba'i lam mchog dang// man ngag rdzogs pa'i klong chen las// yang gsang ma mo drug po ste// 'od chen kha dog sna tshogs kyis// srid pa'i rgyal mo chen mo yis// dbyings kyi yum drug bskyed pa las// rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug cu snang// de nas srid pa'i bde 'gro gtso mo yis// nyi zla thod phreng gdan du bting// thig le chen po brgyan brgyad po yang pa yis// khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po dang// bcas pa bzhi po gding bar bya// srid pa'i rgyal

mo bskyod pa yis// sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi po dang// thugs kyi bgyes sde bzhi po yang// mngon sum gdan du gding bar bya// bde chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// srid pa'i chags byed spun gnyis mnan/ srid pa rang lugs smug po yis// e ka dzA Ti spun drug mnan// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// chags pa'i dbang byed dmar mo yis// 'dod khams dbang chen spun gnyis mnan// srid pa spyi yi mdo bsdus kyis// nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis mnan// dbang mo spyi yi mdog gsal gyis// srin mo bdun po gdan du mnan// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab kyis// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi po mnan// srid pa 'jigs byed pho mo yis// nyi shu rtsa brgyad gan rkyal mnan// de ltar gdan du bting nas kyang// snying 'dren phyag rgya bcings nas kyang// drag po sngags kyis bcing bar bya// hUM mu kha ha le da ha sha ha sha phaT kri ya shan+te nan// sur+ya pa ta ka rag sring 'gro nan/ su ti shin dun ti nan/ ke ma ta ke ma ta ni la ta nan// ma ma hUM b+h+yo nan/ ma ma duSh+tAM nan/ ma ma duSh+tAM phaT/ me ra ga ta pi tha sha nan/ zhes brjod pas/ gdan gyi rgyu rnams bsgyel nas/ de nas bdud rtsi dmar chen kha ru blugs/ oM badzra a mr-i ta a ng+hiSh+Tha/ tsit+ta nan/ ta Ta phaT nan/ nan ti ni nan/ srog 'phrog pa yin te/ bdag gis snying khrag zhal du rngubs// lce yi steng du gsal bar bzhag/ hUM nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi yab// nga ni srid gsum snying rje'i bdag/ nga ni ma mo kun gyi rje// thams cad kyi ni snying khrag bdag/ khyod rnams snying khrag nga la yod// nga yi las rnams khyed kyis sgrubs// tsa dun tri ma mo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu rag mo b+h+yo/ ye shes rtsal 'phang thig le yis// bsgom bya ma mo bcu gsum la// drug cu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bdag nyid bla na med pa yi// ting nge 'dzin du gsal byas la// sems pa dbang po las bskyed pa'i// ma mo chen mo bcu gsum la// ma mo drug cu rtsa brgyad srog gi snying po bsdus// 'khor du ma mo gzhan yang bzhag/ de nas 'byor tshogs mchod pa bsham// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la mchod// hUM thig le'i dbyings las bskyed pa'i khro rgyal yum// gnyis med ha ha bzhad cing rngam pa'i hUM sgra 'byin// mche ba dkar po gtsigs shing snying 'dren rkan sgra rdeb// ma mo'i tshogs rnams 'dul mdzad dkyil 'khor mchog/ ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// A+oM dang swA gnyis rgyab bsnol 'khyud// 'bru gsum rtse sprad sku gsung thugs// ma mo rdo rje khrag gi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur dam du bcings// hA gnyis rtse sprad gyen du bsgreng// oM gnyis rtse sprad thad kar bsgreng// swA gnyis rtse

sprad thugs kar bkan// 'bru gsum thugs kar dam du bsnol// gu+u yu thugs kar bzung ba ni/ ma mo rdo rje me yi rgya/ oM gnyis rgyab bsnol lu gu rgyud/ 'bru gsum sor mo rtse bsnol te/ hrI gnyis drag tu g.yab bar ni/ ma mo rdo rje khrag gi rgya/ rdo rje thal mo brkyang pa las/ thabs kyi a dang haM gnyis las/ shes rab swA yis mtshon par bya/ shes rab oM dang ha gnyis la/ thabs kyi hUM gis bstan par bya/ shes rab hUM dang a brkyang ste/ thabs kyi a dang swa bkan nas/ sems kyi dkyil du brkyang bkan pa/ ma mo ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rgya/ rdo rje rin chen rdzogs pa yi/ phyag rgya bzhi zhes dpa' bos bshad/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ phyag rgya bstan pa dang lta ba bstan pa dang ma mo 'dul ba bstan pa'i skabs kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to/ 'jig rten 'joms mdzad stobs kyi lha/ phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags/ zhes gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ thig le chen po'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur kha sprad nas// shes rab mchog gi phyogs nas su// oM A hUMM gsum rtse sprad de// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rgya// thabs kyi hUM dang sgo gsum rgya// rang rtags ye shes phyag rgya yin// shes rab swA yis sku gsum 'khril// thig le byang chub sems kyi rgya// shes rab hUM gi rtse mo ru// thabs kyi swA yis sbyar mnan pas// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya yin// thig le chen po'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// ma hA su khar bsdams gyur na// bla na med par gsal 'gyur bas// dus gsum nyes dmigs sel bar byed// dus gsum mgon pos de skad bshad// dkyil 'khor bsgom dang sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan bstan pa dang/ skye shi rtsa ba gcod cing bde klong dbyings su sdud/ kun kyang sku mdog khro mor bzhugs shing dbang chen dkyil 'khor rdzogs// phyag nas sprul pa 'gyed cing dug gsum dbyings su sbyor// ma mo 'khor du 'dus shing b+ha ga'i mnga' mdzad ma/ drug cu rtsa brgyad du ni mkhyen par mdzad/ rgyu las bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi chen po 'di/ rnam rtog gzhol phyir sku la thim par mdzod/ hUM ha he ma ma b+h+yo ru lu b+h+yo/ a la la ho/ dbyings kyi yum drug bskyed nas su// dkyil 'khor drug po spyan drangs so// hUM ma mo chen mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor mnga' bdag mo// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad zhal lngar 'bar// mkha' la bde klong dbyings na gsal// mkha' 'gro srog gi mnga' mdzad ma// dkyil 'khor gtso mor gshegs su gsol// hUM ma mo chen mo rgyud bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum shar gyi mkha' 'gro ma// hUM ma mo chen mo dbugs kyi bdag/ sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog

la// zhal gsum nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma// yang sbas drug gi dkyil 'khor nas// thugs dam chen po dgyes dgongs la// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi bskul/ dang por ma mo bskul ba'i thabs dang/ dbang du sdud pa dang gsang ba'i gnas bstan pa ni sngon du bshad zin to// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ thig le phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas 'bru lnga'i don lag gi 'du byed bsgom pa ni/ g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// rdo rje gar du bskor ba ni// shes rab mchog gi snying gar bstan// sbom po dbang mo rtse sprad de// thabs kyi phyogs mtshams bskor ba ni// ma mo tshogs kyi rgyal mo'i rgya// rdo rje sder mo dam bsnol te/ oM bsgres rtse mo rgya bcings pas// ma mo rdo rje rus pa'i rgya// rdo rje khu tshur bcing pa las// hUM dang ha gnyis rtse bsdus nas/ 'bru gsum brgyud nas gshog pa'i tshul/ na ra ha zer bzung ba ni/ phyag rgya grub par bstan pa yin/ ma mo srid pa'i them las/ rin po che gter gyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa/ 'jig rten 'joms pa stobs kyi lha/ 'jig rten 'di ltar dbang byed pa// rim pa gang zhig gang gsal ba// yang dag dpa' bos bka' stsol cig/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten 'di ltar dbang byed pa/ srid pa'i mkha' las bskyed pa'i dbyings kyi yum drug dang/ sri pa'i bde 'gro la sogs dbyung ba lnga las bskyed pa'i bu mo spun drug dang/ 'byung ba lnga'i chags 'dzin spun gnyis dang/ dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i gtso mo yum gyi mkha' la gnas/ dus bzhi dbang byed ma ni bu mo spun drug dang/ nyi zla thod phreng ngo/ cha snyoms ma ni khris pa'i dbang mo che bzhi dang/ dgyes sde bzhi'o/ dus kyi nyul le ma bzhi ni sring mo bzhi'o/ ma mo rang rang gi bkod thabs ni/ yul chen mo'i mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ yid la bsgom legs ma dang bdun 'khol lo/ ma mo bdun ni rnal 'byor gyi drod nyul bas nam gyi gung la rgyu'o/ yum chen mos nyin mtshan phyed mar nyul zhing gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad la mnga' mdzad do/ de nas khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi yum chen mos gtso byas/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo la sogs te/ ma mor grags pa dang srid pa kun la dbang mdzad/ rgyal mo chen mo'i lho nas srid pa thams cad 'char/ bcu bzhi zhes bgyi ba rje dang 'bangs lnga bcu rtsa drug yod/ de la ni nang blon dang gung blon dang kha blon dang bar mtshams blon mo zhes kyang bya'o/ nyi ma dgu brgya rtsa gcig/ zla ba dgu brgya rtsa gnyis kyis/ ri rab kyi phyi rol na yod pa'i snang

srid thams cad tshig nas ci yang mi srid pa las/ ri rab kyi ring thung nas yang dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du+u sa brtol bya ba ni/ shing gi rtse mo ri rab kyi bum pa'i nang na/ yum chen mo srid pa'i rgyal mo de/ sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba las/ dbu dang phyag gcig yang ston pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi ral pa can/ spyan gnyis g.yas nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag g.yon nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchi ma 'dzag pa/ yang na bdud rtsi'i mchis ma zhal nas 'bras bu rnam pa lnga'i bcud 'dzag pa/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis na/ g.yas srid pa thams cad kyi snying bzung nas ri rab la 'jus pa/ g.yon na rdo rje dang b+han+d+ha gzung nas ri rab la 'jus pa/ sbas pa'i zhabs gnyis kyis ni/ g.yas pas 'jig rten na dbang che ba rnams kyi snying rtse brdzis pa/ g.yon pas 'jig rten na dbang che ba thams cad kyi snying rtsa mnan pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' ge sar gyi dbus nas snang srid thams cad 'phel 'grib mdzad pas/ ye shes rang rig las ma gtogs pa kun kyang mkha' steng du sdud pa/ spyi bo'i gtsug nas khrag gi ral pa gcig gis srid pa'i ma mo thams cad dbang du sdud pa'o// de nyid kyang badzra he ru kas spyi gtsug tu nub par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de ni ri rab kyi rtse bum pa'i nang na bzhugs pa'o// de'i mdun rgyab na srid pa chags byed ma dang cha snyoms ma gnyis gnas so// yum chen mo'i khol mo srid pa zhig 'dzin ma dang/ srid pa'i byan byed gnyis shing gi rtsa ba na gnas te/ ri rab kyi phyi rol na snang zhing srid pa skye 'gro thams cad gcig kyang mi snang ba las/ yum chen mo'i sku'i sprul pa srid pa'i bde 'gro mas snang srid bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'byung ba lnga'i drod las sprul pa'i bu mo dkar mo la g.yu'i ral pa can/ dbral ba'i dbyes na mig zur gsum pa yod pa gcig/ lcags dang zangs kyi mkhar nag la/ snying brgyud pa'i phreng zhags can gcig skyes pa des/ nyi zla stong thod du bcings nas nyi zla zung gcig btang bas/ gdong srid pa cha snyoms mo// de ni nang par nyi ma'i zer la zhon nas ma mo lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bcas nas/ dgra srog cham la 'bebs pas/ de'i dus su gtor ma gtang ngo/ de nas nyi zla stong gi thod phreng ma mo nyid gsang gnas/ ri rab kyi rmang du sbas pas/ kA la yak+sha bya'i gdong pa can gyis tshor nas/ byi ba'i lor yid kyis sbyor ba gcig byas pas/ glang gi lo la bu mo spun bzhi skyes pa dang/ khol mo srid pa cha snyoms mas lte ba bcad pa dang/ bu mo de bzhi la so sor ming btags te/ dbyings phyug ma dang/ rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang/ bdag nyid ma dang/ gcig pu ma dang bzhir btags so// de bzhis srid pa phung ba gcig byas te bskal pa phra mo gcig tu dbang byas so// de

nas nyi zla nyid ye shes pa sprul pa dang/ srid pa bde 'gro ma dang gnyis kyis sprul pa bkye nas/ phung byed de bzhi sa ma sros nyi ma ma rgas bar du dgra bo'i mngal thams cad dbang du bsdus so// hUM las sprul pa'i ma mo bzhi/ de'i dus su gtor ma gtang ngo// de'i ma srid pa chags byed mas byas so// ming po dang byi pos ming btags pa ni rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo tshe dang/ rdo rje pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ rdo rje srid pa khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ rdo rje khams gsum tshogs pa'i dbang mo cher ming btags so// bu mo de bzhis ming gi dbang thob nas ma bzhis dbang du bsdus so// sprul pa'i bu mo de bzhi dang/ rigs kyi 'byung ba de bzhis shing gi yal ga la 'brug gi lo la rtse zhing mdza' ba dang/ mu stegs kA las tshor nas dman mo bor ba/ mdza' na rgyug pa khyed cag rnams nal bu'i lto ru zhugs pas ngo tsha ba'i bu skye bar shog/ ces dmos pa dang dmod mo sdigs te sbrul gyi lo la bu mo spun bzhi skyes te/ yang srid pa chags byed mas lte ba bcad do// de nas ma bzhi ngo tsha nas// ri rab kyi grA bzhir sbas pa rta'i lo la blta yis mi bra ba'i bud med rdzu 'phrul che zhing mtshan dang ldan pa bzhir dpal chen pos gzigs nas thugs kyi dgyes sde gsang ba'i byi mor bzung ngo// dkar mo mig gcig rgyas 'debs ma dang/ nag mo ral can rmongs byed ma dang/ dmar mo dbang sgyur za byed ma dang/ ser mo las mkhan tshe 'phel ma dang bzhir ming btags so// de bzhi ni sa sros nas nyi ma shar gyi bar du rgyu ste thun bzhi ru rgyu'o// nag mo ral can nam gyi gung la dgu tshigs zhon nas rgyu bas de la gtor ma btang/ dmar mo dbang byed srod la gnod sbyin bu 'phrog la zhon nas rgyu bas de la gtor ma btang/ ser mo las mkhan bdud mi kun la zhon nas nam gyi cha smad la rgyu bas de la gtor ma btang/ dkar mo mig gcig skya rengs kyi zer la zhon nas rgyu bas de la gtor ma btang/ de rnams kyi khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang srid pa gzhi 'dzin gnyis/ khyi lo dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo la khyo shug tu 'dus pa dang/ phag gi dpyid zla ra ba'i zla ba nya la bu khye'u gcig skyes pa dang/ jo mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can gyis skos rje drang dkar du ming btags te skos bdag tu dbang bskur ro// de nas skos rje drang dkar dang srid pa cha snyoms gnyis khyo shug tu 'dus te srid pa'i skos btab bo// de gnyis las bu mo spun drug skyes te e ka dzA Ti sman drug yin no// kho rang yang bdud/ e kadzA Ti yang bdud mo las bu mor ma byas// ming sring du byas te/ jo mo nyi ma'i thod phreng gis bstan pa bsrung du bcug ste sngags srung lcam dral du ming btags so// de nas yang rta'i lo la byi

byas pas lug gi lo la bu mo spun drug skyes te/ bzhi ni khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'o// skos bdag drug gis chung mar blangs so// shar gyi skos bdag gcig ni bar snang gi ma mo dang 'dus so// srid pa gru 'degs mar ming btags so// gcig ni e ka tsa ra mar ming btags so// thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i khol mor yang thob bo// yang lug gi lo tshes brgyad kyi nub mo byi byas pas// spre'u lo khyi zla ba'i tshes bcu gsum dpyid zla ra ba bdud kyi nyi ma la btsas pas ci byed ci ru ma btub bo// dgyes sde'i khol mo bzhi'i ming ni/ dkar mo chen mo mche ba can dang/ ser mo rkang ldag ma dang/ nag mo kha glal ma dang// dmar mo mchu 'jib ma dang bzhi'o// de bzhi'i ring la ni/ pha skos rje drang dkar gnod sbyin gyis lcags thag la brgyus/ ma yugs kyi gson mor las nas der skye ba'i rgyud chad/ gnod sbyin gyis kho'i mgo yang bsgyur nas seng ge'i mgo byin pas lus nag por bsgyur nas bstan pa srung du bcug/ 'khor du 'gong po spun bdun btang ngo// de na lug dang spre'u gnyis gnyen bya ru mi rung ngo// lug dang spre'u gnyen byas na rabs chad kyi lo bya ba yin no// phag dang byi ba gnyen byas na pho'i sa ru rabs chad kyi ro dur 'debs/ glang dang 'brug gnyis gnyen bya mi rung ngo// kha smras dang sgo khyi yang mi chags/ bar du lha mi chags te/ ri bsnyil sa ltung gi lo bya ba yin/ stag dang sbrul gnyen mi bya/ khang rdibs dgra khang khyim la zhugs pa'i lo yin/ stag dang phag gnyen mi bya/ srog shi lus gtor gyi lo bya ba yin/ bya dang sbrul du 'dus la kha yan gyi lo bya ba yin te bya yug sa byed pa bya ba yin/ bya dang spre'u gnyen byas na/ pho g.yas stongs/ mo g.yon stongs bya ba yin// khyi dang yos bu gnyen byas nas ram shing chad kyi lo bya ba yin te/ stag dang lug tu byas nas shi shing zad bya ba yin/ de ni rang kha zug bya ba yin no// ma mo srid pa'i bem las// skye rgyud ma sring gi lo'i mtshan nyid mdo tsam bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang lha g.yung drung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// lha chen po bdun gyi chung ma srin mo chen mo bdun 'jig rten du rab tu gnod pa las/ yum chen mo'i thugs kyi sprul pa dbyings kyi yum drug gi sprul pa nang blon drug/ gsang ba bsdus pa'i ma mo de ltar btul nas nang gi blon mor byas so// gsang ba bsdus pas ni nyi zla 'od phreng can no// de nas rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang ya bdud rgyal mo gnyis byi ba'i lo nal byas pa las/ phag gi lo bu btsas pa las/ lo yang nur ba las/ yar la shod kyi skyes to re dang/ 'dod khams lha'i gtso mo gnyis mtshe mar skyes pa las/ de nas yar la shod kyi skyes to re zhes pa dang/ bdag nyid ma gnyis

shing nal byis la'i rtse mor lug gi lo la mdza' na brgyugs pas/ bdag nyid ma'i rting pa la khrag tsa re 'dug pa mthong ste/ skyug bro nas mchil ma gcig khrag la bor bas/ khrag dang mchil ma 'dres pa'i bu ming sring gnyis skyes pas spre'u'i lo la gnam khyi dkar po skyes so// srid mo sa bdag pad+ma'i phreng yin te// ma spyugs/ pha ri ma la yar bros pas/ bu ming sring ni dam sri dang rgyal por gyur to// yar la shod kyi skyes to re snying na gnas long na ba lug dang spre'u'i lo byi byas pas/ lug gi lo la ming po shel ging dkar po skyes so// sring mo ni pad+ma gar gyi dbyings phyug ma/ de nas shel ging dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma gnyis ming sring nal byas pas/ bu 'gong po spun dgu skyes so// des na mi rung ba yin no// de nas e ka dzA Ti'i ming ni ma mo yongs kyi tshogs bdag mo zhes bya'o// gru 'degs ma bzhi ni har ting dkar mo dang/ dun ting nag mo dang/ shan+tiM dmar mo dang/ grub ting ser mo dang bzhi ni nyi ma phyed na rgyu ste/ de'i dus su gtor ma gtang ngo// spyir ma mo'i dkyil 'khor brgyad yod de/ yum chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni snang srid rdzogs ldan mchog gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dkar mo mig gcig ma ni nyi zla 'od ldan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi ni snying rje byams ldan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkar mo mig gcig la sogs bzhi ni gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbyings phyug ma ni phung byed sbas pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ni skye 'gro yongs su skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de ni bdud rtsi bum pa dang 'dra'o// thugs kyi dgyes sde ma bzhi ni ge sar yongs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// srid pa cha snyoms ni mnyam byed chen mo'i tshogs so// srid pa'i gru 'degs ni gling bzhi spyi'i tshogs so// e ka dzA Ti ni pho nya kun gyi tshogs so// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi ni dri za la sogs pa'i rigs so so'i tshogs so// 'dod khams lha'i gtso mo ni bud med nag mo'i tshogs so// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma gnyis nyul byed chen mo'i tshogs so// rin chen srid 'degs ma dang gling bzhi spyi phud ma ni sman phran gtso mo'i tshogs so// e ka dzA Ti'i bu mo/ e ka dzA ra bsam nas/ jo mo kun gyi nang na bdag gi jo mo bzhi khud par dbang chung bas/ khol mo'i nang na bdag cag dbang chung bas nang 'thab cig bya snyam pa las bu mo gcig pu mas byi sna byas te rgya mtsho gting nas chu srin gyi rgyal po ku be ra ma ka ra ba bkug ste/ dug shing gdug pa can gcig gi gam du nyal po byed du bcug pa'i bu/ 'brug gi lo la bu dkar po mig gcig pa bya ba skyes te/ srin mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma bya ba

skyes// nad gtong bas ming ni lha mo nag mo zhes bya'o// de nas ming pos ma'i mthu dang gzi byin phrogs te 'jig rten yongs kyi mthu yang rku bar bgyis pas sru mo e ka dzA Tis tshor te jo mo khros pa'i dbang mo che la zhus nas/ rjes 'bangs la bsgral ba'i las byas pas mi gcig gi khong nas tsit+ta bcu byung ba las/ gcig snying gi bdag po la sbyin/ dgu la gsum rgyal the'u khra bo dang/ tri shang ka ra dang/ gnod gtor dang gsum ste rgyal po'i rigs la gnod de/ gsum la bar the'u smug po dang/ legs the'u khra bo dang/ sa the'u nag po gsum ste yongs kyi mi la gnod do// gsum gyi phyogs bcur gyur te brag srin dang shing srin dang chu srin gsum du gyur to// dgu car rkang pa ya re bcag nas/ gnam khyi dkar po 'khol du bcug go/ de nas e ka dzA Ti 'brug gi lo la lus ma bde nas mnyes btsir ba las/ bu gdong sog po mig long ba la/ lus spyang ki la khog pa na snying gsum yod pa gcig skyes pa las/ de ni su la yang cha med pa las/ dgra bo'i snyinga'abyin pa byams pa la lan ldon pa zhig song snyam nas/ su la yang med pa rung snyam nas dga' zhing 'dug pa las/ jo mo nyi ma'i 'od phreng gis tshor nas shel gel khol por byin nas gtang ngo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ srid pa pho dang mo rgyud kyi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha// 'dren cing 'gugs pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ hUM hUM badzra nan ti phaT/ ma ga dun ting b+h+yo/ oM mu ting b+h+yo/ ba shan tri nig mu dun ti ni/ oM a sUr+ya bi to a to ye pad+ma byi to a to ye/ kha rag byi to a to ye// srid 'gro byi to a to ye// oM badzra ke ma ke ma/ oM badzra ta kem ta kem/ badzra nI la/ badzra na la/ badzra da la/ badzra man+da/ oM badzra gram bu la/ mur shing/ oM badzra snying kha rag kha ran snying/ trag rak+sha mur tsag sha/ trag rak+sha mu tra baM/ khung mu ta ma/ trag rak+sha/ bra ban ka ra/ ka tiSh+Tha b+h+yo/ phra sha b+h+yo/ phra shi shang gyi sha b+h+yo/ hUM ka ri ka ma ro/ nam la tshur mi ta kha tong ta/ da la tsa da la tsa la/ pad+ma tsaN+Da b+h+yo/ gu mu rak+to/ ting saM dang saM/ e a ra li bu byi ru ru lu ru lu/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo ru rak+sha/ oM a mr-i ta b+h+yo/ ting b+h+yo ting b+h+yo/ pra ting b+h+yo/ mu ting b+h+yo/ shan ting b+h+yo/ dun ting b+h+yo/ rak+ting b+h+yo/ har ting b+h+yo/ grub ting b+h+yo/ te e ting ta b+h+yo/ a par b+h+yo/ da la dun b+h+yo/ ni la ma ma ka sar ma b+h+yo/ dbang phyug ma bskyed pa ni b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// de ni ma mo'i 'gugs 'dren yin// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ 'gugs 'dren sngags kyi le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten 'joms

pa'i stobs kyi lha// srid pa'i dbang chen 'di dag kun// bsnyen bsgrub bcol na ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ bsnyen bsgrub bskul ba'i tshigs rnams kun// ngas gsungs kun grags the tshom med// hUM srid pa'i rgyal mo sku bzhengs shing// dbu ni dpag bsam shing gi bum pa la// sku ni ri rab gtos yin te// ma mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'byung ba lnga las grub pa mo// khyod kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor nas// 'gro ba rigs drug khyod las 'char// khyod kyi sku stod g.yas g.yon nas// lha dang lha min g.yul ngo 'gyed// mtshon cha go cha'i na bun la// lha dang lha min 'thab mo 'gyed// lha rnams rgyal te lha min pham// do nub mi dang 'dre ru 'thab// lha yi mthu dpung ma chung zhig/ ma mo khyod kyi lte ba nas// dug gsum 'khor ba gti mug phag/ mun ltar gtibs pa'i na bun las// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong// de yang ma mo khyod kyi lto// gti mug las kyis ma rtogs nas// 'dod pa'i ma mo thugs dang 'gal// srid gsum nad rnams b+h+yo zhing bzlog/ b+h+yo bzlog chen pos kha sgyur la// rde'u thabs cig kyang der bzlog cig/ ma mo khyod kyi lte ba nas// zhe sdang chen po me ltar 'bar// me ltar 'bar bas snying po tshigs// ma rtogs 'khrul pa'i zhe sdang mes// 'dod pa'i ma mos bka' bkyon skad// srid gsum nad kyis sdug bsngal 'bar// nad rnams bzlog la zor kha byol// ma mo khyod kyi sku yi lte ba nas// 'dod chags 'khor ba chu ltar 'khrugs// 'dod chags gzugs su bya byung ste// ma rtogs 'khrul pas rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams// 'dod pa'i ma mo thugs dang 'gal// srid gsum nad rnams da bzlog cig/ zor kha bzlog la byol kha sgyur// dmyal ba rnams kyang srog la chags// ma mo dam la mi chags sam// yi dwags rnams kyang gza' btung gos la chags// ma mo rdzas la mi dgongs sam// ske le mi yang 'dod pa'i rdzas la chags// ma mo mdos dang yas la mi dgongs sam// lha ma yin yang go mtshon drug la chags// ma mo mdos dang yas la mi chags sam// lha yang longs spyod rdzas la chags// ma mo mdos la mi dgongs sam// 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ bde ba cha snyoms tshur gson cig/ dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// g.yas na b+han+d+ha lcang lo bsnams// g.yon na ru dar rtse la 'phyar// sku la mu men shel gyi go zu gsol// yid las sprul pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// dbyings kyi yum chen mdangs ldan ma// khams gsum 'khor ba'i zhen chags thong// mdos bdag chen mo bde ba'i cha snyoms ma// de yang rgyal mo khyod lags mod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes

shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ yid 'ong rgyal mo srid pa skye 'gro'i bdag/ sku mdog g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbu sngo zhing// na bza' rma lo mdzes pa gsol// g.yas na b+han+d+ha lcang lo bsnams// g.yon na b+han+d+ha smug po bsnams// de yang rgyal mo khyod lags mod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ 'khor lo tshims byed 'dod chags ma// sku ni rin chen in+d+ra nI// g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus dkar zhal// phyag na b+han+d+ha lcang lo bsnams// g.yon na ba dan dmar po 'phyar// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// de yang rgyal mo khyod lags mod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo tshudzutshur gson cig/ 'gro ba sgrol byed mkha' 'gro ma// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus dkar zhal// na bza' chu srin g.yang gzhi gsol// g.yas pa b+han+d+ha lcang lo bsnams// g.yon na dar nag ru mtshon 'phyar// 'di yang rgyal mo nyid lags mod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ 'khor ba chags pas tshim mdzad ma// sku la zhing chen g.yang gzhi gsol// kun kyang mi bzad 'bar ba'i sku// g.yas dmar g.yon dkar dbus ljang zhal// khrag chen 'bar ba'i ral pa can// g.yas na b+han+d+ha lcang lo bsnams// g.yon pa ba dan ljang nag 'phyar// de yang rgyal mo khyod lags mod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ sku ni mi bzad mthing nag sku// na bza' zhing chen g.yang gzhi gsol// g.yas nag g.yon mthing dbus ser zhal// g.yas na b+han+d+ha lcang lo bsnams// g.yon na ba dan khra bo bsnams// ma mo chen mo drug po yang// gdan du zhing chen bsnol ma bting// kun kyang me ri smug nag nang na bzhugs// rgyal mo'i thugs las sprul pa mo// kun kyang rgyal mo nyid lags te// 'khor ba rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// dbyings kyi rgyal mo drug po la// 'dab chags rgyal mo mkha' lding drug/ gar dang bcas te rgyal mo drug la 'bul// gshog chags rgyal mo khyung chen drug po la// mdzes pa'i btsun mo drug zhon pa// rgyal mo drug la glud du 'bul// gcan gzan rgyal po gwa dor drug po la// skyes pa chas bzang drug zhon la// rgyal mo drug la glud du 'bul// lha yi sprul pa rgyal po drug/ 'khor dang g.yog bcas glang chen drug zhon pa// rgyal mo drug la glud du 'bul// shing ris kyi 'phan bzangs la// mdzes pa'i ri dwags rgyal po drug/ sna tshogs dar snas mdzes par brgyan// blon po drug dang bcas pa las// nyi zla

mdzes pa bkra yal yal// bya lding ni nam mkha' la 'phyo// shad shad ni gar bsgyur ba// bya skad ni di ri ri/ logs la sha dgo rmig bzhi rgyu// ya mtshan rmad kyi dkor cha 'di// rgyal mo drug la glud du 'bul// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ rgyal mo chen mo khyed drug kyang// mnga' bdag jo mo'i spyan sngar dam bcas nas// 'dod pa'i gter la spyod do skad// srid pa'i byol bzlog mdos 'di bzhes// dang po dmu dang phya ru 'thabs// der yang rgyal po 'od lha yis// dmu yi g.yul ngo der bzlog go/ de nas lha dang lha min 'thabs// lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngo der bzlog go/ de nas mi dang 'dre ru 'thabs pa las// mi kha lhas bzung 'dre srin pham// do nub 'dre yi g.yul ngo bzlog/ zhe sdang rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// zhe sdang sbrul gyis thugs dam bskang// 'dod chags rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// 'dod chags bya yis thugs dam bskang// gti mug rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// gti mug phag gis thugs dam bskang// nga rgyal rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// rgyal mo drug gis thugs dam bskang// phrag dog rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// 'gro drug gzugs kyis thugs dam bskang// nyon mongs dug lnga me ru 'bar// 'di yang rgyal mo khyod kyi dug/ rgyal mo rnams kyi dug nad 'di// gsangs so dug lnga'i nad sos nas// rgyal mo yang dag don dang ldan par bskang// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ sku'i glud 'bul lo// rang gi tshang 'jal lo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ rgyal mo drug gi bskang ba'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas yang g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal mo'i 'khor gyi blon mo rnams// de la nan tan ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ mi srun ma mo chen mo rnams la ni drag tu nan tan bskyed cing/ de rnams ni shin tu gdug pa'i ma mo yin no// zhes gsungs so// hUM 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ dbang bsgyur nang blon chen mo drug/ de ring ming pos mdos gting gis// srin mo nang blon mdos longs shig/ nam mkha' khams kyi dbyings phyug ma// sngon mo khro gnyer ral pa can// mi mgo thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// na bza' sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// ngar nag ru mtshon phyag na bsnams// bdud kyi yul nas phyag brnyan gtong// nang blon chen mo dbyings phyug ma// chibs su glog mo gya gyu bcibs// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ 'byung ba lnga yi ni bcud 'byin ma// na bza' mthing ber ni mdzes pa la// mu men shel gi ni kha chag can// phyag na zhing chen rgyal mtshan

'phyar// chibs su rtsangs pa mgo dgu bcibs// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ ma mo chen mo kar ting shags// sku dkar mo ni tse re re// g.yu yi lan tshar ni ske sor slebs// na bza' dar dkar gyi go zu la// gser gyi rdo rje'i kha chag can// me tog mdzes pa'i ga sha can// chibs su bya rgyal khyung la bcibs// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ dus gsum mi 'gyur glog phreng can// sku mdog cir yang ma nges te// na bza' chu srin g.yang gzhi gsol// phyag na mgo bo'i rgyud mangs bsnams// gsang ba'i spyugs glu tse re re// las su sems can srog la rgol// bdud dang srin po mu stegs 'dul// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ nyul le chen mo har ting shags// sha khrag dmar la mnga' mdzad ma// na bza' mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// phyag na be con dgra s+t+wa bsnams// chibs su ma keng cang shes bcibs// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ding ting sngon mo gzi brjid 'od gsal ba// sku mdog dmar nag 'bar ba la// na bza' mchog gi g.yang gzhi gsol// chibs su zangs kyi ke'u le bcibs// las su bdud kyi kha dpon mdzad// khol du srin mo mgo dgu 'gyed// phyag na gsod byed 'khor lo bsnams// sdig pa nag po'i ltas ngan gtong// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ lha mo mi za brag gyon ma// gung blon chen mo mdos longs shig/ me tog mdangs kyi rgyal mo ni// srin mo yi ni srog rkun mo// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ srid pa'i g.yul zlog ma mo gung blon ma// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'od ldan rgyal mo srid pa'i mnga' bdag mo// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ nang blaun gung blon ma mo bdun cu rtsa brgyad po// kun gyi ming nas byung zhing mdos bdag ces kun la 'gres so// ma mo spyi kun kyang ma mo brgya rtsa brgyad du ma gtogs med do// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ mdos bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha// rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug po la// mdos kyi bskang ba ji ltar brjod// ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug po la// tshe dang dbang thang skyed pa'i phyir// tshig gis bskul ba 'di skad brjod// ces gsungs so// hUM srid pa'i bde 'gro khams

gsum yum mchog ma// phra men rgya mtsho sku bskyod cig/ yum chen nyid las sku sprul ma// dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// spyan ni khros pa'i tshul mnga' zhing// zhi ba'i sku la snang srid 'char// sprul pa'i sku las zhabs brgyad 'char// drug gis rgyud drug sgo yang gcod// gcig ni klu yi khams su 'char// gcig ni bdud dang mu stegs 'joms// rnal 'byor shes pa'i yul drug las// spyan drug mngon par shar ba ni// spyan gsum gyen du gzigs pa yis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo yang 'byed// sems can skye shi'i lam yang ston// spyan gsum thur du shar ba yis// srid pa gsum yang thal bar rlog/ g.yas kyi zhal bzhad thugs rje ston// g.yon gyi zhal bzhad khams gsum dbang du sdud// dbus kyi zhal bzhad drag shul che// rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa yis// srid pa'i 'gran zla chem chem gsol// ma mo gsang ba'i b+ha ga las// srid pa gsum ka shar bar mdzad// lha dang bdud dang gnod sbyin dang// gshin rje srin po kun kyang 'dar// ma mo sku yi g.yas phyogs nas// las byed ma mo bcu gsum 'char// pho nya phyag brnyan thams cad 'gyed// g.yon gyi phyogs nas shar ba ni// ma mo sku yi sum cha las// nges pa'i ma mo dgu sbas shing// thams cad kun la khyad par brtson// yum gyi zhabs kyi g.yas phyogs nas// bka' sdod nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'char// rnal 'byor kun gyi las rnams sgrub// srid pa'i ma mo thams cad kun// ma mo sku yi rgyan du rdzogs// ma mo thugs kyi thig le las// rdo rje kha T+wAM gzhu bdungs nas// shes rab ye shes mde'u rtse las// spros pa'i ma mo dgu 'phen ma// nges pa'i bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// shr-I hUM sras 'khor du brtag/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad sgrol zhing dbang du sdud// zhi ba'i sku la thugs rje che// ye shes sprul pa'i phyag drug las// g.yas kyi dang po 'khor lo bsgyur// gsang sngags bka' rnams sgrogs pa'i don// g.yon na rin chen dbang bsgyur zhing// srid pa'i 'jig rten gnad la 'phen// g.yas kyi bar ma g.yang gzhi rdebs// bdud dang srin po dbang du sdud// g.yon na b+han+d+ha dmar bskyil zhing// bud med ma mo dbang du sdud// g.yas kyi tha ma tshe srog 'dzin// rnal 'byor kun la dngos grub ster// g.yon gyi tha ma lcags kyu dgu bsnams shing// dam tshig nyams pa rnams dang ni// bka' las 'das pa'i snying nas 'dren// spyi gtsug sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis// stong gsum 'jig rten b+h+yo bzlog mdzad// bdag nyid ye shes rtsal 'chang zhing// nges pa'i dbang dang rtogs pa'i mthu// man ngag thugs kyi rgyud bskul zhing// skad cig yud tsam dbyings nas bzhengs// srid pa gsum dang gling bzhi

yang// thang gcig yud kyis 'jig par mdzad// khyad par ye shes nyi zla'i spyan// g.yas kyi spyan gyis srid gsum gsal// g.yon gyi spyan gyis sbyor ba mdzad// rdo rje smin ma gdengs pa yis// mu stegs yak+sha'i snying yang 'gems// ma mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// byang chub sems ma zhes kyang grags// yang dag gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo la// bde klong kun gyi gtso mor grags// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba thabs kyi 'phro 'du yis// yum gyi thugs dam 'dis skongs la// sku ni mi bskyod 'dir bzhugs shig/ 'khor gyi blon mo kun bskyod do// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM lha mo chen mo rnal 'byor ma// kun gzhi yongs kyi dbang phyug ma// snang srid kun la dbang bsgyur zhing// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs 'phrog ma// dung chen phyag na bsnams shing 'o dod chen mo sgrogs// gshin rje bran du 'khol zhing 'jig rten me yis bsreg/ 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'phrog cing byang chub sems kyi bdag/ sgrol ba don du gnyer zhing dbang phyug kun dang sbyor// srid gsum sprul pas 'gengs shing ya bdud dbang du sdud// g.yang gzhi gos su gon zhing kha T+wAM g.yab mos 'debs// sku mdog khro mor bzhugs shing rnal 'byor grogs mdzad ma// khrag dang zhag gis brgyan cing spu gri phyag na bsnams// dam nyams dgra bo'i don snying 'byin cing snying khrag 'thung// mAng sa zas su za zhing tsit+ta'i zhags pa 'phen// nyi zla thod du bcings nas stong gsum bde la 'god// dung chen snod du dmar chen khrag dang snying sna sbyar ba 'di// ma mo khyed rnams kun gyi thugs dam bskang// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ dbyings kyi yum drug bskang ba'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// hUM rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// nyi ma stong gi gzi mdangs can// stong gsum 'jig rten 'od 'phro ma// srid pa sgrol byed gshegs su gsol// hUM rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// pad+ma stong gi dbu rgyan can// ge sar 'bum dang bcas nas su// 'jig rten myos pa'i khrag 'thung ma// dbang phyug rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// hUM rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum gsod byed bdud rtsi sbyor// bdud rtsi sman mchog kun gyi gsos// bdud rtsi rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// hUM rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// b+ha ga yongs la mnga' mdzad ma// gnas lam thams cad ston mdzad ma// thar pa'i lam tshol gshegs su gsol// khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi rnams kyang// mdos bdag

chen mo mdos long la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// hUM b+ha ga 'bum la mnga' mdzad ma// dbyings kyi rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten yongs kyi byin mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// bdag nyid lhag lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo gshegs su gsol// stong gsum thams cad rgyug mdzad ma// gcig pu yum mchog gshegs su gsol// sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi rnams kyang// mdos bdag lags kyi mdos long la// glud bdag lags kyi glud bzhes shig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ sbas pa'i ma bzhi'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i shar phyogs na// shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' bya rgod thul pa la// g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// dung gi lan tshar mche ba can// rin chen shel gyi thod gdengs can// dkar mo sgeg ma 'bum gyis bskor// srid gsum shar la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir byon mdos bdag mdos long la// bdag gis las bcol 'grub par mdzod// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na// lha mo nag mo mche ba can// gser g.yu brtsegs pa'i thod gdengs can// nag mo sgeg mo 'bum gyis bskor// srid gsum lho la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir spyon mdos bdag mdos longs shig/ hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i nub phyogs na// nub kyi dmar mo dbang bsgyur ma// na bza' chu srin g.yang gzhi la// sbrul nag bdun gyi gdengs ka can// g.yu yi lan tshar mche ba can// byi ru 'bar ba'i thod gdengs can// dmar mo sgeg ma 'bum gyis bskor// srid gsum nub la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir gshegs mdos bdag mdos long la// rnal 'byor phrin las 'grub par mdzod// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs na// byang gi ser mo las mkhan ma// sku la rma bya'i thul pa gsol// mthing gi go lcog ya bas bskor// gser gyi lan tshar mche ba can// thod skam 'bar ba'i thod gdengs can// ljang nag sgeg mo 'bum gyis bskor// srid gsum byang la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir gshegs mdos bdag mdos longs shig/ hUM gling bzhi rgyal mo gsang ba'i gzungs// thu+u ba g.yas la dmag gis bkang// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra 'dul ma// thu+u ba g.yon pa rin po che// rnal 'byor tshe dang dbang thang skyed// phyag g.yas zhing chen g.yang gzhi rdebs// khams gsum rdul du brlags nas kyang// bdud dang srin po dbang du sdud// phyag mtshan g.yon na b+han+d+ha bskor// ma mo thams cad dbang du sdud// ral pa can gyi 'khor skyod la// 'dir spyon mdos bdag mdos longs shig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem

las/ thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// hUM srin mo chen mo sham sham mo// a phyi chen mo mi bzad ma// na bza' zhing chen lpags rlon la// mtha' ma b+han+d+ha rlon pas bskor// lag pa g.yas na zhing gi sor phreng bgrang// g.yon na mi mgo phor pa thogs// rang gis rang la tshim par stob// g.yang gzhi ru mtshon phyar nas su// bdud dang srin po thal bar rlogs// 'jig rten thams cad sgrol bar byed// 'dir gshegs mdos bdag mdos long la// bdag gi phrin las 'grub par mdzod// hUM khyab bdag chen mo rnal 'byor ma// khyab bdag chen mo thig le dgu// ye shes ngang gi rol pa las// phyag na rtse gsum 'bar ba bsnams// khrag 'thung chen mo kun la dbang bsgyur ma// mchod pa dam pa bsngos pa dang// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// khyed kyi 'khor rnams rab tu mi bsgrubs te// sgra skad yid 'phrog byed pa ma mo khyod kyi 'khor// 'dod pa lnga la rab dad pas// me yi bskal pa gtong zhing snying rje lam du gtong// gsod pa don du gnyer zhing khro bo kun dang sbyor// bdud kyi bu mo 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag shul che// 'o dod chen po 'bod cing zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs// dgra snying tshal par 'gems pa ma mo khyod kyi 'khor// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ hUM ma mo chen mo srin pa'i bdag/ e ka dzA Ti ral gcig ma// mig gcig ma la dkar sham mdog/ rang chas sprin dkar go zu la// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i kha chag can// lag na kha T+wAM mtshon cha thogs// za 'og zhabs ma'i dbu rgyan can// bsam pas khams gsum myos byed ma// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM ma mo chen mo tshur gson cig/ rin chen srid 'degs chen mo khyod// mdog bzangs sngon mo ral pa can// rang chas mu tig go zu la// gser dang g.yu yi kha chag can// mtha' ma rin chen 'bar bas bskor// g.yas na rin chen za ma tog/ g.yon na g.yu yi zo ba thogs// khyod ni srid pa'i ma mo ste// tshe bdud dbang chen ma mo khyod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM 'dod pa'i ma mo chen mo ni// bdud kyi srin mo gshin rje'i lcam// mdog bzangs ma mo ral pa can// ral pa'i zar bu mun nag gtibs// lcags kyi lus la zangs kyi zhabs ma can// lag pa g.yas na gshin rje'i khram bam can// g.yon na sho rde'u dkar nag 'grem// mtshan na nad kyi rkyal pa sbed// khyod ni 'jig rten b+h+yo bzlog mkhan// khram bam phyis la sho rde'u gtor// nad kha phyis la dal kha sgyur// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ rims nad phyis la

dal kha zlog/ rnal 'byor ma mo dbang bsgyur ma// mdog bzang dkar mo ral pa can// khyod ni gling bzhi spyir 'gro ste// rang chas dar dkar go zu la// g.yu bran 'bar ba'i kha chag can// gser gyi gang leb 'bar ba la// g.yu yi cod pan 'od 'phro ma// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas phyogs bcur 'gro// g.yas kyi phyag na thogs pa ni// gser gyi lcam bu 'bar ba la// g.yu yi lcag 'bras 'bar ba btags// klad la bskor bas bdud dpung 'joms// sa la brdabs pas dgra bgegs sgrol// gzhan gyis rbad kyang mi nyan par// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// dbu brgya ma la spyan stong ma// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i cha byad can// phrin las dgra bgegs kun 'dul la// rdo rje sgeg mo mdos longs shig/ hUM pad+ma las kyi dbang phyug ma// sa bdag chen mo pad+ma phreng// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba thogs// grong khyer kun tu 'thor byed ma// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo bskul ba dang bskang ba'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// hUM ri rab gling bzhi gru 'degs ma// har ting dkar mo chen mo ste// byang shar mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// hUM dun ting nag mo chen mo ste// shar lho mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// hUM shan ting dmar mo chen mo ste// lho nub mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// hUM grub ting ljang ser chen mo ste// nub byang mtshams gyi gru 'degs ma// mtshan ni gru 'degs chen mo ste// rgyal chen gzungs ma mdos longs shig/ hUM dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// shar gyi dkar mo mche ba can// lho yi nag mo kha rlangs ma// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// rigs bzhi'i dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// 'dir spyon mdos bdag mdos long la// bdag gi bsam pa 'grub par mdzod// hUM gling bzhi'i mgyogs ma lha yi sring// shar gyi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// hUM mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring// lho yi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// hUM dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring// nub kyi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// hUM nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring// byang gi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// sring mo chen mo khyod bzhi yang// mdos bdag ni mdos longs shig/ ces bstod la mdos dbul lo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ bskang ba dang ma mo ming grangs kyi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha// mi srin 'jigs pa'i mgon can

rnams// bsgrub cing phrin las bcol ba la// rdzas rnams mthun par ji ltar bsog/ rtags dang dus tshig gtor ma ji ltar gtang// gtor ma'i maN+Dal ji ltar brtsig/ 'jig rten 'joms pas bka' stsal cig/ ces gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ nyams dga' bkra shis bzhugs gnas su// gzhung dang mthun par dkyil 'khor bri// pad+ma'i rigs la mtshan dang ldan// shin tu sgeg ma gzhag par bya// tsit+ta rak+ta zhing chen lcang lo yang// rdzas su dur khrod ro rdzas bzhag/ mi yi zil pa ched du blang// rak+ta tsit+ta tshogs tshad bsog/ tshil chen me mar kha lnga gtang// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi 'chad// ci 'byor zhal zas tshogs kyis bskang// rnal 'byor shun chen gon la phreng ba chen po bgrang// srid pa spyi blugs zha gyon la// rtse gsum 'bar ba'i g.yab mo thogs// dngos grub blang ba'i zhal bu yang// bkra shis rdzas su blang bar bya// de nas dang por lha yi bsnyen pa bya// yum dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// ka ni ka yi mchod pa dbul// bdag nyid badzra he ru ka/ yum srid pa'i rgyal mo nyid du byin gyis brlab// gnyis su med par de bzhin bsgom// de nas snying po dbul bar bya// nying bzhi mu kha le kro d+hI shwa rI ma hA/ pad+ma b+ha ga bde klong 'dus 'dus/ snying dza da sha yu ti hUM b+h+yo/ de nas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig na/ ha zhes spyugs pa phyung zer nas gam du 'ong ngo// de nas dang po sbyor ba byas pa la// kar ni kas mchod pa dbul lo// de nas yum ston la rnal 'byor ma gsum mam lnga tshun chod gang byed kyang ched du gang byed pa'i snying po la dril la so sor rang re bzlas so// de nas yum chen mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba la 'ong ste/ de ni dngos grub tshur ster ba yin pas rab tu bzang ngo// sngar yum dang lhan cig sbyor ba'i mchod pa dbul bas/ yum la 'gran mi rgyu/ phyis ma ston na dngos grub mi ster ro// gsang ba'i gzungs ma ni// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can no// sbyor ba la byung nas bstod pa ni// hUM che zhes mon mo gsang ba'i yum// thig le sbyor ba'i yum gcig ma// dkar mo nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// gru gsum 'bar ba'i spyan gcig ma// g.yu yi ral pas srid pa sgrol// chags pa'i spyan gyis pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen mchi ma skye 'gro'i gso// tsit+ta'i zhags pas dgra bo sgrol// sngon gyi sbyor mchod ji bzhin du// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes bstod do// sgrub pa de thon nas/ gang sgrub pa la 'jug go/ gtor ma'i maN+Dal brtsig pa ni/ dbyings kyi ma mo ni rgyar khru byed dang ngo// dpangs su 'dom gang khru gang bar brtsig/ mdog smug nag tu bya khru gang gi 'og tu maN+Dal zhing ras la bris la bzhag/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi par bya/ dbus su gru gsum la gtso mo spyi'i snying po bri/

'khor lo bzhi la phung byed ma la sogs pa gang byed pa'i snying po bri/ gtor ma btang/ dun ting nag mo nang par nyi ma'i zer la zhon nas rgyu ba de'i gtor ma btang ngo// mis mi mthong bar ming rus 'khor lo'i 'og tu bzhag go/ bdud mo rigs kyi gru gsum du brtsig/ dpangs dang rgya kun gcig/ maN+Dal dur khrod kyi ras la gru gsum bsnol mar bri/ tshangs pa gzi can gyi bu mo nam mkha'i mtha' la rgyu bas/ nam lang ba la btang/ las byed ma mo rnams kyis gru gsum la kha khyer bar gsum brtseg la khang seng du rtsig/ 'gram du ling+ga bskur/ bdud yak+sha me sreg gi bu mo nag mo rkang gcig skar mda' la zhon nas rgyu bas// nam gyi cha smad la btang ngo// sprul pa'i ma mo'i gtor ma ni/ nyi ma gung la zla ba'i sras mo rta la zhon nas rgyu bas de'i dus su btang ngo// bdud khyab pa lag rings kyi bu mo nam gung la rgyu ste/ 'dod pa ro zan khrag 'thung spyan gcig yin pas/ der yang btang ngo// stegs ni gru bzhi la mdog ser nag tu bya/ 'khor lo ro ras la ma mo'i snying po gang byed kyis mtha' ma bskor la/ dbus su ming rus bris rtags ma thon par gzhug gtor ma de'i steng du spungs/ de ni gtor ma'i las so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ gtor ma btang ba dang spyi yi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// da ni bu mo bzhi la las dag po bkol ba la/ tshes bcu bzhi la gnas dben par bsham/ de nas yo byad brtsam/ dkar mo mig gcig ma la b+han+d+ha zlum la pad+ma chags pa dang/ 'jam la ri mo nyung ba btsal/ dkar mo mche ba'i phyag na bsnams// 'chong ris smug pos rab tu brgyan// ljon shing ri mo yod pa ni// nag mo chen mo'i phyag na bsnams// pad+ma 'dab brgyad yod pa la// dkar la 'tsher bar gyur pa ni// dmar mo dbang bsgyur phyag na bsnams// dum bu gnyis pa yod pa'am// rdo rje rgya gram rtser 'dug pa// ser mo las mkhan phyag na bsnams// de rnams rten du bcas pa la// ri mo med na tshon gyis bri// rigs ni mtshan ngan 'dir mi gtogs// b+han+d+ha de bzhin ldan pa la// shel gyi rgyu bzhi yang dag rdzogs// gzhan yang dam rdzas ma bzhi bsog/ de nas ma bzhi'i dbang bskur ba'i ngan sngags bod pa/ 'bod rbad gsod pa gsum du dril la bzlas/ dang por bzlas pa ma ma snying kha raka/ ma ma rak+sha ma ma rak+sha/ rak+mo snying khrag la ma ma dun dun/ trag rak+sha ma snying he kem ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ rbad pa dril ba/ khog sbub rol gcig ma ma snying khrag la sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dza dza snying rtsa phyung zhig/ ma ma snying tsit+ta la thun/ snying khrag ma ma dun dun/ shaM tiSh+Tha ma snying la ya ma ma b+h+yo/ bsad pa dril ba la/ mA mA sha sha ma ma hring hring/ dgra bo ma ma sa ma ya/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta ma dz+wa la

mA ra ya dz+wa/ tsit+ta tsal rol chuM thuM ri li li/ ma las myur du mdzod cig/ ces drag tu bskul lo// hUM shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' shun chen rlon pa gsol// b+han+d+ha rlon pa'i dril bus brgyan// ral phran zhag gi thigs pa la// dung chen mche ba gtsigs pa yis// shar phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// rin chen shel gyi thod gdengs can// zhag gi lan phran bsigs pa yis// steng du ya bdud rdungs shig chem// bar du dgra bgegs thal bar rlogs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na/ nag mo chen mo mche ba can// mi lpags rlon pa'i go zu can// b+han+d+ha skam po'i dril bus brgyan// rdo rje lan phran dril chen 'khrol// lcags kyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// lho phyogs dgra bgegs phur pas 'debs// gser g.yu spel ba'i thod gdengs can// dril chen ral pa gsigs pa yis// steng du lha chen 'ching bar byed// bar du dgra bgegs phung bar byed// 'og tu byol song stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i nub phyogs na// dmar mo chen mo dbang sgyur ma// na bza' khrag gi go zu la// sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chun 'khor can// pad+ma rak+ta'i thig phran can// mche ba dmar po gtsigs pa yis// nub phyogs dgra bgegs phung bar byed// mi khrag rlon pa'i thod gdengs can// khrag gi lan phran bsigs pa yis// steng du tshangs chen 'jigs par byed// bar du dgra bgegs phung bar byed// 'og tu byol song gnas ris 'joms// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs na// ser mo las mkhan chen mo la// mdzes pa'i na bza' sku la gsol// mAM sa rlon pa'i thul pa la// dri chu khol ma'i ya ba bskor// lan phran dril bu 'bar ba 'byung// gser gyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// byang phyogs srid gsum rlag par byed// mAM sa rlon pa'i thod gdengs can// dri chu'i lan phran bsigs pa yis// steng du tshogs kyi bdag po 'ching// bar du dgra bgegs thal bar rlog/ 'og tu bgegs rigs stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// thig le gsang ba'i gzungs gcig ma// bdud rtsi rnam lnga dbu la rdzogs// g.yas na g.yang gzhi'i thor tshugs kyis// mu stegs nag mo'i snying 'byin ma// g.yon na thod pa khrag 'dzag bsnams// bud med thams cad dbang du sdud// ral pa can gyi 'khor skyong ma// sgrub pa po la brtse dgongs te// 'dir spyon bdag gi las mdzod cig/ ces bskul lo/ mchod rten rnying pa'i phyogs bzhir thod par stsal la bzhag/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsgrub nas mnan na ba gdon mi za'o// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ srin mo bu mo bzhi bsgrub

pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas ma mo e ka dzA Ti bsgrub pa 'di ltar byas na gang 'dod kyi gtam smra ru 'ong ngo// stegs bu gru bzhi pa gcig gi steng du/ grwa phying gtsang ma gcig bting la/ dam rdzas sna lnga stsal ba'i dmar gtor gyi nang du sman dang/ phud gtsang ma stsal te/ dar dmar kha tshon gang gis kha bcad la/ kha nub tu bltas la zhag bdun du bsgrub pa byas te/ bud med mtshan dang ldan pa la pra phab ste/ hUM srid pa'i byan mo yal gam can// skye 'gro ral gcig 'jig rten sgrol// mig nas khrag 'dzag snying khrag bsreg/ kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// ma byung ba yi dus mtha' nas// 'jig rten las kyi dbang bsgyur ma// sems can don la rab brtson te// snying rje byams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brtse ba'i thugs kyis gshegs su gsol// yum las bab nas snang srid ston// de la med du
