mi rung ba ni snel gri mo'i snying dang thod pa yin no// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ e ka dzA Ti pra phab pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten 'joms pa stobs kyi lha// mdos la ma tshogs ji ltar bskul// ces gsol to// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ dang po hUM gis lha mchog gtso bo bstod// de nas rigs kyis ma tshogs mchod// hUM bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag 'jigs pa'i cha byad can// dkar nag 'bar ba'i zhal mnga' ba// phyag drug phyag mtshan skye 'gro sgrol// sbrul chen zhags pas ma tshogs 'gugs// g.yang gzhi g.yabs pas thams cad 'dul// yum dang gnyis su med pa ste// sbyor ba tshogs kyi mchod pa 'dis// thugs rje dbyings nas rol par mdzod// bstod pa kun mthun/ de nas ma mo'i snying po kun thun gcig bzlas/ a mr-i ta'i dam chu la/ he ru ka'i nga rgyal bskyed la/ hUM nga ni khams gsum snying khrag bdag/ da ni sha rus 'cha' ba ste// nga ni za byed chen po ste// khams gsum mAM sa za ba'i bdag/ ma mo kun gyi re gnas kyis// ma mo bskang zlog gtor ma longs// zhes dam bsres la/ de nas yang/ hUM 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ do nub ma tshogs gnyen mchod do// 'bru sna ni mang po dang/ rin chen ni sna tshogs dang/ gling bzhi'i gtor ma dang/ sna tshogs ni rdzas bsags nas/ srog chags ni mang pos bskor/ kun kyang rin chen brgyan/ 'jig rten ni nor gyis bskor/ dkon pa'i ni zas bsogs nas/ mu men ni stegs bu la/ rin chen ni bcal bkram nas/ spos kyi ni sa gzhi bting/ dbang gi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// dar dkar gyis yol ba bres/ gsal ba'i mar me btang/ rgyal mtshan ni sna tshogs btsugs/ le brgan ni gdugs kyis bkab/ ma bdud ni gnyan

byung nas/ gse bgyi ni skyems 'phang bltam/ srog chags kyi skyin du 'bul/ chus srid kyi mnga' thang bzhes/ longs spyod ni rkyen du bzhes// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jig rten yongs kyi mnga' mdzad mo// ma mo tshogs kyi bdag mo ste// srid gsum yongs la mnga' bdag mo// skye 'gro yongs kyi za byed ma// na bza' zhing gi g.yang gzhi la// thod pa rlon pa'i phreng ba can// lag na snying gi longs spyod ma// 'dir gshegs mdos bdag mdos longs shig/ rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// shar phyogs rigs kyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo sprin chen go zu la// lag na gser gyi spu gri thogs// srid pa kun gyi rus 'cha' ma// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ hUM rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// lho phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// nag mo g.yu yi go zu la// bskal pa'i me dpung 'od 'bar zhing// srid pa gsum gyi drod 'bebs ma// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe 'phrog ma// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nub phyogs khams kyi rgyal mo ste// dmar mo khrag gi go zu la// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang// skye 'gro kun gyi khrag 'thung ma// 'dir spyon mdos bdag mdos longs shig/ las kyi rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// ser mo gser gyi go zu la// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs bdag mo// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ nam mkha'i rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// 'jig rten rigs kyi mdos kyi bdag/ mthing nag nam mkha'i go zu la// gser gyi zhags pa bsdogs pa 'phen// skye 'gro kun gyi bkrag bdag mo// 'dir spyon mdos bdag mdos longs shig/ hUM 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ ri rab gling bzhi'i rtse mo la// snang srid kun gyi phug srog mo// sku mdog mthing nag chen mo la// dbu dang zhal ni cir yang ston// rin chen ral pa sna tshogs kyis// snang srid kha dog gsal mdzad ma// spyan gnyis mdzes pa'i mchi ma yis// g.yas la snang srid dbang du sdud// g.yon pa skye 'gro gsos mdzad ma// lnga bcu rtsa bdun jo mo ste// skye 'gro kun gyi mnga' bdag mo// ma mo chen mo gshegs su gsol// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug la mdos bsngo ba'i le'u ste so drug pa'o//// hUM che zhes chen po dkar mo ste// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags can// snying gi zhags pa bsdogs shing 'phen// dkar mo chen mo ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ che zhes dkar mo nyi ma'i mdangs ldan ma// srid pa gsum char sgrol mdzad ma// lag na shel gi spu

gri thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ hUM che zhes chen mo khrag 'thung ma// srid pa gsum char dbang du sdud// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// khros pa'i rgyal mo ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ che zhes dmar mo bdud rtsi bdag/ srid pa gsum ka gsos mdzad ma// lag na bdud rtsi bum pa thogs// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ che zhes ljang nag gnas 'dul ma// srid pa gsum char zad par 'gyur// lag na zhing lpags rgyal mtshan bsnams// khros pa'i rgyal mo ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ che zhes chen mo srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na skra yi zhags pa thogs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo la// lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi rdebs// b+ha ga chen mo phung byed ma// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ mtshan ni rgyug byed chen mo ste// lag na mi mgo'i rgyug pa thogs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ mtshan ni bdag nyid chen mo ste// lag na zhing gi rgyug pa 'phen// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ hUM ri rab lhun po'i dkyil 'khor nas// srid pa shar gyi bdag mo ste// dkar mo chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ srid pa lho yi bdag mo ste// nag mo chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ lag na b+han+d+ha lcang lo thogs// 'ching bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ srid pa nub kyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo ste// lag na b+han+d+ha lcang lo bsnams// 'ching bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung// srid pa byang gi bdag mo ste// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// lag na thod pa rgya gram thogs// len par byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ bskang ba'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// khol mo rnams la bsngo bar bya ste/ srid pa yongs kyi sha za mo// shang shang de'u la sogs pa bzhi// ri rab gling bzhi bcas pa la// ma tshogs 'bum gyis bskor ba la// rje dang 'bangs dang khol mo dang// g.yog dang bran la sogs pa dang// nang blon kha blon gung blon dang// ma tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa ni// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ ri rab bang rim bzhi pa la// shar phyogs dung mkhar dkar po la// g.yu yi sgo mo stsal// gser gyi sgo lcags kra la la// de'i khab bdag pa/ dbang

phyug ni sgrol byed lags/ sgo ba ni sgo phye zhig/ mdos bdag ni mdos longs shig/ glud bdag ni glud longs shig ri rab lho phyogs na/ lcags mkhar sngon po'i nang shed khyab 'jug chen po yin/ gnam lha dkar po'i ming phyung nas/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ 'dzam gling ni byang phyogs nas// mdos kyi ni bdag po ba/ ma hA de ba lha chen po/ btsun mo u ma de ba 'khor dang bcas// nor lha chen po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mngos longs shig/ byang shar mtshams shed na// bse mkhar ni khra bo la/ dngul gyi ni bad kyis bskor/ lcags kyi ni sgo stsal bas/ btsan ni yam shud dmar po'i mkhar// btsan gyi rgyal po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos longs shig/ mdos 'di phar song 'gab ma ngan// tshe 'di tshur mchis mna' ma za// phya dang g.yang ma 'bros/ zhes bskang ngo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ mdos bskyal ba'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o//// de nas rtag pa'i rgyal mo la bstod pa/ hUM snang srid thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong// dus gsum bde gshegs 'byung ba lnga yi yum// skye 'gro ma lus 'byung ba lnga la rdzogs// 'das dang ma byon 'byung ba lnga yi dbyings// 'byung ba lnga nyid b+ha ga yum gyi klong// bde chen yum gyi klong la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM khams gsum thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i rgyan// snang srid thams cad 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ gru chad bzhi yis b+ha ga'i tshul gyis brgyan// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo sku bskyod cig/ hUM 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su// ma bdud bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// yum gyi rgyal mo sku bzhengs te// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams gnon// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// mkha' la dus bzhi cha snyoms ma// dbu gcig zhal lnga srid pa gsal// zhabs las 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// phyag drug phyag na sna tshogs bsnams// dang po rdo rje dril bu dang// b+han+d+ha lcang lo kha bad 'phyar// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo can// tshogs kyi bdag mo gshegs su gsol// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// dri za bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// shar gyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' dkar mo shel ltar dag/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rdo rje b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma dgra s+t+wa gtun shing 'bar// tha ma seng ge'i mchog chen stobs// 'byung ba sa yi mnga' bdag mo// 'gro ba'i sha la mnga' mdzad ma// rus pa'i bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hUM byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan

steng du// byang gi mkha' 'gro khyung chen gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ljang nag shin tu 'bar// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rdo rje rgya gram 'bar// bar ma khyung chen rgyu zhags 'dren// tha ma spyang mo zhing chung snyod// 'byung ba rlung la dbang bsgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// dbugs kyi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hUM nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// chu bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// nub phyogs mkha' 'gro dur bya'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyan gsal ma// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// spyan ni dmar po'i mdangs kyis mdzes// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po dung khrag g+han+d+ha dmar// bar ma zhags pa dril bu la// tha ma ce spyang zhing chung snyod// 'byung ba chu la dbang bsgyur ma// 'gro ba'i khrag la mnga' mdzad cing// khrag gi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hUM lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// gshin rje bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// lho yi mkha' 'gro ban glang gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sngon po bai DUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ dang po rin chen b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma me 'bar chu spyang bsnams// tha ma stag mo zhing chung za// 'byung ba me la dbang bsgyur ma// 'gro ba'i drod la mnga' mdzad cing// drod kyi bdag mo gshegs su gsol// dkyil 'khor mtshams kyi 'khor lo'i steng// lha chen bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rdo rje'i mchu// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ser po btso ma gser// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rin chen b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spu gri bsnams// tha ma 'ug pa'i zhing chung snyod// nam mkha'i stong la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// bkrag gi bdag mo gshegs su gsol// kun kyang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// sems can don la brtse zhing dung// 'jigs tshul che zhing snying rjer ldan// ye shes drug ldan rgyal mo drug/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shog/ glud bdag ni glud longs shig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ rgyal mo drug gi bskang ba'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// pho rnams thugs dam ji ltar bskang// mthun pa'i rdzas rnams ji ltar bsog/ ces gsol to// de nas bka' stsal pa/ mo kha bas ni pho kha drag/ sna la sngon du pha rnams mchod// mo kha pho ni sla ba yin// de yi mthun rdzas bsog pa ni// dkar po bcu gsum

rdzas bstan pa// lug dang bya dang sprel dang khyi// bcu gsum cho bzhir bsag par bya// bshos bu lha bshos mar me dang// mkhar thabs bcu gsum cho bzhi'o// mda' dang nam mkha' ngar glud dang// spyan gzigs gtor ma bcu gsum tsho bzhi'o// zhal zas bzang pos sna drangs bcu gsum mo// tshogs tshad zhal rnams bris na rab// shing ris ljang bu gzhung bzhin bya// mchod dang bstod pa kun kyang gcig/ 'gong po spun dgu'i bsag thabs la// dang po 'gong po spun brgyad la// gzugs dang mthun par 'dra 'bag brgyad// mgo la bya dkar sgro btsugs la// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad phyi bstan kha// nam mkha' mtheb gang mkhar thabs brgyad du bsham// mda' brgyad mtho re dkar po la// mdzes pa'i tshon gyis bskor ba'i ri mo gsum// blon po gdan bag dbus su ni// mda' ris mkhar thabs za 'og go zu ris// nam mkha' g.yu ris dar dkar mtshan pa'i ljang bu bya// zhal zas sna tshogs mdzes par bsag/ shing ris mthun par bsag par bya// de nas phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du// yas stags bskyal la gtang// rgyal po'i gsang mdos dbul ba ni// kho rang sku gzugs mdzes par bya// shog bu'i lag 'phan bdun gyis brgyan// spyi bor gdugs kyis dgab par bya// yi ge bcu pa'i 'khor lo snying gar bzhag/ de nas smyug ma khru gang la// khram gyi bu ga bsnol mar nam mkha' gzug par bya// lha la gtso bo'i nam mkha' gzug/ g.yu yi khong ba phyi rim dkar// gser gyi kha chag gtang bar bya// de nas khong pa gser la kha chag g.yu yi phyi rim dkar// gcig ni dkar po che ba'i g.yu dang bye ru gser// gnyis ni dkar la g.yu dang gser gyi kha chag yin// bzhi ni dkar po zang ma la// mtho gang tshad du gzug par bya// sna tshogs dkar po'i rgyan gyis mtshan// 'ja' ris btod la rim gyis gzug/ de nas mkhar thabs dkyil du gzug/ spyan gzigs gtor ma phud gtsang dbul// rkang 'dom nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// gting ring yas stags gnan par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang srid pa'i rgyal mo sgos mdos bsham// mkhar thabs gzhung bzhin bshams nas kyang// nam mkha' dgu po gsang ba'i mdos dang gcig/ lha bshos bre cha'i steng du ting lo lnga'i mar me btang// smyug ring sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// mda' ris gzhung dang mthun par bya// spyan gzigs phud gtsang dbul bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rgyal po mched lnga la// lha bshos bre cha lnga byas te/ dbus su ting la ri mo mar gyis bltams la// smyug ring mda' ris nam mkha' kun mthun/ spyan gzigs cha lnga/ gser dngul gyi snod du phud gtsang mas bkang la

dbul lo// de ni pho'i bskang ba yin no// ma mo'i mdos kun gyis sna la bskang ngo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ pho bskang ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas yang sa bdag yo bcos kyi mdos 'di gsungs so// dang po gtsang ma'i gnas nyid du// klu yi dkyil 'khor bsham par bya// de nas gtsang phye bre gang la// sa bdag bcu drug gzugs byas te// dang po gtso bo bzhi yi gzugs// shar du sa bdag hal khyi la// lho ru hang 'phen dgod par bya// nub tu sa bdag the se la// byang du tsang kun dgod par bya// shar du mi yi lus po la// stag dang yos bu'i mgo can yin// lho ru mi yi lus po la// sbrul dang rta yi mgo can yin// nub tu mi yi lus po la// bya dang spre'u'i mgo can yin// byang du mi yi lus po la// phag dang byi ba'i mgo can yin// nub byang mi yi lus po khyi'i mgo can yin// byang shar glang gi mgo can yin// shar lho 'brug gi mgo can yin// lho nub lug gi mgo can yin// gzhung dang mthun par rdzas rnams bsag pa ni// sna tshogs shing sna tshang ba dang// ljang bu bcu gnyis shing ris bzhi// sna tshogs 'bru dang mar dang 'o ma dang// khur ba dkar gsum gtor ma bzhi// gtso bo bzhi la dbul bar bya// 'khor gyi sa bdag bcu gnyis la// gtor ma cha gsum bsham pa ni// nas dang gro dang 'bras chan gsum gyi gtor ma gsum// dang po gcig ni mar dang 'o mas dgang// gcig ni sna tshogs rtsi sman blugs// gcig ni sran chang bra phye nas dang sbal gcong gtor mas dgang/ nam mkha' khra bo chen po bzhi// gtso bo bzhi la dbul bar bya// shar du dkar po gser gyi kha chag can dang gnyis// lho ru ser po g.yu yi kha chag can dang gnyis// nub tu dmar po dung gi kha chag can dang gnyis// byang du sngon po byu ru'i kha cag can dang gnyis// mtshams bzhir gser g.yu'i kha cag can ni bzhi// mda' ris bzhi ni gzhung dang mthun pa la// bcu gnyis nam mkha'i kha dog bzhin// phyogs mtshams gzhung dang mthun par bris// de bzhin sa bdag phag mo la// dmar gtor cha gcig bshams nas ni// bal tshon sna lngas kha bcad la// de bzhin sna la mchod par bya// de bzhin ma mo srin mo'i rdzas// bal nag tshal po byas nas ni// 'bru mar chang gi spang ma blugs// gzugs ni mtho gang tshad yin te// mdos bdag kun gyi nang du yang// mo yi rdzas ni bsag par shis// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ sa bdag yo bcos kyi skabs so//// de nas yang klu'i mdos kyi skabs 'di gsungs so// rigs bzhi klu'i gzugs brnyan ngar phye la dgos par bya'o// nag po mgo dgu la bya spu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhag/ rtsi sman sna tshogs dang/

mtshal li khri dung dang dmar po'i gdugs/ shing rtsi tshang ba 'o ma dang 'bras la sogs pa'i 'bru chan sna tshogs dang/ mngar sna tshang ba bsag par bya'o// rgyal rigs la nam mkha' sngon po la sna tshogs tshon gyis bris pa la/ dar sna tshang bas brgyan pa'o// bram ze'i rigs la khong dmar po'o// sna tshogs tshon gyis bris pa gcig dbul lo// rje'u rigs la khong nag po la/ sna tshogs tshon gyis bris pa gcig dbul lo// dmangs rigs la khong nag po la/ sna tshogs tshon gyis bris pa la/ sna tshogs chu bya'i sgro dang ras ma sna tshogs pas brgyan pa dbul lo// gtor ma cha gcig la 'bras chan dang nas kyi rus chan dang// zho dang khur ba btab pa ni/ rgyal rigs la dbul lo// bram ze'i rigs la nas kyi rus chan dang// khur ba mar dang zho dang bcas pa dbul lo// rje'u rigs la nas chan dang/ sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi 'bru sna'i gtor ma gtang ngo// dmangs rigs la sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin no// 'o ma la sman sna tshogs dang/ mngar sna tshogs pas bran pa ni/ rigs bzhi kun la gtor ma dbul/ shing ris dang mda' dar gzhung bzhin byas la/ sna tshogs shing sna la nam mkha' dang bcas las gzug go/ nam mkha' ni 'dra ba gnyis rgyal rigs la/ bram ze'i rigs la 'dra ba bzhi/ rje'u rigs la 'dra ba gnyis dang dmangs rigs 'dra ba bdun no/ maN+Dal la ba yi rnam lnga dang/ spos chus byi dor legs par byas la/ gzugs lnga dgod do// gtor ma cha bzhi dgod la bzhag go/ 'o ma'i phor bu bzhi yang bzhag go/ sna tshogs spos chus nad pa bkrus la/ kha shar du bstan la g.yas phyogs su/ nas dkar mo gsog med pa bre gang bzhag de ni glud de tshe'i skyin pa'o// g.yon du sran ma nag po gsog med pa bre gang bzhag/ de ni glud dang 'khrun bcad pa'o// mdun du zhal zas sna tshogs dang/ 'brang rgyas dang phud bltams la bzhag/ de ni bkra shis gsol ba'o// lag pa g.yas par mtshal li khri bskur/ de ni bkrag dang gzi mdangs skyed pa'o// g.yon du dung bskur/ de ni rus nad gso zhing tshe brtan par byas pa'o// de gnyis nas gtor dum re blugs/ lhag ma'i snying gar gdags so// de nas klu mchod la chu sngo bzang po can du yas stags bskyal lo// nag po rkang gcig ni bya khyung dang/ phyag na rdo rje'i sngags kyis rma bya'i sgros brab cing gtubs la/ nad pa'i mal 'og tu mnan// sgro nad pa'i lag tu thogs// bya khyung snying po zlos su gzhug go/ ma mo srin pa'i bem las/ klu mdos kyi skabs so//// de nas yang rnal 'byor las su rung zhing/ bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir ma mo rigs bzhi'i dbang bskur ba 'di gsungs so// de yang dang por gnas

bkra shis pa'i sar maN+Dal gzhung dang mthun par brtsig/ spyi sgrub dpe chung dang mthun par bris/ zhing chen gyi 'phan gdugs dang/ rgyan sna tshogs dang dur khrod kyi rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs dgram/ de nas mchod pa la sogs pa bshams la/ slob dpon la dar mthing nag gam/ lcags kha'i thod bcings la/ gnyen po stobs kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ ma mo rigs bzhi la mchod bstod bya/ zhag lnga'am bdun du/ yang na gsum yang rung bas/ spyir bsnyen pa dbul/ de nas dbang bskur ba ni/ dbang gi lha mo spyan drangs te/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te/ badzra re'u tri sa ma ya dza zhes spyan drangs te/ 'di skad ces bstod do// hUM dkar mo khyung thogs rdo rje'i gshog pa can// mkha' la yid bzhin sprul pa'i char 'bebs ma// a la la yi dngos grub gsol mdzad ma// ma gcig gtsug gi rgyan 'byams ma// yid bzhin sprul pas mkha' la bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma// do nub dbang dang dngos grub stsol// zhes byon par bsams la slob ma nub sgor bzhag go/ de nas slob dpon gyi sa 'di skad ces brjod do// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// khyod ni skal mchog rab tu ldan// yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'jug pa'i skal bar ldan pa ni// de ni skal ldan rnal 'byor te// lus ngag yid gsum dang bas 'dud par gyis// langs stabs thal mo spyi bor rdebs// 'di nas bzung ste dam par gyis// zhes brjod pas/ rig pa'i me tog thogs nas/ rigs kyi bu des 'di skad ces zhu'o// bla ma ye shes dam pa kun gyi bdag/ sku gsum bder gnas dngos grub dag/ ma nor mtshan ma'i lam ston pa// bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug kyi// bdag la dngos grub bstan du gsol// zhes rin po che'i me tog gtor nas de nyid na 'khod do// de nas yang gu rus 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// dad pa'i mchog ni nyer bzhag nas// bla ma la mos dad pa skyed// dbul ba'i mchog tu de 'gro yis// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'di skad ces zhu'o// rin po che'i me tog thogs la/ ho dgongs su gsol// lan gsum brjod nas/ bdag ni dad pa'i shugs bskyed nas// bla ma rdo rje'i slob dpon la// lus ngag yid gsum dad pa yis// bdag ni skyabs su gsol lags kyi// dkyil 'khor lha la skyabs su mchi// ma mo rigs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal lags kyi// bdag la gsan cing dkyil 'khor ston// zhes me tog dor nas/ de nyid du long bu dang thal mo sbyar nas 'khod do// de nas yang gu rus 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi

bu// rigs bzhi ma mo'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dad pa'i yid kyis khyod 'jug na// slob dpon nga la dad pa skyed// 'khor dang yul dang bu smad tshogs// dad pa'i mchog tu dbul bar gyis// gus pas thong na dbul bar bya// gal te dad pa'i stobs med na// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu yin pas// bstan par bya ba ma yin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rigs kyi bu des/ bdag ni dad pa'i shugs dang ldan// bla ma snying rje rab ldan na// bdag kyang dam tshig gtso lags kyi// rdzu 'phrul mthu yi dngos grub bdag la stsol// bdag la dbang mchog dam pa gsol// de nas yang gu rus 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi gtso// khyod ni dam pa'i tshul 'dzin na// rigs bzhi ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du// khyod ni nga yis gzhug par bya// sdom pa gsum la gnas par gyis// nyams pa gnyis la 'dzem par gyis// bla ma la ni gus par gyis// gang ltar dam bca' byas pa la// dor bar bya ba ma yin no// sgrub pa'i dam rdzas dang du blang bar gyis// des ni thun mong dngos grub thob// de nas yang ni rigs kyi bu des 'di skad ces zhu'o// sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyid// bla ma la yang gus par bgyid// yi dam lha la mthun rdzas dbul// yang bla mas gsang bar 'os dang 'da' dka' bsrung// srog las nyams pa mi bsgo zhing// chos kyi dam tshig nyams pa dang// bla ma mched lcam la 'khus pa// 'di ni nyams pa chen po yin// de yang yi ge phyed mi 'dri// chos dam 'dres pa dam tshig nyams// chos skad gcig 'dres bu 'khor srog dang bral// dam can chags na de ltar yin// gal te chos nyid don 'chol na// rdo rje dmyal bar gdon mi za// bu khyod dam tshig bsrung bar gyis// de nas yang 'di skad ces gdams so// ma mo srog gi 'khor lo ni// thams cad srog gi rgyun 'chang bas// bden pa dor bar ma byed par// rtag tu srog gi snying po thon// 'on tang bu gcig ma byams 'dra// zhes pas ro rdzas bskams la khrom// dbang mchog 'di la dad pa skyed// de nas rigs kyi bus 'di skad ces zhus so// khyod ni dam pa kun gyi gtso// bdag ni rig pa mchog lags kyi// dang du blangs pa'i dam rdzas rnams// dang du de ring bdag len gyi// ging chen rnams kyi dbang mchog stsol// b+han+d+ha lcang lo kha bad can// 'dza' gad bdud rtsi sman gyis bkang// dngos grub 'phel ba'i rdzas mchog 'di'i// de ring bdag la dbang mchod stsol// mchog chen g.yang gzhi ru mtshon 'di// ma mo mkha' 'gro g.yab mo bas// thams cad 'du ba'i rdzas mchog 'dis// de ring bdag la dbang mchog stsol// tsit+ta rin chen 'bar ba 'di// ma mo rnams kyi

rten yin te// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dbang mchog stsol// rtsis mchog khram bam bdud las rgyal// lha srin sde brgyad bdud las rgyal// dgra dpung 'joms pa'i dbang mchog stsol// kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'bar ba 'di// drag po mtshon cha rno dbal te// ye shes mtshon chas kun 'dul bas// dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i rdzas mchog 'dis// dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i dbang mchog stsol// dam rdzas bdud rtsi rnam lnga 'di// kun gyi zas mchog dam pa ste// dngos grub 'phel ba'i dam rdzas 'dis// de ring bdag la dbang mchog stsol// mthing nag dar gyi cod pan 'dis// thams cad skyob pa'i mthu dpal te// mi nub rgyal mtshan chen po pa// kun gyi dpal du gyur pa bas// de ring bdag la dbang mchog stsol// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// phreng ba rin chen me tog ldan// tshangs pa gtsug phud chen po bas// de ring bkra shis me tog phreng ba 'dis// de ring bdag la dbang mchog stsol// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// kun kyang 'tsho ba'i rdzas la brten// zhal zas ro mchog sna tshogs 'dis// dngos grub 'phel ba'i rdzas mchog ste// de ring dngos grub spel ba'i dbang mchog stsol// ming nas btags nas chags pa ste// 'jig rten 'dir ni mi nub phyir// ming gi grags pa'i rgyu yin pas// lha mir bcas pa'i dbang mchog stsol// de yang dang po dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i dus na/ gdong g.yogs la sogs pas dkrig la/ me tog dor ba ni kun dang mthun/ de nas slob dpon la yon phul la/ gdams ngag nod do// de yang rdzas chad cing dad pa snying nas ma rdzogs na/ dbang mi thob ste/ shin tu brtson 'grus bskyed par bya ste/ de yang slob dpon man ngag dang ldan zhing dad pa che la snying rje che ba ni slob dpon dam pa ste/ de ni yid bzhin gi nor bu dang 'dra'o// de la ni dbang 'di nod par bya la/ slob ma yang smras pa btsan te chad pa ltar byed cing gsang ba'i gtam thub na dbang bskur bya'o// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ dbang sbyin pa'i skabs so//// de nas yang dam tshig gi skabs 'di gsungs so// sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ma mo rnams kyi dam tshig bsrung bar bya// sngags dang 'khor dang nyams dang 'dres// 'di dag dam tshig bsrung ba gces// sngags kyi dam tshig bsrung ba ni// dang po srog gi snying po ma nor bar// bod yig drug gi sel zhugs nas// yin pa min par gso ba na// de ni dam tshig chen po'i 'khon yin no// chad dang nor dang lhag par yang// de yang dam tshig sngags kyi 'khon// de ni sngags kyi 'khon nag ste// ma mo'i 'khon nag bsrung ba ni// dam tshig gcig pa 'khon pa dang// srog las nyams pa dag po'i

'khon// nyams pa chen po chos las dam nyams te// khrims med dam tshig nyams pa dang// dam pa chos kyis skad mi 'dre// 'di dag ma mo'i dam tshig ste// bsrung na shin tu dam can te// rang gi dam tshig thub par bsrung// 'di ni chos khrims dam tshig ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsrung bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// kha la mi bsrung sems la bsrung// sku yi dam tshig bsrung ba ni// bla ma rnams kyi sku mi smad// grib ma 'gong ba ma yin te// rkang brkyang phyogs char gom pa dor ba min// steng phyogs yongs su 'gro mi bya// ming nas 'bod pa ma yin te// yul gyi phyogs nas 'bod par bya// bka' rnams bcag pa ma yin te// ra ro ba snying myos pa'am// sman rnams mi gsol bka' bcag min// gzhan ni nam yang bcag pa min// de ni sku yi dam tshig go/ thugs kyi dam tshig bsrung ba ni// gang yin bstan pa'i yi dam lha// gsal bar bsgom zhing dam par bzung// gsung gi dam tshig bsrung ba ni// gang la byed pa bzlas pa'i sngags// mi tshig bar ma chod par bzlas// sel rnams ma shor shin tu gces// dam tshig rtsa ba gsum po ni// gang bsgrub pa yi srog yin no// de nas yan lag dam tshig ni// dam can sgrub par 'dod pa rnams// dam can brten pa'i dam rdzas rnams// shin tu dka' yang btsal bar bya// sgrub pa'i dam rdzas ma tshogs na// nye bar byed kyang dam mi skong// drag po'i rdzas rnams ma tshogs na// las rnams myur du 'grub pa min// shin tu nyams pa rnams la 'jom// de ni ma mo'i dam tshig ste// srog las gces par dam tshig gzung// ma mo srid pa'i bem la/ dbang dang dam tshig gi skabs so//// de nas sa bdag gi bstod pa 'di gsungs so// shar gyi sa bdag hal khyi ni// sku mdog dkar po gangs ri 'dra// sku ni rin chen 'bar ba la// 'od zer dmar po stong gsum 'phro// phyag na gser gyi mda' gzhu bsnams// shar gyi sa bdag dam shing la// gtsang ma mdos kyi mchod pa 'bul// lho yi sa bdag hang phan ni// sku ni rin chen 'bar ba la// sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar// phyag na sbud pa nag po bsnams// dam shing sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// lho yi sa bdag dam shing la// gtsang ma mdos kyi mchod pa 'bul// nub kyi sa bdag dam shing ni// sku ni rin chen 'bar ba la// sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams// nub kyi sa bdag 'khor bcas la// gtsang ma mdos kyi mchod pa 'bul// byang gi sa bdag gtam shing ni// sku mdog rin chen 'bar ba la// rin chen thor tshugs mdzes pas brgyan// sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar// phyag na rtsang dang phur bu 'dril// byang gi sa

bdag 'khor bcas la// gtsang ma mdos kyi mchod pa 'bul// sa bdag chen po khyed bzhi yang// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs te// bcol ba'i las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// rje rigs bco brgyad slar la bzlog/ sa bdag khyed kyi thugs dang 'gal ba bskang bar bya// khyod kyis bka' chad bral bar mdzod// shar gyi sa bdag 'khor skyong ba// stag mgo can dang yos mgo can// shar phyogs shing la mnga' mdzad cing// sku mdog dkar po 'od zer 'bar// phyag na khram dang rin chen bar bu bsnams// de la gtsang ma mdos kyis bskang// lho yi sa bdag 'khor skyong ba// mi lus rta dang sbrul gyi mgo// lho yi phyogs na mnga' mdzad ma// sku mdog sngo sangs 'bar ma la// phyag na zor ba dgu khram bsnams// me ri 'bar ba'i phung po 'phro// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang// lho phyogs sa bdag ma bkyon cig/ nub phyogs sa bdag 'khor skyong ba// mi yi lus la bya dang spre'u'i mgo/ nub kyi phyogs la mnga' mdzad cing// sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na sdig pa nag po dang// zangs kyi sog le kha brgya bsnams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang// nub phyogs sa bdag ma bkyon cig/ byang gi sa bdag 'khor skyong ba// mi lus phag dang byi ba'i mgo/ byang phyogs chu la mnga' mdzad cing// sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar// phyag na ral gri so mangs bsnams// rin chen 'bar ba'i dbyug to bsnams// gtsang ma'i mdos kyis thugs dam bskang// byang gi sa bdag ma bkyon cig/ shar lho'i mtshams kyi sa bdag ni// mi lus 'brug gi mgo bo can// sku dmog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar// phyag na rin chen mchod rten bsnams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang// lho nub mtshams kyi sa bdag ni// mi yi lus la lug gi mgo/ sku mdog sngo bsangs 'od zer 'bar// phyag na rin chen dbyung to bsnams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang// nub byang mtshams kyi sa bdag ni// mi yi lus la khyi yi mgo/ sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar// phyag na ga'u ser po bsnams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang// byang shar sa bdag chen po la// mi lus glang gi mgo bo can// sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'bar// phyag na dgra s+t+wa 'bar ba bsnams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang// mtshams na gnas pa'i sa bdag bzhi// 'byung ba sa la mnga' mdzad cing// mi yi gnas su gnod ma sbyor// sa bdag yul nas ma 'degs shig/ yul bdag mtha' nas ma 'khrug cig/ sa la gnas pa'i sa srin yang// brag la gnas pa'i brag srin rnams// thang skam pha bong la brten

pa// sa bdag 'khor bcas khyed rnams kyang// gtsang ma'i mdos bde phar long la// sngon chad gnod pa slar la rtul// phyin chad gnod pa ma byed cig/ shing la gnas pa'i shing srin dang// sa la gnas pa'i sa bdag gis// mchod pa dam pa 'di bzhes la// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par mdzod// nyon cig sdig chen las ngan khyod// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// gal te bka' las 'das pa na// na raka dmyal ba'i gnas su skye// zhes gzhung bzhin bya'o// de nas rdzas rnams bskyal bar bya'o// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ sa bdag yo bcos kyi skabs te dang po'o//// de nas klu rnams kyi bstod pa 'di gsungs so// gzhung dang mthun par bsogs nas ni// 'di skad ces gsol to// shar phyogs klu rgyal dung skyong ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'od zer 'phros// sbrul mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka can// chibs su dung gi sbal pa bcibs// phyag na dung sbal lcong mo bsnams// rigs ni bram ze'i rigs su gtogs// bram ze'i rigs kyi 'khor gyis bskor// kun kyang nad kyi rkyal ba thogs// kha rlangs sngo dmar 'od du 'khyug/ khrag nad chu ser char ltar 'bebs// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ nA ga yu yu nA ba ba de ba u swA hA/ mdar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mdar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ hUM lho phogs klu rgyal rgya mtsho ni// sku ni rin chen 'bar ba la// sbrul mgo lnga yi gdengs ka can// sku mdog mthing nag 'od zer 'phro// phyag na lcags sbal lcong mo'i rgyal mtshan bsnams// chibs su chu glang sngon po bcibs// rigs ni rgyal po'i rigs su gtogs// rgyal rigs gtsang ma'i 'khor gyis bskor// kun kyang lag cha sbal pa'i rkyal pa thogs// gdung ba'i las kyi mdze nad bco brgyad gtong// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ hUM nA ga rA dza de ba yu yu sbur lce swA hA/ mngar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams so

gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ hUM nub kyi klu rgyal gzi brjid ni// sku ni rA ga 'bar ba la// sbrul nag bdun gyi gdengs ka can// sku mdog dmar ser 'od zer 'bar// phyag na dung gi sdig pa bsnams// chibs su zangs kyi chu srin bcibs// rigs ni rje'u rigs su gtogs// rje rigs gtum pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// kun kyang zangs kyi sdom sdig nyi li li// mdze nad bco brgyad char pa 'bebs// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ hUM nA ga ra b+ha lin kha hU ya hU ya swA hA/ mngar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ hUM byang gi klu rgyal mtha' yas ni// sku ni rin chen ljang gu la// sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar// rigs ni dmangs kyi rigs su gtogs// phyag na g.yu yi sdom sdig bsnams// g.yu sbal lcam mo tha ra ra// chibs su glang bu dmar po bcibs// 'khor du dmangs rigs klu yis bskor// kun kyang sbal nag thod pa phor ba yang bsnams// pho lhog glang thabs char du 'bebs// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ hUM na ga nA ga 'be ri 'be ra ga ba ling dung swA hA/ mngar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ byang shar klu rgyal 'jog po ni// sku ni mi bzad 'bar ba la// sbrul mgo gnyis kyi gdengs ka can// sku mdog dkar ser 'od zer 'bar// phyag na yid bzhin bum pa bsnams// rigs ni bram ze'i rigs su gtogs// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ nA ga ba ru Na na be swA hA/ mngar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni

mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ shar lho klu rgyal dga' bo ni// sku ni baiDUr+ya sngon po la// sbrul mgo gnyis kyi gdengs ka can// gtsug na yid bzhin nor bus brgyan// sku mdog mthing nag 'od zer 'bar// phyag na g.yu yi bum pa bsnams// rigs ni rgyal rigs dra mar gtogs// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ nA ga yu yu nA ga rA dza b+ha li swA hA/ mngar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ lho nub klu rgyal rigs ldan ni// sku ni pad ma rA ga'i dbyibs// sku mdog dmar ser 'od zer 'bar// phyag na sbal nag rgyal mtshan bsnams// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can// rigs ni rje'u'i rigs su gtogs// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ nA ga be nA ga b+ha li nA ga hUM ya hUM ya swA hA/ mngar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ nub byang klu rgyal nor rgyas ni// sku mdog ljang zhu 'od zer 'bar// sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// phyag na sbrul zhags khra bo bsnams// rigs ni dmangs kyi rigs su gtogs// nag thal can gyi 'khor gyis bskor// pho log glang thabs khros nad gtong// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ nA ga be nA ga be nA ga su pra ste swA hA/ mngar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud

rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ de nas klu mo bzhi la mchod cing bstod la// hUM nub phyogs rgya mtsho'i pho brang nas// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'bab pa// 'dam bu me tog tshal gyi gling// pad+ma rA ga'i dkyil 'khor nas// rje rigs bu mo pad+ma can// sku mdog dmar mo pad+ma mdzes// zangs sprul 'khyil pa'i nang na bzhugs// phyag na dar dpyang dmar po bsnams// rin chen gser gyi cod pan can// mngar gyi mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor ma bzhes// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman dang ni sna tshogs spos kyis mchod// sha bkra phol mig 'bras dang rkong pa rnams// 'jig rten gnas na zhi bar mdzod// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i pho brang ni// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs pa// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rgyal po'i rigs kyi bu mo ste// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// baiDUr sngon po 'od du 'bar// sbrul mgo lnga yi gdengs ka can// rtag tu sbrul sngon dkyil na bzhugs// phyag na gser gyi nya mo bsnams// rin chen g.yu yi cod pan can// 'khor du sman phran 'bum gyis bskor// mngar gyi mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor ma bzhes// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman dang ni sna tshogs spos kyis mchod// sha bkra phol mig 'bras dang rkong pa rnams// 'jig rten gnas na zhi bar mdzod// mdos bdag mdos long ma// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i pho brang du// don mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs pa// 'dam bu me tog skyed mos tshal// bram ze'i rigs kyi bu mo ste// klu yi bu mo dung skyong ma// sku mdog shel dkar 'od zer 'bar// sbrul mgo gsum gyi thod gdengs can// phyag na dung chen 'khyil ba bsnams// rtag tu sbrul 'khril nang na bzhugs// dung gi cod pan thod gdengs can// 'khor du klu sman 'bam gyis bskor// mngar gyi mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor ma bzhes// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman dang ni sna tshogs spos kyis mchod// sha bkra phol mig 'bras dang rkong pa rnams// 'jig rten gnas na zhi bar mdzod// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ byang

phyogs rgya mtsho'i pho brang chur// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs pa// me tog mdangs ldan dga' ba'i tshal// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// klu yi bu mo gzi brjid can// sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// phyag na sbrul nag rgyal mtshan bsnams// sbrul nag 'khyil ba'i nang na bzhugs// dmangs rigs kyi ni bu mo ste// 'khor du klu bran 'bum gyis bskor// mngar gyi mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor ma bzhes// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang// rtsi sman dang ni sna tshogs spos kyis mchod// sha bkra phol mig 'bras dang rkong ba rnams// 'jig rten gnas na zhi bar mdzod// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ de nas srin la 'di skad brjod do// nyon cig gdug pa klu yi bu// a pha klu dang a ma stag/ srin mo ni tshogs pa'i bu// khyod ni brag srin khra bo ste// mgo la sbal nag rmog zhu gsol// lus la sbrul nag phrag pa ma slog pa gsol// lag na rgya zor khug pa thogs// khyod ni rab tu mi bsgrungs te// glang thabs smyo 'bog khyod kyis gtong// rdo rje 'chang gi bka' nyon la// gnod pa'i sbyor ba rgyun chod cig/ chu la gnas pa'i chu srin dang// brag la gnas pa'i brag srin dang// shing la gnas pa'i shing srin dang// sa la gnas pa'i sa srin dang// de ring rngan dgas 'di long la// sngar byas gnod pa slar la rtul// da slan chad gnod pa ma byed cig/ ces nad pa'i lus zan gyis dril la/ gzugs mgo dgu pa'i khra bo gcig byas la/ 'bru yi gtor ma btang/ sran ma la phyogs bzhir bya khyung gi snying po bzlas la gtor ro// de ni byad 'grol ba'o// nas dkar mo ni nad pa'i gos la dril la mchan du gzhug/ bsnyen pa'i snying po bris la mgul du gdags so// mdos chu mig tu bskyal lo// de nas bkra shis gsol/ nad pa rung nas zan bya/ mi la byin mi rung ngo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ klu mdos kyi skabs so//// de nas srid pa pho rgyud las/ mchod pa 'di gsungs so// phud ma nyams par rin chen brdar la 'di skad ces brjod do// kye phyogs phyogs de ni pha ki na// nyi ma shar phyogs pha ki na// shar gyi dkar po spyan gcig pa// khyod kyi pha dang ma smos pa// gnam khyi dkar po spyan gcig lags// ma ni srid pa'i byan mo ste// sku ni dkar po mu tig la// bzhugs ni nyi ma'i dkyil na bzhugs// sprul pa zla ba'i zer la 'gyed// 'gro ba mi la gnya' zung byed// chibs su dkar po 'od la chibs// chibs kyi snga khong la/ shel gyi sgro ba btags// chibs kyi phyi long la/ rtsis kyi khram bam na/ gser

bkal// skye 'gro kun gyi bdag po ste// srog bdag chen po da tshur byon// 'khor du 'gong po spun brgyad 'khol// mdos bdag mdos la byon// khyod kyi thugs dam dgyes sde mo// shar gyi dkar mo spyan gcig ma// chibs su shwa ba dkar mo chibs// sku la dar gyi la'u gsol// mu tig mdzes pa'i lan phran can// g.yu yi lan phran tse re re// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i khri la bzhugs// mdos kyi phud la da tshur byon// g.yon nas sbrul smad 'khyug cing byon// srod la byol zhing tho rangs nyul// shar gyi dkar mo spyan gcig ma// sngon ni bdag dang thugs dam gcig/ da lta khyod la mchod pa 'bul// khyod kyi thugs kyi sbrul pa ni// 'gong po spun dgu'i phyag brnyan 'gyed// chibs su nyi zer zla zer bcibs// 'od kyi zhags pa rkyong zhing sdud// btsan bdud sde bzhi'i phyag brnyan 'gyed// de ring mdos bdag mdos la byon// rgyal po dpon g.yog 'khor dang bcas// mdos bdag mdos la byon// spos dud btang la dar dkar gyi g.yab mos g.yab cing/ hUM gnam rim pa bcu gsum gyi yar steng na// gnam gyi ya cho dkar po la// nyi 'phang sad kyi 'grul po che// sku la shel gyi slag pa la// mu men gser gyi kha chag can// dbu la dung gi thod tshugs bcings// sku ni cir yang ma nges te// thugs ni cir yang sprul pa 'gyed// thams cad mkhyen pa'i bdag/ mi brdzu ni dgu ru brdzu/ nang gi dro la babs tsa na// bu chung ni rol por brdzu// nub kyi bzhug la babs tsa na// rang thod rgyal por brdzu/ sbrid dang sha ra ra/ mi brdzu dgu ru brdzu// rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul dam pa mdzad// smyo 'bog brgyal nang sho ra re// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ dam las ma 'da' sdig ma byed// dus la bab po sa ma ya// kro d+ha kro d+ha ging ka ra ging ka ra/ sha ba ri sha ba ri/ ging ka ra b+h+yo/ hUM srog bdag rgyal po nyi 'phang sad// rgyal po chen po li byin har// khyod kyi thugs dam nyams shed 'gal shor re// nyes par gyur pa ci mchis pa// dkar po bcu gsum mdos kyis bskang// hUM nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sa gzhi rgya re che// ri rab lhun re sdug/ rtsi shing grangs re mang// phyogs phyogs ni pha ki na// nyi zla 'od re gsal/ de'i 'og shed na/ mkhar gcig gnam du zings se zing/ dung mkhar dkar po la/ logs bzhi dung la byas/ dkar mdangs chad de chad/ 'gram bzhi lcags la byas/ lcags 'gram khyugs se khyug/ zur bzhi mchong la byas/ mchod mkhar smug po ldems se ldem/ ka ba gzi la byas/ gdung bzhi gser la byas// kha bad g.yu la byas/ rin chen gral phyam bkram/ nyi zla gnyis kyi mthongs khung btong/ de 'dra'i mkhar gyi mthongs khung na/ shel gyi byi la 'od mdangs ya

la la/ de yi nang shed na/ khri khri gcig gnam du zengs se zeng/ dung khri dkar po bya ba la/ de'i steng shed na/ stag gdan khra bo nems se nem/ de yi thog shed ni/ rta dkar dkyus dang brengs se breng/ de'i steng shed na/ mi pho dkar po la/ g.yu yi smin ma can/ bse yi sen mo zengs se zeng/ mtshal gyi thig le can/ dung gi so thags can/ sku la ci gsol na/ dar dkar ras ka gsol/ phyed ka gser gyi slag pa gsol// dbu la ci bcings na/ dar dkar 'gying thod bcings/ mtshal gyi thig les brgyan/ stag ral g.yas na bkra// gzig shubs g.yon na 'khyug/ phyag mtshan g.yas pa na// sba lcag dkar po la/ g.yu yi lcag 'bras btags/ gnam la bskor zhing sa la rdeb// phyag ni g.yon pa na/ shel gyi zangs gri bsnams/ res 'ga' drag tu khros pa'i tshe// lcags kyi mi pho chen po la// sku la ci gsol na/ rgya byi stod kyi slag pa la/ 'bum gyi smad kyi sham bu btags// sku ma ring la bsnams// dbu la rmog zhu gangs ri gsol// phyag ni g.yas pa zangs gri bsnams// g.yon pa lcags kyi rnge'u chung bsnams// btsan bdud 'gong po pho nyar 'gyed// mchod do gser skyems dngas pa mchod// rin chen gser gyis mchod bskang ngo// dkar po bcu gsum gyi// mdos kyis khyed bskang ngo// 'khor na gnas pa'i rgyal po ni// khu le shod kyi lag dgu dang// ag ni dang ni ug ge dang// drang se dang ni gyi bad btags pa/ dung gi sgo mo gsal/ bse'i rgyan ldan kra la la/ de'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po lags/ ma he ni shwa ra hA/ ya bdud ni ming nas phyung/ mdos bdag ni mdos longs shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dzam gling ni nub phyogs na/ nor gyi ni bdag po la/ zangs mkhar dmar po la/ g.yu yi bad btags nas/ gser gyi sgo gsal bas/ g.yu yi rgyan ldan kra la la// ma hA de ba lha chen po// btsun mo u ma de bI lags// nor lha chen po'i ming nas phyung/ mdos bdag mdos longs shig byang phyogs pha ki na/ gser mkhar gru bzhi la/ kha bad g.yu yis bgyis/ dung gi rgyan ldan kra la la/ de'i bdag po ba/ tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can/ mdos bdag ni mdos longs shig/ gung gi yar steng na/ dung mkhar dkar po la/ gser gyi kha bad can/ g.yu'i rgyan ldan kra la la/ de'i bdag po ba/ shang se dang// de khod dang ni ni khod dang// nyi zla 'khor dang bcas pa ni// brgyad kyi bdun na zhungs se zhung// logs la sha rkyang brengs se breng// rgyab tu sbra sbre 'du ru ru// steng na thang dkar 'phyo zhing lding// mchod ni 'bru chang rin chen gser gyis mchod// bskang ni dkar po bcu gsum mdos kyis bskang// rgyal po dpon g.yog 'khor bcas

kyis// rmongs po bu med bu gsol cig/ dbul po nor med nor gsol cig/ nor dang srid rnams 'phel bar mdzod// rgyal po'i sku ni rin chen sku// rin chen skus ni re 'dod 'byung// rgyal po'i thugs ni mar khu'i thugs// mar khu'i thugs kyis bsam pa 'grub// lha ru mchod do dpal mdzod cig/ g.yu ru mchod do dung du 'bud// dar du 'phel lo mgon skyabs mdzod// gnod pa'i bsam sbyor ma mdzad par// bdag cag bsam pa mtha' ru phyung// dka' bar bsogs pa'i mdos chen dang// gsal bar bltams pa'i mar me dang// gser sgong g.yu sgong nyi sgong dang// rgyal po'i mnga' thang skyems phud dang// bda' bar bya ba'i zhal zas rnams// khyod la 'bul lags bzhes su gsol// sri'u gsos la rigs rgyud spel// nor phyugs spel cig nyi 'phang sad// zla ba sad kyi dus mdzod cig/ shos pa sad dang nyi 'phang sad// ma hA rA dza li byin har/ ma hA shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ dkar po shel ldan dkar po 'dis// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// rgyu mchog shel ldan dkar po 'dis// rgyal po shel ldan ru tsho la// ma ni sang ste rgyu ru yang dkar gnyis// bshos shing yid kyis sprul pa'i sras// dung gi sgo nga gcig tu byung// lo gcig 'khyud skor len pa dang// kha ru ma rdol zhabs su lug/ de nas lug tu btags pa yin// ru gnyis gyen du 'khyil ba yis// gnam lha dkar po gyen du 'degs// mig gnyis 'phred la tshig tshig blta// ma rig mun pa'i skyon la blta// thams cad gsal bar go 'byed do// sgra rnams dag par rab tu nyan// rna ba'i dbang po krong nge krong// kha mthar ro la lce myong bas// ro mchog brgya ldan gsang ba'i dbyings// sna yi dbang pos dri ma snom// lcags kyi rmig bzhi sa la 'khrab// bdud bzhi ma lus zil gyis gnon// spu ni dud lo 'khyil ba 'dis// sems can kun gyi gsos su byed// drod dang dbang po 'khor bcas pas// lha srin sde brgyad dgyes par skongs// nang cha rgyu ma gnye ma tshil// sha khrag chu rgyus pho mtshan bcas// mkhris pa glo ba mchin pa snying// mkhal la pho ba grod pa dang// sul mangs shan shan glo khrag bcas pa rnams// srog bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la// lhag ma med par 'bul lags kyi// bzung ba thong la brtsams pa shol// dkar po bya gag gsung snyan 'dis// bskang ngo rgyal po mched la bskang// bya gag 'di yi rjes shul dang// tshe lug ne seg 'khor bcas rnams// 'khor gyi srog bdag brgyad la 'bul// khyod kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ mthu rtsal ldan pa'i skyes bu khyod// thugs dang 'thad pa'i mkha' lding 'dis// bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang// bya yi pho smos pa/ gser bya ra ba tha

le lags/ a ma g.yu yi bya mo gung ma ro ne lags/ de gnyis bshos pa'i sras/ sgo nga gsum du byung ba ste/ gser sgong khra bo de/ dma' yang mi dma' ste/ bar snang khams gsum gsos// sha zan mchu gug byung/ zangs sgong dmar po ste/ mtho yang mi mtho ste/ rgya mtsho'i steng du rtol/ 'dam zan mchu le ba byung/ dung sgong dkar po de/ mi mtho mi dma' ste// ri rab kha ru brtol/ sgum thun mchu lhum byung/ sgum thun brgya ni mi dang chad ma byas/ bdud dang btsan gyis bskor// sman dang gzed kyis bskor/ bar snang khams la 'phyos te song/ mi bu rigs la phan/ res phan res mi phan// de yi nang shed na/ ze bza' bya yi rigs/ rig pa gsal dngas pas/ nyin mtshan shan yang 'byed/ dbyar dgun drod yang 'dzin// de yis mi dang chad byas so// mi yis bya gsos pas/ bya yis mi yi glud du chad/ de yi nang shed nas/ bya dkar ze dmar 'di// rin chen dung gi kha dog ldan// dang por rgyal po shel gyi bu// rtags dang btab pa yin/ zangs kyi gtsug phud do shal 'dis// srog bdag rgyal po 'khor bcas la// bskang na dgyes pa'i rkyen cha yin// bya mig mas yar bkab pa 'di// srid pa mas yar chags pa yin// bya mig dmar la dngas pa 'di// srid pa'i skye 'gro khrag gis bskyed pa yin// bya lus bum par 'dug pa 'di// ri rab lus la rdzogs pa yin// mjug ma rgya sor 'dug pa 'di// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga yin// spu nyag dkar la 'tsher ba 'di// srog chags thugs ni mar ltar bzhun// bya mchu ser la gug pa ni// bskang na gser du 'gyur ba yin// rgyal po rgyu ba'i dus tshod du// skad snyan tang tang sgrogs pa ni// lha dang skad sbyor byed pa yin// de lta bu yi mkha' lding du/ mdos 'dis thugs dam bskang ngo dgyes bar mdzod// mtshan ldan shel mdog ra dkar 'dis// rgyal po dpon g.yog 'khor bcas la// thugs dam bskang ngo gshegs su gsol// ra yi pha smos pa/ pha ni gshan ra ru ring yin// ma ni skyi ra 'gram ring yin/ bshos dang gnam gyi sras/ ra bu srin ra kham pa dang// myang ra ldan dmar gnyis su byung// bu ni dkar po gnam ru skyes// mi yi glud dang khams su 'bul// ra ru dkar la dngas ma 'dis// rgyal po'i thugs la skye shi med// mi 'gyur brtan pas skyon dang bral// ru gnyis dkar la ldem pa la// dar tshon sna lngas brgyan pa 'di// rgyal po'i ru mtshon yin par bshad// kha nas bla sgra sgrogs pa ni// don rnams 'grub par byed pa yin// lcags kyi mi bo sngon po bzhi// phyogs bzhi rgyal pos mngags pa'i rtags// spu nyag rtsub la ring ba ni// rgyal po'i bka' 'khor las la 'gyed phyir lags// ag tsom bungs dang ldan pa 'di// thabs

kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtags// sha tshil bams su che ba 'di// 'khor rnams bran du 'khol ba'i rtags// g.yas dang g.yon du snom byed cing// phri sgra drag po sgrogs pa ni// che ba'i mchil la skyug par skyugs// drag tu kha nas bla sgra sgrogs// sha ni khrag dang bsres nas gsol// bskang ngo bsgral lo srog bdag 'khor dang bcas pa mnyes par mdzod// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag slud bzhes shig/ de yang dang por mdos la spyan drangs shing snyan gsan dbab pa 'di skad do// gtsang mar sbyar ba'i bskang rdzas mang po la/ 'dir spyan drang ba ni/ phyogs bzhi 'tshams brgyad so so'i mnga' mdzad pa ni// shel ging chen po srog gi mnga' mdzad pa// khu le lag dgu dang/ ag ge dang/ ug ge dang/ drang seng dang/ shang se dang/ de khod dang ni ni khod dang// nyi zla la sogs srog bdag chen po brgyad// rang rang gi 'khor g.yog mang po'i tshogs dang bcas te/ bdag cag gi bsam pa 'grub cing/ khyed kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir/ spyan 'dren mchod pa 'bul gyi gshegs su gsol// 'khor na gnas pa'i tshogs bcas kun// spyan 'dren mchod pa 'bul gyi gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi ma hA rA dza ra tri tri sha sa mA ya s+t+waM/ badzra sa mA dza/ badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ badzra pA sha hUM/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ badzra g+haN+De hoH/ rgyal po dpon g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ mngon sum du byon par bsam mo// de nas slob dpon dang/ yon bdag 'khor bcas kyis phyag gus par 'tshal ba ni// na mo stong khams khyab par sems can don la dgongs// nga dang bdag med srid 'phrog srog la dga'// na bza' dar dkar 'jol ber gsol// khyod la dang ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// kun la khyab pas nga dang bdag tu med// zhe sdang gdug pas srog la bar chad byed// sems can kun kyang khyod la rab tu mchod// srog bdag sri rgyun khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor skyong bstan pa'i don la rab tu mos// khams gsum sems can rnams la sna tshogs gnod pa byed// skyur dang khrag gi dri tshor dpag tshad brgya khrir rgyug/ tshogs dang 'khor na gnas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gdan la gzhugs su gsol ba ni// dar dkar beg tsho dgu rim la/ za 'og bla brnyan nems se nem// de 'dra'i brjid chen gdan steng du// rgyal po bgyes par bzhugs su gsol// dung dang gser spras khri yi steng// rab mdzes srog bdag 'khor bcas bzhugs su gsol// badzra tiSh+Tha lhan/ de nas zhabs bsil ba ni/ gtsang mas sbyar ba'i chab gtsang 'di// phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil bar mdzod// swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ho \u0f85haM/ de nas pur gtsang thogs la 'di skad do// hUM 'bru bcud dam pa'i skyems

'phang 'di// kha dang mdang dang skyur ba'i ro// skyems 'phang dam pa 'di drangs pas// ljags kyi dbang po tshim par byed// 'byung ba'i bcud bsdus rin chen sna lnga'o// longs spyod lnga dag rkyen du che// 'di 'dra'i gser skyems dam pa 'di// bzhes shig srog bdag 'khor bcas bzhes// oM ma ma pUr kha hA rA dza swA hA/ khA hi khA hi/ rgyal po chen po bdag dang yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pas/ mdos dang phud du bcas pa'i tshogs ma lus pa phul ba 'di bzhes la/ bdag cag la mthu dang skyabs dang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyud spel du gsol// de nas 'di bstod do// gnam sngon po ya gi chad de chad// rin chen gser gyi nyi zla ta la la// gza' dang rgyu skar mang po sigs se sig/ lha srin na bun khu rlangs thibs se thib// kha dog sna lnga'i 'ja' tshon khyugs se khyug/ dung dkar gyi khu 'phang sha ra ra// thams cad smin pa'i char pa si li li// gtum po 'brug gi sgra chen di ri ri// 'bar ba glog gi 'od chen khyugs se khyug/ rab tu mdzes pa'i me tog sna tshogs skyes// dri bsung spos me mang po rgyun mi 'chad// ro mchog ldan pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs bkram// rnga dang rnga chen dung dang 'khar ba yi// sil snyan sgra dang pi wang sgra// glu gar rtse 'jo rol mo rnams// bla dre 'phan gdugs na bza' mdzes pa dang// nor dang bang mchod dkar po bcu gsum mdos chen dang// sna tshogs bskang ba'i rdzas rnams kun// dga' dang gus pas 'bul lags kyi// dpon g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bzhes su gsol// dri ma med pas shel ltar dag/ thugs rje chu bo rgyun ltar 'bab// nga dang bdag 'dra'i gzung 'dzin spangs// sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste// thugs rje dbang gis 'gro kun yongs la skyobs// sku la dar dkar ral ga gsol// phyag na gdug pa'i dbyug pas 'joms// chibs su dar dkar mdog ser bcibs// rin chen lta bur dgos 'dod skongs// smod cing 'phya bar gang byed pa// de la nad rnams sku 'dren cing// dar gcig tsam la phung bar byed// de 'dra'i rgyal po khyod la bstod// rin chen gshog pa gdengs pa yis// klu rnams 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// rma bya rab tu mdzes pa'i thul pas brgyan// 'gro ba ma lus phung po nying mtshams sbyor// dar dkar rab tu mdzes pa'i go zu la// g.yu phran mdzes pa'i sham thabs can// bya thul can la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor na gnas pa srog bdag brgyad// shel dang dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i sku// srog bdag dkar po brgyad la bstod// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rnams mang po yang// rang rang nus pas rgyal po'i bran du byas// sprin ltar gtibs pa de ring yas dang stags la byon// mdos bdag

mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ hUM nyi ma shar phyogs pha ki na// mkhar gcig rin chen dung gi mkhar// 'gram ni lcags 'gram sngon po legs// sgo ni rin chen bse yi sgo// bye ru 'bar ba'i gtan pa rtsal// bad ni g.yu bad sngon po la// mthongs ni nyi zla gnyis kyi mthongs// zur ni mchod zur smug po la/ baiDUr+ya g.yu yi zil pa chags// sku mkhar phyogs bzhi'i bla 'og na// mtho bar bya dkar rgod mi lding// dma' bar sa yi byi mi 'dzul// bar du mnyen po sbrul mi 'khril// logs la gzar po sprel mi 'dzeg/ de 'dra'i mkhar la mtshan gsol ba// srog mkhar she le ru 'dzod lags// nang na khri gcig khri bzang po// dung khri dkar po bya ba lags// bse yi rkang bzhi bar te bar// dar dkar klang bsten nems se nem// g.yas na rta skad lhang lhang ba// ngang dkar gser mdog bya ba lags// srab ni gser la mthur ni g.yu// stan ni za 'og dngul stan can// sha thag g.yas la tshon drub btags// sha thag g.yon na nad kyis rkyal pa btags// g.yon na khyi zug dar ma dir// nyi mig seng spar bya ba lags// shel gyi khyi la g.yu ral can// mche ba dung gi phur pa bzhis// skye 'gro thams cad rtsad nas gcod// so ni lcags kyi phur pa bzhin// zangs kyi spar shad gdengs pa yis// skad cig tsam gyis phyogs bcur phyin// mjug ma dung gi zhags pa yis// brdabs pas lha srin thams cad brgyal// ske la gser gyi a long btags// g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// dkrol bas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes// kha nas ngu zug gsum bsgrags te// dang pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'jig/ bar pas rgyal chen rigs bzhi brlag/ tha mas sa bdag gdung zhing 'bod// spu ni nyag ma re re la// sna tshogs 'od chen 'phro bar byed// dbus kyi dung khri dkar po la// srog bdag shel ging dkar po bzhugs// sku ni gangs ri chags pa 'dra// g.yu yi smin ma khyugs se khyug/ bse yi sen mo shad de shad// dung gi so bdar thems se them// sku la dar dkar ral ga gsol// dbu la brjid ldan 'gying thod bcings// rtsal chen seng ge'i kha chag can// dpa' rtsal stag gi thod ka can// rkang la g.yu ris chags 'u la// gyi men dngul gyi sgrog bu can// gser gyi sga chen mdzes pa la// rin chen g.yu yi tshar tshar can// sku la ring la lcibs shing bzhugs// stag ral g.yas la gzig shubs g.yon// spa lcag dkar po g.yu 'bras can// gnam la bskor zhing chibs la bskyod// thugs ni me ru lam mer 'bar// sku ni khro gtum drag rtsal can// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can// sku la sprin dkar slag

pa gsol// phyag na rdo rje be con bsnams// rgya gar chos kyi mtshan gsol ba// tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can// phyag na rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// rgya nag dag gis mtshan gsol ba// rgyal po chen po li dun shan gyi bya// za 'og 'phar chen slag pa gsol// bse yi mdung chen dbal ring bsnams// sum b+ha'i yul du mtshan gsol ba// sum ru 'gro than bgyi ba lags// pags bu dkar po'i slag pa gsol// phyag na dngul gyi byi la bsnams// zhang zhung yul du mtshan gsol ba// de yang srog bdag shel ging lags// sku la man tri ral ga gsol// phyag na tsan+dan be con bsnams// gtsug lag bon gyis mtshan du gsol// nyi phang sad kyi mtshan gsol ba// sku+u la dngul dkar ras ka gsol// phyag na tsan+dan dbyug pa bsnams// skye bo yongs kyis mtshan gsol ba// kar te yam pa spyan gcig pa// sku ni ma bcos dkrus mar bzhugs// phyag na ral gri stobs chen bsnams// li yi yul du mtshan gsol ba// a ka d+ha ra skyes gcig po// sku la dar dkar thul pa gsol// phyag na gshog pa'i sog le bsnams// hor gyi yul du mtshan gsol ba// ga gon gser slag can zhes bya// sku la ma ting shel gyi slag pa gsol// phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams// mon gyi yul du mtshan gsol ba// bdud kyi rgyal po sa mun rje/ dgong kha nyi ma'i zer la rgyug/ phyag na nyi zer zhags pa bsnams// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ de nas lcam mo bskul te/ hUM/ rgyal po thugs kyi dgyes sde mo// gsang ba thugs kyi yum gcig ma// sku lus shel la smin ma g.yu// so thags dung la nor bu mchong// ngag gi gsung snyan tongs se tong// gser gyi rna cha wangs se wang// mu men gur chen chi li li// zangs kyi sgrom bu khyugs se khyug/ bse yi sen mo zangs se zang/ sku la bya rgod thul pa la// rma bya 'bum gyi mdongs kyis brgyan// gser gyi skar mda'i mtha' bskor can// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i kha chag can// na bza' mdzes pa de gsol nas// sems can kun gyi srog la dga'// phyag g.yas shel gyi bum pa ru// bdud rtsi dam pa'i bcud blugs nas// gtso bo mnyes byed rnal 'byor tshe 'phel ma// phyag g.yon gser gyi zangs gri bsnams// dgra bo'i bdun rgyud rtsad nas chod// zhal gyi rlangs pa dug tu thul// mi nad sna tshogs char du 'bebs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud longs shig/ ces gser skyems gtong ngo// de nas 'khor srog bdag brgyad kyang zer/ 'gong po spun dgu la 'di skad bskul lo// shar gyi phyogs nas gshegs pa ni// rgyal po chen po khu le shong// gser gyi mi pho chen po la// lag

dgus rgyal khams yongs la khyab// la las srid dang mngal la rku// la las yul mkhar rtse nas 'bebs// la las srog gi shan pa byed// la las dbang gi lha dang 'bral// la las sgo yi lha dang 'bral// la las sgo yi nor dang 'brel// la las nyin gyi hor pa byed// la las srog gi 'jab bu byed// la las na chung skye rgyun gcod// sku la sha ba'i slag pa gsol// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud longs shig/ lho yi phyogs nas gshegs pa ni// rgyal po chen po ag ge yang// sku ni g.yu yi 'tsher bag can// za 'og sngo khra'i ber chen gsol// sngon po dar gyi 'gying thod bcings// phyag na brdeg pa'i mda' gzhu bsnams// sha la dga' zhing khrag la mos// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ nub kyi phyogs nas gshegs pa ni// rgyal po chen po u ge ni// sku ni zangs mdog dmar khra la// za 'og dmar khra'i ber chen gsol// dmar po le brgan 'gying thod bcings// phyag na lcags kyu mda' gzhu bsnams// sha dang khrag la dad re che// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ byang gi phyogs nas gshegs pa ni// rgyal po chen po brang se ni// sku ni mthing nag ljang gu la// zab slag khra bo sku la gsol// ljang gu dar gyi 'gying thod bcings// mda' gzhu zhags pa phyag na bsnams// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ shar lho'i rgyal po shang se ni// sku ni ra gan 'bar ba la// sku la gu ling ber chen gsol// thang dkar rgod kyi bya thul brtsegs// dpral na rgya long ta la la// mda' gzhu dril chung phyag na bsnams// dbu la rgod kyi dpa' mtshan can// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ lho nub rgyal po da khod ni// mu men 'khrul gyi mi bo la// dpral ba'i dbyes na spyan gcig gzigs// sngon po g.yu yi ber chen gsol// dbu+u la stag gi rmo gzhu gsol// phyag na mda' gzhu sta gri bsnams// sha dang khrag gi gri tshor na// dar cig tsam gyis stong gsum bgrod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ nub byang rgyal po ni khod ni// bye ru dmar po'i mi pho la// men gri dmar po'i ral ka gsol// zangs kyi rmo gzhu dbu la gsol// rgod kyi ldem sgro dbu la btsugs// phyag na mda' gzhu 'tshag pa'i khol ma bsnams// hab kyis skye 'gro'i sha la za// hub kyis skye 'gro'i khrag la 'thung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ byang shar rgyal po nyi zla ni// dung la dkar

po'i thod nan can// phyag na mda' gzhu lcags kyu bsnams// dar tsam sha dang khrag med na// rang la rang yang 'tshig cing 'khro// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ srog bdag brgyad kyi btsun mo yang// sku ni dar sham mdzes pa la// rin chen dung gi lan phran can// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i thul pa gsol// phyag na mda' gzhu bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ bka' 'khor mngag pa'i las byed pa// la la blon po 'gying bag can// la la skyes pa mtshon gyis 'debs// la la byis pa kyal kha byed// la la longs spyod nor rnams rku// la la thob shor dos la byed// la la bdud btsan do zla byed// la la phyogs log srog la rgol// da ni gdug pa'i skyes bu rnams// ya sangs skyes gcig man chad nas// the'u rang grong rgyu yan chad du// mdos bdag mdos long la// glud bdag glud bzhes shig 'greng mi'i glud du 'bul// dud phyugs kyi glud 'bul lo// zhes kun gyi mgo la rgod kyi ldem ru 'dzugs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ pho mdos man chad kyis bskang ba'i skabs te/ dkar po bcu gsum gsang mdos la sogs pa'i skabs so//// de nas yang skos bdag dang bcas te g.yul ngo bzlog pa 'di gsungs so// kye skos bdag chen po brgyad// mdos kyi skos la byon// shar phyogs lus 'phags po// dung ltar dang ni dkar ba la// zla gam ni dbyibs 'dra zhing// yul dang ni mi ru 'dra// che yang ni mi che ste// chung yang ni mi chung ste// gling bzhi ni kun las 'phags// dung ltar dang ni dkar ba la// shel gyi ni zil pa can// rin chen ni dung la byon// thams cad ni spyan gcig pa// 'bru dang bang ba ni rkang 'gros rnams// mdzes par brgyan pa ni 'di bzhes la// shar gyi skos bdag ni skos mdzod cig/ shar phyogs rgyal chen gyi bka' bsgyur la/ shar phyogs lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngo bzlog/ shar phyogs skos bdag gi mdos longs shig/ rgyal po'i bka' chad bzlog/ de nas srid mo zor bdag mo bskul te/ hUM gling bzhi gling mchog shar gyi lus 'phags po// lcags ri mu khyud 'das pa'i pha rol na// mun pa'i g.yung drung gling bar nang shed na// byol song nying sha nying gis za ba'i gtso mo ni// dga' mo gnyan gyi zor 'phen ma// sku la mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// mu med sngon tshar si li li// lag pa g.yas na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// g.yon na mchog gi phur bu 'dril// khyod ni zor gyi bdag mo ste// zor dang thun gyi las la brtson// sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// khyod kyis lha min g.yul ngo

zlog/ phog par rgyob cig myos byed ma// mdos 'di phar song dgab ma ngan// tshe 'di tshur mchis mna' ma za// shar phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur cig/ ces phud gtong ngo// gling bzhi gling mchog lho yi 'dzam bu gling// lcags ri mu khyud 'das pa'i pha rol na// mun pa g.yung drung gling bar nang shed na// byol song nying sha nying gis za ba'i gtso mo ni// arga gnyan gyi sman gcig ma// sku la sbrul nag go zu gsol// mu tig phreng ba'i ljon tshar can// phyag g.yas b+han+d+ha lcang lo bsnams// g.yon pa ri rab phur pa 'dril// lho phyogs lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngo bzlog/ phog par rgyob cig myos byed ma// mdos 'di phar song 'gab ma ngan// tshe 'di tshur log mna' ma za// lho phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur cig/ lho phyogs 'dzam gling sog kha na// bai DUr g.yu yi zil pa chags// 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa ni// che yang ni mi che ste// chung yang ni mi chung ste/ sog kha ni gru bzhi po// mdzes pa'i chas kyis brgyan/ gling mchog ni rgyan dang bcas/ lho yi skos bdag mdos longs shig/ lho phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur cig/ hUM gling bzhi gling mchog nub kyi ba lang spyod// lcags ri mu khyud 'das pa'i pha rol na// mun pa g.yung drung gling bar nang shed na// byol song nying sha nying za'i gtso mo ni// rak+ta gnyan gyi tsa mun tri// sku la g.yag lpags rlon pa gsol// ba glang dmar po'i ya bas bskor// phyag g.yas b+han+d+ha dmar po khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// khyod ni zor gyi bdag mo ste// nub phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur la// nub phyogs lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngo zlog/ phog par rgyob cig myos byed ma// mdos 'di phar song 'gab ma ngan// tshe 'di tshur log mna' ma za// nub phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur cig/ nub phyogs gling ni zlum po ste// rA ga dmar po'i zil pa chags// ban glang zhon pa 'khor dang bcas// ban glang spyod ni rgyab dang bcas// nub kyi skos bdag gnyis la 'bul// skos bdag ni mdos long la// nub phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur cig/ hUM gling bzhi'i gling mchog byang gi sgra mi snyan// lcags ri mu khyud 'das pa'i pha rol na// mun pa'i g.yung drung gling bar nang shed na// byol song nying sha nying gis za ba'i gtso mo ni// dre'u gdong chen mo gzer mgo bcad// sku la zhing ras khros ma gsol// bya rog lus la dred kyi mgo// bskyod na lha min kun kyang g.yo// rdo rje stangs stabs bro brdung nas// zor dang thun gyi las la brtson// lag na rtsad dang phur bu thogs// khyod ni zor gyi bdag mo ste// byang phyogs lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngo bzlog/ byang phyog rgyal chen bka' sgyur cig/ phog par rgyob cig myos byed ma// mdos 'di phar song 'gab ma ngan// tshe 'di tshur log mna' ma za// byang

phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur cig/ byang phyogs gling ni gru bzhi ste// brdzus nas skye zhing sgra yis 'chi// mdzes pa'i shing lo mang pos brgyan// byang gi skos bdag gnyis la 'bul// skos bdag ni mdos long la// byang phyogs rgyal chen bka' sgyur cig/ byang phyogs lha min g.yul ngo zlog/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ skos bdag brgyad dang zor bdag ma bzhi'i skabs so//// de nas yang tshal bzhi dar chas can bdun dang bcas pas/ g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hUM ri rab chen po lcog bzhi la/ ded dpon chen po bzhi bzhugs pa// mi 'gyur tshal dang dga' ba'i tshal// rtsub 'gyur tshal dang 'dres pa'i tshal// byang shar mtshams 'di lha yi tshal// 'khor lo chen po bcu gnyis so// sku la dung khrab dkar po gsol// dbu la shel rmog dkar po gsol// chibs su ba lang dkar po bcibs// phyag na ba dan dkar po rtse lnga bsnams// lha bran dar chas can ni bdun gyis bskor// phyag gnyis 'khor lo ral gri bsnams// chos shig lha yi ded dpon tshogs// mdos bdag mdos longs shig/ glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngo zlog/ lha rnams rgyal la lha min pham gyur cig/ do nub rnal 'byor bdag rgyal la// gnod sems sdang bar byed pa pham gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi ded dpon ni// sku la bse khrab bse rmog gsol// chibs su bse ru ru gcig bcibs// phyag na dar dmar ba dan bsnams// lha min mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor// bdud dang gnod sbyin g.yul ngo bzlog/ bdud dang gnod sbyin der pham mo// de ring rnal 'byor bdag rgyal te// sdang ba dgra dang gnod pa bgegs// de rnams de ring pham gyur cig/ de ring rnal 'byor bdag rgyal lo// bdud dang gnod sbyin ded dpon ni// sku la ci gsol na// 'bum byed stod kyi zangs khrab la// gnam lcags smad kyi sham thabs can// dbu la zangs rmog dmar po gsol// chibs su zangs kyi 'phar ba chibs// sna tshogs dar gyi ba dan bsnams// bdud dang gnod sbyin mang pos bskor// ma mo rnams dang bka' zla gcig/ ma mo rnams kyi g.yul ngo zlog/ der yang ma mo pham gyur cig/ do nub rnal 'byor bdag rgyal lo// gnod pa'i bgegs dang sdang ba'i dgra// 'di rnams do nub pham gyur cig/ der yang rnal 'byor bdag rgyal lo// ma mo rnams kyi ded dpon ni// sku la g.yu khrab sngon po gsol// chibs su zangs kyi mi pho skya ring chibs// ba dan nag po phyag na bsnams// ma mo dmar nag mang pos bskor// ya gi bdud dang gnod sbyin man chad nas// ma gi dam sri yan chad kyi// de ring ma mo'i chad pa zlog/ der ni ma tshogs dbang phyug rgyal// do nub

rnal 'byor bdag rgyal lo// mdos bdag ma mo mdos longs shig/ ces ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ded dpon chen po bzhi dang/ tshal chen po bzhi nas g.yul ngo 'gyed pa'i skabs so//// de nas rnal 'byor pa'i las byed du ma btub na/ ma mo rnams la thugs dam bskang ba 'di gsungs so// de la ma mo spyi'i rdzas la 'di rnams so// 'phan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dur khrod kyi sha khrag dang/ b+han+d+ha lcang lo'i tshogs dang/ zhal zas dang chang phud dang/ rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dang/ zhun chen gyi mar me dang/ spa ra ma ti dang/ rdza rnga dang cang te'u dang/ pi wang dang gling bu sogs 'bud pa dang brdung bar bya// gang brten pa'i sgo rnams gtsor bya/ de nas 'di skad ces spyan drang/ hUM sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// rgya gar yul gyi a g+ha ma g+ha na// dur khrod chen po so sa gling// bang so dmar po'i gzhal yas su// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// dkar mo nyi khri bdun 'bum gcig/ chos kyi sku dang rab ldan cing// 'gro ba'i don la gshegs su gsol// nag mo nyi khri bdun 'bum gcig/ chos kyi sku dang rab ldan cing// 'gro ba'i don la gshegs su gsol// smug mo nyi khri bdun 'bum gcig/ chos kyi sku dang rab ldan zhing// 'gro ba'i don la gshegs su gsol// dam can de yi bka' 'khor na// las la 'du ba'i ma mo rnams// thugs dam bskang phyir gshegs su gsol// rdza rnga cang te'u skad snyan khro lo lo// mi rkang mchog gi gling bu di ri ri// me dud spos chen du ba rgyun mi 'chad// zhing chen 'phan gdugs mang po sprin ltar gtibs// dur khrod sha khrag mang po ri ltar spungs// b+han+d+ha lcang lo mang po nags ltar gtibs// gsal ba'i mar me mang po mdangs kyang phyung// rak+ta dmar po rba rlabs chi li li// zhal zas ro mchog mang po mchod par btags// ma mo dbang phyug tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang// hUM gtso mo srid pa'i rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// dbyings kyi yum drug thugs dam bskang// rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug gi thugs dam bskang// ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi'i thugs dam bskang// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad thugs dam bskang// dbyings kyi ma mo'i thugs dam bskang// gtso mo srid pa'i rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi'i thugs dam bskang// theg chen sa yi dbang mo che'i thugs dam bskang// ri rab gling bzhi'i dbang mo che yi thugs dam bskang// rgya mtsho gling bzhi'i dbang mo che yi thugs dam bskang// khram kha stong gi dbang mo che yi thugs dam bskang// 'khor na gnas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang// nyul le nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyi thugs dam bskang// pho nya nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyi thugs dam

bskang// sman phran nyis brgya lnga bcu bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// bdud mo nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyi thugs dam bskang// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bdag cag g.yar dam gso ru gsol// dbyings kyi ma tshogs thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bskang ngo bdud mo rigs kyi thugs dam bskang// gtso mo e ka dza Ti'i thugs dam bskang// bal mo kun grags thugs dam bskang// ral gcig rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// ma mo dung mgrin ma yi thugs dam bskang// gnam gyi ye rdar ma yi thugs dam bskang// sa yi phung byed ma yi thugs dam bskang// bar gyi glog ma srin gyi thugs dam bskang// bdud kyi bu mo nag mo phung gsum dang// nag mo bkrag med ma yi thugs dam bskang// kun khyab nag mo'i thugs dam bskang// bdud mo lha mo'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang// bdud mo ma tshogs dbang phyugs tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ nag mo 'bum gyi thugs dam bskangs nas kyang// bdag cag g.yar dam gso ru gsol// bskang ngo sprul pa'i ma mo'i thugs dam bskang// gtso mo srin mo mgo dbu ral gcig ma'i thugs dam bskang// 'dra mi 'dra yi thugs dam bskang// ro shal nag mo'i thugs dam bskang// yang gab ma bzh-i'i thugs dam bskang// dkar mo dbu dgu ma yi thugs dam bskang// smug mo dbu lnga ma yi thugs dam bskang// rak+ta tsa mun tri yi thugs dam bskang// mtsho sman rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// sprul pa'i ma tshogs thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ bdag cag g.yar dam gso ru gsol// bskang ngo las byed ma yi thugs dam bskang// gtso mo gdung byed nag mo'i thugs dam bskang// gnam gshags zor ba gdong gi thugs dam bskang// gdong mo bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// dam can bse yi lha mo bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// las byed ma bzhi'i thugs dam bskang// ma mo dmar nag mang po sprin ltar gtibs// ma mo gnyen gyi thugs dam bskang// bskang ba'i gnas lnga yum gyi mkha' la bskang// bskang ba'i gnas lnga bskangs nas kyang// bshags pa'i gnas gsum tshad gyur cig/ bya ba'i las rnams 'grub gyur cig/ skong ni nyid bzhi'i mkha' la skong// dngos grub ma mo rigs bzhis stsol// ma mo srid pa'i bem chen po las/ ma mo rigs bzhi'i bskang ba'i skabs so//// de nas yang ma mo rnams las mi byed cing dam la 'du ru ma btub na/ dam rdzas gsang ba a mr-i ta bltams la/ smreng gsol zhing bshags pa 'di gsungs so// hUM ye shes lha tshogs gsan cing dgongs su gsol// ma mo mkha' 'gro gsan cing dgongs su gsol// bdag gi srid pa'i ri bo ni// de ni nyid bzhi bde mchog

lags// bdag gi dpag bsam shing bu ni// de ni ma mo'i rgyu gnas lags// bdag gi srid pa'i mdo sdud ni// de ni ma mo'i 'chags sa lags// bdag gi dbang po'i mdo sdud ni// de ni ma mo'i spyod yul lags// bdag gi dngas ma bzhi po 'di// de ni ma mo'i dam rdzas lags// bdag gi dbang po lnga po ni// 'byung ba lnga dang gnyis med yin// bskang ba'i gnas lnga de ru bskang// 'khor gyi ma mo dam tshig can// srid pa'i ma mo las mkhan ma// 'jig rten ma mo grogs kyi mchog/ srid pas bsdus pa'i dam can ma// gnyis su med pa'i las bcol 'tshal// dam tshig tshul bzhin bsrungs nas kyang// gzhan gyi dring la ma bzhes par// bdag gi las 'di 'grub par mdzod// ma bcos dbyings kyi pho brang du// ma mo rigs bzhi'i thugs dam bskang dgongs pas// sdang ba'i dgra bos ma ster ro// mnyam pa nyid kyi zhing khams su// khyod kyi spyod yul bgyi dgongs pas// bar chod rkyen gyis ma ster ro// 'gyur ba med pa'i pho brang du// gnyis su med par bskang dgongs na// bstan pa 'jig pas ma ster ro// byang chub chen po'i gshegs lam du// g.yel ba med par gshegs dgongs par// sdang ba'i dgra bos ma ster ro// bka' dang gzhung bzhin rngo ma thogs// lha la bar chod ma mchis la// dam la 'khu rngog ma mchis na// dam la gnas pa'i dam can ma// sngon gyi man ngag phog pa \u0f84bzhin// las la bab po mthu ma chung// dus la bab bo g.yel ma mdzad// srog la bab po thugs ma ring// bcol ba'i las 'di ma mdzad na// dgung la shar ba'i nyi ma la// lho sprin smug pos sgrib la khad// klung du 'dril ba'i chu bo la// klung 'dor sgyogs kyis bcus la khang// rgyun du 'ong ba'i chu bo la// mi gtsang dug gis bslad la khad// dus su skyes pa'i ha lo la// rkyen gyi sad kyis bsad la khad// rdo rje brtan pa'i ri bo la// gti mug gzong gis btab la khad// shes rab gsal ba'i nyi ma la// bag chags grib mas sgrib la khad// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la// ma nongs stabs la bcad de mchi// tshe rabs snga ma'i las 'phro dang// 'jig rten 'di yi dam tshig gnyis// mthun na bdag gi las 'di mdzod// mi mthun zhe sdang phyir ma g.yel// bsten pa thams cad bsgrubs pa lags// smreng ba thams cad bos pa lags// mchod skyon yang pa thams cad bcol ba lags// srin po gdug kyang smreng na gdung// srin mo gdug kyang bos na 'ong// skye shi'i lam yang bzlog na zlog/ sra ba'i brag kyang brkos na phed// rba drag klung yang bcad na chod// 'khor ba'i lam yang bkag na khegs// rdo rje'i sku yang bshig na shig/ tshegs la ma gzigs las 'di brjod// bskang

chags pa med par bu lon gnyer/ bsad pa med par srog la rgol// 'khor ba'i lugs las kho yis bzlog/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kho yis bshig/ rgyal ba'i pho brang kho yis bshig/ byang chub rgyun lam kho yis bcad// bdag gi gzugs kyi phung po 'di// sol ba'i sdong po 'gyel pa 'dra// bdag gi rnam par rig pa ni// me stag babs te shi kha 'dra// bdag gi dbang po lnga po ni// ston kha'i me tog rnying pa 'dra// sdug gi bu gcig 'dir 'bod do// 'phong gi bu gcig 'dir smreng ngo// pham 'phang yang pa'i ming po 'dir snyeg go/ dmangs kyi bu gcig 'dir sgron no// ngas ni ma nyes yogs ka myur du chod// pham pa'i stag ma myur du zung// sing ge brjod dang ma bral cig/ rgod po gshog pa ma bcag cig/ stag gu ris dang ma bral cig/ bdud rtsi rgyun lam ma gcod cig/ rdo rje gzong kha ma snyil cig/ bstan pa dbu 'phang ma smad cig/ me tog sad kyis ma gsod cig/ gsang ba'i gnas lnga ma spangs shig/ rgyal ba'i bka' rgyud ma bcad cig/ bstan pa 'dzin pa'i ma sring tsho// nyid kyi che ba ma smad par// bstan pa gnyen po myur du srungs// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni// bdag dang 'ga' las ma gtogs pa// rnal 'byor kun kyang dam mi bsrung// phred thogs yongs kyang srog mi 'dzin// sngon gyi zhal bzhes gang lags pa// rang srog bsrung phyir rang dam srungs// rba klong 'khyil pa'i chu bo la// don ma mchis par ma 'chongs shig/ nam mkha' ye nas stong pa la// don ma mchis par ma gshegs shig/ ched la ma bab las 'chol la// srog la babs kyang ma gshegs shig/ gnad ma shes par stong 'bod kyang// ched mi cha bar ma bzhud cig/ shis ngan rgyu mtshan mi shes phyir// gzhung tshugs go rim mi shes par// rang nyid tom tom dkrug pa la// brtul zhugs phrin las ma mdzad par// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la// skong ni mkha' bzhin dbyings la skong// 'gegs ni shes shi sa'i 'brub khung kyang pa'i 'khrul khungs 'gegs// gcod ni 'khor ba'i rgyun lam gcod// snying srog brtan pas las 'di mdzod// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ smre ngag mdongs gsol gyi skabs so//// hUM mi skye mi 'gag chos kyi dbyings// skyon gyis ma gos gzugs kyi sku// skyon dang nyon mongs mi mnga' yang// rna 'byor dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir// sku la gshegs bzhugs mi mnga' yang// sprul pas 'gro don mthar phyung zhig/ lus ngag bskang du gyur pa rnams// khyed
