kyi 'dul skal de lags kyis// phrin las myur du mdzad du gsol// chu bo klong chen 'byung ba la// lam du re nas ma gshegs shig/ gshegs dus lags kyang phyag tu gshegs te mchis// nam mkha' stong pa'i bar snang

la// yul du re nas ma gnas shig/ gnas kyang ma mo'i gzhal las min// gangs ri 'grims pa'i ma mo yang// g.ya' lo spang la ma gshegs shig/ gshegs kyang rten du mi 'gyur ro// dam la gnas pa'i skyes bu yang// dmigs pa med par mi sgrub kyi// 'dzam bu gling bzhi yul min gyi// kun gzhi gnas mchog ma spangs shig/ srid pa thams cad rkyen min gyi// dbang po lnga rkyen ma spangs shig/ srid pa gsum po las min gyi// skyo med byang chub ma spangs shig/ 'khrug go cog kyang rkyen min gyi// rak+ta'i rba klong ma spangs shig/ 'grogs so cog kyang grogs min gyi// ming po grogs mchog ma spangs shig/ 'phyo ba'i nya mo ma bsad la// lding ba'i bya rgod ma bzung na// sbas pa'i sems nyid ma btsal na// brjid pa'i seng ge ma bsad la// mgyogs pa'i pho nya ma bzlog na// re ba'i bu gcig sun ma phyung// 'khor ba'i ming po thag ma bcad// bsgrub pa'i ming po sma ma dbab// stang mar 'dzin na bdud kyang rung// bcol na nyan na dgra yang rung// bsgrub pas 'grub na 'dre yang rung// dam la gnas na gnyen kyang rung// dmigs shing bsngos pa ma mchis kyi// srid pa gsum la gnas pa dang// 'jig rten gsum gyi skos byed rnams// gang gi mdzad kyang ma tshig ste// 'di dang phyi ma gnyis char gyi// grogs kyi mchog tu khyed bsngo yis// dmigs pa'i las 'di 'grub par mdzod// brnag pa'i las 'di mthar byung zhig/ bdag gi gnad la ma bab na// ma mo gnad la ci ste bor// bdag gi srog la ma bab na// sdig pa'i dmod mo ci ste bor// bdag gi yid la ma bab na// lus sems 'ben du ci la 'dzugs// bdag gi ngag la ma bab na// khro bo'i nga ro ci ste sgrogs// bdag gi dam la ma bab na// shi srog gnad la ci ste bor// de ltar yin nam min pa ni// bdag gi lus las tshur ltos dang// lus ni zla zhing rnying pa 'dra// bdag gi bkrag la tshur ltos dang// bkrag ni mun pa'i grib ma 'dra// bdag gi mdangs la tshur ltos dang// mdangs ni me tog rnying pa 'dra// bdag gi sems ni me stag shi kha 'dra// kun gzhi rgya mtsho gting 'khrugs 'dra// dbugs ni mi rgan shi kha 'dra// de ltar lags sam ma lags pa// bden tshigs lags kyi srog la ltos// shar na bzhugs pa'i dam tshig can// gzigs sam ma mo bdud mo'i tshogs// ma tshogs bdud mo spyan ma brtul// gsan nas snying sran ma che zhig/ dam srog gzung phyir rdzas la byon// ltar ma gzung phyir phrin las mdzod// lho nas bzhugs pa'i sprul pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// ral pa sngon po gsigs tsam na// lho sprin smug po gtibs pa bzhin// rtsal dang ldan par las la byon// nub na bzhugs pa'i

las byed ma mo zangs mdog ma// zangs kyi ral pa bsigs pa dang// thams cad 'dus pas khrag nad dgra la gtong// rtsal dang ldan par las la byon// byang na bzhugs pa'i ma mo ni// dbyings kyi ma mo srid pa'i byol bzlog las la brtson// thams cad 'dus pa stong dang rtsa brgyad de// sa dgu'i gting na 'khor 'dus la// srid pa gting nas zhig la khad// ma btsun thugs kyis bzod lags sam// bdud mo dang ni nyul le ma// pho nya dang ni sman phran dang// phung byed chen mo khyed rnams kyis// byang gi las mkhan lcags sgrog ma// ral pa lcags la phur bu'i so// rtsal dang ldan par gshegs su gsol// de ltar dam la ma gshegs na// gnod sbyin stobs ldan nag po yis// bskal pa gting nas dkrug par mchi// rgya mtsho gting nas skam ste mchi// de ltar ma mos dam tshig srungs// rang dam rang gis ma bsrungs na// nyi zla gnyis kyang thang la lhung// seng ge brjid dang ma bral cig/ dkon mchog dbu 'phang ma smad cig/ stag gu ris dang ma bral cig/ ming po bdag gi ltar ma zung// brag bar rus sbal bzhin du bdag bsgrub kyi// rdo rje 'dam bu bying du re// byang chub sems dang bdag ldan gyi// bskal pa mgo mjug ma ldog cig/ dgra bo dam nyams ma thul na// bdag ni mtha' 'khob yul du 'khyams// phrin las bcol ba chud ma gsan// thugs dam ma tshogs dbang phyug bskang// trag rak+sha ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu snying kha raka mo b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha mu tra mA ra ya/ phye thum ril kha thuM/ rmugs dgra bo khams rmugs/ ma ma snying kha raka ma ma rak+sha// ma ma raka mo dun b+h+yo/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ smreng gsol ba dang smreng bshags pa dang smreng ga bton te bskang ba'i cho ga'i skabs so//// de nas ma mo rnams las la 'du ru nges kyang ma btub na// ma mo srid pa'i gting nas dkrug pa ni/ phrin las kun gyi gnya' non no// de yang dur khrod nas pho mo gang yang rung ba la/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i ro btsal la/ ro de'i snying gar/ gang byed pa'i snying po shing shun la bris la gdags/ de ltar gnod sbyin gyi sku yi dkyil 'khor ro la bris/ ma mo'i snying po la gnod sbyin gyi snying po gzhug tu btags la/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na thugs dam la 'byon par 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor ma sub par ro bshas la/ rdzas rnams mchod par 'bul/ snying gi nang du ma mo'i srog snying bcug la// gnod sbyin gyi thugs kar gdags/ gnod sbyin dang ma mo gnyis ka la mchod pa drag tu dbul/ des bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ gnad la ma mo gnod sbyin gyi sku yi dkyil 'khor du dbab pa'i skabs so//// de nas ma mo rigs

bzhi la bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hUM dbyings kyi ma mo'i gtso mo ni// srid pa yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// srid pa cham la 'bebs mdzad ma// bzhugs ni sa dgu'i steng na bzhugs// sa dgu'i steng na bzhugs tsam na// klu rgyal 'bum la zhal bskos mdzad// spyan ni bar snang mkha' la 'phyo// zhal ni rnal 'byor yongs la gzigs// thugs ni dam tshig can la dgongs// dung dung spyugs pa'i brda glu len// srid pa cham la 'bebs mdzad ma// sku la rma bya'i thul ba gsol// phyag na mi srang chen po bsnams// grogs su gnod sbyin mang po brten// las su srid pa khram la 'debs// srog chags mang po srang la 'jal// keng rus sha khrag mang po lto ru gsol// nga dang bdag tu blta bas 'jig rten las la 'bul// 'khor 'dul chen mo gshegs su gsol// zhes thugs dam bskang ngo// hUM khram kha stong gi dbang mo che// sku ni mi bzad 'bar ba la/ phyag na bdud kyi khram shings bsnams// mthing nag ber chen sku la gsol// rak+ta chags byed thig le spyan// bdud mo nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyis bskor// mgyogs byed bka' yi pho nya mo// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// ri rab gling bzhi'i dbang mo che// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// zhe sdang ral pas sa gzhi khebs// ser nag 'bar ba'i na bza' la// g.yu bran mdzes pa'i kha chag can// phyag na zhing chen rgyal mtshan bsnams// 'khor lo mtshon chas dgra sdang 'joms// bdud 'dul chen mo 'jigs byed sku// 'khor du pho nya nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyis bskor// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// theg chen sa yi dbang mo che// sku mdog ser nag 'bar ba la// na bza' rin chen btso ma gsol// mu men mdzes pa'i kha chag can// g.yas na dar nag ru mtshon bsnams// g.yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// sman phran nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyi bskor// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// rgya mtsho gling gi dbang mo che// sku ni ljang nag 'bar ba la// g.yu yi lan phran thor tshugs can// g.yas na sbrul nag ru mtshon 'phyar// g.yon na sdig pa mgo dgu bsnams// nyul le nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyis bskor// ma mo dmar nag mang pos gtams// gdug pa 'dul mdzad ma mo mang pos bskor// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// dbyings kyi ma mo'i thugs dam bskang// ma tshogs dbang phyug thugs dam bskang// mi mthun gdug pa'i dgra bgegs rdul du rlog/ hUM bdud mo kun gyi gtso mo ni// e ka dza Ti gu ya gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// ma tshogs bdud kyi lcam mo ste// dbu yi ral pa thor tshugs gcig tu 'khyil// mi bzad dug gis kun

bskul te// mthing nag ral pas sa gzhi yongs su khebs// bse yi sen mo zangs se zang// dung gi mche gtsigs thams se tham// mthing nag go zu sku la gsol// chibs su bdud rta nag po chibs// g.yas na tsit+ta'i phreng ba bsnams// g.yon na ltas ngan spyang mo bsnams// bdud mo mang po 'o dod cho nge rdung// bskal pa'i khrag mtsho khol ma'i rba klong 'khrug/ dur khrod gnas na shin tu mi bsgrungs te// mi khrag rta khrag mang po'i mtsho rnams chi li li// rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyis gdung nas bskul ba'i tshe// mchi ma khrag tu 'dzag cing sdang dgra 'dul// mthun pa'i dam rdzas mang pos thugs dam bskang// srin po'i thod pa bam ril mkhar du brtsig/ sha khrag dmar gyi ar+g+ha mtsho ltar 'khyil// 'khor ba chags pa gnas nas stongs par byed// ma mo kun gyi gtso mo bdud mo'i tshogs// bskang ngo mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// sku ni ser nag chen mo la// mthing nag ral pas sa gzhi yongs su khebs// chibs su cang shes bong bu chibs// sku la dar nag ber chen gsol// g.yas na bdud kyi khram bam bsnams// g.yon na sho rde'u dkar nag 'grems// sngo dmar nad kyi rkyal pa g.yon na btags// g.yas na sna tshogs tshon gyi gru gu btags// ris su bcad cing bdud mo dam la sdud// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting du skems// bdud 'dul lha mo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang// hUM mi bzad lha mo tshogs kyi gtso mo ste// ral gcig rgya mtsho bskal pa'i me 'bar ma// lha chen tshangs pa brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// nyi zlar sprul nas dbu yi rgyan du bcings// shri yang shwa ri ma tshogs dbang phyug ma// rgyal mo brgyad cu rtsa lnga'i gtso mo ste// srid pa yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// mi srun gdug pa 'dul ba'i bud med khyod// khrag mtsho dmar po'i nang na bzhugs// shrI yang shwa ri dpal gyi yum gcig ma// kha mig dgu ni rgya mtsho'i gting du bstan// mon mo gdug pa'i tshogs kyi bka' blon mdzad// srin po pho mo mang po grogs mdzod cing// bdud kyi yum gcig kha 'bar ral pa bsigs// khrag mtsho'i klong nas me za brag gyon ma// rgya ri skye ser rdo rje kha 'bar rkan sgra can// le bdud shar gyi mthu mo che// dkar le shags kyi bshan pa mo// smug nag chen mo rdo rje sman// tsha ba shod kyi rgyal khams rgyal mo ste// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong na// rak+ta dkar gyi dri snom ma// dpag bsam shing la mnga' mdzad lha mo nam gru ma// smug nag ma mo mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// bal mo gdug pa'i ma tshogs ni// sku ni mthing nag chen mo la// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan// mi lpags

g.yang gzhi go zu la// sbrul nag stong gi gar sha la// stag gi sham thabs dkris pa las// thal chen khrag dang zhag gi zo ris can// seng ldeng phur bus skye shi rtsad nas gcod// gnam sa bar snang gsum nas phrin las myur mdzad ma// gnam gyi ye 'dar chen mo ste// chibs su sol ba'i bya khyung chibs// ral pa mun nag sprin ltar gtibs// sol ba'i bud med 'bum gyis bskor// che zhe bar ma'i glog ma srin// ser nag gdug byed las brgya ma// chibs su lcags kyi kang ka mgo dgu chibs// rol du dug sbrul nag po khrid// kha nas dug gi skyog mda' 'phen// ser nag ma mo'i dbus nas 'gying// 'dir byon rnal 'byor las mdzod cig/ che zhe sa yi phung byed pa// khrag gi bud med ral pa can// mi mgo rlon pas sku la brgyan// mi bzad dbugs kyi mnga' mdzad ma// chibs su zangs kyi ske le chibs// dmar nag ma mo 'bum gyis bskor// bdud mo tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang// bskang ba'i mthun rdzas mang po ni// brjod kyis mi lang mtha' yas mchog/ ma tshogs bdud mo'i thugs dam bskang// hUM sprul pa'i ma mo'i gtso mo ste// srin mo chen mo mgo 'phyangs ma// sku ni ser nag chen mo la// khrag gi ral pas sked sor sleb// spyan gnyis nyi zla shar bzhin ta la la// yas kyi mche gtsigs brang gi sle'ur zug/ mas kyi mche gtsigs smin ma'i dkyus su zug/ g.yas kyi nu ma g.yon gyi 'phrag la gzed// zhing chen tsit+ta zhal du gsol// dur khrod ro shun gos su gyon// chibs su dur khrod ce spyang chibs// rtag tu dur khrod dkyil na bzhugs// srin mo 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor// sha dang khrag tu bsres nas skom du 'thung// srin mo gdug pa'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang// ma mo chen mo dkar mo dbu dgu ma// sku la dar dkar la'u gsol// gser gyi sbal lcong mdzes pa'i kha cag can// rin chen thod gdengs thor tshugs can// phyag na gser sbrul gdug pa bsnams// klu sman 'bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor// ma mo chen mo smug nag dbu lnga ma/ dbu lnga phyogs bzhir gzigs shing khams gsum sgrol// klu rgyal yul du nam gyi gung la gshegs// klu srin gdug pa mang po 'khor du 'khol// 'dir byon rnal 'byor las mdzod cig/ ma mo chen mo shrI tsa mun tri// dpal chen he rus mngag pa'i pho nya ma// grub pa'i ma mo dmar nag spyan gsum khro gnyer can// bzhugs ni khrag mtsho mang po'i dkyil na bzhugs// sha chen khrag la longs spyod cing// sbal pa nag po'i spa ru bsnams// sngon mo gru gus dgra bos yan lag 'ching// tshe srog snying 'byin ma mo bye ba 'bum// dur khrod sha khrag gsol zhing rkang gi gling bu 'bud// khrag gi ral pa bsig pas glu bran mang po bran du

khol// dur khrod ma mo shrI tsa mun tri la bskang// srog med mdangs bzhis thugs dam bskang// mtsho sman rgyal mo chen mo ni// sku ni mthing nag chen mo la// sku la sbrul nag thul pa gsol// sngon mo khro gnyer ral pa can// yang na rma bya'i thul pa gsol// gsal byed dngul gyi me long ta la la// g.yas na sbrul zhags khra bo bsnams// g.yon na g.yu yi sdig pa mgo dgu bsnams/ klu rgyal 'bum gyi lcam gcig ma// bskal pa'i khrag mtsho khol ma yis// sdang ba'i dam nyams dgra bo la// klu nad zha grum mdze nad thong// bskang ngo srog med mdangs bzhis thugs dam bskang// de nas gdong mo bzhi dang/ bse ba ti'i bdag mo bzhi la sogs/ gsang ba'i ma mo rnams la bskang ngo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo rigs bzhi bskang ba'i skabs so//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ ma mo rnams kyi rang rang gi las dang/ gnas dang mthun rdzas dang/ de rnams kyi srog gi snying po bstan pa 'di gsungs so// dbyings kyi yum drug gi gnas ni ri rab kyi rtse shing yongs 'du+u sa brtol bya ba'i nang du bzhugs so// sprul pa byed pa ni sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa bzhin no// ma mo de rnams kyi blta ba ni/ snang ba rang bzhin gyis stong par blta/ kun rdzob tu bem pa'i shes par blta/ phrin las ni srid pa mo 'khor du bsdus nas 'khol te/ de bzhin ma mo drug ka ste/ de'i phyir dbu gsum gsum du byung ba'o// de'i mthun rdzas ni dpe chung dang mthun/ dam rdzas ni b+han+d+ha lcang lo dang/ tsit+ta'i phreng ba dang/ zhing gi 'phan gdugs dang/ sha khrag gi gtor ma mang po dang/ dar sna tshogs pa brtsegs pa'i gur ro// de rnams kyi dam tshig ni// sngags kyi 'khon dang/ dam tshig nyasam pa rnams la bka' chad kyis gcod cing/ dam tshig pa rnams la srung skyob byed pa'o// kho rang gi ngo bo nyid ni 'ja' tshon lta bu'i sku'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyang/ sangs rgyas rigs lnga'am 'byung ba lnga las grub pa skad zer kyang/ de ltar ni ma yin te/ 'byung ba lnga'i rtags su sku mdog sngon po ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi nang snod bcud 'byung ba lnga las grub pas// de'i rtags su bstan pas na rtag pa'i rgyal mo zhes bya'o// de rnams kyi ngo bo ni/ sku me long nang du gzugs brnyan bzhin gnas so// ye shes kyi rje mo bcu bzhi ni// de rnams kyi blta ba ni rje ltar gong ma rnams la blta/ rang gi rig pa ye shes kyi sems kun gzhi'i rgyun dngos po rig pa tsam du brtags nas/ zhing ni 'byung ba lnga las grub pa'o// de rnams ni gong ma la rje mo ltar blta'o// de yang bcu bzhi'i nang na/ nyi zla stong gi thod phreng gis srid pa 'cham la 'bebs pas/ 'dod chags kyi rgyal mo des srid pa pho mo skye ba'i rgyun cham la

phab bo// phra men rgya mtshos skos btab ste// ma mo bcu bzhi gtso mor dbang bskur bas/ de ni jo mo'i yang jo mo/ dbyings kyi yum drug gis kyang dbang bskur bas/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo dang khyad med de/ dbyings kyi yum drug la jo mor blta'o// las skal du ni ma mo kun 'khol ba'o// mthun rdzas ni dpe chung dang mthun no// gsang ba'i dam rdzas ni sna tshogs snying sna dang/ dur khrod kyi re rdzas kun mthun no// blta ba'i mtshan ma 'dul ba'i gnyen po kun/ dbu gsum phyag drug khro bo rdul snyed kyi bka' nyan par blta'o// srid pa cham la 'bebs pa bka' bsgo ba bzhin nyan pas/ ma mo nyi shu yongs dus mtha' nas kyang dus mkha' nas bsrung mtshams kyis bskal ba 'di 'das na/ dmyal ba mi yi dwags su 'gyur te/ de ni tshe tshad med do// dam tshig ni bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas pa'o// sman mo rnams ni mi'i rgyu+u ma dang nang khrol rnams la dga' ste de ni dam rdzas so/ mthun pa'i bskang rdzas ni/ gnam la lding ba dang/ sa la 'dzul ba'o// gnas ni ri rab kyi rmang na gnas so// lta ba ni dpal chen po lta bu gcig la dbang byed kyi rje bo lta bu gcig tu bltas nas/ bka' bsgo ba nyan no// dam tshig ni mchod cing brten la dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsrung ba'i rnal 'byor gyi bka' byed pa'o// las skal ni nyin mtshan med par sha khrag la dga' ba dang/ gnod pa sna tshogs byed pas gnod sbyin mo zhes bya'o// de yang bya ba mo dang byed pa po gnyis kyis/ de rnams gdug pa can 'dul dka' bar gzigs nas/ ye shes lha'i tshogs la gsol ba btab pa/ rngam khro gtum pa drug cu rtsa brgyad 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// ha ha zhes sgrogs gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul mdzad pa// drug cu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi dus la bab kyi rngam pa'i sgra phyung zhig/ 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rngam pa'i mtshon cha yis// bka' las 'das pa rnams kyi snying bsreg mgo lus phraul// zhes gsol ba btab pas/ des 'dul bar dam bcas so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo dang rang gi dam tshig dang/ lta ba so sor bstan pa'i skabs so//// de nas ma mo rnams kyi bskang ba'i le'u las/ gsang ba thugs kyi bskang ba dang/ sku yi thugs dam bskang ba ni/ spyir bskang ba dang sger sgos bskang ba 'di gsungs so// spyir bskang ba la yang rnam pa bdun te/ gsang ba mdos kyis thugs dam bskang ba dang/ ma mo spyi bsgrub chen pos thugs dam bskang ba dang/ rta chen po sgo bzhis thugs dam bskang ba dang/ bam mtshan dang ldan pa la/ spos chu dang gur gum gyi chu gtsang mas bkrus te/ gos dang rgyan gser g.yu la sogs pas brgyan pas bskang ba dang/ mdangs bzhis skong ba ni/ me long gi

mdangs dang/ rma bya'i sgro mdongs dang/ chu mig dngas ma'i mdangs dang/ me dmar gyi mdangs bzhis bskang ba dang/ rnal 'byor pas yum mtshan dang ldan pa la sbyar ba'i byang chub sems kyis bskang ba dang/ dngas ma lnga yis bskang ba ni/ me yi dngas ma me shel dang/ chu'i dngas ma chu shel dang/ khrag gi dngas ma bud med kyi mtshal chen dang/ sems kyi dngas ma khu ba dang/ sbu gu spu skra'i dngas ma dang/ za 'og ber gyis bskang ba'o// de ni ma mo spyir bskang ba'o// kun kyang de bdun gyis mi bskang ba ni med do// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo spyir bskang ba'i skabs so//// de nas yang ma mo rigs bzhi'i sgos bskang la/ der ma 'dus pa med pas/ de yi bskang ba'i rdzas mdos bstan pa 'di gsungs so// dang por dbyings kyi ma mo'i bskang rdzas bstan pa ni/ rma bya'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dar mthing nag gi 'phan ring dang/ bse phor mtshan ldan du khrag sna tshang ba dang/ sna tshogs snying sna'i phye ma dang/ rA ga'am mthing ga'i lcang lor phud gtsang ma dang/ ma bdud sha chen gyi lang ling dang/ lug nag rgya sol po dang/ lug smug rgya sros pos thugs dam bskang ngo// dar sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i ljang bu/ lus tshad brgya rtsa brgyad kyis thugs dam bskang ngo// de ni dbyings kyi ma mo'i bskang rdzas so// bdud mo'i rigs kyi bskang rdzas ni/ b+han+d+ha lcang lo mtshan ldan dang/ tsit+ta dang ni rak+ta dang/ snel gri'i snying dang thod pa dang/ klad pa dang/ shun chen gdugs dang/ sha chen gtor ma dang/ ngang pa'i sha dang/ dug sna tshang ba dang/ 'ug pa'i snying dang mig 'bras/ phag pa'i snying/ skyes pa dar ma grir shi ba'i thod pa dang/ bud med mtshal chen gzhag par bya// nal bu'i sha khrag 'bras bu dang/ me dud spos chen dar nag ru mtshon dang/ khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug cing keng rus sha khrag ri ltar spungs nas zas su za bas bskang ngo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ bdud mo rigs kyi bskang rdzas so//// sprul pa'i ma mo'i bskang rdzas ni// spang yang ra sha smug gu shel mig dang// sngon mo lto ser shel mig dang// dkar po shel mig smin g.yu dang// nag mo lto dkar shel mig dang// u pa ta yang de dang mtshungs// gsal ba'i me long smos pa'i snying sna dang// rak+ta phud gtsang na chung dar ma'i zhing g.yab dang// byi tri pu tra lo lnga pa yi sny-ing// bskang ba'i rdzas de bsog par bya// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ sprul pa'i ma mo'i bskang rdzas so//// las byed ma mo rnams kyi kun kyang mthun zhing 'di'i khongs su 'gro// ma mo srid pa'i bem chen po las rigs bzhi'i ma mo bskang rdzas bstan pa'i skabs so//// de nas ma mo rnams la mchod bstod bskul ba 'di gsungs so// hUM ma

bcos dbyings nas lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i sku// gsal ba'i dbyings phyug gsang ba'i yum// ma bcos lhun rdzogs gsal ba'i sku// rang bzhin 'od gsal ye med gsal// khams gsum rdzogs pa'i mkha' dbyings nas// skye ba med par sku 'khrungs ma// rang bzhin gsal ba'i dbyings phyug ma// rdo rje thogs 'chang 'phrul mo che// rims nad kun gyi mnga' bdag mo// sa lcam spel dbyings kyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// khrag skyugs nad kyi mnga' bdag mo// rims nad tsha ba khyod kyis 'phri// sku ni 'ja' tshon lnga yi sku// ye shes lnga ldan dbyings phyug ma// dur khrod tsha chen skar ma'i klong nas grub// gling bzhi'i rgyal mo rab 'phags ma// 'ja' tshon lnga yi khang pa na// 'gram bzhi me la logs bzhi chu// khang mig gcig la skar khung bzhi// thabs chen shes rab rdzogs pa'i rtags// mi 'gyur sa gzhi'i steng du brtsigs// sprin gyi bral la nam mkha'i phub// 'byung ba lnga yi khang chen na// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i sku ni ldem bag 'phrul gyi sku// phyag na rdo rje'i thog chen 'bebs// thog la mnga' mdzad 'phrul mo che// yid bzhin nor bu gtsug na 'bar// gser gyi gtsug phud 'phrag la bkal// dpral ba'i dbyes na nyi zla gsal// bskang ba'i mthun rdzas khyod la 'bul// dpal 'bar nyi zla stong gis gzigs pa'i sku// mkha' la 'phyo zhing dbyings na gsal// mkha' 'phyo dbyings gsal bdud 'joms ma// chibs su bdud rta zangs lag chibs// gser gyi zhags pa phyag na bsnams// gser mkhar zhags pa 'debs yang 'bebs su byon// dza pa pe mi ta mri ta mri ta d+h+ri hUM ma ma dza/ che zhe chen mo g.yu yi lan phran can// mkha' dbyings bde chen yangs pa nas// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can// ye shes dbyings nas sku 'khrungs te// rtog dang bral ba'i dbyings phyug ma// lhun grub rgyal mo bde bar gshegs pa'i sku// thugs dam dbang gis gshegs su gsol// ma g.yel 'od phung 'khyil ba na// shes rab 'bar ba'i dbyings phyug bzhugs// snang ba thams cad 'khrul pa ste// 'khrul pa med par ye shes gsal// 'khrul pa nyid ni ye shes te// mi dmigs 'khrul par mi rtog na// 'khrul pa ye med sangs rgyas te// rnam dag mkha' dbyings gsal dkyil na// 'od phung mi dmigs ye shes gsal// 'khrul pa ye nas mi dmigs pas// mi dmigs pa ni chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid mi 'gyur skye ba med// g.yu yi lan phran skye med 'khrungs// skye ba med par sku 'khrungs kyang// sems can las kyis thugs dam bskang// dam tshig mi mda' brda dang bcas// thugs dam gnyen po brda yis bskang// rims nad gtong ba'i dbang mo che// za byed kri sna'i gling

shed na// glo blo yang sub nad kyi mnga' bdag mo// nad ni glo blo yang sub za byed gtong// sku mdog dkar mo spyan mig dmar// dbu la thor tshugs mang pos brgyan// sku lus gcig la spyan mig gsum// sku gsum lhun rdzogs mi 'gyur rtags// g.yu yi lan phran zar bur 'dzag/ zar bu'i gseb nas tsha tsha 'khrug/ mkha' lding dkar mo'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// dmigs kyis thugs dam mi bskang du// me tog kun rgyas gling shed nas// rgyal po rdo rje ston po la// glo blo yang sub zad byed nad kyis btab// dga' rab dpal gyi brtsig pa yis// dkar mo'i mig brgya'i thugs dam bskang// nad dang dal kha sgyur cing dengs// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ thugs dam bskang ba ni/ dkar mo g.yu yi lan tshar can la mnyes mchod 'bul ba'i skabs so//// de nas las byed thigs pa rab zags la bskang ba'o// mkha' la gsal ba'i 'od dkyil nas/ nyag gcig mi pham sku bzhugs te 'od phung dkyil na nyag gcig bzhugs// phyag la lcags kyi 'khor los gtams// shangs la zla ba brgya yis gtams// sku la khrag gi na bun 'thul// dkar mo brgya yi las byed ma// srid pa rnams kyi yang steng na// nyi zla 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang na bzhugs// sku yi bongs la dpag tshad brgyad// spyan nas khrag dang zhags chu 'babs// zhabs la 'khor lo stong gis gtams// 'khor lo'i stengs nas skar mda' gtang// spyan gyi dkyil nas 'brug chen 'gyu// dar nag gur chen 'og dkyil na// dkar mo brgya yi las byed mdzad// bdud rtsi'i thigs pa phyag las 'dzag/ bzhogs phyed nad dang dreg nad gtong// dreg nad gtong ba'i dbang mo che// khra hor rtsal pos thug dam bskang// pha yis rtsal byin mchu gug zlum// ma yis rtsal byin brang rus rno// zhang pos rtsas byin gsod la dga'// sder mo zangs sder mig rtsa dmar// mngag pa'i las la thogs chags med// thigs pa rab zags thugs dam bskang// thugs dam sku la mi bskang du// rgyal po 'ba' la bsnyung ba la// 'bar ba brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang// gzhogs phyed rims nad dal kha sgyur// mu sa dza hUM se shu dza/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ las byed ma mo thigs pa rab zags ma'i skabs so//// mu men g.yu'i go lcog can la bskang ba 'di gsungs so// kha la rab 'bar mthu mo che// mu men g.yu yi go lcog can// ye nas kha rgyal khyab pa'i sku// gsang ba gsum gyi dbang phyug ma// gser gyi thod gdengs thor tshugs can// g.yu mkhar ldem pa'i nang shed na// rin chen 'bar ba'i sgo mo gsal// 'gram bzhi chu las bgyis// logs bzhi rlung las bgyis// yang thog ni g.yu yis

phub// dmar nag me yi gdan steng nas// rin chen ral pa thor tshugs bcings// sku ni 'khril zhing ldem bag can// chibs su sbrul chen dkar khra chibs// phyag gnyis gser gyi 'khor lo bsnams// zhabs gnyis rol mtsho'i gting du brkyang// dbu gsum zhabs bzhi go lcog can// g.yu yi gtsug phud phrag la bkal// gser gyi skad sgrogs bzung ba bgyis// bdud rje rgyal po'i mtha' ma can// mAM sa za zhing rgyud drug sgrol// mig bzlog kha yal snying 'chu'i nad// g.yu yi go lcog can gyis gtong// dkar mo lto rgyas thugs dam bskang// khyed nyid thugs dam mi bskang du// mtshal chen dkar mo'i gling chen gyi// rgyal po b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsnyun// slob dpon shrI seng ha yis// sku la dkar mo lto brgyas bskang// mig bzlog nad chen khyod kyis bcad// lus ni rin chen lnga yi lus// rin chen rkang bzhi nor gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing gi lus po can// dbang po brgyad ni rin chen gter// rin chen sna lngas thugs dam bskang// rin chen gzugs kyis khyod nyid bskang// nad rnams gdug pa khyod kyis bzlog/ mu tre mu tre dza/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las// kar mo rgyal mo las byed ma'i bskang ba mdor bstan pa'i skabs so//// smug rgya srol po'i mnga' bdag mo// rmig pa khra bos mchod cing bskang// b+ha ga skye med mkha' klong dag pa nas// bde chen 'du 'bral med pa'i sku 'khrungs te// ye med stong pa rab tu gsal ba nas// bde chen 'du 'bral med pa spyan drangs nas// bal nad 'dar bu'i dal ka bcad pa'i phyir// lha mo khyod la thugs dam bskang// srid pa hor lcam rkang mgyogs ma// gnas ni ri rab rtse la bzhugs// sku mdog nag mo lcags kyi ral pa can// dbyings kyi ma mo rgan byed ma// stag mkhar dgu khri dgu thogs na// ma mo chen mo sku bzhugs te// khang mig gcig la skar khung brgya// logs la mda' khung brgya btod de// rnam shes tshogs brgyad dus gcig gzigs// lha mo chen mo dri za 'dul// shar gyi phyogs kyi nyi zer la// dri za bdul ba'i gnyan po mdzad// dri 'dul gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// hor lcam rkang mgyogs gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi ma// hor lcam rkang mgyogs bran du 'khol// sku lus gcig la spyan mig brgya// khang mig gcig la sgo mo brgya// steng du spyan mig gzigs pa yis// steng gi lha bran dus gcig 'dar// sman mo'i tshogs ni skrag par byed// lha mo khyod kyi sku nyid ni// ma mo stong gi pho nya byed// phyogs bzhir gom pas phyin pa'i rkang mgyogs ma// zhang po ya bdud hor lha bag pas gdug pa'i lcam// skye shi med par rkag mgyogs ma// ma ni srid pa'i bde 'gro ma// sku ni

nag mo lcags kyi ral pa can// ral pa'i gseb nas tsha tsha 'khrugs// dung gi khri la g.yu yi gdan steng nas// phyag na skye 'gro khram la 'debs pa'i me long gzigs// gser gyi tsong tsong brag la 'phyong// nyi ma byang phyogs pha ki na// gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dul mdzad ma// spyugs pa'i brda la bcings mdzad ma// dgra la phur pa 'debs pa mo// srid pa'i hor lcam rkang mgyogs ma// phyag na gser gyi 'khor lo 'dril// lcags kyu rtse dgu phyag na bsnams// gdug byed rnams kyi snying nas 'dren// sku las me lce dpag tshad stong// dus tshod 'dzin pa'i dbang mo che// mig nas nyi ma'i 'od zer 'char// zhal nas bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag/ phra men gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma// dar dkar gur chen yol 'og nas// nyid kyi sku ni 'khril zhing ldem// mAM sa za zhing rgyu drug sgrol// stong gsum byol bzlog mdzad pa'o// chibs su stong pa sprin gyi rta// dbu la thor tshugs bcu drug bcings// bal yul tsha ba rong du hor lcam sku sprul te// bal nad gtong ba'i dbang mo che// u rgyan slob dpon 'bab legs kyis// gsang ba'i mtshan btags hor lcam rkang mgyogs ma/ bskang ngo grub pa'i lcam gcig ma// bskang ngo smug rgya srol pos bskang// ye med stong pa'i rgyal po ni// mi skye dbyings nas sku 'khrungs te// skye med stong pas thugs dam bskang// dbang phyug gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// bskang rdzas smug rgya srol pos bskang// stong pas stong pa bsgral ba la// bsgral zhes bya ba'i tha snyad med// b+ho na la pa hUM le tre tre shag tre sha hUM b+h+yo/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo smug mo'i blon mo bskang ba'i skabs so//// mnga' bdag chen mo gtsug phud can// gag pa dang lhog pa'i mnga' bdag de bskang ba ni/ sngo rgya srol po gla ba dang bya nag mo zho thig can des bskang ngo// hUM mkha' dbyings bde chen 'du 'bral med pa na// pha med ma med blon mo skye shi med// las kyi rgyal mo chen mo las mkhan mo// dbang phyug gsang ba'i yum gcig bde spyod ma// skye med b+ha ga'i dbyings nas sku 'khrungs nas// skye shi zlog par byed pa'i mnga' bdag mo// skye shi las la mnga' mdzad mnga' bdag mo// skye shi las la mnga' mdzad mnga' bdag gtsug phud can// bskang ba'i mthun rdzas 'di yis thugs dam bskang// dbang phyug gsang ba'i yum gcig las mdzad ma// gnam sa'i bar la mnga' mdzad dbang mo che// tir ya rgya yi yul du grub// rgya nag nang du sku bzhugs tshe// lhogs pa skrangs pa'i mnga' bdag mo// bar snang nam mkha'i phyi mthongs nas// srid pa gnam gyi ya ba bskor// smug nag chen mo rab gsal 'phags// khyod ni skye med dbyings nas 'khyungs// byang chub sems la skye shi

med// sems la skye ba med la 'gag pa med// mnga' bdag chen mo gtsug phud can// rgya gar nya mig khang pa na// gser mkhar gru gsum g.yu bad can// chos nyid skye med dbyings phyug ma// ye shes zhi ba'i ngang nyid can// rab 'bar rgya mtsho ye shes gsal// mkha' dbyings bde chen gsal ba nas// pho brang mtshan mo rgyu ba'i mig stong ma// dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi mnga' bdag mo// las su rnal 'byor grogs mdzad ma// 'bar ma nyi ma'i bang bas mgyogs// bdag nyid zangs ma'i sbu gu las// sa bon las ni skur gyur nas// 'byung ba lnga dang dbyer med pa'i// mnga' bdag chen mo sems las byung// sems nyid skye med byang chub sems// byang chub sems las ma nyid byung// ma zhes bya ba dngos po med// pha mas bskyed kyang bdag la byung// bdag gi kun bzang byang chub sems// byang chub sems las ma mo byung// ma ni chos nyid dbyings yin te// mo ni rig pa'i ye shes yin// ye shes rang rig dbang sgyur ma// lta ba mya ngan ye nas 'das// spyod pa mya ngan yongs ma 'das// las la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i sku// bdag ni ye nas byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni spros dang bral// spros bral skye med b+ha ga nas// dbang phyug las mkhan mnga' bdag skyed// rig pa'i spyod yul las kyis 'khol// de nas gnas su shi sa bstan// de ltar sems las khyod bskyed kyang// sems can las kyis mtshon du yang// khyod kyi mtshon pa'i pha ma ni// nyi ma shar phyogs pha ki na// dri 'dul dri za'i rgyal mo ste// dung gi khong seng bcu drug la// ma yi dum bu rum du yang bu la brgyan// gnam gyi rgyal po gtsug phud can// ma ni lte mtshon rje steng ste// rdo rje khros pa'i dbang mo che// dpag bsam bum par mtshon pa'i sras// bcud kyi rgyal mo ltang 'dzin ma// rgya gar nang na sku bzhugs nas// las su lhog pa dkar nag gtong// rgya yi rgyal mo sha sa le// b+ha ga hri ti rgan byed ma// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang mo che// sngo skya srol pos thugs dam bskang// bskang ngo dam can rgyal mo bskang// srog med mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang// lha med gzugs kyis thugs dam bskang// byon pa na le sha mi sang sang he he ke mu khu lo b+h+yo/ ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ mnga' bdag chen mo gtsug phud can bskang ba'i le'u'i skabs so//// de nas mtsho sman chen mo sgrub pa la// bskang ba'i skabs 'di gsungs so// lug chu kha dang khyi sngon mo shel mig sbrul de rnams kyis bskang ba'o// hUM skye med b+ha ga klong chen nas// skyed par med par sku 'khrungs te// rigs pa'i lha mo dpal gyi lcam// mtsho sman chen mo ltang 'dzin ma// gser gyi khri la g.yu yi gdan steng nas// phyag na 'phrul gyi me long

bsnams// sku ni ma bskyed brtan par bzhugs// shel mig mdangs la thugs re 'thad// sku mdog sngon mo zhags pa can// sku la nya lcibs go zu gsol// bzhugs ni rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// chibs su sbrul chen khra bo chibs// mdze 'bras gtong ba'i dbang mo che// sku yi go zu nya lcibs 'bar// gser gyi sgrog zungs mig mang ris// mtsho yi gting nas me 'bar te// kha 'bar mas ni 'bud par byed// byang shar mtshams na sku bzhugs nas// gser gyi nyag thag skyong mdzad ma// thugs kyis khams gsum gsal bar gzigs// 'bar ma me yi zhags pa can// 'bar ba nyi ma'i mig gcig ma// 'bar ma glog gi lce 'byin ma// mtsho sman chen mo khyod kyi ma// ma dros klu ni khyod kyi pha// mtsho sman chen mo ltang 'dzin ma// gser gyi sku mkhar ldem pa na// za 'og nya mig gur phub nas// klu mo kun gyi 'khor gyis bskor// dam nyams dgra bo phung bar byed// sbas pa'i ma mo sru mor bzung// shel gyi thod gdengs dbu+u la bcings// g.yu yi chags bu zhabs la gsol// gser gyi lan phran dbu la tshar// mtsho sman chen mo mi bzad ma// khyaud kyi sku ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sbrul phran brgya yi phyag gdub can// chu srin stong gis snyan cha byas// sku lus gcig la lag pa stong// mtsho la rlob cing rba la 'khrug/ srin mo za byed khol mor 'khol// 'bar ma gnyis dang spun drung gnyis// cir mi 'ongs pa'i spun drung bzhi// pha med ma med yid kyi bu// khyod nyid byang chub sems las byung// nu ma'i dkyil nas nyi ma 'char// smug mo stong gi kha blon mdzad// bskang ngo mthun pa'i rdzas kyi thugs dam bskang// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ mtsho sman bskang ba'i skabs so//// kha rgya srol po dang/ khyi rgya bo dang/ bya nag mo dang/ dar mthing nag yug gcig gis thugs dam bskang ba ni// rdzong mo dka' bzlog ma ste/ hUM mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa nas// dpal gyi dbang phyug dka' bzlog ma// 'jig rten khams kyi mthu mo che// las la dbang bsgyur gsang ba'i yum// thugs rje rgyud bskul khro mo 'bar ma'i mngag gzhug mdzad// lte ba'i phyogs nas drang srong chen po gza' brgyad 'char// khyod kyi thugs las nyi zla 'char// khyod kyi zhabs kyi mthe bong nas// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'char// khru gang tsam gyis gnam ma sleb// chag gang tsam gyi sa ma sleb// bdag nyid gzugs kyi phung po las// rdzong mo dpal gyi dbang phyugs skyed// sems las gzugs kyi phung po byung// sems nyid skye med byang chub sems// 'du 'bral med pa'i sku 'khrungs te// dpal gyi dbang phyug dka' bzlog ma// ske rags bcings shing lag na mdung zhags thogs// ral gri thogs nas khrag

gis myos// rin chen ral pa gyen la bsgreng// srid pa gsum la mnga' mdzad ma// khyod kyi sku ni gnya' shing 'dzin gyi kha na bzhugs// sku la me ri phung po 'bar// zhal nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bebs// khyod kyi sku la spyan mig bzhi// g.yas kyi spyan gyis dri za 'dul// g.yon gyi spyan gyis gshin rje 'tsho// gshin rje 'dul zhing mi snying za// g.yas kyi spyan gyis gnod sbyin 'dul// g.yon gyi spyan gyis dgra bgegs 'dul// bskang ngo dam can rgyal mo bskang// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ rdzong mo bskang ba'i le'u'i skabs so//// ma mo kha 'bar kong sgra can bskang ba ste/ btsun mo bzhi bcas te// hUM mkha' dbyings klong nas skur bzhengs pa'i// srid pa gsum la dbang byed pa'i// mnga' bdag chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// srid gsum b+h+yo bzlog mdzad pa'i dbang mo che// rtog pa med pa'i khang pa nas// rtog pa med pa'i nyag gcig bzhugs// cir mi 'ongs pa'i spun drung bzhi// gsang ba'i dbyings nas sku bskyod nas// lcags mkhar gru bzhi khyams brgyad na// g.yu yi bad la gser sgo btsal// blon mo chen mo khyod bzhugs te// 'gran zla med pa'i kha blon mdzad// skye ba med pa'i b+ha ga nas// skye ba med pa'i sku 'khrungs te// las ni sna tshogs rnam bzhi mdzad// bltar med sku ni ri rab tsam// 'byung ba lnga ni sku bskyed de// 'byung ba nam mkha' stong pa ste// lcags mkhar gru bzhi stong pa'i ngang// stong pa'i ngang las sku 'khrungs pas// stong pa stong pa'i thugs dam bskang// ye med stong pa dbyings phyug ma// dus bzhi cha snyoms rgyal mo bzhi// sgra ling be sna'i klong chen nas// bskyed pa med par sku 'khrungs nas// kha blon chen mo kha 'bar ma// skrangs dang skyug pa'i nad rnams gtong// bskang ngo bltar med mdangs kyis bskang// bskang ngo bltar med gzugs kyis bskang// skrangs pa bye ta'i gling chen nas// kha 'bar chen mo kong sgra can// lcags mkhar gru bzhi khyams brgyad nas// gser stan dar dkar yol 'og na// blon mo chen mo kong sgra can// sman mo stong gi zhus thag gcod// kha blon brgya yi dbus na 'gying// zhal nas thog dang ser ba 'bebs// rlung rta ser bu chibs mdzad ma// rlung zhags khra bo phyag na bsnams// dgra sdang rlung la skur du byon// zhabs kyis bar snang lha chen gnon// srid gsum sgra sgrogs mthu mo che// spyan nas bdud rtsi'i zham chu 'bab// bdud kyi khams kun phung bar mdzad// zhal gyi tshems bar so gnyis nas// thu lum chen mo rab 'bar 'don// bdud kyi bya rgod chen mo brgyad// ltag pa'i dbyes nas 'phur zhing lhag/ zangs kyi khyi mo chen mo bzhi// dpral ba'i dbyes nas 'khang zhing zug/ skrangs pa bye ta'i gling

shed nas// skye med rgyal mo khyod bzhugs te// le brgan ral pa gnam la bsgrengs// dbu gsum ye shes 'bar ba'i klong// lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yis// bdud kyi khams kun sreg par mdzad// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyis// srid pa'i gtso mo rdul du rlog/ bar snang khams kyi lha bran brgyal// lha mo rdo rje rtsal rab rtsal// skrangs lkugs gtong ba'i dbang mo che// chibs su lkugs rta snga sna chibs// rol du bar snang glog chen khrid// 'gran zla med par shug thag gcod// ngag lkugs gtong ba'i dbang mo che// kr-iSh+Na sA ras thugs dam bskang// blon mo chen mo 'bar ba ma// btsun mo ba les thugs dam bskang// bsgral ba med par tshim gyur cig/ ta sha na yi thugs dam bskang// khyod ni btsun mo gnyis la dgyes// btsun mo gnyis kyi thugs dam bskang// thu lum rab 'bar gsal ba mo// gsang ba'i yum gcig sgra mo che// bskang ngo dam can rgyal mo bskang// sems 'di ni 'byung bas skyed// 'byung ba ye med stong pa ste// 'byung ba lnga la skye shi med// byang chub sems la skye shi med// skye shi med pa'i dbyings phyug ma// bskang rdzas chen po 'dis bskang gis// khyod kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ lha mo rdo rje rtsal rab 'bar gyi thugs dam bskang// rgyal mo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ shes rab gsal ba'i dbyings chen nas// rgan byed chen mo rdo rje kha 'bar kong sgra can// dus bzhi snyoms pa'i rgyal mo la// bskang ngo shes rab dbyings kyis bskang// b+h+yo pa tsa du la ba te sha na mu sa ru tsa hUM b+h+yo// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo kha 'bar kong sgra can gyi thugs dam bskang ba'i skabs so//// hUM gsang ba'i dbang phyug las kyi phra men ma// mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar ba mi bzad khrag chen 'khrugs pa mo// rnam dag zhing la bstod pa'i tshul ston pas// bskyed pa med par sku 'khrungs b+ha ga gsal// shes rab dbyings chen yum chen gsang ba mo// rab 'bar sgraba'i dam tshig bdag skyong gis// nyams pa'i chad pa sgos bskos pa yang na chod// dus la ma g.yel myur la mdzod// bdag gi gzugs kyi phung po la// snang ba med pa'i gos gyon cing// mthong ba med pa'i rkyen yod na// sdang ba'i dgra bo las ngan pos// nyes pa med par stabs la bcad// chen ma mo mi bzad ma// srid gsum 'gran zla med pa'i rgyal mo khyod// zhabs gnyis 'khor los rab brgyan te// gling bzhi kun tu khyab par nyul// khyod ni stong pa'i ngang las 'khrungs// stong pa bltar med ye nas mtshon du med// ye nas mtshon du med pa'i rgyal mo khyod// 'jig rten khyab par 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ma// rab 'bar sgra can dung gi thor tshugs

can// don du dbyings kyi yum drug kha blon mdzad// gser mkhar zo ba rdzong gi nang shed na// zhal bsgos rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga la mdzad// nyin mtshan med par mkhar gyi rtse la bzhugs// kha bdag chen mo rab 'bar ma// nag mo tshogs kyi kha blon mdzad// ye shes 'byung ba'i ngang las byung// sems nyid ye med mtshon du med// mtshon du med pa'i ngang las sku 'khrungs te// sems can las kyis khyod kyi sku la mtshon// stong gsum dbang bsgyur rab 'bar mthu mo che// sems can las kyis khyed kyi sku mtshon te// rtog med khang par rtog med khyod bzhugs pa// smyo ba be ta'i klong be ha'i gling chen ye lud nas// sku mdog smug gu g.yu yi lan phran can// zhabs la gser gyi 'khor los btegs// 'dzam bu'i gling bzhi khyab par nyul// las su smyo 'bog nad chen btang// sngags pa dam nyams 'khor du nad chen gtong ba'i dbang mo che// sngon tshe dur khrod bsil tshal du// gsang ba'i mtshan btags rdo rje kha ral can// gser mkhar zor ba gdong gi nang shed na// las kyi rgyal mo sku bzhugs te// gser gyi nyag thag brtsegs pa la// g.yu yi bad btags ya la la// ma mo'i nang na 'khu ldog che// gnyan mo mi pham khyod kyis kyang// smyo ba be ta'i gling chen nas// sngags pa'i 'khor du smyo 'bog gtong// nyams pa rnams la chad pa chod// dam tshig nyams pa'i gnyen du che// spyan rdzi ba spu nyag re la// gza' skar rgyug cing rgyu skar 'gyed// smyog 'bog gtong ba'i dbang mo che// bskang rdzas sa pa sha nas bskang// bsgral ba med par tshim gyur cig/ sems can 'di yi mdangs chen 'dis// nam mkha' stong pa'i ngang dang mnyam// bya yi dge bsnyen 'di yis thugs dam bskang// sems can 'di la dbugs yod de// gzung du med pas rlung dang mnyam// gzugs med dbugs kyis thugs dam bskang// sems can 'di la gzugs yod pas// kha ral rdo rje rtsal gyi thugs dam bskang// smyo 'bog gtong ba'i rgyal mo la// mtshon du med pa'i gzugs kyis bskang// smyo ba be ha'i gling chen du// dam tshig nyams pa'i sngags pa la// smyo 'bog gtong ba rgyal mo khyod kyis gtong// khyod kyi thugs dam g.yu ske ma yis bskang// bskang bas tshim ste bsgral ba med// stong pas stong pa bsgral ba la// bsgral zhes bya ba'i gdags gzhi med// bsgral ba med par tshim gyur cig/ b+h+yo ba na she tre ma tre te ma gu se hUM ha he b+h+yo/ ma mo de ni phu ron gyis bskang ba ste/ nag mo nan ltar khros na/ bya phu ron gtsor byas la dbyings kyi yum drug nas mar rdzas tshogs tshad kyis bskang ba'o// 'di ma mo bskang ba'i le'u chen mo ste/ sgo nas gnas kyi cho ga nyi shu rtsa gnyis po dang/ yang sgos skong yod

do/ de yang sgos skong ni/ dkar mo nag mo smug mo gsum du phye na/ ze tshe kol ni sgos skongs so// srid pa'i b+h+yo bzlog gis bskang ba ni/ ma mo spyi'i skongs so// gling bzhi dang gur yang spyir bskang ba'o// rigs bzhi bsdus te bskang na/ spyi bsgrub chen pos bskang ste// sngags pa dam tshig nyams nas 'khor du ma btub pa dang/ rang nad kyis gdung ba la/ spyi sgrub la spyi bskang gang 'grub pa btags nas drag tu bskang zhing/ slob dpon la dbang nos nas 'gyod pa skyes nas bshags na 'di dang phyi ma gnyis kar mi sgrib par 'gyur ro// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo bsdus pa brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong rtsa brgyad kyis bskang ba dang/ pho 'dus pa dang sa bdag dang/ klu'i bskang ba le'u chen po'i skabs so//// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ gu ru dpal bzhad pa rtsal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//// slad kyi gu ru 'phrul bag gi thugs kyi dgongs pa'i bem zhes bya ba 'di/ gu ru 'phrul gyi gshog rgod rtsal dang ban chung yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur ba'o//// bdag 'dra ban chung sangs rgyas kyis// 'dzam gling sems can rtog can la// lung chen bskang ba le'u chen po 'di// shog ril dpe chung nyi shu rtsa bzhir spel// shog bu lnga ni lo yi bcos thabs yin// dgos pa de yis tshang bar 'gyur// 'dzam gling sems can grol gyur cig/ pha tshogs ma tshogs mkha' 'gro ma// thugs dam bskang ba 'di bsgyur bas// bdag la rtag tu skyob gyur cig/ ma mo srid pa'i bem chen 'di// mthu chen byin rlabs bkra shis shog/ ma mo rnams kyang 'du bar shog/ dbyings kyi ma mo 'di mchod pas// tshogs gnyis rdzogs te sgrib gnyis byang// tshe 'dir bar chad thams cad bzlog/// rgya gar skad du/ karma ma hA kA la khra dra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po las mgon bya rog gdong gi rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung nag po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi la chos ston pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu nyid ma hA kA la bya rog gdong can du sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus ngan bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// ma hA kA la nag po che// de yis bstan pa srung bar byed// lha chen dpal 'bar khros pa yi// thugs mgon nag po chen po ste// de yi las mgon bya rog gdong// nga yis sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam bzhi'i 'khor rnams bsrung ba dang// dkon mchog dbu

'phang bstod par gyis// sngags 'chang bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong// dus ngan rtsod pa dar ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas bstan pa rang gis 'jig/ de dus khyod kyi las sgrubs shig/ ces stsal to// bya rog gdong gis slar zhus pa/ nga yi las mkhan dmar mo rtsa 'jib khrag 'jib ma// 'di yis nga yi las rnams sgrub// 'jigs byed dpa' bo'i bka' las nyan// ces gsol to// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gis slar bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ nga yi las rnams mtshon cha 'dra// zhes gsungs so// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u dang po'o//// de nas bsgrub bsnyen las kyi rim pa yang/ gsad dang bzlog dang gnan pa dang// bsreg dang gtor ma ting nge 'dzin// gnad la dbab dang gzir ba dang// ltas ngan cho 'phrul tsha ba'i rims// yum gyis gsad dang ba liM bzhis gsad dang// phyi nang gsang ba'i rten bca'o// ga'u thod pa'i gzhal yas khang// de ltar rdo rje 'chang la smras so// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u gnyis pa'o//// de nas bsnyen pa'i rim pa yang// dur khrod sa nag blangs nas ni// rol cha sna tshogs dkrol nas ni// de la maN+Dal bya bar gsungs// gru gsum nag po kha khyer can// khyi mo nag mo'i g.yang gzhi dgram par bya// de steng bu mo gtsang ma'i ka pA la// de steng ga'u kha sbyor nang// gri rgod snying la 'ben bya la// de steng gri gug gzhag par bya// steng nas dar nag gur yang phub// phyi nang gsang ba'i rten gzug la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma bsham// hUM// las kyi mgon po nag po ni// yan lag thung zhing gel pa yi// khros pa'i mdog can bya rog gdong// g.yas kyis gri gug nag po thogs// g.yon pa b+han dmar khrag gis bkang// A+oM ma hA kA la g+hu ni hri da hUM phaT/ bsnyen pa grangs la them par bskyal// bstod pa gtang zhing mchod par bya// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas gtor ma bya ba ni/ sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma shar du dgod// khrag sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma lho ru dgod// snying sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma nub tu gzhag/ rus sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma byang du gzhag/ de la dmigs pa byin gyis brlab// oM AHhUM/ sbyang dang spel dang bdud rtsir bsgyur// A+oM ma hA kA la badzra/ g+hu na hr-i dang/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ che ge mo'i mAng sa/ rak+ta tsit+ta go ro tsa na/ ba su ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ zhes dbul bar bya'o/ las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u bzhi pa'o//// phyi nang gsang ba'i rten rnams ni// phyi srog lug nag g.yag nag la// snying po

bris la rten du gzung// nang gi rten ni mda' dang dar nag gsob// snying po sngags dang bcas par bcings// gsang ba'i rten ni gri rgod du// g.yul du shi ba'i snying nang du// srog gi 'khor lo bris byas la// dar nag gril la lus la bcings// de yis lus dang grib mar 'gyur/ las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u lnga pa'o//// de nas gsad par bya ba ni// tsha ba gsum dang nim pa khrag/ yungs kar yungs nag dug dang khrag/ ske tshe ba yi rdzas dang phu+u brgod rnams// skyer pa'i shing la me spar nas// las kyi mgon po'i gsad pa bya// ting nge 'dzin dang gtor ma yang// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu 'bad// yugs sa'i khyim nas me blangs la// sngags 'di bzlas pas bsreg par bya// oM ma hA kA la g+hu na hri da hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ che ge mo dom dra rmi dang ku ru hUM phaT/ ces pas bsreg par bya'o// las kyi mgon po bya rog gi rgyud las le'u drug pa'o//// hUM las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong// gri gug thod khrag lag tu thogs// dmigs pa'i nang khrol 'drad cing za// de yi rgyu ma 'dren par byed// rkang dang rus pa stob cing 'cha'// yum ni gsod byed khrag 'jib ma// phyag bzhis rkang dang snying dang khrag/ ma mo rnams kyis sha la rol// dur khrod che sbyar len 'du rnams// dbang po rnams dang nang khrol 'dren// 'byung po rnams kyis sha la spyod// mchod pa bstod pa sngags rnams drang// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u+u bdun pa'o//// de nas ngag ni mnan pa ni// sa nag dur khrod sol ba la// dug dang khrag gis byug par bya// mar nag byug la 'bi 'bi bya// skol phor nang du bcug nas ni// ma phyung skyer pa'i phur pas ni// bum pa slebs par phug byas na// de khung ling+ga gzhug par bya// oM ma hA kA la dom dra drag sha/ king ka ra/ stam ba laM ku ru laM/ rgyug rgyug/ breng breng/ thum thum/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ khrag la lcib lcib/ chod chod/ thum thum s+t+wam+b+ha nan/ las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u brgyad pa'o//// oM ma hA kA la gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na che ge mo'i mAng sa la kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM ma hA kA la ha na ha na che ge mo'i rak+ta la kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM ma hA kA la da ha da ha che ge mo'i tsit+ta la kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM ma hA kA la pa tsa pa tsa che ge mo'i ko ro tsa na la kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM ma hA kA la mA ra ya che ge mo'i ba su ta la kha kha khA hi khA hi/ las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u+u dgu pa'o//// de nas zlog par 'dod gyur na// dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang/ yungs kar nyung nag bra bo dang// sran ma sha ni gtor chen bya// las mkhan yab yum kha sbyar nas// dam tshig mgon po

bskyed nas ni// ye shes mgon po bstim par bya// 'jig rten mgon po mchod par bya// las kyi mgon po rbad par bya// ma hA kA la drag sha/ dom tra trag ling/ ma ma ling ling/ lcib lcib/ chod chod/ thum thum mA ra ya bzlog/ gtsur tor 'og tu sba/ las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u bcu pa'o//// de nas las byed ma 'dod na// rang nyid dam tshig mgon por bsgom// ye shes mgon po spyan drangs la// 'jig rten mgon la ba liM 'bul// las kyi mgon po dkrug par bya// phaT hUM ta hri na g+hu la kA hA ma oM/ drag shad ma ma lcib lcib chod chod thum thum ging ka ra// thun rdzas mgon po'i gzugs la brdeg cing ling+ga la brab po// yul la rbad do// des rang dbang med par las byed do// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas thun gyi bsgrub pa yang// yungs kar nyung nag dudang khrag/ lug nag snying dang g.yag nag snying// pho rog mi pho'i snying dag dang// khrag skam bre gang g.yag rur blug/ yang na su b+hi nang dag tu// rabs chad pho mo'i thod nang du// ser ba'i thun rnams sbreng bar bya// yul mi srog dang yul srung mi// thun gyi nang du bcug par bya// rang nyid ye shes mgon por bskyed// 'jig rten mgon po rnams/ lha ma srin sde brgyad ste// gser gyi ri bdun nas/ gser gyi zor ba thogs// me tog 'joms par byed/ oM ma hA kA la dom tra trag shad/ bdud khrom/ ma hA la ser phrem/ shun ting smin phrom/ shar shar drag tu phog/ nal nal chem chem/ phrom phrom/ shar shar nag nag bdud phrom g+hu na hrI da trag shad/ ling ling 'ur 'ur/ lhogs lhogs/ 'khug ma lam/ phu phu nA ga bur thums/ chem chem phrom nal phrom nal/ sarba sha trUM a mu ka'i lo tog sna tshogs ma hA kA la du pe sha sha shu shu ging ka ra/ ma ru tse mar gu lam/ phrom phrom/ na ga shu bo ho lam/ ma ma rag mo dza dza phob/ ces rtags la thug gi bar du bzlas so// gza' bdud rA hu la dang sbyar ro// thun 'od 'byung glog gis bar snang khengs/ 'brug gis sa gzhi g.yos/ thun la ser ba dngos su 'ong/ las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//// ye shes mgon po ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'o// 'jig rten mgon po ni lha ma srin sde brgyad do// las kyi mgon po ni bya rog gdong can yin// ma mo rtsa srog khrag 'jib mas las byed do// chos 'khor bsrung na kho la gnyer gtad do// nor bsrung na rten gsum rtag tu bcad/ gang 'dod rbod na gsang rten lus la 'chang/ mi snying bsgul na gtor ma dus gsum gtang/ dngos grub 'dod na mchod pa rtag tu 'bar ro// dang po bsnyen pa'i las ni shin tu

gces// bya nag mi nag g.yag nag dang// ma mo glu len gar byed dang// rtsam tsam rang yang lnga dang shwa 'ud dang// grangs dang ser ba dngos su 'byung// thog dang 'ur sgra chen po dang// dar nag thogs dang dung dkar 'bud// lce la me tog skyes pa dang// rgyal po'i tshul du dbang bskur ba'o// lung bstan 'byung dang skad snyan 'bod// rmi ltas gsal bor ston pa ni// las mgon bya rog gdong gi ltas// dngos su byung na ma mo'i rtags// des las gang yang thogs pa med do// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u bcu gsum pa'o//// mdze thod skya bo sha med la// las kyi mgon po yab yum sbyar// dug dang tsha ba ske tshe dang// nya sbrul sbal pa lcong mo'i sha/ ling+ga gtub nas sbal pa'i gzugs// 'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsis mchod// oM ma hA kA la ya/ nA ga mA ra na trag shad/ thum thum chod chod/ rtsa khrol nA ga gung ling ling/ 'jib 'jib/ trag rag sha mA ra ya nA ga rtsad nas chod/ trag shad che ge mo'i tsit+ta hur thum rbad sod/ ces thun du brab bo// bskyed cing bstim pa dang/ mchod cing bcing pa'o// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//// 'bras dang zho dang 'o ma dang/ til dang khre dang sran ma'i chan// de la gtor chen rab tu bya// chang gis bkang la mar me bltam// rol cha dkrol zhing dung yang 'bud// dge 'dun rnams kyis sna drangs la// dmod dang bcol ba'i las rnams la// bskor ba bya zhing las mgon rbad// yul khams bskor zhing gtsang sar skyol// rims dang 'khrug pa zhi bar 'gyur// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong de/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi thugs kar thim mo// rnam thos sras kyis slar bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// dge 'dun mi btsun chos mi dar// dus ngan sde 'khrugs mtshon gyis gsod// ser chags rnams ni mtshon gyis gsod// skye bo rnams ni dug gis gsod// gsang sngags rgyud sde nub nas ni// mu stegs log chos dar ba'i dus// de dus bstan pa 'di yis srung// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gdug pa can/ nga'i 'khor rnam bzhi khyod kyis skyongs shig/ dge bdun gyi bstan pa khyod la gtad do// bya rog gdong can khyod kyis zung// sbas pa yum gyis rgyun du zung// gsang bar sbas so rgyun du zung// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la rgyal po rnam thos rjes su yi rang ngo// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud las/ yongs su bzung ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong gi rgyud rdzogs so// sna nam gyi 'gyur////
